900334080.baseEffect_: Put a random Runecraft follower from your deck into your hand.
900334080.baseFlair_: I'm fighting. I know Kyle would never run away at a time like this—and neither would she. For me, that's reason enough to fight.

900334090.baseEffect_: Give your leader the following effect until the end of the turn: Whenever you play a Machina card, draw a card.
900334090.baseFlair_: I, too, will fight. I have abandoned lies and deception. Now all I have left is this shard of truth. And I've learned that the truth is priceless. I am prepared to risk everything to protect it.

900344050.baseEffect_: Change the cost of a follower in your hand to 1 and change its attack and defense to 1/1.
900344050.baseFlair_:
"Love is naught but a fabrication."
With her words, love itself perished from Ville de l'Amour.
Nothing short of a miracle would return love to this place.
—Ville de l'Amour, Spirits

116322010.baseEffect_: Last Words: If you have 20 cards or less in your deck, summon a Guardian Golem.
116322010.baseFlair_: A spoon of elmwood, a jasper bowl of laraeya, and a silver throne... I'm not sure what's going to happen, but I haven't let any reagents go to waste.

115311010.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Choose - Put a Paper Shikigami or Demonic Shikigami into your hand.
115311010.baseFlair_:
Onmyodo. It appears from within the shadows of history. During a certain emperor's reign, it becomes a popular form of fortune-telling in the capital.
—The Legacy of Onmyodo: Pyo
115311010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
115311010.evoFlair_:
Nobles enjoy Onmyodo and come to use it in their everyday lives. It can make predictions concerning matters of the heart, epidemics, and even the course of battle.
—The Legacy of Onmyodo: Toh

900311010.baseFlair_: Huh? Why am I wearing a scarf if I'm made of snow? Humph! Even snowmen get cold, you know!
900311010.evoFlair_: Huh? Why am I wearing clothes if I'm made of snow? Humph! Are snowmen not allowed to be interested in fashion now?

900311040.baseFlair_: This haphazard pile of scrap metal moves with an ominous screech.
900311040.evoFlair_: This mountain of scrap metal slays the foes of its master.

900311060.baseEffect_: At the start of your turn, deal 1 damage to both leaders.
900311060.baseFlair_: Hey, no one told me I was gettin' turned into a rat! This makes me squeaking mad!
900311060.evoFlair_: Argh! What the squeak is going on? And why'd you have to make me look so ratty?

900311070.baseEffect_: Last Words: Spellboost the cards in your hand.
900311070.baseFlair_: A divine beast summoned by a kind and talented Mysterian girl. During school hours, it can be occasionally seen freely roaming the halls of the academy.
900311070.evoFlair_: One day, the young beast collected flowers around the academy to bring them to the girl, for this day was the one year anniversary of their union.

117321010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Earth Rite - Gain +1/+1 and Last Words: Summon 2 Earth Essences.
117321010.baseFlair_: Ladies and gentlemen, I give you the Nine of Wands, voice of caution. Open your eyes. Perk up your ears. The truth is right in front of you. Sharpen your senses, open your mind, and the impossible shall become possible.
117321010.evoFlair_: With deft paws and mental fortitude, the magic gems dance and twirl, forming shapes from which myriad enigmas abound. The moggy observes the crowd, waiting for just the right moment to dazzle them with the grand finale.

119321020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Deal X damage to an enemy follower. X equals the last digit of your leader's defense.
Last Words: Spellboost the cards in your hand.
119321020.baseFlair_: You have the honor of speaking to Alistair Alethea, the most brilliant mind in the skydom. I'll restore my family's honor, you'll see. You... don't know who the Alethea are? You've clearly got much to learn.
119321020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
119321020.evoFlair_: You're tired of me piercing holes in your arguments? You truly are unschooled. Always be strong, always be correct. That is the way of the scholar and I aspire to be like my father—an intellectual giant.

113331010.baseEffect_: Whenever you play a follower, gain +0/+1.
113331010.baseFlair_: Everyone loves a princess! Oh, to be a lovely princess... my beauty would drive any maiden green with envy. Maybe then I'll be able to get a little closer to them...
113331010.evoEffect_:
Whenever you play a follower, gain +0/+2.
Whenever you play a spell, gain +2/+0.
113331010.evoFlair_: Ngh... Princesses aren't supposed to be spoilsports. To earn the people's love, you've gotta spread your own! So that's why I'm gonna find out what makes each and every person amazing!

118341010.baseEffect_: During your turn, whenever an allied amulet leaves play, put a Rapid Fire into your hand. (Transformation doesn't count as leaving play.)
118341010.baseFlair_: Ahh, good ol' Rivayle. I know she's got her share of crooks, and most people 'round these parts don't have a pot to piss in, but I love her just the same! And after I catch me some bandits, she'll be an even nicer lady than she already is! Alrighty, Maiser—get your hiney on patrol!
118341010.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Put a Rapid Fire into your hand. Subtract 1 from the cost of all Rapid Fires in your hand.
During your turn, whenever an allied amulet leaves play, put a Rapid Fire into your hand.
118341010.evoFlair_: I get it. I truly do. The world don't change just 'cause you ask nicely. But I love the people of this city, no matter their lot in life. And that's why you're comin' with me—Accelerate!

705314010.baseFlair_: Time for Professor Cagliostro's super-special crash course: Alchemy for Absolute Morons!

117314010.baseEffect_:
Deal 1 damage to an enemy follower.
Earth Rite (2): Deal 4 damage instead. Then draw 2 cards.
117314010.baseFlair_:
The experiment's a huge success. Wow, am I good, or am I good?
—A Mage, in the Exploded Ruins of His Study

119314010.baseEffect_:
Deal 1 damage to an enemy.
If this card has been Spellboosted at least 5 times, put an Impalement Arts into your hand and give it the following effect: At the end of your turn, discard this card.
119314010.baseFlair_:
Step right up and witness a wonderful display of dexterity and valor! See if you can figure out the trick to this one!
—Magic Illusionist

900314020.baseFlair_: Dragons aren't the only ones who breathe fire when they're angry.

107324010.baseEffect_: Randomly put 1 of the following cards into your hand: Mysterian Missile or Mysterian Circle.
107324010.baseFlair_:
"Can you believe this load of homework? What a monster!"
"Hang in there, Lou!"
—Overheard at Mysteria Academy

114324010.baseEffect_:
Put a Naterran Great Tree into your hand.
If this is your fifth turn or later, recover 1 play point.
Then, if this is your tenth turn or later, deal 2 damage to a random enemy follower and then 2 damage to the enemy leader.
114324010.baseFlair_:
The Mother bestows gifts upon her children.
When the mages discovered her kindness in the laboratory, they saw a glistening, iridescent aether. They soon learned that it grants power to those who lust for the arcane.

118334010.baseEffect_:
If this card has been Spellboosted at least 5 times, banish 2 random cards from your deck.
Then, if it has been Spellboosted at least 10 times, banish a random enemy follower.
Then, if it has been Spellboosted at least 20 times, summon 2 Ultimate Clay Golems.
If this card has been Spellboosted at least 50 times, win the match.
118334010.baseFlair_: Just as today's seeds are tomorrow's trees, today's children are tomorrow's heroes. Likewise, today's incantation is... Oh, it's just another ol' magic spell.

900334050.baseEffect_: Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower.
900334050.baseFlair_:
"Go any further and these flames will only get hotter."
—Grea, Mysterian Dragoness

900334070.baseEffect_:
Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower.
Spellboost: Deal 1 more.
900334070.baseFlair_: It's true that all flowers eventually wilt, but I bloom beyond the world's rules. Look now upon the eternal blossom and her spells of resplendence—for it is far more than you deserve!

900344030.baseEffect_:
Deal 2 damage to an enemy.
Give your leader the following effect: At the end of this turn, if at least 4 Machina cards were played this turn, put a Delta Cannon into your hand. (This effect is not stackable.)
900344030.baseFlair_: Charging Delta Cannon... Fire. —Tetra, Sapphire Rebel

900344090.baseEffect_:
Remove all effects on an enemy follower except changes to its attack or defense.
If any allied amulets are in play, recover 1 play point.
900344090.baseFlair_: Peace, justice—those are just hollow words. Hollow words that the world had best never forget. For I am the law. And I shall not want for order in my jurisdiction. Now if you understand—silence thyself.

102312040.baseFlair_: Sure it's thrown together, but it's better than nothing!

105312010.baseFlair_: Tincture, elixir, or just today's lunch? No one knows but her.

113312010.baseFlair_:
Ingredients: black-tail lizard, firesnake powder, bat heart
—Notes from a witch's notepad
To-do list: Get a new cauldron
—Messy scribbling from a witch's notepad

106312010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If another Earth Sigil amulet is in play, perform Earth Rite - Draw a card. Recover 1 play point.
106312010.baseFlair_: The light of the stars is the light of the future. To know one is therefore to know both.

900312010.baseEffect_: (This is an Earth Sigil amulet that can be used to activate Earth Rite effects.)
900312010.baseFlair_: I daresay the fruits of my research should take my magical abilities to still greater heights!

109332010.baseEffect_: If you have at least 5 play points, Choose: Play this card as an Emergency Summoning or Reactive Barrier.
109332010.baseFlair_: "There are a couple of things I wish to impart to you. But instead of giving you the usual lecture, allow me to show you this. Think you can understand it?" —Accomplished Mage

100311010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Both players draw a card.
100311010.baseFlair_: Come one, come all, and prepare to be amazed by the greatest magic show the world has ever seen! Be sure to tell your friends!
100311010.evoFlair_: One, two, three—abracadabra! Well? What did you think? If you liked that trick, you'll love the next one!

101311010.baseEffect_: Whenever you play a spell, gain +1/+0 until the end of the turn.
101311010.baseFlair_: This flightless bird has dedicated its life to magical study in hopes of one day soaring through the sky.
101311010.evoFlair_: Faithful that wings will sprout from his back, this flightless bird continues to dedicate its life to magical study

101311020.baseEffect_: Last Words: Summon an Earth Essence.
101311020.baseFlair_: Though the wizard himself might die, his knowledge is passed on to the next generation.
101311020.evoFlair_: Even should some evildoer reduce his body to ash, the knowledge he fostered will be passed down forever.

101311060.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Earth Rite - Put a Conjure Guardian into your hand.
101311060.baseFlair_: Hmm... Either I botched the brew or this recipe is codswallop! Maybe a shard of dragonstone can rescue it.
101311060.evoFlair_: Arcane enigma! I've done it—an entirely new tincture! Failure truly is the mother of success.

103311030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Spellboost a follower in your hand 2 times.
103311030.baseFlair_: The magic is spiraling out of control! Sorry, everyone! I could really use a little help here!
103311030.evoFlair_: There's no way I can stop the runaway magic on my own. But with all of you here, things will be okay! Fight alongside me, everyone!

105311010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Draw a card if the number of Neutral cards in your hand equals or exceeds the number of Runecraft cards in your hand (excluding this card).
105311010.baseFlair_: A witch's treats must seem scary. You don't want to eat any, do you? But, still, these are my best work.
105311010.evoFlair_: Someday I'd like to open a shop of my own. That's why I make treats like this every day. Even we witches have dreams in our hearts.

105311030.baseEffect_: Last Words: Spellboost the cards in your hand.
105311030.baseFlair_: A mystical critter found in the emerald-green woods and gardens of Mysteria Academy. The enchanted gem in its forehead emits energy to nourish the greenery.
105311030.evoFlair_: This mystical critter has an important role in the early spring. It releases the magical energy it stored up during winter to create a flower garden for incoming students.

106311030.baseFlair_: You shouldn't treat familiars as if they were simple servants. They are irreplaceable companions deserving of trust. They are the rescuers of lonely old magicians, saving them from a life of solitude. —Familiars: An Introduction, Chapter 1
106311030.evoEffect_: Evolve: Spellboost the cards in your hand 2 times.
106311030.evoFlair_: Do not depend on their devotion, for that is not their purpose. To truly be a good fit for your familiar, you must work to improve yourself. Only then will your familiar's power increase. And wouldn't that be handy? —Familiars: An Introduction, Chapter 6

107311020.baseEffect_: Last Words: If you have played another Mysteria card this turn, randomly put 1 of the following cards into your hand: Mysterian Missile or Mysterian Circle.
107311020.baseFlair_: Welcome, promising wizards and witches of the future, to Mysteria. Here, you will unravel the secrets to sorcery—I will do my best to guide you on this journey.
107311020.evoFlair_: An explosion outside, you say? Ah, that must be Ms. Miranda. Just like when she was a student... Some things never change.

108311010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a random spell from your deck into your hand.
108311010.baseFlair_: The future's just like, phew! Nobody can be sure what'll happen, so it can't be put into words. But I'll bet your future is, like, fwoosh and brrrr!
108311010.evoFlair_: Your future's going to be all fwoosh and brrrr! Huh, don't you understand? Then hold on for a moment! I'll burn you—fwoosh—and freeze you—brrrr!

108311030.baseEffect_: Clash: Put an Earth Essence into your hand.
108311030.baseFlair_: It's been years and years since I started learning magic. One day before I knew it, I was standing on two legs! Who knows, I might become human before long!
108311030.evoFlair_: It's been years and years since I started learning magic. I'm still not a real mage, but someday I'll tell that girl just how I feel!

109311010.baseEffect_: Last Words: Deal 1 damage to a random enemy follower.
109311010.baseFlair_:
"Howdy! Pleasure to meetcha!"
"You guys are real... Right?"
109311010.evoEffect_: Last Words: Deal 3 damage to a random enemy follower.
109311010.evoFlair_:
"I'm not sure if I'll ever be as good as her... But one day I want to be a great witch, just like Grandmother."
"That's the spirit, Anna!"
"But then again... it's too bright to go outside..."

110311010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Randomly put a Mysteria follower (excluding Owen, Knight of Mysteria) from your deck into your hand.
110311010.baseFlair_: Right now I'm not a knight—I'm just another student of Mysteria Academy. So I'll study magic like a good pupil... while I watch over the princess from the shadows.
110311010.evoFlair_: If anything threatens the princess, I'll use all my knowledge and strength to defend her. With my enchanted blade, I can slice through any spell... Just try and stop me!

111311010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If there are no allied Earth Sigil amulets in play, summon an Earth Essence.
111311010.baseFlair_: A little heresy is imperative to sorcery, wouldn't you say? Listen, rabbit, the gift of speech is nothing to sniff at. You may have lost your colony, but you've gained incredible wisdom. —A fickle wizard
111311010.evoFlair_: Sorcery is the way of righteousness—as long as you use your gift in the name of good, magic will always be your ally. So go on, then. Return to your colony with your newfound insight. —A fickle wizard

112311030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Cayman, Mysterian Butler into your hand.
112311030.baseFlair_: Wahahaha! Ladies and gentlemen of Mysteria! Bask in my wealthy glory! I have no need for greetings—I give you my loose coins instead! Cayman! Ready my treasure so that I might shower it upon these plebes!
112311030.evoFlair_: I was born to stand above all others! No matter where I go, I'm always number one! Cayman! Ready my handkerchief, as I have moved myself to tears!

113311010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Choose - Put an Assembly Droid or Repair Mode into your hand.
113311010.baseFlair_: Core mutations have led to one new discovery after another. Rather than grow one's magical capabilities, there are now methods to improve magical efficiency... much to the dismay of a mechastaff sorcerer. —Research Archives of the Sorcerer's Guild, Vol. I
113311010.evoFlair_:
I mean, yeah, it's full of magical energy and whatever, but... Mine doesn't need to only work, it's gotta be efficient! See this? I only need an ounce of magic to get it working!
—Jetbroom Witch to Mechastaff Sorcerer

113311030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If you have 20 cards or less in your deck, deal 2 damage to an enemy.
113311030.baseFlair_:
They sparkle and glimmer ever so quickly... Enough to catch the eye of any cat. The sparks of the battlefield are just another plaything for that one.
—Lightning Shooter
113311030.evoFlair_:
Such a sparky, fluffy tail—and that adorable purr... Oh, I just can't! It's so cute, I could just go numb! You know what? I'm gonna hug it!
—Lightning Shooter

114311010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Naterran Great Tree into your hand. If you have 20 cards or less in your deck, gain +2/+2.
114311010.baseFlair_: O still and stable earth. Foundation of matter and author of gravity. Cardinal direction: North. Domain of the Gnomes. You who chill and dry... Please, tell me. Will I be as strong and steadfast as you one day?
114311010.evoFlair_: O still and stable earth. Foundation of matter and author of gravity. Cardinal direction: North. Domain of the Gnomes. You who chill and dry... Please... Give me the strength to withstand and endure, just as you do!

114311030.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Earth Rite - Gain Rush and summon a Scrap Golem.
Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Gain +4/+4.
114311030.baseFlair_:
Chief: Recurrence of uncontrolled behavior confirmed.
Manager: It's acting strange. Further experimentation required.
Trainee: What's with those weird poses it strikes?
—Records from a certain lab
114311030.evoFlair_:
Chief: Is this an incentive-related complication?
Manager: It's looking at us. Does it want something?
Trainee: Do you think... it just wants us to say "good job"?
—Records from a certain lab

115311020.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: Randomly put a copy of an allied amulet destroyed this match into your hand. If the amulet is a Naterran Great Tree, gain +2/+2.
115311020.baseFlair_: O volatile and fickle wind. Master of gentle endurance and change. Cardinal direction: East. Domain of the Sylphs. You who heat and dampen. Yours is a fine zephyr that brings windfalls aplenty... and I'll gladly gather them up.
115311020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
115311020.evoFlair_: O volatile and fickle wind. Master of gentle endurance and change. Cardinal direction: East. Domain of the Sylphs. You who heat and dampen. The winds of fortune will bring me riches... I'll blow all my business rivals away.

115311030.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Enhance (5) - Summon a Charming Gentlemouse. Give +1/+1 to all allied Charming Gentlemice.
Enhance (8) - Summon 2 and give +2/+2 instead.
Enhance (10) - Summon 3 and give +3/+3 instead.
115311030.baseFlair_: Heh... Have you perhaps been charmed by my flame? This blaze and I are much the same, you know... If you get too close, you might get burned. Squeak!
115311030.evoFlair_: Heh... I dedicate this light to you. This flare is much like you, you know... radiant and dazzling. Squeak!

116311010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Repair Mode into your hand.
116311010.baseFlair_: The source of the core's metamorphosis was discovered during magitech research. The resulting tool was capable of predicting detailed fortunes. This type of magical analysis and recursion wouldn't be possible without the boon of technology. —Magical Research Report
116311010.evoEffect_: Evolve: Change the cost of a random Repair Mode in your hand to 0.
116311010.evoFlair_: The reason we incorporated technology into our spells was to grasp the manifold possibilities of magic. By breaking down the world into its constituent elements, we become capable of anything. And modern technique is to thank for this miracle. —On Amplification

117311010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If there are no allied Earth Sigil amulets in play, summon an Earth Essence. Otherwise, perform Earth Rite: Put a Golem Summoning into your hand.
117311010.baseFlair_: The Magician's raison d'être lies in creation. A flash of an idea sets ablaze the imagination, and the imagination constructs plans to set everything in motion. These inspired works of pride draw the eye and captivate the senses.
117311010.evoFlair_: The Magician is a vessel from which creation flows. Driven by the inexhaustible imperative for improvement, nothing can contain his conviction. He creates; therefore he is.

118311010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Summon a Dutiful Steed. Draw a card.
118311010.baseFlair_:
"Read up, spring chicken. You're the newest piece of crap we've hired, which means you're responsible for upholding the law now. You best not ignore a single word of this handbook, you hear me?"
—Deputy's Handbook, First Page
118311010.evoFlair_: "This whole town's a dung heap. And the criminals are the cattle doin' the dungin'. If you want to clean up the mess, you best forget everything you know about justice. Let's just hope you can stand the smell long enough to make a difference!" —Deputy's Handbook, Second Page

900311080.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Restore 2 defense to your leader.
900311080.baseFlair_: You called for me, my lord? For you to choose to interact with the plebeians beneath you, your heart is even broader than the ocean... You never fail to impress me. Here you are. Scatter these gold coins to your heart's content.
900311080.evoFlair_: Lord Shirati used to be so small, but now he has grown enough to scatter all those gold coins... It's too bright a sight for these old eyes. I vow to serve him until the end of my days.

900311090.baseEffect_: Last Words: Spellboost the cards in your hand.
900311090.baseFlair_:
One, two, three, four. Voices echo in spite of themselves. The object housing a god stands on its own. Truly mysterious.
—A Guide to Onmyodo: Introduction
900311090.evoFlair_:
Onmyodo, a momentous curse. Terrifying, without a doubt. A tiny shikigami, like a child. The sight of it hard at work is truly precious.
—A Guide to Onmyodo: Introduction

101321040.baseFlair_: My circles can decipher the building blocks of life. Would you like to know the definition of beauty?
101321040.evoFlair_: Analysis leads to a greater appreciation of the world. Open your eyes, and I'll show you everything you've ever wanted to see.

103321030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put an Earth Essence into your hand.
103321030.baseFlair_: Diminutive in appearance, slight of build, and a keeper of limitless knowledge.
103321030.evoEffect_: Evolve: Put a random card with Earth Rite from your deck into your hand.
103321030.evoFlair_: Diminutive in appearance, slight of build, and an endless wellspring of hidden arts.

104321020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a random card with Spellboost from your deck into your hand.
104321020.baseFlair_: Um, which way was the school again? This way? That way? The other way? Oh no, I'm gonna be late!
104321020.evoFlair_: I did it! I made it to school. Now watch me turn into a master sorceress. Fun spells, scary spells—I'm going to learn them all!

104321030.baseEffect_: Last Words: Earth Rite - Summon a Magic Illusionist.
104321030.baseFlair_: There are indeed tricks to my magic, but that doesn't mean anyone will be able to figure them out! Now behold as I reveal to you the rarely seen and horrific mysteries of immortality!
104321030.evoFlair_: No matter how many times you freeze me, burn me, cut me, pierce me, or crush me, I shall only reappear in all my glory—at least until you finally figure out the trick.

108321020.baseEffect_: If you have at least 6 play points, Choose: Play this card as a Mysterian Whitewyrm or Mysterian Blackwyrm.
108321020.baseFlair_: Mysteria... This really takes me back. Not a thing's changed. Not the students' passion for studying magic... And not you shadowy fools who dare to enter without permission.
108321020.evoFlair_: I won't let you run roughshod over the young ones' future. Never. Flee the academy while I am still me!

112321020.baseEffect_: Whenever you play another Machina card, draw a card.
112321020.baseFlair_: The magic researchers' latest experiment was a success. We were able to create a metal pseudo-lifeform that moves on its own. A minimal amount of mana allows it to act alongside its fellow machines, leading to increased output. —Mage Association Research Report, Part 2
112321020.evoFlair_: The magical lifeform turned out splendidly thanks to the help of a strange machine. But a portion of mages objected against incorporating technology with magic. I imagine it will prove quite difficult to change their minds. —Comment about Magical Technology 2

116321010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Draw X cards. X equals the number of allied amulets in play.
116321010.baseFlair_:
O still and stable earth. Foundation of matter and author of gravity. The essence of earth and wind is the very essence of the land itself. There's no load too heavy for it to bear... Wow.
—Geoelementist
116321010.evoFlair_:
The rain that should fall does not fall; the sun that should shine does not shine. This world is warped and its power fleeting. Our old ways have become putrefied by the new.
—Magica Principia, Part 2

116321020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put an Earth Essence into your hand.
116321020.baseFlair_: No, no, I don't want any goody-goody opponent! It's not that I'm dark-hearted, I just want someone who will give it their all! Not that I plan on losing, of course.
116321020.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Earth Rite - Deal 2 damage to all enemy followers.
Earth Rite (2) - Deal 4 damage instead.
116321020.evoFlair_: Ahh! Now this is more like it! A devilishly fun bout between two upstanding fellows! Just don't cry when I unleash my dark power!

119321010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal X damage to an enemy follower. X equals the number of times this card has been Spellboosted. Then, if X is at least 10, deal 4 damage to the enemy leader.
119321010.baseFlair_: Hyaa-ha-ha! Look at that thing burn! Huh? What are you doing here, brat? It's way past your bedtime. Keep giving me lip and I might roast you over a spit.
119321010.evoFlair_: Hey, brat. I thought I told you to go home. Toddle onto bed, kiddo, or else you won't grow up big and strong. Y'know what? Never mind. It'll be faster if I walk you home myself.

102331010.baseFlair_: Think I'm an old fool, you little whippersnapper? Well, you're right... I'm an ancient mage, and miserable to boot!
102331010.evoEffect_: Evolve: Put a Crimson Sorcery into your hand.
102331010.evoFlair_: I guess I'm getting a little too old for this, but I can at least go out with a bang. Ahem... Brace yourselves, villains!

110331020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Discard a card with Spellboost from your hand. Then put a random card with Spellboost that originally costs more than the discarded card from your deck into your hand and Spellboost it X times. X equals the number of times the discarded card had been Spellboosted.
110331020.baseFlair_: Our way is truth. Yours is deception. Your true nature flutters in the depths of your soul. Call to it, release it, and achieve your purpose in life. Only then will the truth be revealed to you.
110331020.evoFlair_:
The Third Rite: Understand Truth
Truth: the original desire. To act in accordance with this urge is but a law of life.
—Teachings of the Assembly of Truth

900331010.baseFlair_: A dauntless snowman knight who sprang forth from the king of snowmen. To warm up the ever chilly monarch, he rubs the king's back.
900331010.evoFlair_: Since it serves as a bodyguard for the king, this knight wears armor. His one fault is that when warming up the king, his spear occasionally pokes the monarch in the rear.

900331020.baseFlair_: A dastardly snowman knight who sprang forth from the king of snowmen. To warm up the ever chilly monarch, he steals clothes from passersby.
900331020.evoFlair_: Since he leads the way for the king, this warrior has grown to tremendous proportions. His one fault is that, not understanding his own power, he accidentally tears the clothes he steals.

900331030.baseEffect_: Strike: Spellboost the cards in your hand.
900331030.baseFlair_: Heretical life-forms created by a mage. They gather, shout, and plot in secret to destroy the world. "Bwa-ha-ha! Yay!"
900331030.evoFlair_: The world's destruction, the world's end. To the onions, its meaning is a mystery. They only wish to see the heartfelt smile of the mage who is their mother.

900331040.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Ward.
At the end of your opponent's turn, banish this follower.
900331040.baseFlair_:
When the spellweaver's incantation echoes, a great spirit answers her summons.
"O, spirit of war! Heed my call!"
900331040.evoFlair_:
The great spirit is faithful to his mistress, protecting her from all of her foes.
"Okay, spirit buddy! Give 'em everything you've got!"

106341010.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, randomly put 1 of the following cards into your hand: Venus, Pollux, Star Phoenix, Castor, Scorpius, or Andromeda.
106341010.baseFlair_: Do you know about stars' power? They shine, shine and glitter, glitter! Anywhoodle, if you watch the stars twinkle at night, you'll grow to love 'em for sure!
106341010.evoFlair_: Starlight has a lot of magical power, you know! You just take it like this and—bam! Uh-oh! Whoopsie doodles! Sometimes I overdo it. Haha!

111341030.baseFlair_:
"Back in my prime, we'd already be finished... Can't believe how long it's takin' me to cast spells these days."
"Taking on all of us on his own? That old coot's lost it!"
—Geos, Runehammer and an enemy officer
111341030.evoEffect_:
Bane.
Evolve: Reveal a random Runecraft spell without Spellboost from your deck and put it into your hand. Gain +X/+X. X equals the original cost of that spell.
111341030.evoFlair_:
"Yeesh! I must be gettin' old if it's takin' me this long to crush a quick thousand!"
"Just what the hell is that hamme—ooargh!"
—Geos, Runehammer and an unfortunate soul

112341030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Seal of Solomon into your hand and subtract X from its cost. X equals the number of times this card has been Spellboosted.
112341030.baseFlair_: There is a ring on his finger, a great ring that rules over all creation. The brass of this ring of wisdom commands the heavens, while the iron commands the earth. The king's name is Solomon, the founder of magic. —The Founding Mage, Prologue
112341030.evoFlair_: And so God asked the king who bore fate on his shoulders: What is your wish? What is your desire? The king replied with one single word: Wisdom. Great wisdom, previously unknown to man. —The Founding Mage, Final Act

116341030.baseEffect_:
Each turn, when you play an amulet for:
-The first time, gain +1/+1.
-The second time, draw a card.
-The third time, deal 3 damage to all enemies.
116341030.baseFlair_: Earth, fire, air, water—these are the four elements that combine to form our world. But within the eternal ebb of time, it seems humanity has forgotten its place. Heed these words: do not abandon old friends. For we are all threads in the fabric of the universe.
116341030.evoFlair_: The artificial beast seeks out new enemies as a matter of function. It then coldly calculates the difference between itself and its target, devoid of mind or purpose. The struggle between the old ways and the new has begun.

117341010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Choose - Put a Rite of the Ignorant or Scourge of the Omniscient into your hand.
117341010.baseFlair_: Turn the first page, the journey begins. I am The Fool, mirror of *. Come, ** pactbearer, take my hand—on the adventure ahead, two heads are better than one.
117341010.evoFlair_: Pact thrice affirmed, we set out. What is adventure but a sort of ***? When you have overcome the four trials, all will become ****. And then what will you do, pactbearer?

117341030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Spellboost the cards in your hand. If this card has been Spellboosted at least 1 time, draw a card. Then, if it has been at least 4 times, deal 3 damage to a random enemy follower. Then, if it has been at least 7 times, deal 3 damage to the enemy leader and restore 3 defense to your leader. Then, if it has been at least 10 times, put 3 Runie, Resolute Diviners into your hand.
117341030.baseFlair_: There once was a young girl with boundless potential slumbering within. When she decided to divine for the world, her power burst forth, awakened. She is the diviner, and in her master's place, she will guide the people to a brighter future.
117341030.evoFlair_: That crying girl of yesterday is no more. No matter how many times she stumbles, she'll keep getting up to fight despair. Destiny has taught her the most valuable lesson of all: how to stand on her own two feet.

118341030.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Enhance (5) - Gain the ability to attack 2 times per turn. Evolve this follower.
Can't be destroyed by effects. (Can be destroyed by damage from effects.)
118341030.baseFlair_:
That thing in the periphery of my vision. Is it a light? A color? An afterimage? It matters not, for she will consummate me. Ah yes, I see it now—the truth of all magic.
—Soiled Scrap of Paper
118341030.evoEffect_:
Strike: If there are more than 20 cards in your deck, banish cards from your deck until there are 20 cards left. Otherwise, put a Golem Summoning into your hand.
Can't be destroyed by effects. (Can be destroyed by damage from effects.)
118341030.evoFlair_:
The light, color, and form remain vivid in my mind.
She filled every part of me—smashing me, thereby making me whole.
—Soiled Scrap of Paper

100314020.baseEffect_:
Deal 1 damage to an enemy.
Draw a card.
100314020.baseFlair_: I weave, I fire, I weave again.

709314030.baseEffect_:
Deal 1 damage to an enemy.
Draw a card.
709314030.baseFlair_: I am requisitioning the nullification of your data link. —Yuki Nagato

100314030.baseFlair_: Truth, take living form. Move through this world until you must die.

713314020.baseFlair_:
What did you expect, challenging a genius among geniuses such as myself? Awaken... Conjure Golem!
—Kai Ijuin

100314040.baseEffect_:
Deal 1 damage to an enemy follower.
Spellboost: Deal 1 more.
100314040.baseFlair_: It starts as just a gentle breeze. Then before they notice, fwoosh!

709314020.baseEffect_:
Deal 1 damage to an enemy follower.
Spellboost: Deal 1 more.
709314020.baseFlair_:
That is Tornado. Class S, Rank 2
She is able to defeat monsters with her psychic powers
using ESP.
—Genos

101314010.baseEffect_:
Return a card that costs 2 play points or less to the player's hand.
Draw a card.
101314010.baseFlair_: The rainbow's shine catches the eye and leads you astray.

109314010.baseEffect_:
Deal 2 damage to an enemy follower.
Earth Rite: Deal 4 damage to an enemy follower instead, and deal 1 damage to the enemy leader.
109314010.baseFlair_: The heavens and earth were rent asunder long before the age of sorcery.

111314010.baseEffect_:
Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower.
Put an Earth Essence into your hand.
111314010.baseFlair_: Here, take this offering... Or perhaps I should say, this evaluation.

708314010.baseEffect_:
Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower.
Put an Earth Essence into your hand.

114314010.baseEffect_:
Banish a card from your hand and put a copy of that card into your deck.
Put a Mysterian Missile and Mysterian Circle into your hand.
114314010.baseFlair_:
The road to magical accomplishment is a long one. The first step is what people call "wisdom."
—Mysteria, Magic Founder

115314010.baseEffect_:
Summon a Paper Shikigami.
If you have 20 cards or less in your deck, summon a Demonic Shikigami instead.
115314010.baseFlair_:
Onmyodo—the way of yin and yang. A momentous curse descended from an ancient era. Without knowing who created it, or how it came to be, the people continue to pass it along.
—The Legacy of Onmyodo: Rin

900314010.baseFlair_: A faithful shield to the end, it will guard its master until nothing is left of their body.

900314030.baseEffect_:
Deal 3 damage to an enemy.
Earth Rite: Draw a card.
900314030.baseFlair_: Knowledge is meaningless without execution. Put your knowledge to the test. With a strong foundation of study and practice, the truth will reveal itself. —The Secrets to Sorcery, Preface

900314040.baseEffect_: Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower. Deal 1 damage to the enemy leader.
900314040.baseFlair_: Just gotta cast it like how the professor explained... Aw, shoot! I forgot to take notes! How am I gonna become a great wizard at this rate? —Male student, overheard at Mysteria Academy

900314050.baseEffect_: Summon a Clay Golem. Give Ward to allied Clay Golems.
900314050.baseFlair_: If you cast it like how the professor explained, it should work... Oh, drat! I'm too nervous. How am I gonna become a great witch at this rate? —Female student, overheard at Mysteria Academy

900314070.baseEffect_:
Summon a Guardian Golem.
If you have 20 cards or less in your deck, evolve it.
900314070.baseFlair_: A golem is a sorcerous shield that faithfully protects its creator, and a spear that pierces through falsehoods to find the truth.

117324010.baseEffect_: Give your leader the following effect: At the end of your turn, if it is your second, fourth, sixth, or eighth turn, deal 1 damage to all enemy followers. If it is your third, fifth, seventh, or ninth turn, draw a card. If it is your tenth turn or later, deal 5 damage to the enemy leader. (This effect is not stackable and is removed after activating 3 times.)
117324010.baseFlair_: I'm not just writing predictions for the future. I'm deciding the future.

118324010.baseEffect_:
Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower.
If you have 20 cards or less in your deck, deal 5 damage instead and recover 1 play point.
118324010.baseFlair_: Don't cross swords in front of her. In fact, don't start anything around her. Otherwise don't be surprised if things start exploding in front of you.

119324010.baseEffect_: Give Rush, Bane, and Drain to an allied follower whose attack or defense has been increased by an effect.
119324010.baseFlair_: A single drop opens the door to untold knowledge.

105334010.baseEffect_:
Put a Conjure Guardian into your hand.
Enhance (6): Put 2 more into your hand.
Earth Rite: Subtract 1 from the cost of all Conjure Guardians in your hand.
105334010.baseFlair_: God made man in his image; man made golems in God's image.

106334010.baseEffect_: Put a random Runecraft follower from your deck into your hand.
106334010.baseFlair_: "Do your best and let the heavens do the rest." What stupidity, what foolishness. Fate does not hold the reigns of life; you do.

112334010.baseEffect_: Transform an enemy follower or amulet into a Joycrafter Sammy.
112334010.baseFlair_: What's the difference between magic and an illusion? I guess it all comes down to whether or not it makes the audience smile. —Words of a retired magician

113334010.baseEffect_: Select a follower in your hand and put a copy of it into your hand.
113334010.baseFlair_: Mysteria Academy has seen a huge increase in student matriculation lately. Fresh blood, transfers—even former dropouts are getting a second chance.

116334010.baseEffect_:
Choose: Use play points equal to this card's cost and play this card as an Isabelle's Conjuration or Tetra's Mettle.
If this card has been Spellboosted at least 5 times, instead put a random Runecraft follower from your deck into your hand and give your leader the following effect until the end of the turn: Whenever you play a Machina card, draw a card.
116334010.baseFlair_:
Do we have a right to resist our creator? Can we even put up such a fight? The fearful lies start raining down.
"The heart yearns. The heart wanders. But in doing so, it becomes stronger."

117334010.baseEffect_:
Discard your hand.
If at least 2 spells were discarded, draw 5 cards.
If at least 2 followers were discarded, destroy all followers.
If at least 2 amulets were discarded, summon 2 Clay Golems and deal 2 damage to the enemy leader.
117334010.baseFlair_: The apprentice stepped forward, smiling confidently. The magus looked on, pretending he knew what was coming.

119334010.baseEffect_: Until the end of your opponent's turn, give all allies the following effect: Reduce damage from effects by 2.
119334010.baseFlair_: A true mage knows how to break the rules and rewrite them in their favor.

900334030.baseEffect_:
Deal 3 damage to an enemy.
Enhance (4): Restore 3 defense to your leader.
900334030.baseFlair_: Turn, Ouroboros! Show them your true power!

900344010.baseEffect_:
Draw 2 cards.
If this card has been Spellboosted at least 5 times, recover 2 play points.
900344010.baseFlair_: Even if only a little bit, my words will draw them in. —Runie, Destiny's Bard

900344070.baseEffect_: Give the enemy leader the following effect: At the end of your turn, reduce your leader's maximum defense by 1. (This effect lasts for the rest of the match.)
900344070.baseFlair_: Omniscience is the curse of knowing all, of being mired in arrogance. Pity the willful wretches, for tedium is their inevitable fate. The Fool takes you by the hand to the grey wasteland of the known.

900344080.baseEffect_:
Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower.
Then, if you have played at least 3 other Rapid Fires this match, deal 2 damage to the enemy leader.

101312010.baseFlair_: Throw away your books and rally in the woods. Nature is a treasure trove of knowledge.

102312050.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 2 damage to an enemy follower.
102312050.baseFlair_: The flames are a threat to thoughtless beasts but a weapon for thoughtful wizards.

104313010.baseEffect_:
Countdown (2)
At the end of your turn, put a random spell from your deck into your hand.
104313010.baseFlair_: Quiet, please. Noise upsets the books. —A poster in the Enchanted Library

107322010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Randomly summon 1 of the following: Clay Golem or Zombie.
107322010.baseFlair_: Insane, or ingenious? Occasionally a voice can be heard coming from within. "Eureka!"

114322010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Randomly summon 1 of the following - Clay Golem or Zombie.
114322010.baseFlair_:
I thought they were supposed to be making golems in there... But they seemed just as happy when they wound up with zombies. You don't think... they just wanted someone to talk to? That can't be it...
—Neighbor of a certain lab

115332010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Select an enemy follower that costs 2 play points or less and summon an allied copy of it. If another allied Earth Sigil amulet is in play, put a Veridic Ritual into your hand.
115332010.baseFlair_: To a magician, a little excess flab is merely extra magic power.

101311040.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Earth Rite - Gain +1/+1 and Ward.
101311040.baseFlair_: Fear not, dear friends. On my father's runesword I do swear that no harm shall befall you!
101311040.evoFlair_: Like my father before me, I shall serve as a defender! If you dare to face my family's rune, have at me!

101311050.baseEffect_: Whenever you play a spell, restore 1 defense to your leader.
101311050.baseFlair_: Lie still. More than that ego of yours is bruised. Now pray my healing touch is enough to see you survive the night.
101311050.evoFlair_: So our prayers were answered. My job here is done, for what it's worth. Rest a little, and Godspeed to you in the battles ahead.

102311050.baseEffect_: Spellboost: Subtract 1 from the cost of this card.
102311050.baseFlair_: You gotta try out this new spell I invented! It wasn't working the other day, but this time'll be the charm. I promise!
102311050.evoFlair_: You gotta try out this new spell I invented! I just got it to work the other day, so you have nothing to worry about! Okay, let's do this!

104311020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Restore 1 defense to all allied followers.
Spellboost: Restore 1 more.
104311020.baseFlair_: Yikes! Those boo-boos look bad! Really bad! I need to tend to them right now!
104311020.evoFlair_: A kiss'll make that boo-boo better! You'll soon feel as light as a flower petal!

104311030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Earth Rite - Gain +1/+1 and Ambush.
104311030.baseFlair_: The darkness doesn't belong only to the night. It's mine as well.
104311030.evoFlair_: The darkness doesn't belong only to the night. Long has it been my ally.

107311010.baseEffect_: Whenever you play another Mysteria card, summon a Bunnicorn Nic-nic if there isn't an allied Bunnicorn Nic-nic in play.
107311010.baseFlair_: We're always together, right Nic? As long as you're with me, we have nothing to fear!
107311010.evoFlair_: As long as Nic is by my side, there's nothing we can't do. We're in this together, forever! Bring it on!

111311030.baseEffect_: Last Words: Put a Mysterian Circle into your hand.
111311030.baseFlair_: I'm so lucky I get to study at Mysteria Academy! Magic is miraculous! And the more I study, the more there is to learn! I'd be even happier if I had any actual talent for spell-casting...
111311030.evoEffect_: Last Words: Put a Mysterian Rite into your hand.
111311030.evoFlair_: I... I don't have any magical talent... so I can't cast any really strong spells. But... I still believe in myself. I have to believe there's something special about me!

114311020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Select an allied amulet and put a copy of that amulet into your hand. Subtract 1 from its cost.
114311020.baseFlair_: My equipment is a mess, my lab is wrecked, and my eyes are watering! This is incredible! A completely unexpected reaction! This experiment is a smashing success!
114311020.evoFlair_: There's no such thing as a failed experiment—just successes... and bigger successes! If you get the result you were after, that's a success! If you don't, then you just made a brand-new discovery! That's a huge success!

117311020.baseEffect_: Last Words: Put an Insight into your hand.
117311020.baseFlair_: All right, that's this month's manuscripts. No need to thank me. When you become as experienced a writer as me, you always leave some wiggle room at the end. Huh? What do you mean I missed the deadline?
117311020.evoFlair_:
That feeling when you think the deadline's ages away, only to find it's long passed? Yes, I know that feeling all too well...
—Ghostwriter

118311030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Spellboost the cards in your hand. If you have 20 cards or less in your deck, Spellboost the cards in your hand 5 times instead.
118311030.baseFlair_: I used to carry a crystal ball everywhere back when I was still a fortune-teller. But seeing all the tragic fates that lie ahead just made me blue...
118311030.evoFlair_: This crystal sword's my best friend now. And it's what I'll use to carve my own path toward the future. That's right—by acting rather than seeing, I'm taking responsibility for my own destiny.

119311010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to an enemy follower and then 1 damage to the enemy leader. If you have 20 cards or less in your deck, deal 3 damage instead.
119311010.baseFlair_: All right, apprentices, open up your books and pay attention! The path of the mage is the path to true wisdom. I'm expecting great things from all of you, but we need to give you a thorough grounding in the basics first.
119311010.evoFlair_: All right, everybody outside! Book learning will only get you so far. You have to put that knowledge to practical use if you want to make any worthwhile discoveries.

900311050.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Can't attack.
At the end of your opponent's turn, destroy this follower.
900311050.baseFlair_: The golem's life is fleeting, like a glimpse of a dream. But its body is more unyielding than any steel or midnight reverie.
900311050.evoFlair_: The golem's life is but a passing dream. It briefly defends its master and then melts into nothing.

900311100.baseEffect_: Last Words: Spellboost the cards in your hand.
900311100.baseFlair_:
Five, six, seven, eight. Voices join together and resound. The words are powerful enough to control demons. Truly frightening.
—A Guide to Onmyodo: Interlude
900311100.evoFlair_:
Onmyodo, a momentous curse. Terrifying, without a doubt.
A fearsome shikigami, like a demon. Its strength is limitless.
—A Guide to Onmyodo: Interlude

101321020.baseFlair_: A game without stakes is no game at all. How does the wagering of our souls sound?
101321020.evoEffect_: Evolve: Spellboost the cards in your hand 2 times.
101321020.evoFlair_: Now, now. No one likes a sore loser, especially down in the hellhole where you'll be going.

103321040.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Spellboost the followers in your hand 2 times.
103321040.baseFlair_: I've no interest in musty ink scrawled on yellowed parchment. I desire new knowledge, wonders known to no man!
103321040.evoFlair_: To find new knowledge, it's necessary to leave all the dusty books behind and head out into the world. I'm not about to sit around waiting for wisdom, like some baby bird with its mouth agape.

105321030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Draw 2 cards. Give your leader the following effect: At the end of this turn, discard all spells in your hand.
105321030.baseFlair_: Grimoires are like students: some are quiet while others are more troublesome. —Mr. Heinlein
105321030.evoFlair_: The more powerful the grimoire, the more troublesome and dangerous it can be. You can't be too careful. —Mr. Heinlein

106321020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If there are no other allied followers in play, gain Rush and Last Words: Put a Magic Gun Hunter into your hand until the end of the turn.
106321020.baseFlair_: Sure, the going's easier with others, but work alone and you rake in the cash! That's why there's no one I trust but this little dude, my magic gun!
106321020.evoFlair_: You gotta have a magic gun! It almost never leaves a mark on your game. Trophies without cuts or punctures fetch a higher price after all!

106321030.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Summon an Earth Essence.
Whenever an allied Earth Sigil amulet comes into play, restore 1 defense to your leader.
106321030.baseFlair_: Compared to that uncivilized shadow magic, my holy magic is perfectly safe. Not only can it heal the body, but it can also soothe the heart.
106321030.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
106321030.evoFlair_: The effects of holy magic change depending on the state of the heart. If a wicked person wields it, then the effects could become equally nasty. Everyone, be careful during your own studies.

108321010.baseFlair_: It goes without saying, but you're extremely lucky to see the magic of a wunderkind like me. I mean, I'm Elusa after all!
108321010.evoEffect_: Evolve: Summon an Imperial Mammoth and give it Rush. Banish it at the start of your next turn. Perform Earth Rite: Give it Ward.
108321010.evoFlair_: It's almost snack time, so I guess I can give, like, ten percent of what I've got. Now check out the amazing magic of the one-and-only Elusa!

109321020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Remove all effects on an enemy follower except changes to its attack or defense.
109321020.baseFlair_: I'm the adorable alchemical prodigy, Clarisse! Yay! Just leave those icky monsters to me! I'll gather 'em all together and then kapow! Make sure you don't get caught by the blast, okay? Hehe.
109321020.evoFlair_: Dissolution is the solution! I'm the best when it comes to blowing stuff up—even better than Master Cags! Wanna see? Great! Everyone, get ready for the biggest kapow of your lives!

110321010.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (1): Restore 1 defense to your leader.
----------
Fanfare: Restore 1 defense to your leader.
110321010.baseFlair_: Our way is truth. Yours is deception. Discard your name, your rank, and your intentions. Else I shall destroy them. Then the truth will be displayed before you.
110321010.evoFlair_:
The Second Rite: Discard Deception
Deceit—that is to say, everything which is not truth—must be abandoned. Release thy true nature.
—Teachings of the Assembly of Truth

113321010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Summon an Earth Essence.
Whenever an allied Earth Sigil amulet comes into play, deal 1 damage to the enemy leader.
113321010.baseFlair_: Yeah! Uh-huh! That's the spirit! I've been saving this happy little spell just for you! No way I'll mess this one up—just a little hocus, pocus, pow!
113321010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
113321010.evoFlair_:
"A spell for smiles? Can you teach me how to do it too?!"
—Lou, Mysterian Freshman
"Easy, all you gotta do is swish, sparkle, and alakazam!"
—Emmylou, Smilemancer

114321010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If any allied amulets are in play, return 1 to your hand and deal 1 damage to all followers. If the returned card is a Naterran Great Tree, deal 2 damage instead.
114321010.baseFlair_: O fire which brings both growth and termination. Master of furious ascension. Cardinal direction: South. Domain of the Salamandra. You who heat and dry. Your flames are like the finest music. Both reduce their audiences to ash.
114321010.evoFlair_: O fire which brings both growth and termination. Master of furious ascension. Cardinal direction: South. Domain of the Salamandra. You who heat and dry. Your flames are much like dreams. Both inspire a longing that burns from the inside out.

106331010.baseFlair_: Due to her godhood, she is immortal. She has never born a scar from the passage of time. But even so, she is a frail, tender, and eternal flower from heaven with beauty beyond compare.
106331010.evoFlair_: Some flowers mustn't be plucked. Some flowers can't help but be plucked. One god sought out her beauty. After accepting the god's favor, she reached full bloom.

110331030.baseFlair_: I used to hate my powers. I thought they were only good for hurting others... that I'd be better off without them. But I was wrong. They give me the strength to protect everything I love!
110331030.evoEffect_:
Ward.
Evolve: Choose - Put a Grea's Ember or Grea's Inferno into your hand.
110331030.evoFlair_: Not even the terror of battle can compare to the prospect of losing those dear to you. I'm done hesitating. I'll do whatever it takes to protect my friends!

111331010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If there is a card in your hand that has been Spellboosted fewer than 3 times, Spellboost that card until it has been Spellboosted a total of 3 times.
111331010.baseFlair_: Flowers are not constrained to grow in the soil; they may bloom beyond the heavens. I am one such blossom. Gaze up at me with fear and respect in your heart, for I am Eleanor Gloria, the Cosmic Flower!
111331010.evoEffect_: Evolve: Put a Splendid Conjury into your hand.
111331010.evoFlair_: My very existence flies counter to the laws of this world. I bloom with my roots neither in the soil nor in the sky. My domain lies beyond the world's rules and beyond the blue. I shall bloom unfettered, unfailing, unparalleled!

112331010.baseEffect_: Whenever you play another Machina card, deal 2 damage to a random enemy follower.
112331010.baseFlair_: Thanks to its tremendous power, the controversy surrounding the use of machines was resolved. A small amount of mana makes the golem move, while its strength is amplified by machines, making it the premier magical life form. —Mage Association Research Report, Part 3
112331010.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Put a Repair Mode into your hand.
Whenever you play another Machina card, deal 2 damage to a random enemy follower.
112331010.evoFlair_: The use of machines to amplify magic power far surpassed our expectations. There is no one left who would argue against the application of such technology. But we must continue our research, for new battles await us.

115331010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Spellboost the cards in your hand.
Union Burst (10): Deal 7 damage to an enemy follower. Deal 2 damage to the enemy leader.
115331010.baseFlair_: Who are you? You've been staring at me for a while now. That must make you... a creep.
115331010.evoEffect_: Evolve: Spellboost the cards in your hand. Deal 2 damage to an enemy follower.

711331010.baseFlair_: Who are you? You've been staring at me for a while now. That must make you... a creep.
711331010.evoEffect_: Evolve: Spellboost the cards in your hand. Deal 2 damage to an enemy follower.

116331010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If any allied amulets are in play, return 1 to your hand and restore 2 defense to your leader.
116331010.baseFlair_: O volatile and fickle wind. Master of endurance and change. Combined with water, it becomes the raging gale. Aye, look at her blowin' around up there, with my feet down here on the ground—quite the competition, ain't she? —Aeroelementalist
116331010.evoEffect_: Evolve: Return an allied amulet to your hand and deal 3 damage to an enemy follower. (Activates only when both a targetable allied card and enemy card are in play.)
116331010.evoFlair_:
The elementalists chose their path. They would cut ties from the foul machinists and act as wardens for all creation. Humanity's purpose, after all, was to live alongside nature—not to control it.
—Magica Principia, Part 3

116331020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Transform another follower or amulet into a Clay Golem. If this card has been Spellboosted at least 5 times and the selected card was an allied card, transform it into an Eldritch Chimera instead.
116331020.baseFlair_: How do you do! What a terrible pleasure it is to meet you! Oh, whoops, that wasn't very polite of me, was it?
116331020.evoFlair_: I grow weary of your presence! Oh, whoops, I seem to have misplaced my manners.

118331010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a random follower without Fanfare from your deck into your hand. Put a Dutiful Steed into your hand.
118331010.baseFlair_:
"The fact that you've read this far shows you take this job seriously. Listen—if you plan on sticking it out in this stinkin' hellhole, I've got your back. I'll keep you safe till you're able to hold your own."
—Magical Gunslinger's Diary, Page 5
118331010.evoEffect_: Evolve: Deal 2 damage to an enemy.
118331010.evoFlair_:
"Seriously, this job is total bullcrap. It sure as hell ain't worth dying for, especially not for a straight arrow like you. Why don't you go sip on some milk while I clean up the mess here?"
—Magical Gunslinger's Diary, Page 6

105341020.baseEffect_:
Can't attack.
If the number of cards in your hand increases to 9 during your turn, evolve this follower and deal 3 damage to all enemy followers.
105341020.baseFlair_: Fear is the first step of worship, and hatred follows love. My dear mage, I am the nightmare you awakened. Know that even if you seal me away, freedom shall be mine in the end.
105341020.evoFlair_: These fetters are already part of me. You, my dear mage, shall soon be freed from the fetters of life!

111341010.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Earth Rite - Gain +2/+0.
Fanfare: Enhance (8) - Deal X damage to all enemies. X equals this follower's attack.
111341010.baseFlair_:
The alchemical manipulation of life is heresy. Have you experienced the ultimate heresy, the most blasphemous and reviled of all magic? Then allow me to demonstrate.
—Heretic Alchemist
111341010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
111341010.evoFlair_:
Bind life into lumps of earth. Forcibly assembled, that life will suffer, warp, rail, and finally burst forth into violence. Pure, clean life can't hold a candle to it.
—Heretic Alchemist

112341010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Earth Rite - Summon a Clay Golem.
Fanfare: Earth Rite (2) - Then deal 3 damage to a random enemy follower.
Fanfare: Earth Rite (3) - Then gain Storm.
Fanfare: Earth Rite (4) - Then gain +3/+3.
112341010.baseFlair_: When her fist touches the earth, she grasps a single lump of dirt; with a delicate technique she diffuses mana, imbuing the clod with life. When her fist touches a soldier, she grasps a single lump of flesh; a reckless technique bestows mana, imbuing the man with strength.
112341010.evoFlair_: "She treats a battle like a performance," a veteran soldier grumbled. "But she's the only one enjoying the show."

114341020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: If this card has been Spellboosted 5 times or less, randomly put 1 of the following cards into your hand.
If this card has been Spellboosted 6 to 11 times, randomly put 2 into your hand instead.
If this card has been Spellboosted at least 12 times, randomly put 3 into your hand instead.
-Cassiopeia
-Jiraiya
-Adramelech
-Demonlord Eachtar
-Spawn of the Abyss
-Dark Jeanne
-Sylvia, the Condemner
114341020.baseFlair_:
The djinn said it could grant the man only a limited number of wishes. So the man wished for unlimited wishes. Since then their lives have been inextricably linked, and quite the strange duo they make.
—Ten Thousand and One Nights, Night 731
114341020.evoFlair_:
The man wished to bring peace to a troubled world. The djinn had never before encountered a human with wishes so selfless. Without realizing, they had begun to act as one. Their names spoken throughout the three realms.
—Ten Thousand and One Nights, Night 774

119341010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Give another allied follower the following effect - Last Words: Summon a copy of this follower.
Skybound Art (10): Summon copies of 2 random allied followers with different names destroyed this match that cost at least 5 play points.
Super Skybound Art (15): Give +5/+5 to all allied followers. Restore 5 defense to your leader.
119341010.baseFlair_: If the going gets tough, you can count on me! After all, I'm the strongest mage in the sky and I can help out lots! Now that that's done... Did I do a good job? Tell me what a good job I've done!
119341010.evoFlair_: I can deal with bad guys like, "Pow!" But healing magic puts a smile on everybody's faces, and that's why my magic's the best! Tell me if you have an owie and I'll make it all better, okay?

100314050.baseFlair_: In nature we simply watch the seasons pass. In magic we create them.

102314010.baseEffect_:
Deal 4 damage to an enemy follower.
Draw a card if an evolved allied follower is in play.

103314010.baseEffect_:
Destroy an enemy follower that costs 3 play points or less.
Enhance (5): Destroy an enemy follower or amulet instead.
103314010.baseFlair_: This is an exceptional rite indeed. —Master Mage

110314010.baseEffect_:
Randomly put 2 of the following cards into your hand.
-Venus
-Pollux
-Star Phoenix
-Castor
-Scorpius
-Andromeda
Earth Rite: Subtract 1 from the cost of those cards.
110314010.baseFlair_: The constellations etched into the night sky may be mere scatterings of light to those without the knowledge to decipher them. But those learned in their patterns can read freely of their own futures. —Chapter 1, The Basics of Fortune-Telling

116314010.baseEffect_:
Banish an enemy follower with 2 defense or less. If you have 20 cards or less in your deck, banish any enemy follower instead.
Draw a card.
116314010.baseFlair_:
I could list all of the hundreds of flaws in your spellcasting, but perhaps your greatest mistake was making your magic... banal.
—Nameless Mage

101324040.baseEffect_:
Spellboost a card in your hand 2 times.
Draw a card.
101324040.baseFlair_: Quiet whispers unite to form a great chorus.

101324050.baseEffect_:
Transform an enemy follower or amulet into a Clay Golem.
Earth Rite: Banish it instead.
101324050.baseFlair_: Whether you turn to mud or vanish from this world completely, you mean nothing.

102324040.baseFlair_: This soulless creature of ice has just enough life within it to last one night.

106324010.baseEffect_:
Draw 2 cards.
Earth Rite: Draw 3 cards instead. Then restore 1 defense to your leader.
106324010.baseFlair_: If mankind has its eyes on the past and its back to the future, then magekind has its back to the past and its eyes on the future. —Teachings of the Leonardian Magic Society

702324010.baseEffect_:
Draw 2 cards.
Earth Rite: Draw 3 cards instead. Then restore 1 defense to your leader.
702324010.baseFlair_: This is the most important fight, so I must put what's most precious to me on the line.

110324020.baseEffect_:
Draw a card.
Select a follower. It can't attack until the start of your next turn.
Return that follower to the player's hand instead if you have 20 cards or less in your deck.
110324020.baseFlair_:
"You're tired, aren't you? Why don't you go ahead and sleep?" said the sorceress, grinning like a demon.
"There, there... Rock-a-bye baby, on the battlefield..."

111324010.baseEffect_:
Summon a Clay Golem. Give +1/+0 to all allied Clay Golems.
Earth Rite: Put a Veridic Ritual into your hand.
111324010.baseFlair_:
Ah, truth... We meet again.
—Young Alchemist

101334030.baseEffect_: Deal 2 damage to an enemy follower. Put a Second Curse into your hand.
101334030.baseFlair_: This primeval curse ends in inevitable death.

103334010.baseEffect_:
Deal 5 damage to a random enemy follower.
Enhance (9): Summon an Arch Summoner Erasmus instead.
103334010.baseFlair_: That was just a little yawn. —Erasmus

108334010.baseEffect_:
Destroy an enemy follower with 2 defense or less.
Draw a card if an evolved allied follower is in play.

108334010.baseFlair_: It's been ages since I had such a heated battle. Consider this my way of saying thanks. —An ice mage

900334060.baseEffect_: Deal 1 damage to a random enemy follower. Do this 5 times.

"If you dare lay a finger on those that I love, then you're my enemy. And I burn my enemies to the ground!"
—Grea, Mysterian Dragoness

113344010.baseEffect_:
If this card has been Spellboosted 5 times or less, summon a Clay Golem and a Scrap Golem.
