113344010.baseFlair_:
Reproduce, multiply, permeate every corner of the land! Surely even the gods would envy us. If you truly wish for this land to flourish, let us build.
—A Confident Sorcerer

101312030.baseFlair_: All great alchemists' work began from that single book.

101322010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Banish an enemy follower with 2 defense or less.
101322010.baseFlair_: For this noble sacrifice, you have my gratitude.

105322010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 2 damage to an enemy follower. Restore 2 defense to your leader.
105322010.baseFlair_: I'll give you lots of sweets, so give me your sweet life. —Witch of the Woods

112322010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Recover 1 evolution point.
During your turn, when an allied follower evolves, put 2 Insights into your hand, recover 2 play points, and then banish this amulet.
112322010.baseFlair_: An orb of concentrated wisdom. Those who seek enlightenment find themselves drawn to its luster.

709322010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Recover 1 evolution point.
During your turn, when an allied follower evolves, put 2 Insights into your hand, recover 2 play points, and then banish this amulet.

709322020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Recover 1 evolution point.
During your turn, when an allied follower evolves, put 2 Insights into your hand, recover 2 play points, and then banish this amulet.
709322020.baseFlair_: Maybe I'm not as good as Sis, but...

101311030.baseEffect_: Can't be targeted by enemy effects.
101311030.baseFlair_: If I could only get this barrier up, no man or men could harm me. Please, everyone, give me just a moment!
101311030.evoFlair_: At long last I am ready! Let the counterattack begin! Steel your hearts, hold your heads high—and move out!

101311100.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Earth Rite - Restore 5 defense to your leader.
101311100.baseFlair_: You look all bent out of shape. Here, I have just the remedy for that.
101311100.evoFlair_: Please, it should be me thanking you. I've been wanting to test that out on someone for some time.

102311020.baseEffect_: Whenever another follower evolves, Spellboost the cards in your hand.
102311020.baseFlair_: The crystals lend their strength only to those bold enough to face the unknown.
102311020.evoFlair_: The crystals glitter for those on a relentless quest for knowledge.

103311040.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Reduce damage to your leader to 0 until this follower leaves play.
103311040.baseFlair_: Eternity must be quite a bore. When I met the witch, she yawned so much tears streamed from her eyes. —A certain villager
103311040.evoFlair_: When she asked me if I want to live forever, I politely declined. No point in enduring an eternity of yawns. —A certain villager

104311040.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Earth Rite - Deal 3 damage to an enemy.
104311040.baseFlair_: By using energy clean and pure, the white mage created a blessed golem that towered over her foes. Driven by the mage's heartfelt wishes, the golem crushed those foes, leaving lifeless hunks of meat in its wake.
104311040.evoFlair_: Regardless of whether the golem is driven by powers of good or evil, what is required of it remains the same: to smash and destroy as commanded.

105311020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Gain +1/+1 if the number of Neutral cards in your hand equals or exceeds the number of Runecraft cards in your hand (excluding this card).
105311020.baseFlair_: My master's hidden arts! And this, my enchanted blade!
105311020.evoFlair_: Your ilk could never comprehend the depth of my master's power!

106311010.baseFlair_: The violet lightning strikes simply because it can do nothing else. She sharpens her magic and waits for that instant.
106311010.evoEffect_: Evolve: Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower.
106311010.evoFlair_: Her form, a bolt falling from the heavens. Her spearhead, flashing with violent violet lightning, pierces all.

108311020.baseFlair_: Glimmering moon! Resplendent darkness! Grant me power! I cannot be defeated so long as the moon is out! Never!
108311020.evoFlair_: The moonlight's magic is infinite! And I'm invincible while its power is mine. There's no way that you can win! Never!

112311020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If you have at least 2 other Machina cards in your hand, deal 3 damage to an enemy.
112311020.baseFlair_: The source of the core's metamorphosis was the development of a magical item. With the help of a mechanical staff, a retired elderly mage was able to recover the power he held in his heyday. —Mage Association Research Report, Part 1
112311020.evoFlair_: That mechanical staff is something else! The old man was beside himself. Even if you don't have enough mana, the machine's own power fills in the blanks. I wager that thing could be used to move something pretty enormous. —Comment about Magical Technology 1

117311030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to all enemy followers. If you have 20 cards or less in your deck, deal 3 damage instead.
117311030.baseFlair_: My best-selling potions? Let's see... The emerald green potion augments spells. It tastes like fire. The electric purple potion induces paralysis. It tastes like fire.
117311030.evoFlair_: You'd like to see my latest concoctions? Well, this ultramarine potion induces silence. It tastes like fire. The amber potion increases strength. It tastes like fire.

118311020.baseEffect_:
Storm.
Fanfare: Summon an enemy Mirror Witch.
118311020.baseFlair_: There's no one better than me when it comes to mirror magic. Even if there were, I'd just flip things around with a spell.
118311020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
118311020.evoFlair_: Did you know that my mirror flips depth perception instead of left and right? Distant objects appear closer, and vice versa. Want to see what trick I bring to the fore?

900311030.baseFlair_: The iron giant creaks into life whenever there is a threat to its master. Its single eye is a window into its pure heart.
900311030.evoFlair_: The guardian golem feels no hatred and no joy. It simply identifies and eliminates threats to its master. There is perhaps nothing more frightening than such well-meaning violence.

100321020.baseFlair_: The god of destruction quickens, scorching foul creatures one and all.
100321020.evoEffect_: Evolve: Deal 1 damage to all enemy followers.
100321020.evoFlair_: As the flames surged forth, no abomination was spared.

101321050.baseEffect_: When this follower comes into play, give your leader the following effect: Followers can't be played. (This effect lasts until this follower leaves play.)
101321050.baseFlair_: Cuhullin! A curse upon you and your ilk! Pray your death alone is enough to right the wrongs enacted against me.
101321050.evoFlair_: This curse will never let you go, my dear boy. The day you break the curse is the day you die.

101321070.baseFlair_: Sounds like they're calling my name. Not a moment too soon either. My blades are ravenous for the taste of blood.
101321070.evoFlair_: Wielding blades with magic is an abomination? What does it matter once they're buried in the heart of your enemy?

102321010.baseFlair_: There's another girl who lives within me. She scares me. Please don't do anything to wake her.
102321010.evoEffect_: Evolve: Earth Rite - Summon a Guardian Golem.
102321010.evoFlair_: I'd never let the gods lay a hand on Remi or me. Now, my toys, dance to my melody. Dance!

106321010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Summon an Earth Essence if there are no allied Earth Sigil amulets in play.
Fanfare: Enhance (10) - Double all other allied followers' attack and defense.
106321010.baseFlair_: Eh, maybe I'm not as good as Pascale—but I'll save you with my dance!
106321010.evoFlair_: Doesn't matter the foe, we'll beat him! What would Pascale say? Probably something like, "I'll knock you out!"

107321010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Both players draw a card.
107321010.baseFlair_: Come one, come all! The amazing Sammy has returned with a brand new bag of tricks! Get ready for a night of marvels!
107321010.evoEffect_: Evolve: Both players draw a card.
107321010.evoFlair_: With magic, anything is possible, and that's the truth! Are you ready? One, two, three... Abracadabra!

111321020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Burgeoning Genius into your hand.
111321020.baseFlair_: My name is Palla. I'm a student teacher, in charge of the light arts. I'm... pleased to meet you. What? I look angry? No, I... I'm sorry. That's just my usual expression...
111321020.evoEffect_: Evolve: Subtract 1 from the cost of a Mysteria card in your hand.
111321020.evoFlair_: I'm still pretty green... and people tell me I seem standoffish. But I want to help you all realize your full potential. So, um... N-now... watch closely! Ah... that's not it. How does Miss Miranda do that?

109331020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Summon an Earth Essence.
Fanfare: Enhance (8) - Recover 1 evolution point.
109331020.baseFlair_: I'm so tired... Hey, Captain, will you give me a piggyback ride? Come on! You know you want to. Tee-hee.
109331020.evoEffect_: Evolve: Earth Rite - Put an Ars Magna into your hand, and recover 2 play points.
109331020.evoFlair_: Hehe. Time for a one-on-one lesson from the founder of alchemy herself, so listen up. The deepest truth known to man iiiis this—the most adorable thing in the entire world is me, Cagliostro! The super cute genius alchemist!

111331020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Summon a Morra, Monika's Familiar.
111331020.baseFlair_:
Lovely Brave Cure! Infinite Magic! You can call me Magical Girl Lovely-Heart Monika, the skies' most magical admiral! In the name of the skies, I'll lead you!
Phew! Being a magical girl is rough!
111331020.evoEffect_: Evolve: Deal X damage to an enemy follower. X equals the number of allied followers in play.
111331020.evoFlair_: Looks and status mean nothing when it comes to helping people! Whether I'm a Valerian admiral or a magical girl, I'll always do my duty! Now follow me! We'll stop evil in its tracks!

113331020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal X damage to an enemy follower. X equals 2 times the number of allied amulets in play.
113331020.baseFlair_:
"Surely you've heard of my name?"
​When asked by a great wizard, it's unwise to answer no.
​"No? Very well, allow me to introduce myself!"
​Rather than a traditional introduction, you'll most likely
receive a blast of magic to the face.
113331020.evoEffect_: Evolve: Earth Rite - Put a random Earth Sigil amulet and a random card with Earth Rite from your deck into your hand.
113331020.evoFlair_:
"Surely you've heard of my name?"
​When asked by a great wizard, it's unwise to answer yes.
​"Excellent! Then surely you'd be willing to help one of my
stature with very important magical research, yes?"
You'll most likely never hear the end of it.

117331010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Earth Rite - Summon an Emergency Summoning.
Fanfare: Enhance (6) - Recover 1 evolution point.
117331010.baseFlair_: Kneel before The Emperor, the ultimate authority. His vassals are golems; his loyal subjects, factotums. With dignity, he reigns over them all. With but the crook of a finger, he has founded an empire—one built on magic's might.
117331010.evoEffect_: Evolve: Deal X damage to an enemy follower. X equals the number of allied Earth Sigil amulets destroyed this match.
117331010.evoFlair_: He is a dominant force, ruling through the might of magic. Artifacts and incantations fall under his purview. He wields them with grace, setting his empire to rights. All magic resides within him, granting him supremacy.

118331020.baseEffect_: At the end of each turn, if there are less than 2 allied Earth Sigil amulets in play, summon 2 Earth Essences. If there are 2 or more allied Earth Sigil amulets, perform Earth Rite (2): Deal 3 damage to all enemies.
118331020.baseFlair_: The past is naught but a graveyard of desire. The longing, the thirst, the want... It all leads to the present! Continue on this path to pave the way to the future!
118331020.evoFlair_: Desires borne in our heart may not always come to fruition. But what of it! A thirst too easily quenched becomes a relic of the past! Continue longing for whatever it is you desire! For that is what will bring out your true potential!

101341020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Put a random spell with Spellboost from your deck into your hand.
Strike: Spellboost the cards in your hand.
101341020.baseFlair_: A cursed magician with the blood of both men and demons running through her veins. Her advice guided the wise King Arthur, son of Uther Pendragon, through many troubles.
101341020.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Put a random spell with Spellboost from your deck into your hand.
Strike: Spellboost the cards in your hand.
101341020.evoFlair_: Merlin offered much advice at Arthur's round table. She saw the king, his knights, and Camelot through all sorts of hardships. In the end an unforeseen storm would expedite her date with destiny.

701341010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Put a random spell with Spellboost from your deck into your hand.
Strike: Spellboost the cards in your hand.
701341010.baseFlair_: A cursed magician with the blood of both men and demons running through her veins. Her advice guided the wise King Arthur, son of Uther Pendragon, through many troubles.
701341010.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Put a random spell with Spellboost from your deck into your hand.
Strike: Spellboost the cards in your hand.
701341010.evoFlair_: Merlin offered much advice at Arthur's round table. She saw the king, his knights, and Camelot through all sorts of hardships. In the end an unforeseen storm would expedite her date with destiny.

108341010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Choose - Put a Prophecy of Boons or Prophecy of Doom into your hand.
Strike: Spellboost the cards in your hand.
108341010.baseFlair_: The weather tomorrow, catching fish... those are about the only things on my mind right now. But you need me, don't you? Then I'll do it: I'll divine the fate of the world.
108341010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
108341010.evoFlair_: The only thing I can do is to see. To listen to the voice of the world. So you're the one who decides. I leave the fate of the world in your hands.

109341030.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (2): Deal 1 damage to an enemy. Summon a Witch's Cauldron.
----------
Fanfare: Earth Rite - Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower. Deal 1 damage to the enemy leader.
109341030.baseFlair_: The craft of witchery is rooted in practice and ritual, held dear to its followers. Rejecting tradition, she was branded a heretic. However, all who dared to challenge would perish before her—the unrivaled witch hunter.
109341030.evoEffect_: Evolve: If another allied follower is in play, destroy that follower and gain +2/+2.
109341030.evoFlair_: What purpose does tradition serve if it cannot defeat a heretic? Witchcraft's essence lies not within the process, but results. Skin besmirched with crimson—the mark of a formidable witch.

112341020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Put a Repair Mode into your hand.
Strike: Recover 1 play point.
112341020.baseFlair_: I may be made of metal, but I can think for myself. If he wants to take that free will from me, if he insists on crushing those like me... Then I have no choice but to rebel against him and his world.
112341020.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Put a Delta Cannon into your hand.
Strike: Recover 1 play point.
112341020.evoFlair_: If I had no emotions, then I would not feel sadness. There would be no need to grieve fallen friends. But I do not have that luxury. I have to oppose him for the sake of our very future.

118341020.baseEffect_: When this follower's attack or defense is increased by an effect, gain the ability to evolve for 0 evolution points.
118341020.baseFlair_: The Titan of Order is true to his title. He's the heavy hand of the law, a fair tyrant that keeps the criminal element of Rivayle in check. Better to obey the Peacekeeper than be commanded by his words.
118341020.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Give your leader the following effects.
-During your turn, whenever an allied follower's attack or defense is increased by an effect, put X Words of Judgments into your hand (up to 3 per turn). X equals the number of followers whose attack or defense was increased by that effect.
-Whenever you play a spell, if it's the 3rd, 6th, 9th, 12th, 15th, or 18th spell of the same name you've played this match, deal 3 damage to all enemies.
(These effects are not stackable and last for the rest of the match.)
118341020.evoFlair_:
"Order, justice... Y'all see any of that 'round here? I suppose, given his proclivities, one might say he's a thrall to such lofty ideals. What he don't understand is this: the world would break itself if it knew it could make a dime."
—Iceschillendrig, Gilded Autocrat

900341020.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Last Words: Spellboost the cards in your hand 3 times.
900341020.baseFlair_:
Nine, ten. The one true shikigami. All others are merely pieces of rubbish scraped together.
—A Guide to Onmyodo: Conclusion
900341020.evoFlair_:
Your minions are no more than playthings. This is what a real shikigami looks like. But have fun collecting those worthless scraps of paper.
—Kuon, Founder of Onmyodo

100314060.baseFlair_: One with my left hand, one with my right. Creating life is so simple.

101314030.baseEffect_:
Deal 5 damage to an enemy follower.
Earth Rite: Put a Conjure Guardian into your hand.
101314030.baseFlair_: One burst of earth, and everything is blown away.

118314010.baseEffect_:
Summon a Clay Golem and Scrap Golem.
Give +1/+0 to all allied followers.
118314010.baseFlair_: The earth is, in essence, a laboratory of limitless size, unbound by walls or ceilings.

103324010.baseEffect_:
Whenever an allied follower evolves, change the cost of this card to 2.
----------
Deal 2 damage to an enemy follower and then 2 damage to the enemy leader.
103324010.baseFlair_: A real mage can fell both the rider and the horse at the same time.

109324010.baseEffect_:
Recover 1 evolution point.
Summon a Guardian Golem if you have 20 cards or less in your deck.
109324010.baseFlair_: "If I can just awaken my latent powers, the test'll be a piece of cake!" "But what if you don't make it in time for the test?" "I guess it's remedial classes for me, then!" —Lou and Hanna

101334040.baseEffect_:
Deal 1 damage to a random enemy follower. Do this 1 time.
Spellboost: Repeat 1 time.
101334040.baseFlair_: Ah, those fires? They keep on going in a chain. Once, twice, and sometimes even forever.

107334010.baseFlair_: One thousand words, she possessed. One meaning, they shared.

900344060.baseEffect_: Give your leader the following effect: At the start of your turn, draw a card and Spellboost it X times. X equals a random number between 1 and 10. Then give it the following effect: At the end of your turn, discard this card. (This leader effect lasts for the rest of the match.)
900344060.baseFlair_: The privilege of ignorance is the acquisition of knowledge; the naive shall inherit the earth. Take heed of the challenge The Fool lays at your feet, for there is no treasure more precious than what lies in the unknown.

101312020.baseFlair_: Don't worry! Me and my alchemy will distend you! Uh, defend. Defend you!

108323010.baseEffect_:
Countdown (3)
Fanfare: Summon a Guardian Golem.
Last Words: Summon a Scrap Golem.
108323010.baseFlair_: We've worked so hard at our drills. I know we're gonna summon something seriously freaky! —A fledgling mage

101311080.baseEffect_: Whenever you play a spell, gain +1/+1.
101311080.baseFlair_: Ever seen a twister tear across the land, devouring everything in sight before spitting it out? Wanna ride one?
101311080.evoFlair_: I know! I'll gift you an experience of aerial ecstasy before bringing you back down to earth headfirst! Splat!

102311060.baseEffect_: Last Words: Summon an Earth Essence.
102311060.baseFlair_: An almost palpable magic infuses the winged gargoyle enshrined at the temple.
102311060.evoFlair_: A vigilant winged gargoyle watches over the church. Its hidden magic is unleashed at the first sign of intruders.

103311050.baseEffect_: Spellboost: Subtract 1 from the cost of this card.
103311050.baseFlair_: I just wanted to summon something cool. But look at the ugly beastie I ended up with! —A student of Mysteria Academy
103311050.evoFlair_: I couldn't get away from the creature, but it grew on me after a while. Did you realize what a beautiful color its eyes are? —A student of Mysteria Academy

109311020.baseFlair_: Peace, harmony, and tranquility are all we need. War is but a futile and meaningless endeavor. Bloodstained warriors, won't you stay and listen to the words of this old man?
109311020.evoFlair_: It may seem like an impossible dream, but there is merit in striving for peace. Is wanting a world without conflict so wrong? If you won't listen to my words, perhaps I shall show you!

116311020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If any allied amulets are in play, return 1 to your hand and transform a random enemy follower with the highest attack in play into a Snowman.
116311020.baseFlair_:
O flowing, mutable water, master of gentle change and of conservation. Strengthen the essence of conservation, and become ice. Oh, just be careful not to freeze too much.
—Riley, Hydroshaman
116311020.evoFlair_:
We make use of the four elements through spirit mediums. However, these arts, the oldest of all magics, are currently under new threat. This is in no small part due to the steel uprising and its perversion of natural phenomena.
—Magica Principia, Part 1

119311020.baseEffect_:
Spellboost: Subtract 1 from the cost of this card.
----------
Fanfare: Draw a card. Spellboost the cards in your hand.
119311020.baseFlair_: Hee-hee... Citrine, snow quartz, amethyst... Crystals come in sooo many different types and colors! With this much variety, not to mention their magical properties, it's no wonder these stones are worth so much.
119311020.evoFlair_: Hee-hee... Ametrine, rose quartz, tiger's eye... So many beautiful stones, and I can write them all off as research expenses. I love being a witch!

100321030.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to an enemy follower.
Spellboost: Deal 1 more.
100321030.baseFlair_: Stormy clouds on high, let me be your elemental conduit!
100321030.evoFlair_: Feel my thunderous fury as I fry you to a crisp!

101321060.baseEffect_: Whenever you play a spell, deal 1 damage to all enemy followers.
101321060.baseFlair_: Master will be proud of how far my flame-wielding technique has come. Shazah!
101321060.evoFlair_: Next on the list to master: wind magic. Can you imagine the flaming vortexes I'd conjure! If Master could see me now...

105321010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Randomly summon a copy of 1 of the highest-cost allied followers that has been destroyed during this match and give it Rush. Banish it at the start of your next turn.
105321010.baseFlair_: The best illusions sometimes surpass the originals. One young woman taught me as much. —Illusionary Magic, Chapter 2
105321010.evoFlair_: She said illusions have lives of their own, lives that could be ended at a flick of the wrist. —Illusionary Magic, Chapter 2

111321010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Earth Rite - Gain +1/+0 and Rush.
111321010.baseFlair_: Most mages are endowed with a natural inquisitiveness. Some view the vulnerable nature of a mortal body as a problem—one they undertake to remedy.
111321010.evoFlair_: Some mages who fuse with the demons they summon lose their minds. Others can master their new demonic bodies and retain their reason. The difference between the two is paper-thin and lies, perhaps, in that inquisitive spirit.

112321010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Mysterian Knowledge into your hand.
112321010.baseFlair_: As your re-elected class president, I'd like to make a pledge! Let's join forces to help shape this academy into an even more splendid place to learn! I know we can do it together!
112321010.evoFlair_: Sure the classrooms get blown up sometimes, and students fly through the air... But that's just another part of Mysteria Academy's charm. As class president, I will ensure this academy retains that charm into the next era!

113321020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give your leader the following effect - Whenever you play a Machina card, recover 1 play point. (This effect is not stackable and lasts for the rest of the match.)
113321020.baseFlair_: Core mutations have led to one new optimization after another. Arcane sorcerers can be divided into two groups: practitioners of the arts, and theorycrafters. Mechanized lifeforms fall in a unique space, as they are both. —Research Archives of the Sorcerer's Guild, Vol. 2
113321020.evoFlair_:
A new type of magical life-form... As a product, I suppose it is definitely marketable, but the logic behind such a creation needs to be checked out. I think I can provide a more... graceful solution.
—Mechabook Sorcerer to a Mechanized Lifeform

117321020.baseEffect_: Whenever you play a spell, summon a Happy Pig.
117321020.baseFlair_: I'm not actually fond of sweets, you know. If anything, I find them too saccharine for my taste. But the morsels they attract? Why, they're so adorable I could gobble them up. Now how about a nice toffee, my little cream puff?
117321020.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Evolve all allied Happy Pigs.
Whenever you play a spell, summon a Happy Pig.
117321020.evoFlair_: The more treats I conjure, the more they gather. Ahh, just look at them. With every bite their pink cheeks grow rounder. Ooh, they really are adorable. But... they've been eating for hours. Surely they've had more than enough?

118321010.baseEffect_:
Crystallize (1): Countdown (3)
At the end of your turn, give +1/+0 to a random allied follower.
----------
Ward.
Fanfare: Give +2/+0 to a random allied follower. Do this 3 times.
118321010.baseFlair_:
She does amazing work, just oozing with creativity. Though I'll admit she's not exactly the nicest person. First time I met her, she actually said I've got the face of a lizard. Ugh, the nerve.
—Peddler of Magic Paintings
118321010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
118321010.evoFlair_:
Dancing stars, floating castles, flying fish—she has a real flair for the fantastical. Thing is, she even does pieces on reptiles sometimes. Whenever I tell her those are hard to sell, she somehow takes that as a compliment.
—Peddler of Magic Paintings

101331010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Earth Rite - Put 3 Conjure Guardians into your hand.
101331010.baseFlair_: A renowned pioneer of modern alchemical methods. Her unquenchable thirst for knowledge is at the root of all her achievements.
101331010.evoFlair_: Perhaps the most refined alchemy adept. Though many follow in her footsteps, none are worthy of stepping into her shoes.

104331020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Both players draw cards until each player has 7 cards in their hand.
104331020.baseFlair_: How do you get to be a princess? I sure don't know, so I'll just start studying everything I can find! How'd you like to join me?
104331020.evoFlair_: Once I become a princess, I'll meet a handsome prince, and then we'll be together, and then, well—hee-hee-hee! I just can't wait to be a princess!

105331010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Deal X damage to an enemy follower. X equals the number of other Neutral cards in your hand.
Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Evolve this follower.
105331010.baseFlair_: Being alone is fine with me. Go ahead and make fun of me, but I'm still going to win. That's my whole reason for living.
105331010.evoFlair_: There's no way I'll lose to some grinning fool. I'll win, and everyone will see how great I am!

106331020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Earth Rite - Gain +1/+2.
At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to a random enemy follower. Do this X times (up to 10 times). X equals this follower's attack.
106331020.baseFlair_: Do Not Drop Off Golems. —Mysteria Academy signboard
106331020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
106331020.evoFlair_: Do Not Pick Up Golems. —Mysteria Academy signboard

107331010.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, randomly put 1 of the following cards into your hand: Mysterian Missile or Mysterian Circle. If you have played another Mysteria card this turn, put a Mysterian Rite into your hand instead.
107331010.baseFlair_: It's all about keeping up appearances, they say. As class president, I have to set an example for everyone!
107331010.evoFlair_: As long as you set your mind to it, surely a bright future awaits you! Come on everybody, let's hit the books!

114331020.baseEffect_:
Spellboost: Subtract 1 from the cost of this card.
----------
Fanfare: Draw 2 cards.
114331020.baseFlair_: From forbidden techniques to the arcane arts, I embrace all manner of spellcraft... I refuse to discriminate when it comes to knowledge.
114331020.evoEffect_: Evolve: Spellboost the cards in your hand.
114331020.evoFlair_: I do not adhere to any one mind-set. Taboo, truth... I'll eat my fill of it all. There is no right or wrong when it comes to knowledge.

115331020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Summon a Demonic Shikigami. Randomly put 2 different followers with Spellboost from your deck into your hand.
115331020.baseFlair_:
Just as Onmyodo is on the verge of dying out, a new torchbearer appears. He learns all there is to know about the forces of yin and yang and summons powerful shikigami.
—The Legacy of Onmyodo: Zai
115331020.evoFlair_:
Nobles and peasants alike are nothing before the shikigami. Onmyodo makes a name for itself once again, spreading throughout the world.
—The Legacy of Onmyodo: Zen

102341010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Earth Rite - At the end of this turn, double all other allied followers' attack and defense if this follower is still in play.
102341010.baseFlair_: If you're looking for some motivation, check out my dance! Of course, now that you've seen it, you better win!
102341010.evoFlair_: If any fools give you lip, give 'em a beatdown! What? You think I should watch my mouth? Well, I suppose you might be right.

105341010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Draw cards until there are 5 cards in your hand. Change the cost of the spells without Spellboost in your hand to 1.
Last Words: At the start of your next turn, banish all spells in your hand.
105341010.baseFlair_: Longface, Fanged Beast, the Sighing Beauty, or the Crimson Rose. Call me what you will. I am the void. I am a fiction. I am everyone and no one at all.
105341010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
105341010.evoFlair_: If you believe in the flickering nothing, I will give you a brain, give you a heart, and give you courage. I kneel before truth, and rule over the nothing.

706341010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Draw cards until there are 5 cards in your hand. Change the cost of the spells without Spellboost in your hand to 1.
Last Words: At the start of your next turn, banish all spells in your hand.
706341010.baseFlair_: Longface, Fanged Beast, the Sighing Beauty, or the Crimson Rose. Call me what you will. I am the void. I am a fiction. I am everyone and no one at all.
706341010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
706341010.evoFlair_: If you believe in the flickering nothing, I will give you a brain, give you a heart, and give you courage. I kneel before truth, and rule over the nothing.

107341010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give your leader the following effect - Your spells deal +1 damage. (This effect lasts for the rest of the match.)
107341010.baseFlair_: Bestow upon them eyes to witness the miracles of magic, ears to hear the melodies of magic, and the heart to command it.
107341010.evoFlair_: To those who cast in my name, bring forth the magic within. It's always around us, and always with you.

108341030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give your leader the following effect - At the end of your turn, if an allied follower is in play, perform Earth Rite: Give +2/+1 to a random allied follower. (This effect lasts for the rest of the match.)
108341030.baseFlair_: There's nothing to fear; you can spit it out! Let the desire spiral wildly within you. I'm ready to love, and coyness is the last thing I need.
108341030.evoFlair_: Every desire is a possibility. Stay true to yourself, humans. Stay thirsty, animals. If you can just do that, I'll show you the way.

110341030.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (1): Earth Rite (X) - Randomly activate 1 of the following effects. Do this X times. X equals the number of allied Earth Sigil amulets in play.
-Summon a Clay Golem.
-Put a Veridic Ritual into your hand.
-Deal 2 damage to the enemy leader.
----------
Last Words: Summon 2 Earth Essences. Put an Orichalcum Golem into your hand and change its cost to 7.
110341030.baseFlair_:
There is beauty in inevitability. But beauty and truth are very different things. Those seemingly forged of happenstance still play their part in the greater, unchanging design.
—Chapter 4, On Golems
110341030.evoFlair_:
Third-rate mages rely on chance.
Second-rate mages try to eliminate it.
Only when you learn to control chance can you call yourself a first-rate mage.
—Chapter 5, On Golems

114341030.baseEffect_:
Fanfare and Last Words: Summon a Witch's Cauldron.
Enhance (8): Summon a Guardian Golem and recover 1 evolution point.
114341030.baseFlair_: Ignorance. I won him the golden fleece. I stepped aboard the Argo. I, who foolishly, foolishly gave over my heart, now cling to the rail of this narrow ship, as the currents toss me. That was my ignorance.
114341030.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Earth Rite - Transform an enemy follower or amulet into a Clay Golem.
Last Words: Summon a Witch's Cauldron.
114341030.evoFlair_: Destiny. I shall burn Glauce. I will abandon Iolcus. You, wretched, wretched lover, shall grow dizzy in my embrace. This was always our destiny.

101314020.baseEffect_:
Spellboost: Subtract 1 from the cost of this card.
----------
Draw 2 cards.
101314020.baseFlair_: All is as my cards have foretold.

109314020.baseEffect_:
Spellboost: Subtract 1 from the cost of this card.
----------
Draw 2 cards.
109314020.baseFlair_: When these cards reach enchantment, fate will move once again.

709314010.baseEffect_:
Spellboost: Subtract 1 from the cost of this card.
----------
Draw 2 cards.
709314010.baseFlair_: Are you ready? W-well, I'm not! Wait until I'm done charging my magic, and then I'll really blast you!

107314020.baseEffect_: Deal 3 damage to an enemy. Put a Chain Lightning into your hand if you have 3 other cards or less in your hand.
107314020.baseFlair_: It struck without warning, nary a cloud in the sky.

108314010.baseEffect_: Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower. Then deal 1 damage to all enemies.
108314010.baseFlair_: Your mother never slapped you, so my winds will have to do the trick! Learn yet? Now get lost! —A mage of winds

112314010.baseEffect_:
Summon 2 Clay Golems.
Deal X damage to an enemy follower. X equals the number of allied Clay Golems in play.
Earth Rite: Give +1/+1 to all allied Clay Golems.
112314010.baseFlair_: Golem assembly must be conducted perfectly. First comes prayer, then parchment and pure silver, and finally the incantation. Take care not to confuse the steps. Tragically, many mages have been crushed by their own golems. —Golem Basics: A Primer, Chapter 8

900314060.baseEffect_:
Whenever you play a Mysteria card, if this card costs 5 play points, change its cost to 3.
----------
Deal 3 damage to an enemy.
Summon a Guardian Golem.
900314060.baseFlair_: Worry not, my beloved students. Your days of study and training will be the key to unlocking the secrets of magic. —Seraph of Mysteria

101324010.baseEffect_:
Summon a Guardian Golem.
Earth Rite: Give +2/+2 to allied Guardian Golems.
101324010.baseFlair_: Clumps of earth, heed my call and be my shield!

113324010.baseEffect_:
Banish an enemy follower.
If you have 20 cards or less in your deck, recover 4 play points.
113324010.baseFlair_: The culmination of millions of happenstances brought you into existence. It would only take one more to take you out of it.

101334050.baseEffect_: Transform each follower into a Snowman.
101334050.baseFlair_: They look better in white anyway, don't you think?

102334020.baseEffect_:
Return an enemy follower with 1 defense or less to the opponent's hand and summon 1 Snowman.
Spellboost: Followers with 1 more defense can be returned and summon 1 more Snowman.
102334020.baseFlair_: The witch's breath coalesced into a bitter snowstorm.

101332010.baseEffect_: Whenever you play a spell, give +1/+0 to all allied followers.

900332010.baseEffect_:
When your opponent plays a follower, destroy this amulet.
Last Words: Summon a Guardian Golem and a Clay Golem.
900332010.baseFlair_: A little late now, aren't we? —Accomplished Mage

900332020.baseEffect_:
When your opponent plays a spell, destroy this amulet.
Last Words: Draw 3 cards and restore 3 defense to your leader.

101311070.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Earth Rite - Put a Conjure Guardian into your hand.
101311070.baseFlair_: Our combined thirst for knowledge was the key to unlocking the arcane mysteries of the God of Creation's methods.
101311070.evoFlair_: Do I fear what depravities may come as a result of my unnatural creations? Not if they can stop my old companion who was claimed by the darkness.

101311090.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to all enemy followers.
101311090.baseFlair_: Hear me, insatiable staff! Feed on the flesh of all those who saw me banished to oblivion!
101311090.evoFlair_: My gratitude alone will never sate your appetite, so this I pledge: we shall walk this land together until you hunger no more.

103311060.baseEffect_:
Spellboost: Subtract 1 from the cost of this card.
----------
Storm.
103311060.baseFlair_: You've gone too far, vile beasts. We cannot allow you to continue. My blade will be your judge, jury, and executioner.
103311060.evoFlair_: Flee and be cut down or surrender and be cut down. It makes no difference to me, as your death is foreordained. Our targets never escape justice, so say goodbye.

106311020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If another allied follower is in play, perform Earth Rite - Give +1/+1 and Ward to an allied follower.
106311020.baseFlair_: The people's wishes call to the stars; the stars' light calls for these wishes. Wishes are the bridge that connect us with the stars.
106311020.evoFlair_: If people forget the stars, then stars will forget the people. I continue praying to the star globe so this doesn't happen.

101321010.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Earth Rite - Gain the following effect: Can't be targeted by enemy effects.
101321010.baseFlair_: Shielding the advancing army all the while, a magic-powered giant laid siege to its enemies. Not even the mightiest sorcery could halt it.
101321010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
101321010.evoFlair_: Across the battlefield there strode a giant, a living shield to protect its allies from the magical onslaught of fire, ice, and lightning.

101321030.baseEffect_: Whenever you play a spell, summon a Clay Golem.
101321030.baseFlair_: It's your lucky day. I rarely agree to perform a private magic show. Tell me, you don't get the chills easily, do you?
101321030.evoFlair_: Oh, don't you be embarrassed. I have a knack for bewitching all my first-timers. Sit a while, won't you? I'll craft you up somethin' good.

102321020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Earth Rite - Transform an enemy follower or amulet into a Clay Golem.
102321020.baseFlair_: You're repulsive! This new form suits you better.
102321020.evoFlair_: You're just so repulsive! I'll do us both a favor and put you out of your misery.

103321020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Crimson Sorcery into your hand.
103321020.baseFlair_: An intruder? In my castle? Well, I suppose I'll welcome them by making them comfortable... and of course warm. Immolated even!
103321020.evoFlair_: You're a brave one... and incredibly stupid. I once razed a city in an instant, and I'll do the same to you!

105321020.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: If there are cards in your hand that have been Spellboosted fewer than 5 times, Spellboost those cards until they have been Spellboosted a total of 5 times.
105321020.baseFlair_: You mustn't, my students, discount the field of shadow magic. It's able to destroy any object and lead people's hearts astray.
105321020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
105321020.evoFlair_: It seems there are some of you, my students, who don't yet understand the power of shadow magic. So allow me to demonstrate its terrible potential!

900321010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Mysterian Circle into your hand. Give all Mysteria spells in your hand the following effect - Draw 1 card.
900321010.baseFlair_: Turn, my flesh, into a whitewyrm. I shall shine the light of purification on the ignorant ones who set foot in this house of learning.
900321010.evoFlair_: The art of wyrmification is forbidden, but if this power can protect the future, then I'll wield the light any number of times!

900321020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Mysterian Missile into your hand. Give all Mysteria spells in your hand the following effect - Deal 1 damage to the enemy leader.
900321020.baseFlair_: Turn, my flesh, into a blackwyrm. I shall pour the dark of destruction on the wicked ones who defile the house of learning.
900321020.evoFlair_: The art of wyrmification is forbidden, but if this power can destroy evil, then I'll release the darkness any number of times!

900321030.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Can't be destroyed by effects. (Can be destroyed by damage from effects.)
900321030.baseFlair_: I've made my choice. You'll be trampled by this one. —Abyss Summoner
900321030.evoFlair_: I've made my choice. You can be decimated to bits by this one. —Abyss Summoner

900321040.baseEffect_:
Storm.
At the end of your turn, restore 3 defense to this follower.
900321040.baseFlair_: I've made my choice. You'll be breakfast for this one. —Abyss Summoner
900321040.evoFlair_: I've made my choice. You can be a sacrifice for this one. —Abyss Summoner

103331030.baseEffect_:
Whenever an enemy follower is destroyed during your turn, summon a Zombie.
At the end of your turn, perform Earth Rite: Destroy a random enemy follower.
103331030.baseFlair_: If it means saving my daughter, I would never hesitate to turn to the forbidden arts, even if doing so is unforgivable.
103331030.evoFlair_: Forbidden arts. Blasphemy. The gods will likely never forgive me. And yet those same gods failed to save my sweet daughter, so I must!

105331020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Deal 3 damage to an enemy.
Fanfare: Earth Rite - Deal 3 damage to all enemies instead.
105331020.baseFlair_: Who am I? Humph! If it matters to you, I'm the greatest mage in all the world.
105331020.evoFlair_: The man who stands before you has explored the ultimate limits of magic. If you value your life, step away from me!

104341020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Discard all Earth Sigil amulets and gain +2/+2 for each discarded card.
Can't be targeted by enemy effects.
104341020.baseFlair_: Begin with nothing. Then infuse a magical soul into a lump of earth to create a golem, which is something. Next magically enhance the golem until it grows into a giant. That giant will crush all before it, leaving you with nothing. —Introduction, The Basics of Truth
104341020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
104341020.evoFlair_: The secrets of alchemy lie in focus and forgetfulness. You should focus only on how to succeed at creation and forget about controlling what you create. Keep this in mind and you'll create something great indeed. —Chapter 3, The Basics of Truth

703341010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Discard all Earth Sigil amulets and gain +2/+2 for each discarded card.
Can't be targeted by enemy effects.
703341010.baseFlair_: Begin with nothing. Then infuse a magical soul into a lump of earth to create a golem, which is something. Next magically enhance the golem until it grows into a giant. That giant will crush all before it, leaving you with nothing. —Introduction, The Basics of Truth
703341010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
703341010.evoFlair_: The secrets of alchemy lie in focus and forgetfulness. You should focus only on how to succeed at creation and forget about controlling what you create. Keep this in mind and you'll create something great indeed. —Chapter 3, The Basics of Truth

109341010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give your leader the following effect - At the end of your turn, if there are at least 6 cards in your hand, Spellboost the cards in your hand; if there are 5 cards or less in your hand, draw cards until there are 6 cards in your hand. (This effect is not stackable and lasts for the rest of the match.)
109341010.baseFlair_: I'm sorry, but I use my powers for the people. I don't divine for individuals. But suppose I told you that calamity awaits you on your journey... Would you give everything up?
109341010.evoEffect_: Evolve: If there are at least 6 cards in your hand, Spellboost the cards in your hand; if there are 5 cards or less in your hand, draw cards until there are 6 cards in your hand.
109341010.evoFlair_: There is a future I cannot see, one in which the world will tremble as it hurtles toward the crossroads of fate. You, the bearer of this destiny... Which path will you choose? I ask that you let me watch over you as you continue your journey.

109341020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower if this card has been Spellboosted at least 6 times.
Then, recover 3 play points if this card has been Spellboosted at least 9 times.
Then, gain Storm if this card has been Spellboosted at least 12 times.
109341020.baseFlair_: Their transgressions piled on as they lost sight of their ethics and morals. What was once the desire for truth was twisted into a depraved pleasure. Before long, they entered a realm inhuman.
109341020.evoFlair_: Their transgressions grew inhumane as they thirsted for the forbidden fruit. But the aftermath was an unmistakable anomaly—they awakened to the sound of an unspeakable horror, finally coming to realize their mistakes.

111341020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Summon 1 Serpent.
Spellboost: Summon 1 more.
If this card has been Spellboosted at least 7 times, summon a Medusiana instead.
111341020.baseFlair_:
Magical Girl Sweet-Tooth Medusa is on the scene! Love and passion! Sugar Time! Magical Light... Sparking!
Phew! Being a magical girl sure isn't easy!
111341020.evoFlair_:
Hate will never be enough to defeat the forces of evil! So I'll wrap them up in my love!
Evildoers the world over... I'll send you back where you came from!

113341020.baseEffect_:
At the end of your turn, deal 4 damage to a random enemy follower.
At the end of your turn, perform Earth Rite: Deal 4 damage to the enemy leader.
113341020.baseFlair_: The men retreated in terror as a master of arcane spells stood before them. "Heh," the wizard chuckled with mild amusement, "this should make for a good warmup." —Ancient War Records, Recovered Fragment
113341020.evoFlair_: The wizard's spells blew them away in a single breath. Seeing the men fall so easily before him, he sighs in disappointment. It seems he had only just begun. —Ancient War Records, Recovered Fragment

115341020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Reduce the enemy leader's maximum defense by 5.
Union Burst (10): Deal 1 damage to a random enemy follower and then 1 damage to the enemy leader. Do this 5 times.
115341020.baseFlair_: Geez... Fine! I'll help you fight, so you'd better be grateful! But get in my way, and it's all over for you. Got it?
115341020.evoEffect_: Evolve: Destroy all enemy followers with 3 defense or less.
115341020.evoFlair_: The truth is, I can't let myself get too close to them. If anything were to happen to them, I'd be the one to suffer... What's that look for? You got a problem?

117341020.baseEffect_:
During your turn, when this card is added to your hand from your deck, if there are 2 allied Earth Sigil amulets or less in play, reveal it and summon an Earth Essence.
----------
Fanfare: Randomly activate 1 of the following effects. Earth Rite (X): Do this X more times. X equals the number of allied Earth Sigil amulets in play.
-Summon a Guardian Golem.
-Put a Witch Snap into your hand and change its cost to 0.
-Deal 2 damage to the enemy leader. Restore 2 defense to your leader.
117341020.baseFlair_:
Curiosity is the hallmark of a researcher. One idea inspires ten theories which are then honed by one hundred experiments, and then at last—eureka! The history of magic is built on moments such as these.
—On Golems (New Edition), Chapter 2
117341020.evoFlair_:
It took mankind a hundred flashes of inspiration to form armies to defend their common interest. It took ten to hone an affinity for the arcane. But it only takes one for magic to thrive and stay alive.
—On Golems (New Edition), Chapter 3

119341020.baseEffect_:
Crystallize (3): Countdown (5)
Once on each of your turns, when you play a follower, give it +1/+0.
At the start of your turn, if you have more evolution points than your opponent, subtract 1 from this amulet's Countdown. (You have 0 evolution points on turns you are unable to evolve.)
Last Words: Summon a Xeno Ifrit.
----------
When this follower comes into play, deal 3 damage to all enemies.
119341020.baseFlair_: Blazing hellfire. A great power wreathed in unearthly flame. The conflagrant beast reduces all who dare cross the skies to ash. His furious roars scorch the trembling land, bathing all in infernal red.
119341020.evoFlair_:
You would venture beyond the fires of purgatory and go further still. The flame in your soul still burns bright, spurring you ever forward. Then come! Bring your might to bear, little creature, and prove your mettle.
—Xeno Ifrit

110324010.baseEffect_:
Summon a Guardian Golem and give it +X/+X. Deal Y damage to the enemy leader. Restore Z defense to your leader.
X, Y, and Z equal the number of times this card has been Spellboosted, split randomly between the three effects.
110324010.baseFlair_: The gates of truth are fashioned from the nature, instinct, and reality of this plane. Throw them open, and never shall they close again.

115324010.baseEffect_:
Deal 3 damage to all enemy followers.
If you have 20 cards or less in your deck, put a Crimson Sorcery into your hand.
115324010.baseFlair_: A witch's patience: mage slang for something that doesn't exist.

101334010.baseFlair_: Mysteries are like little treasure chests of truth. Without a key they're worse than useless. But with one their significance is limitless.

102334030.baseEffect_:
Banish all enemy followers with 2 defense or less.
Earth Rite: Banish all enemy followers with 5 defense or less instead.
102334030.baseFlair_: Though the armored horde bellowed, the wizard needed only to murmur.

104334010.baseEffect_: Transform each enemy follower into a Flame Rat.

107334020.baseEffect_:
Earth Rite: Give +1/+0 to all allied followers, including followers summoned by this card.
Summon a Guardian Golem, a Clay Golem, and a Scrap Golem.
107334020.baseFlair_: Do not grieve my departure when my time in this world ends. I shall bestow upon you a new companion, born from this earth.

900334010.baseEffect_:
Deal 5 damage to an enemy follower.
Put a Final Curse into your hand.
900334010.baseFlair_: This unyielding curse echoes again and again.

110311020.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (2): Deal 2 damage to an enemy follower.
----------
Fanfare: Deal 4 damage to an enemy follower.
110311020.baseFlair_: Our way is truth. Yours is deception. Your name, your rank, even your intentions—all deceit. Cast them aside and the truth will reveal itself to you.
110311020.evoFlair_:
The First Rite: Know Thy Deception
This world is rife with falsehood. Lies, fabrications, and guile—the untrue takes many forms. Thou must know them all.
—Teachings of the Assembly of Truth

115321010.baseEffect_:
Spellboost: Subtract 1 from the cost of this card.
----------
Fanfare: Summon a Paper Shikigami.
Whenever an allied Paper Shikigami or Demonic Shikigami comes into play, give it Ward.
115321010.baseFlair_:
Onmyodo is not merely a form of divination—it is power. With a talisman and a string of words, the user can bend monstrosities and calamities to their will.
—The Legacy of Onmyodo: Sha
115321010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
115321010.evoFlair_:
As the true potential of Onmyodo comes to light, it begins to see use in battle. Swords are no match for its power, and it shatters armor with ease. A single strike is able to take out numerous enemies.
—The Legacy of Onmyodo: Kai

118321020.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (1): Summon a Dutiful Steed.
----------
Fanfare: Summon an Arcane Personnel Carrier and Clay Golem.
At the end of your turn, summon an Arcane Personnel Carrier and Clay Golem.
118321020.baseFlair_:
"When you work in an outhouse, you'll attract flies. Some of the worst buzzers we've got on the force can't even pick their own nose. But, hey, it's not all bad—we can shoot up the whole horizon, and get paid for it!"
—Deputy's Handbook, Third Page
118321020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
118321020.evoFlair_: "Word of advice: don't ever hesitate. None of these criminals will give a fart about you, so you can't be too careful, hear? I know we ain't friends, but I don't want you dying on me. The whiskey won't taste as good when I gotta drink it alone." —Deputy's Handbook, Fourth Page

101331020.baseEffect_: Whenever you play a spell, summon a Dragon.
101331020.baseFlair_: Most mages' origins are steeped in mystery. This one's, however, is not—he made a blood pact with a dragon deity.
101331020.evoFlair_: To gain the trust of a dragon god, one must command unrivaled sorcery. Do so, and aerial domination will be all but assured.

108331010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Choose - Summon 1 Snow Knight or {1@Wild Snowman@Wild Snowmen}. Spellboost: Summon 1 more.
108331010.baseFlair_: This winter sure's nasty! Someone, anyone! Come warm up your king!
108331010.evoFlair_: Hohoho, that's better. I'm nice and toasty now. Huh, now you're chilly? Well, how about you think of someone beside yourself?

108331020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Summon an Onion Patch. Give your leader the following effect - Whenever you play a spell, summon an Onion Patch. (This effect is not stackable and lasts for the rest of the match.)
108331020.baseFlair_: The world rejected me, so I'll reject the world. I've said it, and I mean it! Now come here, my beautiful little servants!
108331020.evoFlair_: Gwaaah, why won't anything go my way? I'm not going to give up though. I'll destroy this whole world no matter what!

109331010.baseEffect_:
Whenever you play a Mysteria card, subtract 1 from the cost of this card.
---------
Fanfare: Randomly put a Mysterian Missile or Mysterian Circle into your hand.
109331010.baseFlair_: Hi there, everyone! I'm Ms. Miranda, your light arts teacher! But you can just call me Mira!
109331010.evoEffect_: Evolve: Put a Mysterian Rite into your hand.
109331010.evoFlair_: In order to really understand my students, it's all about appearances, right? Well, how's this? It doesn't fit quite like it used to, but I think it'll be okay. Yay!

900331060.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Deal 4 damage to an enemy.
900331060.baseFlair_: All right apprentices, gather 'round! Any alchemist worth their saltpeter needs two things: gumption and the basic recipe for any creation. First ye pour the ingredients! Then ye mix it up fine! And then... Well. Ye'll know when ye get to that part!
900331060.evoEffect_:
Ward.
Evolve: Earth Rite - Summon a Guardian Golem.
900331060.evoFlair_:
"So that's the final step... Pour, mix, and... boom..."
—An Alchemist's Apprentice, Covered in Soot

119331010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: The next time this follower takes damage, reduce that damage to 0. Summon a Bai Ze.
119331010.baseFlair_: I am a maiden from a nearby village. You may call me Pholia! Hmm, calling myself a mere village maiden doesn't feel right. Well, no matter. Rejoice! With me at your side, you now have the strength of one hundred soldiers.
119331010.evoEffect_: Evolve: Evolve all unevolved allied Bai Zes. Give all allied followers the following effect: At the end of your turn, restore 2 defense to your leader and this follower.
119331010.evoFlair_: The sky is so big and blue, and I want to travel and see more of it. I can always enjoy retirement later. Hmm? How old am I? Hasn't anyone told you that asking a lady her age isn't good for your health?

900331050.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (3): Recover 1 evolution point.
----------
Fanfare: Summon a Lovely-Heart Monika. Recover 1 evolution point.
Last Words: At the start of your next turn, put a Morra, Monika's Familiar into your hand.
900331050.baseFlair_: We help magical girls turn their love and hope into power! That's the job of us familiars! So you've gotta dream big, Monika—and love even bigger! I'll be able to give you tons of power then!
900331050.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
900331050.evoFlair_: A pure heart, a sweet costume change, and a metric fluff ton of unyielding love—Monika, everything you need to be magical is inside of you! Now... Transform!

900331070.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Ward.
At the end of your turn, give all allied Pholia, Retired Sovereigns the following effect: The next time this follower takes damage, reduce that damage to 0.
900331070.baseFlair_: I am a primal beast in service to the sovereign; my place is therefore by your side. I would like to remind you of that fact, Sovereign. I am not a dog, much less a pillow. I will not deign to "lie down."
900331070.evoFlair_: I will follow my sovereign wherever she goes. Even should she no longer rule, she retains the qualities of a good leader. That is enough for me to stay by her side.

110341020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Spellboost all the cards in your deck 9 times.
110341020.baseFlair_: Drenched in the rain of knowledge, where dost thou wander? Why deceive thyself with intentions and ambitions? 'Tis inane affectation. Expose thyself to the deepest truths—the qualities, faculties, and reality of this plane. And then... I shall put this world to trial.
110341020.evoFlair_: To want for purpose is deception; to wish for meaning is deceit. Understand the deepest truths and thou shalt manifest only that which must be. And then... I shall put this world to trial.

114341010.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (1): Return an allied amulet to your hand and deal 2 damage to an enemy follower. If the returned card is a Naterran Great Tree, deal 3 damage instead.
(Can be played only when both a targetable allied card and enemy card are in play.)
----------
Ward.
Fanfare: If any allied amulets are in play, return 1 to your hand and deal 2 damage to all enemy followers. If the returned card is a Naterran Great Tree, deal 3 damage instead.
114341010.baseFlair_: Wind, water, fire, earth. Volatility, conservation, ascension, and gravity. Domains of the Sylphs, Undines, Salamandra, and Gnomes. Four elements who write the very laws of existence. Surpass this world and redefine it as you will.
114341010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
114341010.evoFlair_: Wind, water, fire, earth. Volatility, conservation, ascension, and gravity. Domains of the Sylphs, Undines, Salamandra, and Gnomes. Four pinnacles which orchestrate existence. Surpass this world, and bestow unto us your gestalt.

900341010.baseEffect_: This follower can evolve for 0 evolution points.
900341010.baseFlair_:
Oooo!
(Humanity... Foolish creators. I stand before you as the manifestation of truths, born from the depths of wisdom—the absolute golem to reign supreme. Now behold, as I prove to you all the strength of my will.)
900341010.evoEffect_: Evolve: Give your leader the following effect - During your turn, whenever an allied Clay Golem comes into play, transform it into an Ultimate Clay Golem. (This effect is not stackable and lasts for the rest of the match.)
900341010.evoFlair_:
Oooo, ooo!
(Humanity... Lonesome creators. My mothers, my fathers stuck in the quagmire of reason. I have already surpassed you. Now witness, as I show the ultimate truth!)

101314040.baseEffect_: Summon 2 Guardian Golems. Earth Rite: Give +1/+1 to all allied Guardian Golems.
101314040.baseFlair_: Alchemists build walls that have wills of their own. That's the difference between us and carpenters.

107314010.baseEffect_:
Destroy an enemy follower. Draw 1 card.
Spellboost: Draw 1 more.
107314010.baseFlair_: Pain, pain, go away. See, now doesn't that feel better?

101324020.baseEffect_: Deal 3 damage to all enemy followers.
101324020.baseFlair_: There's no need for the power of tigers. Not when you can just summon a dragon.

102324030.baseEffect_:
Summon 1 Clay Golem.
Spellboost: Summon 1 more.
102324030.baseFlair_: Quantity over quality! Am I right or am I right?

104324010.baseEffect_:
Spellboost: Subtract 1 from the cost of this card.
----------
Give +2/+2 to an allied follower.
104324010.baseFlair_: Feel the power of the enchanted sword!

111334010.baseEffect_:
Draw cards until there are 9 cards in your hand.
If this card has been Spellboosted at least 9 times, recover 7 play points.
111334010.baseFlair_: Hear me, all living creatures: Be governed by instinct. Open wide your slavering jaws to devour sadness and joy alike. Only then shall we seize upon the truth.

900344040.baseEffect_: Randomly put 1 of the highest-cost followers that cost X play points or less from your deck into your hand and change its cost to 0. X equals the number of times this card has been Spellboosted.
900344040.baseFlair_: A mere fragment of the king's infinite wisdom.

101333010.baseEffect_:
Countdown (3)
Fanfare: Earth Rite - Summon a Guardian Golem.
At the end of your turn, summon a Guardian Golem.
101333010.baseFlair_: Whoa, this could be huge! What's that word again? Oh yeah—eureka!

114332010.baseEffect_:
Invocation: At the start of your tenth turn or later, if you can evolve and have at least 1 evolution point, use 1 evolution point and invoke this card.
Until this amulet leaves play give your leader the following effects: Whenever you play a card deal 2 damage to a random enemy. Whenever you play a card, if there are no followers in your deck, recover 1 play point.
114332010.baseFlair_: A faint, insinuating voice guides your footsteps, and you find yourself before an unassuming storefront. Inside that establishment long forgotten by the masses, you feel the heat of countless stares. Selections here are made by the items, you realize, not the customers.

112311010.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (1): Summon an Earth Essence.
----------
Fanfare: Deal 3 damage to 2 random enemy followers.
112311010.baseFlair_: Tremble in fear before my power! O, brilliant red! Dwell within my hand and shine... Huh? You think my incantation's too long? That's my strategy, silly! Enemies think I'm going to cast a spell, so they drop their guard and get closer... Then I just use my sword instead!
112311010.evoFlair_: As a magic user who wields a sword, there are a lot of things I'd like to say to her... But there's no point preaching to a mage that they're doing it wrong. —Blade Mage

113311020.baseEffect_:
Spellboost: Subtract 1 from the cost of this card.
----------
Storm.
Fanfare: Deal 2 damage to an enemy follower.
113311020.baseFlair_: The righteous mage witnessed it for himself—a bane his sword could not break. An eye for an eye, a curse for a curse. The knight's two swords seemed to bring down a curse on the accursed beasts.
113311020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
113311020.evoFlair_: The wielder shows no mercy to those who would be cut down, for the twin blades that mete out curses on the accursed beasts. The justice he believed has long perished, but his determination is undying.

119311030.baseEffect_:
Crystallize (2): Earth Sigil
Last Words: Summon a Guardian Golem.
----------
Rush.
Last Words: Summon 2 Guardian Golems.
119311030.baseFlair_: Golems have strict working conditions. They must only work during the day; require rest days each week; need regular upkeep; and should only perform work-related tasks. Deviating from these conditions may cause the golem to go berserk. —Golems for Dummies, Chapter 3
119311030.evoFlair_:
These golems have a better life than me...
—Resentful Young Sorcerer

109321010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If you have 20 cards or less in your deck, Choose - Summon an Eldritch Chimera or Eldritch Demon.
109321010.baseFlair_: It's all about method and attention to detail, you know. I guess you could call it dedication to the craft? Anyway, I'm obviously gonna destroy you here, so... Which pup should I do it with?
109321010.evoFlair_: Sure, a result is something you can be proud of, but the process is something you can really savor. Anyway, clearly you're gonna get torn to shreds here—just give me a second to choose how.

115321020.baseEffect_:
Spellboost: Subtract 1 from the cost of this card.
----------
Fanfare: Summon a Demonic Shikigami.
Whenever an allied Paper Shikigami or Demonic Shikigami comes into play, give it +1/+0 and Rush.
115321020.baseFlair_:
The people grow suspicious of Onmyodo. It is not truth as they had once thought, but power. What kind of power, none can say.
—The Legacy of Onmyodo: Jin
115321020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
115321020.evoFlair_:
The number of Onmyodo practitioners is small. They are unable to defend themselves from the pointed words of so many. Having lost the trust of the people, they are driven from the capital.
—The Legacy of Onmyodo: Retsu

103331020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Summon a Grea the Dragonborn and evolve it.
103331020.baseFlair_: Are you new to Mysteria Academy? I'm Anne, and this is Grea! Looking forward to studying together!
103331020.evoEffect_: Strike: Deal 1 damage to all enemy followers.
103331020.evoFlair_: I love this academy! Nothing would make me happier than if you learn to love it too!

104331030.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Summon a Dragon.
Fanfare: Earth Rite - Summon a Windblast Dragon instead.
104331030.baseFlair_: "True magic is that which lies beyond human knowledge, so dragons are a type of magic." The elder mage muttered the words to his acolytes. "There is value in understanding dragons, value that makes sacrificing one's human form a small price to pay."
104331030.evoFlair_: "Study the wings of the dragon to learn to fly, and study its fangs and claws to learn to rend the earth asunder." As the elder mage spoke these words, its scaled master roared. "One roar is worth a thousand words. This is true learning!"

117331020.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (2): Summon an Earth Essence. Put a 7-play point Alchemical Craftschief (without Accelerate) into your hand and subtract X from its cost. X equals the number of allied Earth Sigil amulets in play.
----------
Ward.
Fanfare: Deal 4 damage to an enemy.
117331020.baseFlair_: All right apprentices, gather 'round! Any alchemist worth their saltpeter needs two things: gumption and the basic recipe for any creation. First ye pour the ingredients! Then ye mix it up fine! And then... Well. Ye'll know when ye get to that part!
117331020.evoEffect_:
Ward.
Evolve: Earth Rite - Summon a Guardian Golem.
117331020.evoFlair_:
"So that's the final step... Pour, mix, and... boom..."

101341030.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, deal 5 damage to a random enemy follower.
101341030.baseFlair_: No respect, I tell ya! No wonder the world's torn asunder! Never mind though—a job's a job. Now lemme warm up my staff.
101341030.evoEffect_: At the end of your turn, deal 7 damage to a random enemy follower.
101341030.evoFlair_: Not a scratch, huh? Maybe I've lost my touch after all. Or maybe you're Death, waitin' to take what's owed, eh? Then gimme ya best, pal!

107341020.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Transform all Earth Sigil amulets in your hand into Veridic Rituals. Then perform Earth Rite (X): Put X Veridic Rituals into your hand. X equals the number of Earth Sigil amulets in play.
107341020.baseFlair_: As the world is filled with sin, so shall its veins be with a magical lifeforce. Its purpose is but one—with sin, comes punishment.
107341020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
107341020.evoFlair_: All sins will meet their judgment without discrimination. Until the world has been purified once more, this armor shall not rest.

115341030.baseEffect_:
Crystallize (1): Earth Sigil
Your leader can't take more than 4 damage at a time.
At the start of your turn, perform Earth Rite: If an earlier-played Earth Sigil amulet is destroyed this way, restore 1 defense to your leader.
At the end of your turn, draw a card.
----------
Fanfare: Gain +X/+X. X equals the number of allied Earth Sigil amulets destroyed this match. Deal Y damage to an enemy. Y equals this follower's attack.
115341030.baseFlair_: Causality is equivalent to truth. Zero is zero. One hundred is one hundred. That balance is forever unchanging... or it was. However, now the forbidden arts make a mockery of causality.
115341030.evoFlair_: Both nothingness and infinity are now possible. Equality can be rewritten, distorted, using a taboo practice capable of deceiving the heavens. Beyond the bounds of reason, the mage smiles calmly.

116341010.baseEffect_:
Spellboost: Subtract 1 from the cost of this card.
----------
Fanfare: Draw cards until your hand is full or you draw a card without Spellboost. Spellboost those cards 3 times.
116341010.baseFlair_:
Time, space, dimension, fate... These are normally linchpins of reality, but the grinning witch picked through them all like faulty locks.
"Uh, how about a real challenge?"
116341010.evoFlair_:
The grinning witch mocks the impossible as easily as she grasps the infinite. Unbridled and free, her power is always on display.
"With a bang and a boom!"

100314070.baseEffect_:
Spellboost: Subtract 1 from the cost of this card.
----------
Destroy an enemy follower.
100314070.baseFlair_: A single caress burns, but an embrace turns you to ash.

713314010.baseEffect_:
Spellboost: Subtract 1 from the cost of this card.
----------
Destroy an enemy follower.
713314010.baseFlair_: You who were left behind by time, who forgot the benevolence bestowed on you... Now you and your dream of a great nation shall crumble!

111311020.baseEffect_:
Spellboost: Subtract 1 from the cost of this card.
----------
Storm.
111311020.baseFlair_: Our way is truth. Yours is deception. Rid yourself of all but that which is true, and only the veracious will walk the earth.
111311020.evoFlair_: Devour falsehoods beneath the shadow of rites. Seekers of truth shall eradicate the false, and all that remains shall be known as truth.

116311030.baseEffect_:
Crystallize (2): Earth Sigil
Fanfare: Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower.
----------
Fanfare: Deal 6 damage to an enemy follower.
116311030.baseFlair_:
For components within the prime field, used iron as the medium. Potential was middling. Notably, seems to command other golems. Not intentional result. Failure?
—Note on a Researcher's Desk
116311030.evoFlair_:
Observation about golem: Uses magic elements itself and builds friends. My only talent is experimentation. Subject seems more human than myself.
—Note on a Researcher's Desk

104321040.baseEffect_:
Spellboost: Subtract 1 from the cost of this card.
----------
Fanfare: Deal 4 damage to an enemy follower.
104321040.baseFlair_: I created it for fun, but it ended up being three times meaner and hungrier than I expected. Talk about triple trouble. —A young alchemist
104321040.evoFlair_: I raised it for fun, but it ended up being four times meaner and hungrier than I expected. How big does this thing get anyway? —A young alchemist

110331010.baseEffect_:
Whenever you play a Mysteria card, subtract 1 from the cost of this card.
----------
Fanfare: Choose - Put an Anne's Summoning or Anne's Sorcery into your hand.
110331010.baseFlair_: For the academy and everyone in it, I'm going to unleash my true power—no holding back! You're gonna see what I'm made of!
110331010.evoFlair_: I'm not scared of a fight... What frightens me is the thought of my friends getting hurt. So I'll protect them, whatever it takes!

114331010.baseEffect_:
Storm.

When this follower comes into play, gain +X/+0. X equals the number of allied Naterran Great Trees you've played this match.
114331010.baseFlair_: O flowing, mutable water, master of gentle change and of conservation. Cardinal direction: West. Domain of the Undines. You who chill and irrigate. Please, rest easy. We are here for you.
114331010.evoFlair_: O flowing, mutable water, master of gentle change and of conservation. Cardinal direction: West. Domain of the Undines. You who chill and irrigate. It isn't that I crave power... but my companion is angry.

101341010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to all enemy followers.
Spellboost: Deal 1 more.
101341010.baseFlair_: A mad alchemist's creation. Though he lost his master, he rages on, compelled to carry out the alchemist's orders.
101341010.evoFlair_: Staring at the white castle walls that conceal his chained master, he clenches his graveled fists and then strikes.

103341010.baseEffect_:
Spellboost: Subtract 1 from the cost of this card.
----------
Fanfare: Banish all cards in your hand. Then draw 5 cards and Spellboost them 5 times.
103341010.baseFlair_: A witch who left the world far behind and lives outside the confines of nature's laws. Her magic alters the face of reality.
103341010.evoFlair_: With but a murmur, the witch transcends barriers and boundaries, as well as distances and dimensions. Her blazing scarlet eyes see futures others can't even dream of.

704341010.baseEffect_:
Spellboost: Subtract 1 from the cost of this card.
----------
Fanfare: Banish all cards in your hand. Then draw 5 cards and Spellboost them 5 times.
704341010.baseFlair_: A witch who left the world far behind and lives outside the confines of nature's laws. Her magic alters the face of reality.
704341010.evoFlair_: With but a murmur, the witch transcends barriers and boundaries, as well as distances and dimensions. Her blazing scarlet eyes see futures others can't even dream of.

104341010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Change the cost of all followers in your hand to 0. Give allied followers the inability to attack the enemy leader. Give allied followers that come into play the inability to attack the enemy leader (if this card is still in play). Give your leader the following effect: Fanfare effects will not activate. These effects will last until the end of the turn this card is played.
104341010.baseFlair_: A wordwielder who can curse a person, a city, or the very essence of a thing with but a single word. When her lips part, calamity slithers forth.
104341010.evoFlair_: The words she whispers drift into the sky and coalesce into disaster. She yearns for tiny misfortunes, silent death, and widespread ruin.

106341020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Deal a pool of 3 damage divided between all enemies. First deal damage to enemy followers equal to their defense in the order they came into play. Then, if any damage is left in the pool afterward, deal it to the enemy leader.
Spellboost: Deal 1 more damage.
106341020.baseFlair_: Their grimoires were comprehensive, and their experiments were superlative. But a god named caprice would make it all crumble to dust. —Terminus Necessarius, Chapter 3
106341020.evoFlair_: Mankind's self-guided destiny is worthless before the caprice that gods employ. Our endeavors, therefore, lie prostrate before the whims of the gods. —Terminus Necessarius, Chapter 12

108341020.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Select a card in your hand, and put copies of it into your hand until it is full. (A hand can hold 9 cards.)
At the start of your turn, evolve this follower.
108341020.baseFlair_: A voice to agitate all within my skull. A groan. She had reconstructed the very essence of my being. It was then that I had a realization: "Yes, magic, in truth, is..." —Grimy scrap of paper
108341020.evoEffect_:
(Doesn't have Ward.)
Strike: Spellboost the cards in your hand 10 times.
108341020.evoFlair_: A voice, a groan, and the tune's meaning gradually became clear to me. She reconstructed me as I should be. Ah, I'm through, but how very wonderful... —Grimy scrap of paper

113341010.baseEffect_:

----------
Fanfare: Put a Ginger's Curse into your hand.
113341010.baseFlair_: A wordwielder who would bring forth disaster. A demon who would bring forth unspeakable terror. Through their fated encounter, an exchanging of words—the birth of love. For this is Ville de l'Amour, a town brimming with the miracles of love. —Ville de l'Amour, An Encounter
113341010.evoEffect_: Evolve: Give your leader the following effect - At the start of your turn, put a Ginger's Curse into your hand. (This effect is not stackable and lasts for the rest of the match.)
113341010.evoFlair_: A wordwielder who believed not in true love. She uttered to the demon, "If your love was born of a curse, perish before my sight!" The demon fled, yet disaster remained imminent. —Ville de l'Amour, A Parting

900334020.baseEffect_: Deal 8 damage to an enemy follower.

100321010.baseEffect_: Spellboost: Subtract 1 from the cost of this card.
100321010.baseFlair_: Come hither and hearken well. The sound of my shackles shattering heralds the beginning of the end.
100321010.evoFlair_: With rebirth comes metamorphosis. Pity none shall be left to see it once my rapturous flames have scorched this earth.

112331020.baseEffect_:

----------
Fanfare: Recover 10 play points.
Fanfare: Earth Rite - Banish all cards in your hand, then draw 9 cards.
112331020.baseFlair_: The unknown exists within the known. How long has it been since I last set foot in this land? One must consider the past to uncover the future... And as I am now, I am confident that I am capable of doing just that.
112331020.evoFlair_: By refining the known, one can discover the unknown. The quest for knowledge is never-ending. Constant effort will yield success.

115341010.baseFlair_:
A noisy crowd of people is worth less than the sum of its parts. Those things you call "knowledge" and "wisdom" are destined to fade away like the morning dew. (What a waste of time. How about we end this?)
I command the five elements. (You're finished.)
