101411090.baseFlair_: A fire dragon that has dwelt inside a volcano since time immemorial. Some call it Hero's End for eating so many would-be vanquishers.
101411090.evoFlair_: When the fire dragon becomes angry, the flames surrounding its body glow an incandescent blue and turn anything they touch into ash.

107411030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 3 damage to a random enemy follower. A random enemy follower can't attack next turn.
107411030.baseFlair_: Bwahaha! Nature's saute, nature's sorbet! Still... there's something missing! Coctura Integro! —Gourmet Emperor Khaiza
107411030.evoFlair_:
As expected from the Gourmet Emperor himself. The firedragon is impeccably chilled as an appetizing side dish, and the frostdragon is grilled to perfection. This deserves nothing less than a perfect score.
—Lyriola, Supreme Critic

114411010.baseEffect_:
Crystallize (5): Countdown (3)
Fanfare and Last Words: Summon a Dragon.
----------
Fanfare: Summon a Dragon.
114411010.baseFlair_:
"Grroooar!"
"A challenge! Let's see who can take that beast down first!"
—Dragonblader and his rival
114411010.evoFlair_:
"Graaahhhr!"
"Our rivalry keeps us sharp, doesn't it! You know I'm the only one who could match a blade to your fangs!"
—Dragonblader and his rival

118411030.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (3): Restore 2 defense to your leader. Draw 2 cards.
----------
Fanfare: Restore 3 defense to your leader. Draw 3 cards.
118411030.baseFlair_: Once upon a time, a very hungry dragon appeared before two rival villages. One village, seeking to wreak havoc on the other, tried to tame the dragon with pumpkins. But as it turned out, the dragon was a compassionate creature and went off with the pumpkins as a gift.
118411030.evoFlair_: The delicious gift from the dragon brought peace to the villagers' hearts and soon, peace between the villages. And tonight, on the anniversary of that fateful day, we celebrate by exchanging fresh produce and clothing native to our respective lands.

111421020.baseEffect_:
Storm.
At the start of the opponent's turn, if this follower has been damaged, restore 2 defense to this follower and gain Ward.
111421020.baseFlair_: I've abandoned my humanity. I gave everything to gain power, to better my country. The dragon's blood coursing through my veins is proof of my resolve. Come, Oswald. Let us fly, my friend.
111421020.evoFlair_: I will never forget the people who laid down their lives for change. For my part, I laid down my humanity... and gained conviction in exchange. The road to dominion is drenched in blood, but the only way is forward.

103431020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Summon an Anne, Belle of Mysteria and evolve it.
103431020.baseFlair_: Anne, quit dragging me over to the— Oh, hello there! So you're the new student. Good to meet you!
103431020.evoFlair_: I like this school. Everyone's just so nice. I'm sure you'll love it too!

108431020.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Give your leader the following effect - Whenever you play a non-follower card, deal 1 damage to the enemy leader. (This effect lasts for the rest of the match.)
108431020.baseFlair_: Hey, you heard what they're saying? It's about the warrior with the horned helmet. They say that underneath the armor, he's really a dragon! —Battlefield rumors
108431020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
108431020.evoFlair_: He doesn't speak a word to anyone, and nobody's seen his face. But when he meets an enemy that seems worth his trouble, he opens his visor and spits flames! —Battlefield rumors

109431030.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (2): Summon a Poseidon's Guard.
----------
Fanfare: Summon 2 Poseidon's Guards.
109431030.baseFlair_: In a palace of deepest depths he resides. The god of the seas, the king of a nation, the commander of his army.
109431030.evoFlair_: The ocean blue fosters life, but do not be deceived by its gentle facade. With a swing of his trident, a mighty tempest can brew at any given instant.

111431010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Destroy all damaged enemy followers.
111431010.baseFlair_:
Dragons reign over the skies. It is a source of great pride to them. Therefore when they descend to earth you may be sure, their goal is nothing less than absolute destruction.
—Veteran Dragonslayer
111431010.evoFlair_:
Their tread is heavy enough to shatter rock. The lash of their tails can cleave mountains. They rule the sky because they love it. If they should come to despise the land... well. It would be the end of all things.
—Veteran Dragonslayer

101441030.baseFlair_: Assemble before me, beloved dragons! I am about to set you free! The time has come for you to return to your rightful place and regain dominion over all living things!
101441030.evoFlair_: Fly, my beautiful dragons, fly! Be proud of your fangs! Your claws! Your wings! No one can stand in your way! It is time to unleash your power upon the world!

104441020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Deal 3 damage to an enemy.
Last Words: Restore 3 defense to your leader. Then put an Ouroboros into your hand.
104441020.baseFlair_: Life and death. Endings and beginnings. An absolute force that governs the ever-spinning, ever-repeating cycle of destiny.
104441020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
104441020.evoFlair_: This serpent depicts an endless cycle, and it represents both everything and nothing. All fated to be repeated as the world spins into eternity is within the belly of this limitless serpent.

105441020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Destroy all other allied followers. For each follower, put a random follower that costs more than it from your deck into play.
105441020.baseFlair_: Such vociferous jaws and grasping claws! Thy brillig name upon the lips lingereth, and never shall it vade! —Poems of Unbeing
105441020.evoFlair_: Thine eyes of flame so blaze! Let thy name resound, unbeing Jabberwock. And the chaos shall as order seem. —Poems of Unbeing

113441020.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Ward.
Can't take more than 1 damage at a time.
113441020.baseFlair_:
"A sword to pierce any shield," shouted the bladesmith.
"A shield to stop all swords," argued the shieldsmith.
Both were squashed by a dragon, so the truth was never known. —Fighting at the Feet of Dragons, "The How and Why"
113441020.evoEffect_:
Rush.
Ward.
Can't take more than 1 damage at a time.
Can't be destroyed by effects. (Can be destroyed by damage from effects.)
113441020.evoFlair_:
"The sky is crumbling and falling," wept the worrier.
"What's the sense in fretting," laughed his wife.
Since all were helpless before the dragon, I could tell the wife was correct. —Trembling at the Might of Dragons, "The How and Why"

114441010.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (3): Summon a Megalorca. Give it Storm.
----------
Ward.
Fanfare: Summon 2 Megalorcas.
Whenever an allied Megalorca comes into play, give it Storm.
114441010.baseFlair_: Not many are there who can part the roiling waves and follow the whirlpool's path to the very depths of the ocean. You, wise one who knows the ways of the sea, you shall have the deadly currents, the sea's rage, as your blade.
114441010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
114441010.evoFlair_: The sea's servants have surpassed its stillness and can command the storm. You who are versed in the ocean's blue, the storm-tossed sea and the water's deadly calm shall be your shield.

112433010.baseEffect_:
Countdown (2)
Fanfare: Randomly summon 1 of the following - Hellflame Dragon, Dragon, or Windblast Dragon.
At the start of your turn, randomly summon 1 of the remaining cards.
112433010.baseFlair_: It's always sad when a child leaves the nest, but I'm just delighted that you all grew up big and strong. Please take care of yourselves, my dear little ones. —Dragonrearer Matilda

105421030.baseFlair_: Provisions are gone, our forces have disbanded, and there's no money left to hire mercenaries. Now what happens to the state? If only there were someone to help. —Diary of the Have-Not King
105421030.evoEffect_:
Ward.
Last Words: Put a Fortress Crab into your hand.
105421030.evoFlair_: At the suggestion of the palace mage, we've established a base atop the monster. At this point we'll take a helping hand from anyone—even a crab. —Diary of the Have-Not King

106421030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Destroy a random enemy follower with the lowest cost.
106421030.baseFlair_: Strong wind blowin' in? Omen for rough seas. Winds calm but the seas are rough? Omen for it. —Young fisherman
106421030.evoFlair_: So big you'll hurt your neck tryin' to look up at it. And it makes these huge waves just by diving. Ain't no way we can get close to it. —Young fisherman

119421020.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Strike: Deal X damage to the enemy leader. X equals this follower's attack.
119421020.baseFlair_: Felling opponents with a single, all-powerful fist—that is the Eternal Rage Style, and I am its master, Ghandagoza! Gahahaha! Your fists show promise, young one! Will you become my disciple?
119421020.evoFlair_: Bwahahahaha! The only thing you can count on is your fists, so why not see how far they can take you? The way is clear—you need only strike the first blow! There is no path that can't be smashed open!

101431050.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Destroy an enemy follower or amulet.
101431050.baseFlair_: The light of the orbs can cleanse any impurity and eradicate any evil. Human lives, human lands—all seem like trifles before its tremendous power.
101431050.evoFlair_: The incandescent light of the dragon's orbs can raze the land to the ground. If you value your life, pray that you are never exposed to their glow.

107431020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal X damage to all other followers. X equals the number of Dragoncraft cards in your hand.
107431020.baseFlair_: "Just 'cause you touch a dragon's scales don't make it angry. They're furious all the time!" —Anonymous Journeyman
107431020.evoFlair_: "Some say that touching a certain scale on a dragon will make 'em real mad. I say just don't touch any of 'em!" —Anonymous Journeyman

101441010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 2 damage to all other followers.
101441010.baseFlair_: An evil serpent that lusts for gold. A brutal creature, it has been known to use its steely jaws to mash into tiny pieces those who come in search of its treasures.
101441010.evoFlair_: Its body is shrouded in a golden gleam; its eyes shine with an evil greed. Those who dare intrude upon its sanctuary are sliced open with sharp claws and drowned in their own blood.

103441010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Discard your hand and deal X damage to all enemies. X equals the number of cards discarded.
103441010.baseFlair_: The knight freed a nameless dragon of terrible power from ruins where few dared to tread. To exact revenge on those who took his country from him, the knight signed a blood pact with the beast.
103441010.evoFlair_: The dragoon took his revenge, completing the last mission of the royal family. With that, the dragoon vanished along with the dragon to atone for crimes that could never be forgotten.

704441010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Discard your hand and deal X damage to all enemies. X equals the number of cards discarded.
704441010.baseFlair_: The knight freed a nameless dragon of terrible power from ruins where few dared to tread. To exact revenge on those who took his country from him, the knight signed a blood pact with the beast.
704441010.evoEffect_: (This card will be treated as Imperial Dragoon.)
704441010.evoFlair_: The dragoon took his revenge, completing the last mission of the royal family. With that, the dragoon vanished along with the dragon to atone for crimes that could never be forgotten.

105441010.baseEffect_: Last Words: During your next turn, double the attack and defense of each allied Dragoncraft follower that comes into play.
105441010.baseFlair_: A land's prosperity and fortune are not perforce coupled to the deeds of men. Of equal import are heaven's works, which guide the leaders and move the subjects.
105441010.evoFlair_: She is there in conquest's shadow—at prosperity's side. She who counsels with her beating wings and illuminates the future with shimmering fires.

108441010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Change your leader's maximum defense to 10. Give your leader the following effect: At the end of your turn, deal 5 damage to a random enemy follower. If no enemy followers are in play, deal 5 damage to the enemy leader instead. (This effect is not stackable and lasts for the rest of the match.)
108441010.baseFlair_: Stunted weaklings, what have you done? What can you even do? Discard it all—each and every thing that binds you. Thirst for them—these wings, these scales, this roar.
108441010.evoFlair_: You are weak, and so you fear the world. But the time for such feelings is through. Once the dragon's power marks you, the world will fear!

114441030.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (2): Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower. Put a Naterran Great Tree into your hand.
----------
Fanfare: Discard all Natura cards in your hand and deal X damage to all enemies. X equals the number of Natura cards discarded.
114441030.baseFlair_:
That beast's command of the raging flames is so... exciting. I could fall in love with those flames. I wish I could be like that. Maybe I should go say hello. I'd hate to waste the opportunity.
—Young Dragonfolk visitor to Dinosaur Island
114441030.evoFlair_:
Tyrannosaurus Rex, king of the roaring blaze. Bathing in magma has given it a body which births flame at the merest touch. Any who impede its progress when it sights its prey will be reduced to ash.
—Dinosaur Island Guidebook

102432020.baseEffect_: At the start of your turn, summon a Windblast Dragon.
102432020.baseFlair_: The cacophony of roars shakes the heavens and the earth.

101431020.baseFlair_: Where others take days to create a world, this dragon takes just an instant.
101431020.evoFlair_: In order to create, one need only entrust their soul to the sea. In order to destroy, one need only summon a whirlpool to swallow the land. Everything comes from water, and one day everything will return there.

106441020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Banish all cards that cost 7 play points or less from your deck.
106441020.baseFlair_: The divine floods washed away every destiny, but from the mud rose a call. In that moment all incidence became inevitability. —Cyclical Histories, Chapter 2
106441020.evoFlair_: The oracle that emerged from the mud will carry in its body everything from this world's beginning and end. Radiant, it will spin the fate of the world—creating all, destroying all. —Cyclical Histories, Chapter 5

107441020.baseEffect_:
Whenever an allied follower evolves, subtract 1 from the cost of this card.
----------
Storm.
107441020.baseFlair_: A depraved creature of evil, wickedness incarnate—from its mouths it expels one thousand curses and one million poisons. —Terrors of the World, Chapter 4
107441020.evoFlair_: It is not blood, but venom that flows in its veins—not life, but malice inside its body. The three necked dark dragon is truly a terrible force not to be trifled with. —Terrors of the World, Chapter 4

108441020.baseEffect_: If you've played at least 10 other non-follower cards this match, and you have 10 play points, Choose: Play this card as a Virtuous Lindworm or Iniquitous Lindworm.
108441020.baseFlair_: A blaze of light and the heavens are torn asunder. What will rain down from them: a merciful verdict of light or a merciless tyranny of dark?
108441020.evoFlair_: A blaze of light and the heavens are covered. Will the creature bring forth the beginning of salvation or the end of sin?

900441030.baseEffect_:
Storm.
Fanfare: Deal damage to your leader until their defense drops to 1. Give your leader the following effect until the start of your next turn - Reduce damage to your leader to 0.
900441030.baseFlair_: I appear when the balance of the world comes under threat. Come. Join me in the fight.
900441030.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
900441030.evoFlair_: You've shown me just what wonders your world has to offer. However... I need not mention what I will do to you should you ever threaten it.

112441030.baseEffect_:
Can't take more than 4 damage at a time.
Can attack 3 times per turn.
112441030.baseFlair_: Its eyes are the color of madness, an angry shade filled with hatred for the skies above. Once a god itself, it has been twisted and deformed by its despair. Lo, the tears of this world exist because of the tears you shed. —Lost Legends
112441030.evoFlair_: Its hatred of the gods becomes a raging sea, waves crashing into the skies above. Those hands that once loved the world transform into the jaws of a fearsome beast. Lo, the seas are violent because they know your anger. —Lost Legends

113441010.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (4): Gain an empty play point orb. If you have at least 1 evolution point, use 1 evolution point and deal 3 damage to all followers. (You have 0 evolution points on turns you are unable to evolve.)
----------
Storm.
113441010.baseFlair_: The world's beginning can be traced to the maternal sea. The world's end will be no different. —Calamity's Return, Foreword
113441010.evoFlair_: When the world began, there was simply nothing. When the world ends, all will simply return to nothing. —Calamity's Return, Epilogue

117441010.baseEffect_:
Ward.
When this follower comes into play, randomly activate 1 of the following effects.
-Draw 3 cards.
-Evolve this follower.
When this follower leaves play, restore 8 defense to your leader. (Transformation doesn't count as leaving play.)
117441010.baseFlair_: Listen to their grievances, dear ally. I am Justice, true warden of equality. From squalid prisons, I shall release. Be bound no longer; rise! Take flight!
117441010.evoEffect_:
Storm.
Ignore Ward.
Can't be targeted by enemy effects.
117441010.evoFlair_: Let us deliver a verdict, dear ally. I am Justice, executioner of prejudice. This sword adjudicates by integrity. The guilty will pay for their crimes.

118441010.baseEffect_:
Fusion: Cards that originally cost 7 play points or more
When cards are fused to this card, if it's the second time this match, gain an empty play point orb. If it's the third time, draw 2 cards.
----------
Fanfare: Banish X random enemy cards. X equals the number of cards fused to this card plus 1.
118441010.baseFlair_: 'Tis a twisted abomination that roams the skies, devouring dragons as it goes. Its first victim swam through a sea of clouds and straight into the creature's maw. The beast sprouted four limbs and began shifting into something grotesque. —Abominations & Taboos, Law
118441010.evoFlair_:
It devoured a fire-breathing dragon; it now breathes fire. It devoured a wise dragon; it is now clever. It devoured a divine dragon; it obliterated an entire continent. Though its form shifts, its appetite remains as voracious as ever.
—Abominations & Taboos, Folly

900441010.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, restore 5 defense to your leader. Then draw 5 cards.
900441010.baseFlair_: As the heavens are torn asunder, the dark clouds dissipate. The light of judgment reigns, and a merciful verdict is set forth.
900441010.evoFlair_: White lightning tears across the sky, raining salvation onto all in existence. Ah, but do not fear. Bow your head and accept it.

900441020.baseEffect_:
Storm.
Can only attack the enemy leader.
Ignore Ward.
900441020.baseFlair_: From beneath the heavens, dark clouds gather. The tyrannies of darkness reign, and a merciless verdict is set forth.
900441020.evoFlair_: Black lightning tears across the sky, raining finality onto all in existence. Ah, but do not fear. Bow your head and accept it.

109441010.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (1): Draw a card. Put a 10-play point, 6/5 Zooey, Arbiter of the Skies (without Accelerate) into your deck.
----------
Storm.
Fanfare: Deal damage to your leader until their defense drops to 1. Give your leader the following effect until the start of your next turn - Reduce damage to your leader to 0.
109441010.baseFlair_: I appear when the balance of the world comes under threat. Come. Join me in the fight.
109441010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
109441010.evoFlair_: You've shown me just what wonders your world has to offer. However... I need not mention what I will do to you should you ever threaten it.

119441020.baseEffect_:
At the end of your turn, if you have 10 play point orbs, subtract 10 from the cost of this card.
----------
Accelerate (1): Draw a card. If you have more evolution points than your opponent, summon a Megalorca. (You have 0 evolution points on turns you are unable to evolve.)
----------
Fanfare: Give -X/-X to all enemy followers. X equals your remaining play points. (Followers are destroyed when their defense drops below 1.)
119441020.baseFlair_: For those who respect the sea, its coming signals good fortune. The waters become calm and ships find their way to port safe and sound. To these virtuous souls, the refreshing spray of the waves is a cleansing benediction.
119441020.evoEffect_: Evolve: Return another card in play to the player's hand.
119441020.evoFlair_: For those who disrespect the sea, its coming signals the end. The waters become stormy and ships are torn apart, never to be seen again. To these unfortunate souls, the violent rocking of the waves is divine retribution.

900432010.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, transform all allied followers without Ward into Inferno Dragons.
900432010.baseFlair_: If you rub a dragon the wrong way, it'll rage and slay you. But if you make away with its hoard, it'll accept you as its master. —Pyrewyrm Commander

900734040.baseFlair_: Allow me to fight at your side. Right now, I am cloaked in sin. But if ever there was a light to lift the darkness and cleanse my soul... it would be the light of atonement. I have only one wish: to save as many as I have forsaken.

900734050.baseFlair_: Your major's here, reportin' for duty—even if this battle does make me feel like a tenderclaw. Would be a lie if I said I'm the strongest in the forest, but you'll find no greater ally than me, milord! Mreow!

900744010.baseEffect_:
Subtract 1 from the cost of a Havencraft or Machina follower in your hand.
If you have played 4 other Salvation Ex Limonias in this match, put a Heavenly Aegis into your hand.
900744010.baseFlair_:
Critical damage detected.
I'll deliver you. With this power.
Initiating proselytization protocol. —Limonia, Flawed Saint

111711010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Choose - Put a Sacred Plea or Beastly Vow into your hand.
111711010.baseFlair_: Ah, yes... My loyal brethren, fellow masters of destructive cyclones, the chosen ones acquainted with the pact of flames, allow me to share my eternal gratitude... —Grimnir
111711010.evoFlair_: It appears you have mastered the winds as well, haven't you? Let's be friends! What's that? You'll introduce me to the beast of flames? Sweet! —Grimnir

113711010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Restore 1 defense to all allies.
Enhance (7): Gain +4/+4 and restore 4 defense instead.
113711010.baseFlair_: Get injured on the battlefield and this ungraceful young woman will visit you. She has a firm voice, a harried step, and a bad attitude. "You there! You're hurt again!" ―Diary of a Warrior
113711010.evoFlair_: Although she complains, she'll heal you gracefully. Say thanks and the bunny will cheerfully whisper, "You're helpless without me!" ―Diary of a Warrior

118711010.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: If any allied amulets are in play, gain +1/+1.
Fanfare: Enhance (5) - Summon a Barong.
118711010.baseFlair_: The stones are giving off a foreboding aura. Enemies must be approaching. This calls for a magical transformation!
118711010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
118711010.evoFlair_: I am Holy Gem, stalwart envoy of the gods! You evildoers will know justice! Get ready for the cleansing of a lifetime!

109721010.baseFlair_: Lost lamb of god, steeped in sin—repent to your heart's content. It appears you have much blood on your hands...
109721010.evoEffect_: Evolve: Destroy an enemy follower or amulet.
109721010.evoFlair_: You have been absolved... NOT! Not even close! Not repentant enough! You must repent harder! Haaarder, I say!

114721010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give another allied follower Rush and deal 1 damage to that follower.
114721010.baseFlair_: Here goes: a shot of medicine that'll make you want to confess your sins and apologize! Huh? Where are you going? Whoops... I gave you the medicine that makes you want to work up a sweat and burn some calories!
114721010.evoFlair_: Hey, you're the guy who helped me with my investigation that one time! If you hadn't accidentally knocked over the real culprit, I never would've caught him! That's the kind of luck I'll need as a future holy commissioner!

119721010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Restore 1 defense to all allies. If Avarice is active for you, deal 1 damage to the enemy leader.
119721010.baseFlair_: Well hello there, you cretins who would mistreat monsters. I doubt the sacrament of confession would do you much good. Not that I would hear you, even if you asked. Hm? What am I? Haha! I'm just a pacifist priest in service to a higher power.
119721010.evoFlair_: Too bad for you, I'm all out of mercy. You'll have to find someone else who'll take pity on you. Well, not that you'll get very far, because I plan to be your judge, jury, and executioner. Yes... You'll answer for your crimes against these lovely, adorable monsters.

109731020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Select an allied follower. It can't be attacked until the end of your opponent's turn.
109731020.baseFlair_: A wind shaman's duty is to ride aboard airships and do wind readings, or in other words, predict weather mid-flight. However, there are fewer wind shamans these days, and those who remain are reduced to offering only simple prayers from the ground.
109731020.evoFlair_: What! You want me to join your crew? Thank you! I've always wanted to fly aboard an airship like the wind shamans of old!

111741030.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Enhance (4) - Put 2 random followers that cost 1 play point or less from your deck into play.
At the end of your turn, put an Elysian Saint-Hares into your deck.
111741030.baseFlair_: The chaste and the true know not of corruption. Thus, the defilement of death has no place among the eternally pure.
111741030.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Give your leader the following effect - At the end of your turn, give +1/+0 to all allied followers that cost 1 play point or less. (This effect is not stackable and lasts for the rest of the match.)
At the end of your turn, put an Elysian Saint-Hares into your deck.
111741030.evoFlair_: The chaste and the true need not speak for concord, as long as intentions remain pure among them.

113741030.baseEffect_:
At the end of your turn, if there are at least 2 allied amulets in play, gain +1/+1.
At the start of your turn, if this follower's attack or defense has not been increased by an effect, destroy this follower.
113741030.baseFlair_:
The warrior entreated heaven for the power to save the weak. Receiving it, he spoke as a holy messenger:
"Human, do not forget the extravagance of this power."
When the warrior forgets God, the wings on his back will carry him to heaven.
113741030.evoEffect_: At the end of your turn, if there are at least 2 allied amulets in play, gain +1/+1.
113741030.evoFlair_:
The warrior saved an uncountable number of the wretched. And they worshipped―not him, but the name of the lord God.
"Human, do not throw thyself into empty deeds."
The warrior continues to battle so long as he believes.

900741040.baseEffect_:
Storm.
Ward.
Whenever an allied Naterran Great Tree comes into play, gain +1/+1.
900741040.baseFlair_: Heed the call of your princess, for you are no longer the cornered rat you once were. Rise to the occasion, and let your swift feet carry you to greatness. —Book of Eulogies on Nature
900741040.evoFlair_: Your voice gives us strength, Princess Daffodil! We swear never to scurry away again! It won't matter if the fiercest of fearsome cats stands in the way; we mighty Meus will fight by your side!

113724010.baseEffect_: Choose: Put a Sacred Teachings, Healing Prayer, or Acolyte's Light into your hand.
113724010.baseFlair_: It's true that faith takes many forms. But keep none other than the one God before you.

114724010.baseEffect_:
Put a Naterran Great Tree into your hand.
If this is your fifth turn or later, recover 1 play point.
Then, if this is your tenth turn or later, restore 5 defense to all allies.
114724010.baseFlair_:
The Mother bestows gifts upon her children.
When the purehearted man discovered her kindness in his manor, he saw a righteous, just aether. He soon learned that it grants power to those who pursue what is right.

117724010.baseEffect_: Put a random amulet from your deck into your hand.
117724010.baseFlair_: Refined beauty is like a polished jewel—it pierces the heart of anyone who looks upon it.

713724010.baseEffect_: Put a random amulet from your deck into your hand.
713724010.baseFlair_:
Feast your eyes on this!
—De La Fille, Gem Princess

900734010.baseEffect_:
Restore 2 defense to an ally.

103711030.evoFlair_: Never will I leave this study. These books are my chains, and this study my prison. I'm trapped in a prison of knowledge, which makes me a pitiable prisoner indeed.

105711030.evoFlair_: From a land far to the west comes one of the four holy beasts. It stops enemies from entering the sacred ground and promises eternal prosperity.

106711010.evoFlair_: O, you of little faith. How naughty, how naughty. You will pray. Or you will perish.

109711010.evoFlair_: Long ears are the picture of good health. At least, that's what my family says. They're so fluffy and embarrassing, though... N-no one's looking, right?

Do not contribute to the spite and agony which govern the world. Sleep is your escape. Dreams are your peace.

115711030.evoFlair_: Prayer blends into our daily lives like balm sinking into the skin. In the same fashion, the animals' way of life is in itself an expression of devotion. The saintly griffon's shriek is its way of conveying both prayer and blessing.

116711030.baseEffect_:

—Garuda, Wings of Paradise

900711110.baseFlair_: When the scales imbued in faith are bountiful from prayer, a divine serpent will be awakened to consume the venom of animosity.
900711110.evoFlair_: The luster of its scales glows a ghastly white—those caught before its fiery red gaze will be exorcised from within.

900711120.baseFlair_: When the final grain of sand has fallen, the cerulean keeper will be awakened, wings aflutter like the winds of time.
900711120.evoFlair_: The flapping of its cerulean wings reveal the flow of time—its flutters exorcising beyond time and space.

"Lord Valdain's plan depends on it!"
He faithfully carries out his orders, confidence guiding his path.
900711140.evoFlair_:
"I'm a major, you hear! Nothing scares me!"
His chest puffs out in a display of bravado.
"I'll make Lord Valdain hop-poppin' proud if it's the last thing I do!"
The major rushes off, keen to attend to his duties.

Ward.

102721010.baseFlair_: You're on sacred ground! And it's certainly no place for the likes of you! My hammer of purity will crush you right down to your soul!
102721010.evoFlair_: Looks like I've overdone it! I can't believe I destroyed the ceiling! It's all your fault for being so weak!

103721040.baseEffect_: Whenever an enemy follower attacks, destroy that follower at the end of the opponent's turn.
103721040.baseFlair_: Ooh! You obviously have fortune on your side! (Not really. I can tell your time's just about up!)
103721040.evoFlair_: Ooh! You're incredibly lucky! (You're unlucky to run into the likes of me!)

106721020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give your leader the following effect - Subtract 3 from damage your leader takes. (This effect lasts until this follower leaves play.)

108721010.evoFlair_: This fragment underlies the coming peace. May placidness soon be yours.

109721020.baseFlair_: Um, excuse me. Where is this place? I wandered off of the main road because I saw some people in need, but then I dropped my map of sacred places. Ahh... What am I going to do?

109721020.evoFlair_: You'll show me the way? That's so nice of you! To thank you for your kindness, would you like to hear about our ward and provider, Zeyen?

116721020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If any allied Natura amulets are in play, gain +1/+1. Subtract 1 from the Countdown of all allied amulets.

Do not fear. Step forth into the world. Shine light on that which is indispensable. Listen well to cries for help, for they will spur you on your sacred quest.
—On the Glory of Nature
116721020.evoFlair_:
Many people want immediate results. So they give up on prayer and turn to machines. But when they do, they forget something important: prayers are neither a thing nor a motion. Prayers are thoughts and beliefs.
—Illustrious Calling, Part 2

117721010.baseEffect_:
Ward.

117721010.evoFlair_: The auspicious tortoise crosses the blessed lands. Its pace is plodding. Its stride is limited. But each step is measured. The tracks it leaves are themselves blessed markers of pilgrimage. A chorus of joyous voices follows it wheresoever it goes.

104731020.baseEffect_: Strike: Deal 2 damage to a random allied follower. If no other allied followers are in play, deal 2 damage to your leader instead.

104731020.evoFlair_: There's always some sort of disaster happening to me. My city was turned to gold, but I'll never give up—never.

111731010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Mark of Balance into both players' hands.

111731010.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Put a Mark of Balance into both players' hands.
Strike: Recover 1 play point.
111731010.evoFlair_: We control the balance, even if that's a bit of an outlandish thing to suggest. It's about preservation, at least until it all comes to an end. And I suspect that's where things are heading. But who's to say? This world can be kind to its people.

111731020.baseEffect_:
At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to all other followers.
At the end of your opponent's turn, give +0/+1 to all other followers.
111731020.baseFlair_:
She is a goddess of malice, who holds dominion over plagues. The helmet she wears, a crown fashioned from the corpse of a noble beast, is proof of her cruelty.
"No, wait! I bought this hat from a regular merchant! I just thought it looked nice..."
111731020.evoEffect_:

111731020.evoFlair_:
She is a goddess of malice, who holds dominion over plagues. It is said she can summon storms with a mere flick of her fan, laying waste to whatever displeases her.
"I can't help it... Sometimes it gets muggy, and you just need to fan yourself, right?"

With the false god slain, we conducted reconnaissance. The dire circumstances of the world remained unchanged. The forces of evil were still abroad, and increasing in number.
—Battles of the Holy Knights, Chapter 8
115731010.evoFlair_:
My name is Wilbert, Captain of the Eclair Holy Knights. My conclusion is as follows: This world was doomed the moment God abandoned it.
—Battles of the Holy Knights, Chapter 9

115731020.baseEffect_:

115731020.baseFlair_: If you're ever in trouble, you can count on me. I'll have you know, I take my work seriously—and I'm good at what I do!
115731020.evoFlair_: I think I deserve a pint for all my hard work... Meep! No, Yukari, no! You can't ruin your hardworking image that way!

117731020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Put a Lorena's Holy Water into your hand.
During your turn, when defense is restored to your leader, if it's the second time this turn, gain the ability to evolve for 0 evolution points.
117731020.baseFlair_: God mourns whenever one of his lambs is wounded. But there's no need to worry—we just have to fortify our bodies and souls! Okay, everyone! Into position! We'll start with one hundred prayers and one hundred crunches!
117731020.evoEffect_: Evolve: Deal X damage to an enemy follower. X equals the attack of the allied follower with the highest attack in play.
117731020.evoFlair_: God watches over our efforts—all the more reason to continue our good work! Now then, everyone! Pick up your scripture! We're going to do some heavy lifting today!

119731010.baseEffect_:
Ward.
If this follower has 2 defense or less, whenever an allied follower attacks, deal 2 damage to the enemy leader.
119731010.baseFlair_: Cloudy skies have a tendency to darken the hearts of people. It saps them of their vigor and their kindness... How terrifying. I want to use my power to sweep the clouds away. I'm sure that is why the sun gave me its blessing.
119731010.evoFlair_: Even now, I remember the beautiful sight of sunlight piercing through the clouds; of trees and plants regaining their verdant vigor; smiles gracing the faces of the people. If I can warm everybody with this blessing, as the sun did back then... then I can ask for no more.

107741010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Deal 3 damage to all enemy followers. Restore 3 defense to all other allied followers.
107741010.baseFlair_: For the wretched, confined in despair and desolation—I have heard the gods' decree! I shall guide you to glory, and together we shall obliterate the dark!
107741010.evoFlair_: Swear on the gods' banner, and let despair consume you no longer! A new promised land awaits us—embrace the light of tomorrow!

112741010.baseEffect_: Whenever an effect restores defense to an ally, draw a card.
112741010.baseFlair_: No matter the struggles you face, I promise that I'll bring you that much happiness in turn. Even though I'm a bit of a disaster-prone ruler, I'll face everything head-on and march toward a brighter future! Now, watch as I take my first step... Huh? Where'd this hole—
112741010.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Restore 2 defense to all allies.
Whenever an effect restores defense to an ally, draw a card.
112741010.evoFlair_: Be it storms or monsters... or mysterious holes that pop out of nowhere, we'll overcome all obstacles and bring about a happy future! I'll never stop my efforts to return our city to its former glory! Even if... Even if meteors rain down upon us! Huh? Look up? Why?

117741020.baseEffect_:

Whenever an allied follower with Ward is destroyed, gain +2/+2.
117741020.baseFlair_: Allies are like baggage—they'll only slow you down. That's what I used to think, and to tell the truth, I probably have gotten soft. Somehow, though, I feel invincible. We're all going to come out of this alive! So fly true, my spear!
117741020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
117741020.evoFlair_: I don't need anyone else. I can fight and win my own battles. Losing's the worst. That's what the old me would have said. But now I know there's something a lot worse, and that's losing my comrades!

101714010.baseEffect_: Give +1/+2 and Ward to an allied follower.

Fanfare: Summon a Holy Cavalier. If you have more evolution points than your opponent, recover 1 play point. (You have 0 evolution points on turns you are unable to evolve.)
114733010.baseFlair_: Brilliant white rays beam in from the ends of the heavens, giving joy to the livestock in the cave.

101711050.baseFlair_: The depravity! How dare they enter church grounds! Hell spawn, prepare to receive the full force of His divine blessing!
101711050.evoFlair_: I lost everything to war, but the church rescued me from destitution. It stands as a beacon of hope for all mankind, and that is why I must not let one demon hoof sully its steps!

101711100.baseFlair_: With heavenly miracles on one's side, there is nothing that cannot be overcome!
101711100.evoFlair_: Those who believe in heavenly miracles shall be spared. Those who pray with all their hearts shall surely drive back the darkness!

102711030.baseEffect_: Can't be targeted by enemy effects.
102711030.baseFlair_: A shining fox that banishes the darkness. Each strand of its fur is infused with holy power.
102711030.evoFlair_: A radiant fox that illuminates the darkest nights. Beneath its beautiful fur lies bestial ferocity.

103711060.baseFlair_: I have a bit of a unique talent. All I have to do is stand around, and animals come right up to me. Pretty cool, right?
103711060.evoFlair_: Don't you think it's wonderful to be loved by animals? I mean, all my animal friends are so adorable!

104711020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Restore 2 defense to an ally.
Fanfare: Enhance (6) - Restore 2 defense to all allies instead.
104711020.baseFlair_: I will heal your wounds. And if that's not enough, I will save your very being. Let me care for your body with magic.
104711020.evoFlair_: Healing and salvation are yours as long as I'm at your side. There's nothing to fear, so let me care for your heart.

104711040.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, restore 3 defense to this follower.
104711040.baseFlair_: Guess how many arms I have!
104711040.evoFlair_: I have two arms! These things on my face are actually a beard!

105711010.baseFlair_: I'm still not much of a bird person. Birds move so fast and always try to fly away. I'll do my job, but, well, you know.
105711010.evoFlair_: Eeek, it's flying this way! Or at least I thought it was. Maybe it saw my wings and thought I was another bird. I wish they'd just stay nice and calm.

106711020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Draw X cards. X equals the number of allied amulets in play.
106711020.baseFlair_: For every prayer, the stars twinkle. I offer my own prayers so that the night sky will twinkle more.
106711020.evoFlair_: For every wish, the stars shine. I weave my own wishes so that the world will shine more.

107711020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Subtract 1 from the Countdown of an allied amulet.
107711020.baseFlair_: Sworn to these mighty wings, I shall never fall or falter! Blessed be the winged ones I dedicate my life to.
107711020.evoFlair_: My mighty wings shall take to the earth. The wretched, wingless mortals shall find no refuge in this heavenly paradise.

111711020.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, if this follower didn't attack this turn, destroy all enemy followers with 2 defense or less.
111711020.baseFlair_: I pray for guidance as I venture into the deepest slumber. Yet the world remains replete with the unlearned who reject holy repose. Very well... They shall lie with the others one way or another.
111711020.evoFlair_: Under the shadow of doctrine, sink into the deepest of slumbers. Where repose is supreme, branded are the deranged who reject it. And it is the deranged who shall be disposed of, for sempiternity.

116711020.baseEffect_:
Crystallize (2): Countdown (3)
Fanfare: If you have more cards in hand than your opponent, subtract 1 from this amulet's Countdown.

Storm.
116711020.baseFlair_:
Guide the lost. Spread your wings. Let your pride soar high upon the wind. Look often on the banner you carry, for it will direct you on your sacred quest.
—On the Glory of Nature
116711020.evoFlair_:
People are inherently good. By nature, we are virtuous. Corruption is wrought by the hands of others. Actors have arrived, seeking to warp our innate characters. If you wish for peace, pray to be returned unto your natural state.
—Illustrious Calling, Part 1

117711010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If another allied follower with Ward is in play, destroy an enemy follower. Otherwise, gain Ward.
117711010.baseFlair_: She is the High Priestess, font of wisdom. Though the world of man is ever-changing, she remains constant. Taking the measure of each circumstance, her decisions are wrought with careful deliberation.
117711010.evoFlair_: As a servant of the gods, she is called on to impart their wisdom unto mankind. The edicts are observed; the lost are guided onto the path of faith. And thus, holy salvation is delivered, efficiently and righteously.

900711020.baseFlair_: A fiery tiger guided by a holy light. Its incandescent flames consume their victims, leaving not a scrap of flesh on the bone.
900711020.evoFlair_: A tiger ablaze with pure, incandescent flames that illuminate and purify even the deepest darkness. It is said that the tiger's flames burn to guide the departed to heaven.

900711080.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Last Words: Summon a Hare of Illusions.
900711080.baseFlair_: I am a phantom, an illusion. I shall come to your aid no matter how many times you call.
900711080.evoFlair_: I am a phantom, an illusion. I can become more than that if you so wish, however.

900711100.baseFlair_: When the bejeweled stone gleams in seven hues, an ancient guardian will be awakened to wreak havoc upon the wicked.
900711100.evoFlair_: The bejeweled stone leads the way to purity—allies of darkness and the wicked placed before the stone will be exorcised from within.

100721020.baseFlair_: Your evil deeds end here. You have defied God himself and there is no place to hide! I see your true form!
100721020.evoEffect_: Evolve: Banish an enemy follower with 3 defense or less.
100721020.evoFlair_: There it is! I see your weakness! My mace shall pummel it into a pulp!

101721040.baseFlair_: Welcome to the Devil's flock. Now it's time to prove your loyalty and offer your eternal soul to the master!
101721040.evoEffect_: Evolve: Subtract 2 from the Countdown of an allied amulet.
101721040.evoFlair_: Heh-heh, I acknowledge your prayers of desperation. Now do as the Devil asks of you, and unleash the greed within your hearts. Soak this world in blood!

115721020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If an allied follower with Ward is in play, gain Storm.
115721020.baseFlair_:
We slew the villain controlling the earth and took back our bountiful lands. I only wish our scattered countrymen had been there to see it.
—Battles of the Holy Knights, Chapter 6
115721020.evoFlair_: We managed to slay the villain controlling the heavens. We took back the skies. Some "heroes of hope." So many of us died. So many sacrifices. —Battles of the Holy Knights, Chapter 7

116721010.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Enhance (8) - Summon a Holylight Convert.
At the start of your opponent's turn, gain +2/+0 for each allied follower with Ward in play.
116721010.baseFlair_: Which is stronger, a prayer or a sword? Pray when someone's got cold steel pressed to your throat, and you'll find the answer real quick. But, when you keep praying—every day—something happens... You embrace this thing called faith, and that can conquer any blade.
116721010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
116721010.evoFlair_: With faith comes light—and mettle. You know, you remind me of myself, back when I believed only in the kind of strength you can see. But let me show you something. Faith can shatter even the tempered blade, and it is dazzling.

900721010.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, restore 2 defense to this follower.
900721010.baseFlair_: The white wings flutter up. Hearing a voice pray for salvation, the beast lends its power of defense.
900721010.evoFlair_: What do they pray for; what do they wish for? Before the opposing statues, the people reveal the content of their hearts, whether pure or impure. Responding to their prayers, the sacred bird swoops upward.

900721020.baseFlair_: The black wings fall down. Hearing a voice of judgment, the beast lends its power to the invasion.
900721020.evoFlair_: What do they pray for; what do they wish for? Before the opposing statues, the people reveal the content of their hearts, whether pure or impure. Responding to their prayers, the demonic bird swoops downward.

900721030.baseFlair_: Surrounded by prayers and wishes, the shield transforms to armor. Verily, thy faith is strong as iron. But is it strong as adamant, and can it pierce walls? —Chapter 6, Path to Salvation
900721030.evoFlair_: Every sorrow shall be expelled and vanquished. The armor is but one sign of many. The way to salvation continues on, and thou must walk along it. —Chapter 7, Path to Salvation

107731010.baseEffect_:
When this follower comes into play, restore 2 defense to all other allied followers.
Last Words: Give a random allied Countdown amulet Last Words: Summon a Pegasus Dullahan.
107731010.baseFlair_: To be revered and honored didn't suit him, so he threw it away—just to remain the way he was.
107731010.evoFlair_: Even lauded as a hero he found himself lost, so he threw it away and found it again—a way to protect the world in the way he was.

110731010.baseFlair_: I pray for guidance as I venture into the deepest slumber. Awaken to the blazing light of morning, and you will find only suffering. We yearn for the sleep that will continue long into the future.
110731010.evoEffect_:
Bane.
At the end of your turn, if this follower didn't attack this turn, destroy a random enemy follower with the highest attack in play.
110731010.evoFlair_:
The Third Doctrine: Awaken Not
Do not teach your brethren to awaken, for unbroken sleep is in itself salvation.
—Teachings of the Sleepers

112731020.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Gain +3/+3 and the following effect: Can't be destroyed by effects. (Can be destroyed by damage from effects.)
Can't be targeted by enemy effects.
112731020.baseFlair_: Hallways: clear. Perimeter: clear. Ummm... Underfoot: clear. As Queen Zoe's attendant, it's my job to protect her from misfortune. I'm pleased to say it's going to be another perfect day of beating back any menace that... What? You fell into a hole? I'm on my way!
112731020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
112731020.evoFlair_: Weather: perfect. Monsters: slain. Now, Your Majesty, if you'll give me your hand. I'll make sure no evil befalls you. So long as I'm by your side... A-are those meteors falling from the sky?!

113731010.baseEffect_: Whenever your leader's defense is restored, deal 1 damage to all enemy followers.
113731010.baseFlair_:
"Kel, are you hurt?"
"Sure am! But I've blown them away with double the pain!" ―Conversation between Elana and Kel
113731010.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Restore 2 defense to your leader.
Whenever your leader's defense is restored, deal 2 damage to all enemy followers.
113731010.evoFlair_:
"Something tells me why there's always a conflict."
"Don't sweat it! I'll buff up and wipe this fight out!"
"That's not what I meant, but... Oh, dear God..." ―Conversation between Elana and Kel

900731010.baseFlair_: When the ancient seal has broken, a titan will be awakened to serve as a sentinel for the virtuous, and a pursuer of the wicked.
900731010.evoEffect_:
Ward.
Evolve: Banish an amulet.
(Can attack.)
900731010.evoFlair_: To this day, an ancient power flows through the golem—through prayer to an ancient generation, a new era can prosper.

110741020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give your opponent a play point orb. Subtract 1 from the Countdown of all enemy amulets. Restore 1 defense to the enemy leader. Your opponent draws a card. Gain an empty play point orb. Subtract 1 from the Countdown of all allied amulets. Restore 1 defense to your leader. Draw a card.
110741020.baseFlair_: The truest evil is the self, where fear, negligence, exploitation, and weakness take root. Confront them. Refuse to awaken; let your mind venture into the deepest slumber. For this is the trial that I now present the world.
110741020.evoEffect_: This follower can't take more than 3 damage at a time.
110741020.evoFlair_: Only the ignorant seek that which is outside the self. Are you prepared to unravel the secrets of repose, to fade into the deepest slumber, and trample on what you may find? For this is the trial that I now present the world.

110741030.baseEffect_:

Ward.
110741030.baseFlair_: Only the purest prayers and most earnest pleas reveal the resplendent path. At its end sits the avatar of salvation, the embodiment of heavenly appeal. —Chapter 10, Path to Salvation
110741030.evoEffect_:
Ward.
Evolve: Put a Holy Lion Crystal into your hand and change its cost to 0.
110741030.evoFlair_: Salvation comes to those who save themselves. This is but one answer, for the path to salvation is ever-stretching. Start your journey from this understanding, and work toward realizing your own salvation. —Chapter 11, Path to Salvation

112741020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Enhance (6) - Gain the ability to evolve for 0 evolution points.
112741020.baseFlair_: The gods have stopped responding. Now the congregation relies on her, for she guides her flock to sure salvation using those blessed metal scales. She is a saint, no doubt, but the worshippers have come to believe in her more than the gods. —Church Records, Part 4
112741020.evoEffect_: Evolve: Give your leader the following effect - Whenever an allied Machina follower is destroyed, put a Salvation Ex Limonia into your hand. (This effect is not stackable and lasts for the rest of the match.)
112741020.evoFlair_:
Abnormalities detected in proselytization protocol. Continue?
There are gods in machines. In people too. But that doesn't mean much. I will take the place of your gods and shower you with true deliverance.

113741010.baseEffect_:

113741010.baseFlair_: When a believer offers a Prayer, the divine shows his form. Having propagated the faith through mantras—now branded as heresy—he now announces the Good News. The mantra praising the divine is now a part of History. —Den of Madness, Expurgated Edition
113741010.evoEffect_:

"Elana, are you still praying?"

―Conversation between Elana and Kel

113741020.evoFlair_:
"You oughta pray we kick the bad guys' butts!"
"Um, I think that it's better if no one gets hurt."
"You've sure got a good head on your shoulders."
―Conversation between Elana and Kel

114741010.evoEffect_:

Whenever an allied Naterran Great Tree comes into play, if there isn't an allied Meus Knight in play, summon a Meus Knight.
114741010.evoFlair_: "Heed my call, valorous Meus! I implore you to come at once!" The Meus military rushes to the aid of Princess Daffodil. "It is time to fulfill your calling and help reclaim our glorious kingdom! To arms!"

115741020.baseEffect_:

115741020.baseFlair_: Aaalll right! Let's get this squared away, shall we? But let's do it with some class. We have to set a good example for the kids at the orphanage!
115741020.evoEffect_: Evolve: Subtract 3 from the Countdown of an allied amulet.
115741020.evoFlair_: I have a home to return to—a family to protect. To preserve that happiness, there's no job too tough. Not that I'd mind a break every now and again...

118741010.baseEffect_:

Then, if at least 2 are in play, recover 2 play points.
Then, if at least 3 are in play, deal 3 damage to the enemy leader.
Then, if 4 are in play, subtract 4 from the Countdown of all allied amulets.
118741010.baseFlair_: "Gods, shadowed are thy names, but we are thankful for thy bread and thy blessing." All right, that's enough prayin'—time to dig in. Now, I know Rivayle's a big, stinkin' pit, but you gotta walk above it all. Stay on the high road, and one day, you just might reach the gods.
118741010.evoEffect_: Evolve: Restore 2 defense to your leader.
118741010.evoFlair_: "Gods, shadowed are thy names, but the world teems with wickedness." You sinned, friend, and now you gotta pay penance. What's that? You're scared of dyin'? Oh, you wanna try beggin' for mercy now? Well, beg louder—maybe the gods'll hear you.

111724010.baseEffect_: Randomly put 3 different cards that cost 2 play points or less from your deck into your hand.
111724010.baseFlair_: Naught exists beyond here, for herein repose awaits you.

119724010.baseEffect_:

708734010.baseEffect_:
Fully restore all damaged allied followers' defense.
Deal X damage to all enemy followers. X equals the total amount of defense restored.

Salvation will come twice.
The first time, through prayer.
The second, after prayers have been forgotten.

117713010.baseEffect_:

117713010.baseFlair_:
There's no such thing as a pointless prayer. Though you might think they're not listening, the gods hear each and every one.
—Holy Mage

101723020.baseEffect_:
Countdown (1)

101723020.baseFlair_: You who renounce your god's name will be granted only death in return.

104723010.baseEffect_:
Countdown (2)

104723010.baseFlair_: Those who were purged of "sin" within her became "saints" who cannot help but uphold their vows of silence. —An excerpt from The Nature of Virtue

108723010.baseFlair_: Choose, you of many sins. Will conviction be your salvation, or will salvation be your conviction?

103733010.baseEffect_:
Countdown (3)
Fanfare and Last Words: Destroy a random enemy follower.

107733010.baseEffect_:
Countdown (1)

Last Words: Destroy all allied Heaven's Golems.
107733010.baseFlair_: The protector was created in the days of yore, an age long forgotten. —Teachings of the Priestess of the Column

118732010.baseEffect_:

118732010.baseFlair_: Love yourself as you love God. Compassion must start with oneself.

900743040.baseEffect_:
Countdown (2)
Last Words: If there isn't an enemy Totem of Madness in play, transform a random enemy follower (excluding Imina, Mad Eidolon) into a Totem of Madness.
900743040.baseFlair_: Speak your praise, mortal. For there is no god but me. —Inscription on a statue

101711060.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Restore 1 defense to all allies.
101711060.baseFlair_: I can see that you're wounded. Please rest here for a while. I would never forgive myself if you returned to battle in such condition.
101711060.evoFlair_: We, the servants of the Heavenly Father, are the only ones who remain to help those who need us. And so we will not rest—not until this war finally ends.

102711050.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Subtract 1 from the Countdown of an allied amulet.
102711050.baseFlair_: My wings beat for you, O pure of heart! May the wind carry my prayers aloft!
102711050.evoFlair_: I take to the skies for the pure of heart! O mighty wind, rend my foes asunder!

108711030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 2 damage to an enemy if there are at least 2 amulets in your hand.
108711030.baseFlair_: His hands became paws, and his form became monstrous. But he did not abandon god, and neither did he stop praying.
108711030.evoFlair_: To theists, he was the perfect believer. To atheists, he was the perfect maniac.

109711030.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Can't attack.
When an allied amulet is destroyed during your turn, evolve this follower.
109711030.baseFlair_: It presents itself to those devoted to prayer, and remains unseen to the faithless. Whether it is real or an illusion does not matter. Who is to know what is actually true? —Regarding Faith, Chapter 2
109711030.evoFlair_: Devout adherent, you believe the truth you know to be right—but can anyone prove the world you perceive to be true? Not all truths are absolute, some may even be false. —Regarding Faith, Chapter 5

112711020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Subtract 1 from the Countdown of an allied amulet.
During your turn, if an allied amulet is destroyed, evolve this follower.
112711020.baseFlair_: Do it, slack off, do it, slack off... You can decide a lot of things by picking the petals off of flowers. For example, I don't have to work very hard today.
112711020.evoFlair_: Slack off, do it, slack off, do it... Ah, what do we have here? A trespasser? Well, unfortunately for you, the flowers have decided I have to be a dedicated guardian today.

113711020.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Strike: Summon an Assembly Droid.
113711020.baseFlair_: Core mutations have led to one new discovery after another. Prayers to God will serve as further salvation for both people and birdfolk. Ironknuckle Nun received new arms, and he received new wings. ―Notes from a Priory, Vol. 1
113711020.evoFlair_: What's important is to save everyone you can reach. But there's nothing wrong with flying. You go quick, and the view's great! I don't know why I fly! I've just got the spirit! ―Steelwing to Ironknuckle Nun

114711010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a random amulet from your deck into your hand.
114711010.baseFlair_: "My sword serves as a powerful talisman." Her soft smile is enough to convince any traveler that her impossibly large sword is nothing more than a protective charm.
114711010.evoFlair_: "My sword serves as a powerful talisman." Her delighted smile is enough to alert any demon that her impossibly large sword is meant for purging evil.

115711020.baseEffect_:
Crystallize (1): Countdown (4)
Last Words: Summon a Calm Featherfolk.
----------
When this follower comes into play, restore 3 defense to your leader.
115711020.baseFlair_: One day, our prayers will bear fruit. Only God knows what fruit that will be, or how it will taste. Prayer is the act of enduring while keeping faith in God's justice.
115711020.evoFlair_: Even should our prayers be granted in a different form than we expect, there is no cause to grieve. The time you spent in prayer has made you more just. Allow me to show you the strength which prayer and perseverance nurtures.

119711030.baseEffect_:
Rush.
At the end of your turn, restore 2 defense to your leader.
119711030.baseFlair_: My sword technique is rather acrobatic; each tumble and twirl a breathtaking display of deathly art. What can I say? I prefer the view of the moon from a higher vantage point. It also affords me better angle of attack from which to lop off your fool head.
119711030.evoFlair_: There's no place you can't reach if you jump high enough, and I'll keep leaping until I reach the moon.

900711030.baseFlair_: A winged white horse that comes to the aid of those who worship blue skies.
900711030.evoFlair_: A pure white horse that comes to the aid of heroes chosen by heaven. It soars through the skies, propelled by the beats of its mighty wings.

900711040.baseFlair_: On the night when the moon is closest to our world, the goddess' guardian fox descends to the mortal realm.
900711040.evoFlair_: The tail of the elegant fox flutters in the breeze, serving as a warning to all those who seek to wrong the goddess. Those foolish enough to ignore its warning are torn to shreds in no time at all.

900711060.baseFlair_: The sound of a flute rings out across the sky, parting the clouds. From the gap this winged servant of heaven descends to the mortal realm.
900711060.evoFlair_: The regal falcon's feathers turn the soil white whenever they make contact with land, eradicating evil and hatred.

900711090.baseFlair_: The gods blessed the great bird with feathers of metal so that it would never be hunted or perish again.
900711090.evoFlair_: The gods blessed the great bird with intelligence so that it could outwit both hunters and death itself.

100721010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Subtract 1 from the Countdown of all allied amulets.
100721010.baseFlair_: Those who dwell in the human realm, heed my words: love thy neighbor, and have faith. Faith is the path that leads to all answers.
100721010.evoFlair_: A world without love is a world without light. A world filled with love is a world without darkness. To battle against the encroaching shadows, we must all love our neighbors.

101721030.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Gain +4/+0 during the opponent's turn.
101721030.baseFlair_: I am a proud warrior entrusted to protect this church from harm. My duty is to eradicate evil and defend all that is holy!
101721030.evoFlair_: Enemies may amass in mighty armies, but this lance shall pierce them all! I have nothing to fear. All evil will be eradicated!

101721100.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give all allied followers the following effect - Can't be targeted by enemy effects.
101721100.baseFlair_: Prostrate yourself. Knights such as I should not have to taint ourselves by association with the likes of you.
101721100.evoFlair_: I do not wish to look at you any longer. But I'll at least cut you down in one stroke so you don't have to suffer.

102721030.baseEffect_:

114731010.evoFlair_: There is no absolution. I know not what sin you have committed, nor why the gods are incensed with you. I simply enforce divine judgment. But if the heavens above have deemed you evil, then you must accept your fate.

Ward.
Evolve: Restore 2 defense to your leader.

112741030.evoFlair_: This is the era that the resplendent god has blessed us with! He will free us from our binds and drive away that which maddens us. We are but unenlightened mortals, who beseech you: help us! —Words of Revelation

—Vice, Death Grip

117741010.baseFlair_: Perk up your ears and listen to my roaring salute! One, two—graaawr! Hehe. Whaddaya think? I'm Strength, beast of vitality. Let's get down to it. I heard you wanna be tough and strong. Just leave it to me—I'll draw out the lion that slumbers within!
117741010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
117741010.evoFlair_: Physical prowess, the latest weapons, greater numbers—none of that makes you strong! It's all just for show! Real strength is the unshakable courage to fight to the end! If you can't take the pressure, just roar! I'll roar with you! Graaawr!

117741030.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
117741030.evoFlair_: Fear not: my generosity is as grand as my form! But do not misunderstand—my light does not wane with the coming dark, nor do I sink beneath the horizon. It is you that revolves around me.

118741030.evoFlair_: Is my divine grace something else or what? I was born with so much of it! I aim to make use of my God-given gift by punishing evildoers. Here, I'll show you how I get the job done!

101721090.baseFlair_: That sword eliminates evil from the hearts of men.
101721090.evoFlair_: The truly pure-hearted are capable of sympathizing with even the most malicious act.

105721030.evoFlair_: The wolf, drenched in silver light, let its quiet anger rage as it solemnly swore to catch and sink its teeth into its foe.

106721010.evoFlair_: I'm the foundation of the stars' peace. Leave a wish within my starry sky. Bask in it as it shoots and sways.

113721020.evoFlair_: We no longer need to discuss anything. Seen from my perspective, you are the skeptic; you are the heretic. Surely you have no complaint at being judged before my god?

117721020.baseEffect_:

117721020.evoFlair_: O divine chorus, thank you for scouting me! Sweet angels, spread your wings and lift your voices in praise, for my time has come! Now, sing along with me!

900721040.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Restore 3 defense to an ally.
900721040.baseFlair_: The unicorn had despaired of humanity, assuming the species was doomed to extinction. But a chance meeting with a pure-hearted maiden rekindled faith and purpose in the proud beast's heart.
900721040.evoFlair_: With the holy beast's powers unleashed, they were unstoppable. But when the maiden praised him, he would shake his great head. They were still a long way from the peace they both so desired.

101731020.evoFlair_: I am a flower, the world's harmony in bloom. As long as I remain, the balance between body and soul shall never be disrupted.

102731010.baseFlair_: No matter how dear this world may be, dreams of abiding here are only dreams. Know that love is nothing more than a fleeting fantasy.
102731010.evoFlair_: I would express the depths of my love, but the body and heart must always be one. And the heavens and the earth can never be united.

102731030.evoFlair_: A winged god who controls the weather and preserves the balance of the world. He wishes only to build a paradise of order for all winged beings.

103731030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give an allied follower +3/+3 and Rush.
103731030.baseFlair_: Corrupters of heaven's light, know that you will be punished for your atrocities! We'll slaughter you and return you to the dust from whence you came. Now fall in, warriors!
103731030.evoFlair_: Follow me, warriors! As the keepers of heaven's light, we are the only ones who can purify the agents of the dark. Charge!

104731030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Banish an enemy follower with 3 defense or less. Then draw a card.

104731030.evoFlair_: With his staff of salvation, the judge opens a path into the light for those who endure his retribution. His blessings illuminate the sky, and the sinful weep before his forgiveness.

105731010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Summon an enemy Odile, Black Swan. Then evolve this follower.

900731020.evoFlair_: A king of salvation ascends, and yet thou art still inadequate. What the king seeks is further prayer, more wishes. Continue ever onward, regent of salvation, without end. —Chapter 9, Path to Salvation

900012010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: If any other allied Naterran Great Trees are in play, randomly destroy 1.
Last Words: Draw a card.
900012010.baseFlair_:
Naterra, a verdant world born from the bounty of aether.
Seeds of conflict take root as its populace fractures and clashes.
Peace or war. Light or shadow.
When the Mother begins to sing, all will be decided.

900012020.baseEffect_: During your turn, when an allied follower comes into play, give it +1/+1 and banish this amulet.
900012020.baseFlair_: Though not a thoroughbred mount by any stretch of the imagination, those who've traveled through the wastelands have found a valuable companion in this horse.

100011020.baseFlair_: In this world of conflict, the only thing a man can truly rely on is his strength. That is why I must continue to fight, continue to win. I simply must.
100011020.evoFlair_: In this world of conflict, the only thing a man can truly rely on is his strength. With this sword I shall carve out a future for myself!

101011010.baseFlair_: "Ugly," they called me. "Monster," they screamed as they fled from the sight of me. No human would deign to help a beast like me. And so I sought power—the power to protect myself.
101011010.evoFlair_: Violence is my armor. It shields my body, shields my mind against the slings and arrows of those heartless scoundrels who revile me. Look at me, slanderers—behold my valor as you crumble before it!

103011040.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Gain +2/+2 if an allied Neutral follower that costs at least 5 play points is in play.
103011040.baseFlair_: Victory is in my grasp! Let the people rejoice! And, to the losers, honorable defeat or atrocious executions. The choice is theirs!
103011040.evoFlair_: Putting your life on the line makes any victory that much more glorious! Now answer to me!

103011060.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Gain +X/+0. X equals the attack of the strongest enemy follower in play.
103011060.baseFlair_: So, you look at me and all you see is a tasty-looking duck, huh? That's only because your heart is losing its purity!
103011060.evoFlair_: That's right. I'm a mirror into your soul. My appearance in your eyes was a test to see if you're fit to set foot on sacred ground!

104011040.baseEffect_: Clash: Destroy the enemy follower if its attack is 1.
104011040.baseFlair_: An ill-fated tomcat who was fused with an owl by uncanny magic. He prowls the skies by night and pines for his old life in the alleys by day.
104011040.evoFlair_: With his prey before him, the owlcat's thoughts fly as furiously as him. Hoo-reow! Hoo-reow! Hoo-reow! The cries of his victim drive him into ecstasy.

107011030.baseEffect_: Last Words: Restore 1 defense to your leader.
107011030.baseFlair_: Oinkie, oink! My tummy's just full of happy! Happy oinkie to the whole wide worldie!
107011030.evoEffect_: Last Words: Restore 3 defense to your leader.
107011030.evoFlair_: Oink, oinkie! Eat that sadness away and fill your tummy with happy! And just like that... Doink! Fill the whole wide world with happy!

108011020.baseFlair_: Bow down before me, sugar-slurping plebes! Yes, I am the tart fairy! An upper-crust morsel fit for kings!
108011020.evoEffect_: Evolve: Return a random enemy follower to the opponent's hand.
108011020.evoFlair_: Bronzed and buttery on the outside, gooey on the inside. Manners can wait—it's time to dig in! Huh? Hold up! No running away!

110011030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Randomly put 1 of the following cards into your hand - Goblin or Goblin Leader.
110011030.baseFlair_: The scouting party lift their voices to reveal the enemy's position. Answering battle cries sound from the front lines. Orders ring out from the commanders. The army moves as if of one mind, motivated by a single, driving thought: "Gimme that, it's mine!"
110011030.evoFlair_:
"This plan is foolproof! A thing of beauty!"
—Goblin Leader
"Yeesh, we're gonna be knee-deep in goblins all day, huh?"
—Village Guard

111011030.baseFlair_: There's nothing better than a well-seasoned dish! That magical flavor that bursts on your tongue and takes your whole body by storm! Take pepper, for example. Just sprinkle it in and... Uwachoo! Ehehe... See?
111011030.evoFlair_: I know I talk a good game, but I'm still learning my way around the spice rack. Still, I won't give up! Someday, I'll make food that'll explode on your tongue and shake you to the core!

112011020.baseFlair_: My brother-in-arms, he who skewers enemies with a flash of lightning. Though he may be an abysmal fool, upon revealing his true splendor he is capable of piercing through all creation. —Grimnir, Warring Tempest
112011020.evoEffect_: Last Words: Deal X damage to a random enemy follower. X equals the number of times that allied followers have evolved this match.
112011020.evoFlair_: Hey, this is my buddy Hnikar! He can be a bit of a screwup, but battle's where he really shines! —Grimnir, Warring Tempest

112011030.baseEffect_: Last Words: Put a Repair Mode into your hand.
112011030.baseFlair_:
Verifying access request... Access granted.
Initializing Project: Core.
Starting up... Startup failed.
Insufficient energy remaining.
112011030.evoFlair_:
Verifying access request... Access granted.
Confirming changes to core.
Confirming optimized support request.
ERROR. Switching priority to energy conservation.

113011010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a random Machina card from your deck into your hand.
113011010.baseFlair_:
Verifying access request... Access granted.
Initializing Project: Core.
Starting up... Startup failed.
Initiating auxiliary unit... Activating antigrav.
113011010.evoFlair_:
Antigrav online. Part assembly... OK.
Confirming changes to core.
Assembly complete. ERROR. Repairing.
Corresponding assistance needed.

114011020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put an Investigation into your hand.
114011020.baseFlair_:
"I'll pay you back if it takes my whole life to do it! So please... please! Will you take the case?"
The detective reached out and took the candy in the boy's hand. "This will do for my fee," he said.
114011020.evoFlair_:
A detective needs two things: deductive reasoning and inspiration. That and a dash of sweetness. The old gray matter needs sugar to produce those flashes of insight.
"Another pro bono job... I really am a soft touch."

115011020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 3 damage to all enemy followers that have Ambush.
115011020.baseFlair_:
But we were perfectly hidden! How'd they target us so accurately? Our enemy must be one skilled marksman!
—Ninja Trainee
115011020.evoFlair_:
"Hey! Look right! Fresh meat!"
"Which way's right?" "The opposite of left!"
"Which way's left?" "The opposite of right!"
—Conversation between two goblins

116011020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Select an allied Machina or Natura follower and put a copy of it into your hand.
116011020.baseFlair_: "Art is an expression of the self." He laughs as he smears his brush across the canvas. "And the only way to make great art is to have full faith in oneself." He gazes calmly, even happily, on his subjects: a city guard and monster locked in a life-and-death battle.
116011020.evoFlair_:
An artist's character is not necessarily in accord with his or her work. Take for example this creative chap. Though he's the picture of egoism, his paintings are nothing short of breathtaking!
—Musings of an Unnamed Artist

118011020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Summon a Dutiful Steed. If it is your fifth turn or later, summon a Bullet Bike instead.
118011020.baseFlair_:
"Why do I travel, you ask? To experience the thrill and joy of adventure, of course."
"I doubt the varmints you encounter think the same."
"Some of 'em tag along with me on the road, but don't you lump me in with 'em." —Wasteland Journal, Interview 1
118011020.evoFlair_:
"Rumors speak of him fighting as a mercenary in the desert. Wearing shining armor and riding a white steed, he often gazes longingly at the horizon. His thirst for adventure never runs dry."
—Wasteland Journal, Interview 1 Follow-Up

119011020.baseFlair_: If you want to be a great detective, you have to remember the three Rs: Research, Recon, and... Uh, I'll tell you the third one once you start showing potential.
119011020.evoEffect_: Last Words: Summon a Master Sleuth.
119011020.evoFlair_:
"Looks like we've finally solved the murder at the bakery. You might say this case... was a piece of cake!"
In other words, the three Rs are Research, Recon, and... witty Retorts?
—Junior Detective's Notebook

101021010.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Last Words: Draw a card.
101021010.baseFlair_: Ding-dong! Hee-hee! Can you hear that? That's the sound of the bells of joy! Try closing your eyes and let it sink deep into your heart!
101021010.evoFlair_: It's time to ring the bells of joy! These are no ordinary bells, you know! They play a song of love that blesses listeners' souls!

102021020.baseEffect_: At the start of your turn, restore 2 defense to your leader.
102021020.baseFlair_: Check out my dance! It'll make you smile!
102021020.evoFlair_: Dancing is my life! Come on! Dance with me!

103021030.baseFlair_: Go check out the Castle in the Sky! Go smite your old coworker! Sheesh, my boss works us to the bone. I guess it's all a part of the job though!
103021030.evoEffect_: Evolve: Deal 1 damage to an enemy.
103021030.evoFlair_: So my boss says I've gotta smite you. It'll be sad to see you go, but orders are orders. Time for you to say bye bye!

104021030.baseFlair_: Driven by a dream to put my heart into verse, I travel far and wide. But my dream just isn't doing anything for my stage fright!
104021030.evoEffect_: Evolve: Give both leaders the following effect - Fanfare effects will not activate. (This effect lasts until this follower leaves play.)
104021030.evoFlair_: Maybe I'm no good at singing, but I still want to share my heart with the world. So could you all listen to my verse just this once?

105021010.baseFlair_: I am the flower that blooms on stage. I sing like a bird and smile like a goddess to welcome the audience into my beautiful tale.
105021010.evoEffect_: Evolve: Give +1/+1 to all other allied Neutral followers.
105021010.evoFlair_: On stage I shine brightest. Some day I'll be the very best actress, one able to express anything in the world! You'll see!

106021010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to the enemy leader.
106021010.baseFlair_: Why did my wings turn black? Why did they chase me out of the skies? And why... why do the angels have to doubt me?
106021010.evoFlair_: Whenever I try to find out why, it hurts deep inside my heart. Tell me, someone, am I a fallen angel? Did I do something bad? If that's the case... If that's how it is, then I...

108021010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Enhance (5) - Gain +2/+2.
Fanfare: Enhance (8) - Gain +3/+3 more.
108021010.baseFlair_: Find your way, human. The answer you seek is there inside the order. I found my answer through obedience to the gods—salvation, the only answer.
108021010.evoFlair_: Do not stand in awe, human. Order will in time engender an answer, the answer that obedience is a truth without parallel. Now take this salvation as your own.

113021010.baseEffect_: Strike: Restore 2 defense to your leader.
113021010.baseFlair_: La-la-la! This new dance is difficult, but it's very pretty! It gets everyone teetering and tottering until they all fall down though!
113021010.evoFlair_:
"As always, her dancing gets pretty intense..."
—Medusa
"I don't think I've ever seen anything like this in the underworld..."
—Cerberus

113021020.baseEffect_:
Invocation: At the end of your turn, if you have 2 play points and no cards in play and your opponent has at least 1 card in play, invoke this card.
Fanfare: Enhance (9) - Gain +7/+7 and Ward.
