113021020.baseFlair_: Thanks for putting all those weapons away—what better way to commemorate the occasion than a song of love and peace? Without further ado, ladies and gentlemen, I give you... Sonata Harmonia!
113021020.evoFlair_: Inciting violence to defeat your enemies? Anyone can do that—instead of such vicious ways, why not spread joy in the name of love and peace? That's why I choose to shred tunes, not faces! Oh, baaaby...

114021010.baseEffect_: Last Words: If an allied Naterran Great Tree is in play, put an Extreme Carrot into your hand.
114021010.baseFlair_: Is he some expression of nature's will? Or nature itself? Unsatisfied with baser fare, this paragon of carrotkind embarks on a quest for the lofty heights of gustatory greatness.
114021010.evoFlair_: When this classy carrot's orange peel matures to a ruddier hue, his quest will come to an end. Nature's finest flavors will burst across the tongue, delighting the taste buds and the soul, and the world shall clamor for seconds.

117021010.baseEffect_:
Ward.
At the start of your turn, put a Cloud Gigas into your deck and banish this follower.
117021010.baseFlair_:
The cloud gigas is as fickle as the weather
One minute he's hot, the next he's cold
For days he'll sit as still as stone
Then disappear in a puff of clouds
—Mountainside Village Folk Song
117021010.evoFlair_:
The clouds in the mountains are mighty tall
And the cloud gigas hides inside them
You might not be able to see him from here
But he'll come running when danger's afoot
—Mountainside Village Folk Song

119021020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to an enemy follower and then 1 damage to the enemy leader. Restore 1 defense to your leader.
Enhance (5): Deal 2 damage, restore 2 defense, and gain +2/+2 instead.
Enhance (8): Deal 4 damage, restore 4 defense, and gain +4/+4 instead.
119021020.baseFlair_: Hey, stop treating me like a child! No, I'm not sad because I miss my master! Ohh, just you wait, I'm going to be a beautiful lady before you know it, and then you won't have any room to talk!
119021020.evoFlair_: We've been traveling a long time together, haven't we? And time has helped me grow into an elegant lady, don't you think? I'm going to keep using my magic to bring smiles to everybody's faces.

900021010.baseEffect_: Last Words: Put an Ultimate Carrot into your hand.
900021010.baseFlair_: The supreme carrot, standing with the most sublime of ingredients. The flavor of its bright orange frame overwhelms all else in creation.
900021010.evoFlair_: The supreme carrot, standing with the most sublime of ingredients. Unsurpassed is its flavor, and heroes dream often of its tastiness and aroma.

102031030.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Gain +4/+2 if at least 2 evolved allied followers are in play.
102031030.baseFlair_: Only when the chosen pair demonstrates true power does the great demonic simulacrum awaken at last.
102031030.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
102031030.evoFlair_: The demonic simulacrum shares its power only with those who seek new strength and the form to go with it.

108031020.baseFlair_: I'm not the mouth of god; I'm her gripping hand. I shall judge you without so much as a word.
108031020.evoEffect_: Evolve: Banish an enemy follower with 1 defense.
108031020.evoFlair_: My lady's hopes are my hopes. My lady's wishes are the world's wishes. There'll be no place for mercy when I judge you.

707031010.baseFlair_: I'm not the mouth of god; I'm her gripping hand. I shall judge you without so much as a word.
707031010.evoEffect_: Evolve: Banish an enemy follower with 1 defense.
707031010.evoFlair_: My lady's hopes are my hopes. My lady's wishes are the world's wishes. There'll be no place for mercy when I judge you.

109031010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: The next time damage is dealt to this follower, reduce that damage to 0.
Fanfare: Enhance (8) - Put a random Neutral follower that costs at least 7 play points from your deck into your hand. Recover 7 play points.
109031010.baseFlair_: I've met so many people on this journey. Nice people, scary people—all of the members of our crew—but most importantly of all, the one who's always there for me... you.
109031010.evoFlair_:
I don't want to watch as everyone else gets hurt protecting me. I want to protect all of you too. That's why I have to summon it!
Primeval dragon, child of flames and darkness!
Thy name is... Bahamut!

111031010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If there are no other allied followers in play, gain Rush.
111031010.baseFlair_: There's no one left. The only angel still able to fight is me. I'll give it all up. Candy, naps... everything, if it means I can save the world!
111031010.evoEffect_: Evolve: If there are no other allied followers in play, gain +2/+2.
111031010.evoFlair_: It might not do any good. Maybe fighting back won't make a difference. But I have faith. The world isn't this cruel. One day light will pierce the gloom!

114031010.baseEffect_: Last Words: If there are no allied Naterran Great Trees in play, summon a Naterran Great Tree.
114031010.baseFlair_:
Come, friend. You will cross the dunes safely on the wings of an angel.
What's that? My steed looks like no angel you've ever seen? But look there on his back! What else but wings would those two proud humps be?
114031010.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Put a Naterran Great Tree into your hand.
Last Words: If there are no allied Naterran Great Trees in play, summon a Naterran Great Tree.
114031010.evoFlair_:
Fear not, friend, though you are beset by foes.
My steed is a demon who devours the desert itself. Behold his powerful jaws. Are these not the gnashing teeth of the maw of hell itself? Deterrent enough for any craven marauder.

712031010.baseEffect_: Last Words: If there are no allied Naterran Great Trees in play, summon a Naterran Great Tree.
712031010.baseFlair_:
Come, friend. You will cross the dunes safely on the wings of an angel.
What's that? My steed looks like no angel you've ever seen? But look there on his back! What else but wings would those two proud humps be?
712031010.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Put a Naterran Great Tree into your hand.
Last Words: If there are no allied Naterran Great Trees in play, summon a Naterran Great Tree.
712031010.evoFlair_:
Fear not, friend, though you are beset by foes.
My steed is a demon who devours the desert itself. Behold his powerful jaws. Are these not the gnashing teeth of the maw of hell itself? Deterrent enough for any craven marauder.

114031020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give your leader the following effect until the end of your opponent's turn - Whenever an enemy follower with Storm attacks your leader, give that follower -2/-0.
114031020.baseFlair_: Mortals are imperfect. They blunder. They change. And because they do, their hopes for the future shine all the brighter. That brilliance locked within their hearts—I plan to reveal it.
114031020.evoEffect_: Evolve: Give -2/-0 to an enemy follower.
114031020.evoFlair_: Thoughts are intangible. They waver. They vanish. And because they do, their brilliance is unparalleled. The sum of their thoughts becomes an aurora intense enough to raze all evil.

116031010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If you have at least 3 other Machina cards in your hand, deal 2 damage to an enemy follower. If you have at least 3 other Natura cards, restore 2 defense to your leader.
116031010.baseFlair_: The progress of technology, the growth of nature. The servants of the hybrid god employ both in their affairs, embracing and rejecting the dichotomy without contradiction.
116031010.evoEffect_: Evolve: Choose - Put an Assembly Droid or Naterran Great Tree into your hand.
116031010.evoFlair_: One wing born of technology, one wing born of nature. The servants of the hybrid god do not waver in battle, adoring and abhorring all creation without contradiction.

118031010.baseEffect_: Once on each of your turns, when this follower's attack or defense is increased by an effect, deal 3 damage to a random enemy follower and restore 3 defense to your leader.
118031010.baseFlair_:
"Why am I always out and about, ya ask? Don'cha hear the ingredients callin' out to me?"
"We heard you'll brave any danger for quality cuisine."
"Bwahaha. Can't cook up much of a meal if you're afraid of a lil' fire." —Wasteland Journal, Chef's Interview
118031010.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Summon an Arcane Personnel Carrier.
Once on each of your turns, when this follower's attack or defense is increased by an effect, deal 3 damage to a random enemy follower and restore 3 defense to your leader.
118031010.evoFlair_:
"There's a nondescript cart that houses one of the finest food stalls round these parts. If yer ever lucky enough to run into it, I recommend their scorpion skewers—desert-hot BBQ, grilled to perfection."
—Wasteland Journal, Chef's Interview Follow-Up

119031010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Draw a card.
Enhance (6): Evolve this follower instead. Recover 4 play points.
119031010.baseFlair_: I'm Vyrn, and this here's the Captain! Nice to meetcha! We're skyfarers. Hehe, pretty cool, right? Huh? Lizard? Did you just call me a lizard?!
119031010.evoFlair_: Well, it's true that I don't even know what I am... But I know who I am! And now's not the time to be runnin' scared—I'm going to do whatever it takes to help my friends!

119031020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Banish an enemy follower with 1 defense.
119031020.baseFlair_: Forgetting the pain of today is the first step toward a brighter tomorrow. Entrust your past suffering to me, child of man, and be lifted of your burdens.
119031020.evoEffect_: Evolve: Banish a card from your hand and put a copy of it into your deck. Draw 2 cards.
119031020.evoFlair_: Even that which is forgotten is never truly lost. Bring me your broken dreams and abandoned hopes. They will live on in me forevermore.

109041020.baseEffect_:
When another allied follower evolves, gain the ability to attack 2 times per turn.
When you play a spell, gain Bane.
When you play an amulet, gain Rush.
At the start of your turn, gain +8/+8 if this follower has the ability to attack 2 times per turn, Bane, and Rush.
109041020.baseFlair_: The nameless warrior took up his sword. He hungered only for triumph. He believed only in strength.
109041020.evoFlair_: Treachery and deception fall to his sword of justice. Like the prizes and flames of war, he does not seek solitude. Yet where his goal lies, there can only be one. Thus, the nameless hero becomes a living legend.

118041020.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Reduce damage from effects to 0.
118041020.baseFlair_:
Exultation of God, True Phantasm, Lightning Incarnate.
We call you by many names, awaiting the seven trumpets.
Show us the way, God willing.
—Song of Revelation, Overture
118041020.evoEffect_:
Ward.
Reduce damage from effects to 0.
At the end of your turn, if you have more evolution points than your opponent, gain an empty play point orb. (You have 0 evolution points on turns you are unable to evolve.)
118041020.evoFlair_:
Keeper of Souls, Herald of the End, Bolt from the Blue.
You do much for the heavens, but we implore you:
Show us the unbridled truth of this mortal coil.
—Song of Revelation, Finale

900041100.baseFlair_:
The fifth circle: Wrath.
Those who lose themselves in indignation will sink to their wastes in the mire of Styx.
900041100.evoFlair_:
The ninth circle: Cocytus.
Our emperor, father of falsehoods, is enthroned where all punishment originates. Where all sin expires.

101014010.baseFlair_: A sharper blade to cut through anything!

109014010.baseEffect_:
Draw a card.
Enhance (6): Draw 3 cards instead.
109014010.baseFlair_: For master sleuths, the search for truth is a dance—sometimes with great attention to detail, and occasionally in reckless fashion.

114014010.baseEffect_:
Restore 2 defense to your leader.
Put a Naterran Great Tree into your hand and change its cost to 0.
114014010.baseFlair_: Nature grants us all manner of blessings. A single tree can purify the air, offer shaded shelter, or even provide warmth as firewood.

712014010.baseEffect_:
Restore 2 defense to your leader.
Put a Naterran Great Tree into your hand and change its cost to 0.
712014010.baseFlair_: Nature grants us all manner of blessings. A single tree can purify the air, offer shaded shelter, or even provide warmth as firewood.

117014010.baseFlair_:
Huh? Why's it dark all of a sudden? That's weird. There wasn't a cloud in the sky when I left this morn—
—A Traveler's Last Words

119014010.baseEffect_:
Give +0/+1 to all allied followers.
Draw a card.
119014010.baseFlair_: A rousing tune that rings out from on high, invigorating troops and rallying them to victory.

101024040.baseEffect_:
If this card is discarded, draw a card.
----------
Draw a card.
101024040.baseFlair_: The light that filters through the trees will bring us a brighter tomorrow.

101034010.baseEffect_: Discard your hand. Draw a card for each card you discarded.
101034010.baseFlair_: Let's see what our next fate will be.

109034010.baseEffect_:
Destroy an enemy follower or amulet that costs 2 play points or less.
Enhance (6): Destroy any enemy follower or amulet instead.
109034010.baseFlair_: Your folly will be met with gentle silence. And now, you too will know the eternal void.

707034010.baseEffect_:
Destroy an enemy follower or amulet that costs 2 play points or less.
Enhance (6): Destroy any enemy follower or amulet instead.
707034010.baseFlair_: Your folly will be met with gentle silence. And now, you too will know the eternal void.

900044060.baseEffect_:
Banish an enemy follower or amulet.
Draw a card.
900044060.baseFlair_: The dreaded day arrives, bringing the end of times. By my hand, the heavens shall fall.

100012010.baseEffect_: At the start of your turn, give +1/+1 to a random allied follower.
100012010.baseFlair_: Blessed be thou who livest in these days.

103012020.baseEffect_: Whenever an allied Neutral follower comes into play, give it +1/+0.
103012020.baseFlair_: This spear points the way to victory.

113013010.baseEffect_:
Countdown (3)
At the end of your turn, give a random allied follower +1/+0.
At the end of your turn, give a random allied follower with no card text Ward.
113013010.baseFlair_: A roadmap that would lead us to riches: the universal language.

900012030.baseEffect_: During your turn, when an allied follower comes into play, give it +2/+0 and Rush, then banish this amulet.
900012030.baseFlair_: When the going gets tough, the tough get going. Wherever it is you've gotta go, this bad boy will get you there.

109023010.baseEffect_:
Countdown (3)
At the end of your turn, give a random allied follower +0/+1 and Bane.
109023010.baseFlair_: Through the annals of history, stories of lore are construed into wisdom. As new pages in time unfold, legends are born.

106033010.baseEffect_:
Countdown (6)
Fanfare: Enhance (5) - Subtract 6 from this amulet's Countdown.
Whenever an allied follower is destroyed, subtract 1 from this amulet's Countdown.
Last Words: At the start of your next turn, put 3 random followers from your deck into your hand.
106033010.baseFlair_: For the virtuous, there is no salvation greater than death. —Holy Teachings, Chapter 1

100011030.baseFlair_: So you want some demons slain? Well, if you're good for the coin, I'm good for the killing. As long as I get what's mine, you'll be more than happy with the results.
100011030.evoFlair_: Work Hard for Your Pay—that's my motto. Hire me and you'll get exactly the fight you hoped for. All right, time to clock in! Come on, demons, your heads will put food on my table!

101011030.baseFlair_: Thousands of arrows have been fired towards it, and yet my shield of light has never been penetrated. Allow me to use it to protect the combatants from harm!
101011030.evoFlair_: I will stand in the way of all disasters and keep you safe from harm! No matter how deep the despair that assails us, I will keep the light of hope shining!

101011040.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Restore 2 defense to your leader.
101011040.baseFlair_: Bring me the brave warriors injured in battle. I am Heaven's own healer—there is no pain I cannot ease.
101011040.evoFlair_: You war-weary souls, come to me; rest in the healing light of love. Close your eyes. As light bathes your body, feel the flame of courage ignite in you once more.

103011030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a random follower that costs 2 play points or less from your deck into your hand.
103011030.baseFlair_: It's so sad without Feena here. I think I'll follow her nice and quiet!
103011030.evoFlair_: I'll use my magic illusions to help you, Feena! Just give me shiny stuff to say thanks!

103011050.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to an enemy.
103011050.baseFlair_: With this arrow I'll make the will of the lord known!
103011050.evoFlair_: Angelic arrows are truly miraculous! They bring revelation to the just and judgment to the wicked!

104011020.baseFlair_: Come at me! I'll hack you to bits right here! And I promise it'll hurt you more than it hurts me!
104011020.evoFlair_: I can't fall here—not with my family and allies counting on me! So come at me! The battlefield's mine!

105011020.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Give +1/+0 to an allied follower.
105011020.baseFlair_: Children of men who are heading into this just war. I am a heavenly angel, and I will bless your troops.
105011020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
105011020.evoFlair_: Children of men who are heading into this just war. I shall help you see virtue through. I shall fight alongside you as a model warrior, and you will receive my blessings.

106011010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give another allied follower the following effect - Can't be targeted by enemy effects.
106011010.baseFlair_: Bringing darkness wherever she goes, the night goddess hides the stars by painting the sky black. Those who embrace darkness give thanks to her so that they may become one with the pall. —The Night Goddess, Chapter 2
106011010.evoFlair_: Lovers of the pall know how to manage the darkness: let it paint over the senses and conceal one's true nature. The goddess looks on her adorable flock and smiles as she scatters the darkness amongst them. —The Night Goddess, Chapter 4

107011010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give another allied follower the ability to ignore Ward.
107011010.baseFlair_: Do you know the ingredients for adventure? Companions, knowledge, and tools? No silly! Just courage and a dream! Let's go!
107011010.evoFlair_: Embrace your dreams and muster your courage... For with courage, you can make your dreams come true! Now, now, there's no time to lose! I don't know where we're going, but it's sure to be an adventure!

107011020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Gain +2/+1. Destroy an enemy amulet.
107011020.baseFlair_: Ga-ha-ha! You're a funny one! Maybe you should hang up your sword and take up comedy! Oh, that's actually your day job? Bwa-ha-ha! You really are a barrel of laughs!
107011020.evoFlair_: Some say I'm too easily amused. If you ask me, though, I say people don't laugh enough! I mean, even the battlefield can be hilarious—look at those serious faces... Bwa-ha-ha!

108011010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Randomly gain Ward or Rush.
108011010.baseFlair_: Let confusion get the better of you, human. The answer you seek is there inside the chaos. I found my answer on the other side of confusion—destruction, the only answer.
108011010.evoFlair_: Do not stand in awe, human. Confusion will in time engender an answer, the answer that confusion is a truth without parallel. Now take this chaos as your own.

109011020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put an Elsam of the Brofamily into your hand.
109011020.baseFlair_: Sorry to keep you, like, salivating. Here's your grub with all the—whoa! That lady knight sitting over there... Total babe city!
109011020.evoFlair_: Guess I've got Katalina fever, you know? But I won't stop till I show her the way this heart beats. Kat, watch out! Cuz someday I'm gonna be your numero uno! Waaheey!

111011010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If your leader's defense is less than your opponent's, deal 2 damage to the enemy leader.
111011010.baseFlair_:
Hey, pal. Never seen you 'round here before. You'd better move along though. Don't say I didn't warn ya.
—Kindhearted patron of the Skin of Your Teeth
111011010.evoFlair_:
Hey, buddy! Never seen you in here. Pull up a seat! Hey, barkeep! Give our new friend here the usual, an' make it extra spicy!
—Mean-spirited regular at the Skin of Your Teeth

114011010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Randomly put 2 different Natura cards from your deck into your hand.
114011010.baseFlair_: Contrast is what really makes flavors pop! Just think what a dash of salt does for your sweets! So even the nastiest food tastes better from the hands of a cute cook like me! If you know the right way to spin it, you can make anything easier to swallow!
114011010.evoFlair_: Contrast sharpens emotional impact too! Consider how much sweeter victory tastes when snatched from the jaws of defeat! So try eating something whose appearance absolutely terrifies you! The relief you feel will be better than any secret sauce!

116011010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If you have any Machina or Natura cards in your hand, discard 1. Then put 2 random cards that share a trait with that card from your deck into your hand.
116011010.baseFlair_: Ah, heck yeah! Treasure! But you can't trick me, you silly, deadly labyrinth! You're hiding even greater riches deep in your tummy, aren't you?
116011010.evoFlair_: Whoa-ho-ho! The mother lode! They said that dungeon diving would be the end of me—well, look where my treasure tingle's gotten me now!

119011010.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare and Last Words: Restore 2 defense to your leader.
119011010.baseFlair_: Whenever you're sad or lonely, I'm here for you. My fluffy wings will have you feeling warm and fuzzy in no time!
119011010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
119011010.evoFlair_: C'mon everyone, don't fight—just enjoy my fluffiness instead! Fluff will change your life! Fluff will bring world peace!

900011020.baseFlair_: Hurry! Her Royal Majesty is impatient. And if she loses her temper, you'll lose your head.
900011020.evoFlair_: Rebelling against Her Majesty? This won't end well for you. You're merely brazen, not brave.

900011030.baseFlair_: To keep Her Majesty safe is why I'm here. It's why I live.
900011030.evoFlair_: Her Majesty rules! So long as there's breath in my lungs, I'll allow none to touch her.

900011040.baseFlair_: My blade will punish any who disobey Her Majesty.
900011040.evoFlair_: Orders are orders, especially when they're coming from Her Majesty. Death to defiers of the queen!

900011050.baseEffect_:
Storm.
Fanfare: Put a Tomoi of the Brofamily into your hand.
900011050.baseFlair_: Yo! I'm Elsam. It's, like, I'm so honored everybody could get together to share this grindage. As for my lady type... I've got a thing for fashionable girls. Here's to a rad evening, everyone!
900011050.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
900011050.evoFlair_: All right, you guys ready to begin the forty-fifth grand tourney of the primal beast name game? w00t! w00t!

900011060.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: Put a Human! Pyramid! Attack! into your hand.
900011060.baseFlair_: Prime Minister Freesia... Nay, dearest Freezie. Just order me to protect you, and it's done!
900011060.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
900011060.evoFlair_: Freezie, stop... I'm still on duty... Zzz...

101021020.baseFlair_: Some monsters are rather more intelligent than others. Take the lizardmen, for example. These creatures fight for each other and for the survival of their species. Thinking they're just dumb reptiles would be disastrous.
101021020.evoEffect_:
Ward.
Evolve: Summon an unevolved Lizardman.
101021020.evoFlair_: You think you can negotiate with lizardmen just because they speak a few words of human language? Think again. Any information you give them is sure to be used against you one day.

103021040.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put an Ultimate Carrot into your hand.
103021040.baseFlair_: For the finest chefs, only the finest ingredients will do! Let the cooking begin! Coctura integro!
103021040.evoFlair_: Everything in this world is just one more ingredient to me, including you tasty-looking morsels! Let's see if you can stand up to my most refined cooking technique! Firestorm of damnation!

106021020.baseEffect_: Fanfare and Last Words: Draw a card.
106021020.baseFlair_: I don't do songs for the throngs. I only sing for one person. This song is your song. Now lend me your ears.
106021020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
106021020.evoFlair_: My songs are great and heartfelt, because they're for one and one alone. Please listen as I sing.

107021020.baseFlair_: Whoa! Easy there, big guy! Eyes on the intruder only, got it?
107021020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
107021020.evoFlair_: Yowza! S-settle down, buddy! I know you want 'em all for yourself, but don't get wild now!

112021020.baseEffect_: During your turn, whenever another allied follower evolves, evolve this follower.
112021020.baseFlair_: My brother-in-arms, he who possesses the Eye of Flame. Though he may cross established boundaries and commit taboos, upon sparking his true flame he is capable of reducing all creation to ash. —Grimnir, Warring Tempest
112021020.evoEffect_: Clash: Deal 2 damage to the enemy follower.
112021020.evoFlair_: Yeah, so this is my buddy Jafnhar! He doesn't really understand the concept of personal space, but he's got an amazing power in one of his eyes! How cool is that? —Grimnir, Warring Tempest

116021010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give an enemy the following effect until the start of your next turn - Reduce all damage dealt to 0. (Applies to attacks and effects.)
116021010.baseFlair_: Songs spread peace and bring love to the furthest corners of the world. That's what a very famous singer taught me when I was just starting out. Anyway, here's a single from my upcoming album called Peace Sonata. Baby, it's love and peace...
116021010.evoFlair_:
Whoa, I love this song! Who wrote—Ah! It's mine, isn't it? Who knew it would catch on like this—love and peace, yeah!
—Apollo

118021010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Put a Dutiful Steed into your hand.
Last Words: Summon a Bullet Bike.
118021010.baseFlair_:
"Why I roam about? It's my job to explore the frontier."
"With scales for skin, isn't it tough riding a horse?"
"That's why I ride one of these instead. Their stone-cold skin and fiery temperament are a good match for me."
—Wasteland Journal, Interview 2
118021010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
118021010.evoFlair_:
"Perk up your ears as you walk along the path of tumbleweeds. If you catch the distinctive hum of a harmonica, consider yourself lucky. The melody from this inhuman adventurer is sure to enliven your travels."
—Wasteland Journal, Interview 2 Follow-Up

100031010.baseEffect_:
Strike: Deal 2 damage to the enemy leader.
At the start of your turn, this follower combines with an allied Harnessed Glass to become Flame and Glass.
100031010.baseFlair_: I have no regrets. If I didn't burn Mother to death, Glass would have been killed!
100031010.evoFlair_: Mother hated Glass and wanted to kill her, but I couldn't let that happen! I wanted to know Glass! She's a part of me after all. I had to protect her.

100031020.baseEffect_:
Strike: Deal 1 damage to all enemy followers.
At the start of your turn, this follower combines with an allied Harnessed Flame to become Flame and Glass.
100031020.baseFlair_: I knew what I'd become. But I had to freeze Father, or he would have hurt Flame. I had no choice.
100031020.evoFlair_: Father loved Flame—he only hated that she killed Mother. That's why I had to watch over Flame. I couldn't let her kill Father too.

104031020.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Enhance (10) - Deal 1 damage to all enemy followers 4 times.
104031020.baseFlair_: I am Grimnir, heaven's chosen god of war and the mad cyclone. I have descended from the lofty realm to save this world, but make no mistake... I'm not here to make friends.
104031020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
104031020.evoFlair_: As my power grows, something within me whirls ever more madly. And few who see me unleash the cyclone will forget the sight of a mighty war god consumed by fury.

105031010.baseEffect_:
Can't attack.
When another allied follower attacks, this follower can attack until the start of your next turn.
105031010.baseFlair_: I spend my life here in this tower, braiding and unbraiding my hair. But if someone were only to come to me...
105031010.evoFlair_: Here in this tower I'm lonely. No one comes to me but the songbirds. But if someone were only to take my hand, then I'd say good-bye to this tower.

107031020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Randomly put 1 of the following cards into your hand: Goblin, Goblin Leader, or Goblin Princess.
Whenever an allied follower that originally costs 1 play point or less comes into play, give it Rush.
107031020.baseFlair_: There is no need for scheming or tactics, for violence is of the essence! Scream for vengeance, cry your fury—we will lay waste to the heavens!
107031020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
107031020.evoFlair_: From the birds in the skies to the insects of the earth—we shall hunt, we shall feed! Our order shall rise and lay claim to every last corner of this world!

109031020.baseFlair_: Bahahaha! Laugh, celebrate, rejoice! For it is I, the supreme gourmet emperor, in the flesh! I have made my glorious return! Now then, shall I serve up a feast for the world?
109031020.evoEffect_: Evolve: Choose - Put a Nourishing Fare or Flaming-Hot Fare into your hand.
109031020.evoFlair_: There are two dishes on tonight's menu! Will you be embraced by sublime nourishment, be immersed in flaming-hot passion? Bahahaha! Don't be picky, just choose!

112031020.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Deal X damage to all enemy followers. X equals the number of times that allied followers have evolved this match.
112031020.baseFlair_:
"I brought you some tea, bro!"
"Oh, thanks! Did you spill it all on the way over or something? Oh well, it's the thought that counts!"
—Hnikar and Grimnir
112031020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
112031020.evoFlair_:
"Let's get moving, Grimnir."
"Okay, okay! Haven't you ever heard of personal space?"
—Jafnhar and Grimnir

113031020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If an enemy follower is in play, change this follower's attack and defense to X/Y. X and Y are equal to the attack and defense of a random enemy follower.
113031020.baseFlair_:
"That's right. I'm a mirror into your soul."
"Oho! Such meaty thighs! Such tender flesh! Now this must be some world-class quality meat!"
"Qua... You tryin' to roast me?!"
—Hamsa and Khaiza
113031020.evoFlair_:
"Wow! Such gorgeous feathers! They'd make a fabulous accessory."
"Q-quaack! Don't even think about pluckin' these feathers!"
—Hamsa and Nelcha

115031020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Randomly put a follower with Fanfare (excluding Princess Knight) from your deck into your hand.
115031020.baseFlair_: He awoke with no memories, no powers of his own. But the bonds forged by his pure heart light his companions' path forward.
115031020.evoEffect_: Evolve: Recover 1 play point. Subtract 2 from the Union Burst of all followers in your hand.
115031020.evoFlair_: He knows not why he is here—only what he has learned since awakening. But he bravely swings his sword for friendship, cutting through artifice to seek out a true ending.

118031020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put 2 Goblins into your hand.
118031020.baseFlair_: I'm not too fond of my husband's violent handling of the power struggle. It only leads to more bloodshed when we should be focused on choosing a successor.
118031020.evoEffect_: Evolve: Transform an allied Goblin into a Goblin King.
118031020.evoFlair_: Being overwhelmingly strong may work for now, but if you fancy yourself a true king, then you'll help me choose the ideal match for our daughter!

900031020.baseFlair_: These wings have been blackened by the shadow of temptation. Corrupted by desire, I have fallen. But heavens, heed my call—for what purpose was I born this way, created this way?
900031020.evoFlair_: Where can one find sin? In those corrupted by temptation, or in a god who has created beings unable to triumph over its beckoning?

107041020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Give +1/+0 to a random allied follower.
Fanfare: Enhance (6) - Give +1/+1 to all other allied followers.
Fanfare: Enhance (9) - Put a Morrigna's Gospel into your hand.
107041020.baseFlair_: The goddess mirrors battle; or rather, battle is a reflection of her will. In the fabric of hope and despair, fated glory and fierce adversity are woven together. —Trinity of Goddesses, Chapter 5
107041020.evoFlair_: War is merciful; war is ruthless. Fools are heralded as heroes, and heroes are forgotten in death. The path of your destiny rests upon the raven's feather—will you meet glory or death? —Trinity of Goddesses, Chapter 8

116041010.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Use X play points to give +X/+X to this follower and another allied follower. X equals your remaining play points.
116041010.baseFlair_: Look up to the heavens and perk your ears. Judgment's trumpet will sound without timbre or tone. And, though wingless you might be, prophecy will be as your guidepost to the light.
116041010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
116041010.evoFlair_: Bow your head and be enraptured. Divine words will shake the land without pretense or pulse. And, though powerless you might be, prophecy will be your offering to the darkness.

900041040.baseEffect_:
Clash: Restore 1 defense to your leader.
Last Words: Put a Moon and Sun into your hand.
900041040.baseFlair_: I am the one who brightens the sky. My work is to deliver light to all the world. I'll even light the abyss of the underworld with an endless shimmer.
900041040.evoFlair_: You're seeking the blessings of the sky. So give your heart to the light. When it's shimmering brightest, I'll show you the wheel in the sky!

900041050.baseEffect_:
Clash: Deal 1 damage to the enemy leader.
Last Words: Put a Moon and Sun into your hand.
900041050.baseFlair_: I am the one who colors the earth; my work is to bring darkness on this plane. I'll even color the sky's shimmer with an unending darkness.
900041050.evoFlair_: You're wishing for the fall of the sky. So offer the darkness to your heart. When the clouds are darkest, the moon is sure to consume the earth.

900041110.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 4 damage to an enemy follower.
900041110.baseFlair_:
The seventh circle: Violence.
If you love not your fellows nor yourself then you deserve none in return.
900041110.evoEffect_: Evolve: Deal 6 damage to an enemy follower.
900041110.evoFlair_:
The ninth circle: Cocytus.
Our emperor, howling lion with jaws agape, is enthroned where all punishment originates. Where all sin expires.

101014020.baseFlair_: A melody of bravery that only the divine can play.

107014010.baseEffect_: Destroy an enemy follower that attacked last turn.
107014010.baseFlair_: Master trapsmiths may alter their contraptions depending on their prey. Alas, no need to fix what isn't broken.

118014010.baseEffect_:
Deal 2 damage to an enemy.
Restore 2 defense to your leader.
118014010.baseFlair_:
Mrg! This savory blend of spices is hot, hot, hoooot!
—Gourmet Emperor Khaiza

101024020.baseFlair_: Loosed arrows become lights, piercing the hearts of evildoers one by one.

102024010.baseEffect_: Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower. Deal 5 damage instead if it's evolved.
102024010.baseFlair_: Let's see if you're still standing after a taste of this.

110024010.baseEffect_: Give +4/+0 to a follower, then deal 4 damage to that follower.
110024010.baseFlair_: Know the pain of yearning. Abandon your innocence. I can't wait to see how you'll change.

116024010.baseEffect_:
Summon 2 Goblins.
Enhance (6): Summon 5 instead.
Enhance (9): Then evolve all unevolved allied Goblins.
116024010.baseFlair_:
First you reported that zombies were doing gymnastics, and now you say goblins are working together? What's next? Will pigs fly and bring happiness to the world?
—Sage Commander

114034010.baseEffect_:
Deal 5 damage to an enemy follower.
If you have more evolution points than your opponent, put a Flaming-Hot Fare into your hand. (You have 0 evolution points on turns you are unable to evolve.)
114034010.baseFlair_:
Let the cooking begin! Coctura integro! First a pinch of this, then a dash of that... And then... Unleash the flames! The oil's going to spatter, so spectators, stand back!
—Gourmet Emperor Khaiza

900034020.baseEffect_: Destroy an enemy follower with 4 defense or less.

108044010.baseEffect_:
Choose: Summon an Amaterasu or Tsukuyomi.
Enhance (7): Give that follower +3/+3.
108044010.baseFlair_: The heavens house a blazing wheel; the dark night, a silver platter. The two differ as heaven and Hades, but both shine the same.

900044030.baseEffect_:
Give a random allied follower +3/+3.
Draw 3 cards.
Restore 3 defense to your leader.
900044030.baseFlair_:
"Rejoice!"
"Yield your courage!"
"The heavens have chosen thee!"
—The Prophecy of Morrigna

104013010.baseEffect_:
Countdown (2)
Until this amulet leaves play, all followers in play and all followers that come into play have Ward.
104013010.baseFlair_: The war-weary pair devised a simpler way to settle their differences.

106013010.baseEffect_:
Countdown (1)
Fanfare: Draw a card.
Fanfare: Enhance (5) - Add 3 to this amulet's Countdown.
At the end of your turn, draw a card.
106013010.baseFlair_: From here the arrow was shot, soaring until it struck the shield waiting on the other side. The resultant trail is but one of the goddess's miracles. —A Lore of the Night Sky, Chapter 4

900012040.baseEffect_: During your turn, when an allied follower comes into play, give it +1/+3 and Ward, then banish this amulet.
900012040.baseFlair_: An abode, a shelter, and a means of transportation—you're getting three in one here. Bring one of these for a trip through any harsh terrain, and you're all set.

104022010.baseEffect_:
When you play a follower that originally costs at least 7 play points, destroy this amulet.
Last Words: Summon an Imperial Mammoth.
104022010.baseFlair_: What do you mean you heard an elephant? It was just your imagination! —An arctic explorer

115032010.baseEffect_:
Invocation: At the end of your turn, if you have at least 4 play points and there are no allied Colosseum on Highs in play, invoke this card.
Fanfare: If any other allied Colosseum on Highs are in play, draw 2 cards and destroy this amulet.
Until this amulet leaves play, both leaders have the following effect: Once on each of your turns, when you play a follower, give it +2/+2 and Rush.
115032010.baseFlair_: A colosseum borne on the back of a god. The strongest of the eight realms gather here to bask in the admiration of thousands. With entire worlds at stake, there is no holding back—the entire colosseum breathes in a single, fevered rhythm.

100011040.baseFlair_: Slowly the titan of a soldier approached. His every step was a mighty quake that sent rattles and groans through the buildings. The villagers could only watch in horror.
100011040.evoFlair_: Weapons, walls, pleas—nothing could halt his tempest of destruction. The village was reduced to rubble in a blink. The titanic soldier glanced down and then moved on in search of more prey.

101011020.baseFlair_: It's our duty to inspect this desert. We need to make sure it's safe before people start to cross it! Now come on—let's head out!
101011020.evoFlair_: The sun's relentless, and we're covered in sand, but we can't give up. The people are relying on us! Now come on—how about you and I lead the way?

105011030.baseEffect_: Summon a Goblin at the end of your turn.
105011030.baseFlair_: Let one get away and it'll call ten, and the ten will call a hundred. You have to squelch them all. —Lucius, Goblin Slayer
105011030.evoFlair_: Don't laugh at the little devils. They may not be wise, but they don't have limits. You've got to squash them all fast. Swordsweep! —Lucius, Goblin Slayer

109011010.baseEffect_: Follower Strike: Deal 3 damage to the enemy follower before it can deal any damage in return.
109011010.baseFlair_: I've been blown up, torn down, and tossed around since I set out for the skies. But it was all worth it 'cuz they helped me get the Grandcypher flying again. Aaand that's why I'll never stay grounded.
109011010.evoFlair_: Yeah, me and the Grandcypher'll get you where you're goin'. So buckle up! Next stop: the end of the sky!

111011020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Keen Enchantment into your hand.
111011020.baseFlair_: I am the proof of an unyielding heart! Don't worry about nicks or cracks in your blade! My powers will have it good as new in no time! Sharp enough to slice through anything!
111011020.evoFlair_: I'm living proof of what an unflagging fighting spirit can do! Your blade may crack or even break, but with me by your side, never fear! Your sword will always be sharp enough to slice through anything!

112011010.baseEffect_: Last Words: Restore 2 defense to your leader.
112011010.baseFlair_: OMG! You seem, like, totally bummed! Guess it's my time to shine! Come on, let's get hyped up!
112011010.evoEffect_: Last Words: Deal 2 damage to the enemy leader.
112011010.evoFlair_:
"You could learn a lot from her."
"I have! Just listen—OMG!"
"That's not what I meant..."
—Lyrial and Ephemera

113011020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Gain +4/+4.
Enhance (10): Gain +4/+4 more.
113011020.baseFlair_: A thriving metropolis stands atop what was once a mere mountain of rubble. A single step—the goliath revealed himself before the land.
113011020.evoFlair_: A mere mountain of rubble rests where once stood a thriving metropolis. A single step—the goliath concealed himself within the land.

115011010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If there are no allied Naterran Great Trees in play, summon a Naterran Great Tree. If an allied Naterran Great Tree is in play, gain +2/+2 instead.
115011010.baseFlair_: Sheepies are so fluffy! Baskin' in the warm sunshine, munchin' on oh-so-tasty grass... Those precious children of the land grow up so fast!
115011010.evoFlair_: Ridin' a sheep's like floatin' on a cloud! "Clip-clop" go their little hooves, "Baa, baa" go their little voices... Those gentle children of the land are always smilin'!

117011020.baseFlair_: You know that warm feeling you get when you think back on a letter? That's your heart sprouting wings so that it can send back a reply. If you could spare a thought for me too, well... that would make my day!
117011020.evoFlair_: Every letter is written with emotion and sealed with shared memories. And each one nestles in your heart, giving it wings. Being a courier is so rewarding! I can't think of a more heartwarming job!

102021030.baseFlair_: These duds are slick! Huh? You're looking mighty hungry...
102021030.evoEffect_: Evolve: Deal 3 damage to all followers.
102021030.evoFlair_: Ha-ha! Look who's laughing now. Have a taste of my searing light, pal!

104021040.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Gain +2/+2 if you have at least 20 Neutral cards remaining in your deck.
104021040.baseFlair_: Though it's not evil, it's not partial to good. Thus is the nature of the wise strix. It longs only for a world where the balance is preserved.
104021040.evoFlair_: The far-sighted strix sees beyond all good and evil in this world. When its beak breaks the silence, the balance of the world will be restored.

119021010.baseEffect_:
Clash: Give +1/+0 to all allied followers.
Can evolve for 0 evolution points.
119021010.baseFlair_: When you live long enough you run into disappointments along the way. But journeying with everyone got me thinking: it's too soon to mosey off into the sunset.
119021010.evoFlair_: If I left the young'uns to fight all by themselves, I wouldn't be able to look myself in the mirror. I'll free myself from doubts and start moving forward—because that's how a skyfarer lives.

101031010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Destroy a follower, and then put a copy of that follower into play.
101031010.baseFlair_: The past cannot be changed, and destiny cannot be altered. Everything has been set in stone. Still, you must not forget: miracles are only visited upon those who overcome this divine providence.
101031010.evoFlair_: I shall use my powers to free the future from the yoke of destiny. Do not become a prisoner of despair, for a hopeful future can be yours—a future of freedom. Go ahead and grasp it.

103031010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a random amulet from your deck into your hand.
103031010.baseFlair_: The divine flame only grants an audience to the chosen. Burning with the radiance of dawn, the holy presence grants salvation to those it favors.
103031010.evoFlair_: Clad in sacred flames, the angel of divine light brought a corona of golden hope to the gloomy world. Soon sunlight was restored to the heavens, marking the beginning of a new world order.

103031020.baseFlair_: Can you buy me a little more time? Just until I finish chanting my inferno spell... If you can hold back the enemy, I'll help you turn the tables!
103031020.evoEffect_: Evolve: Deal 2 damage to an enemy follower. Deal 5 damage instead if it's a Neutral follower.
103031020.evoFlair_: Minions of darkness! My unrivaled flames will purge your rotten souls and restore your purity!

107031010.baseFlair_: Ding-dong, ding-dong! Hey, check it out! Everybody's wishes gave these bells a new life! Now the sounds of joy are sure to reach you!
107031010.evoFlair_:
Everybody's wishes, I want them all to come true!
So wish for happiness, and the bells of joy will keep on ringing! Ding-dong, ding-dong!

108031030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Choose - Put a Ruthful Droplet or Ruthless Waterspout into your hand.
108031030.baseFlair_: The ocean's big and open, so you can do anything! The gentle currents, the raging waves—which do you like?
108031030.evoFlair_: The ocean's big and open, and my heart is too! So yeah, yeah, don't do anything too bad! I won't forgive you just like that!

110031010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to an enemy.
110031010.baseFlair_:
"C'mon, Goblin Mage! We've got treasure to hunt!"
"Ooh! Feena, I found some shiny stuff!"
"Wait, don't touch that! It's a tr—"
—Feena and Goblin Mage, falling for an obvious trap
110031010.evoEffect_: Evolve: Destroy all enemy followers that cost 1 play point or less.
110031010.evoFlair_:
"F-failure? Ha! I don't know the meaning of the word!"
"Ah! There's something shiny on the floor! Yoink!"
"Did you hear a click just now?"
—Feena and Goblin Mage, about to fall into an oubliette

110031030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Until the end of the opponent's turn, give all allies the following effect - Reduce damage from effects to 0.
110031030.baseFlair_: A grudge against you? Why would I feel anything at all about someone I've never met? This is just part of the job. So stop struggling, okay? You're making it harder to smite you!
110031030.evoEffect_: Evolve: Deal 2 damage to an enemy.
110031030.evoFlair_: It's tough being a professional. You just hafta suck it up and do what you gotta do—but I won't complain! No sirree, I'm just gonna forge ahead and follow my orders. You've got my back, right?

900031010.baseFlair_: After losing a bloody battle for royal authority and being shut away in a cave, the prince responded to the voice of a demon. He resolved to transform into a hideous goblin so that he could have his revenge.
900031010.evoFlair_: As the first step in his revenge, the prince led his goblin soldiers against his homeland to claim the throne. There he planned to reign not as a man but as a goblin king.

105041010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give +1/+0 to all other allied Neutral followers in your hand and in play.
105041010.baseFlair_: Lands of wonders, lands of marvels! What sort of adventures could be waiting? I can't wait to find out!
105041010.evoEffect_: Evolve: Give +0/+1 to all other allied Neutral followers in your hand and in play.
105041010.evoFlair_: I'm going to change the world to change myself. I mean, I have to change the world if I'm going to become a grown-up. I'll keep going onward, and I won't fear a thing in this land of wonders and marvels!

117041020.baseEffect_:
Invocation: At the start of your turn, Rally (10) - Invoke this card.
----------
Fanfare: If you have more evolution points than your opponent, gain +0/+2 and deal 2 damage to an enemy follower. (You have 0 evolution points on turns you are unable to evolve.)
At the end of your turn, give +1/+1 to all allied followers.
117041020.baseFlair_: The wind is eternal, forever traversing the four corners of the world, opening new paths as it flows. Children of man, wheresoever you tread, I am at your backs. The fear and indecision that dog your steps will be swept away by my tempests.
117041020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
117041020.evoFlair_:
I hold her in the highest esteem, you know. She can be sharp and cold, but she'll guide those adorable humans with her easterly winds all the same. We're polar opposites, yes, but... That's why I admire her.
—Goddess of the West Wind

900041070.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, destroy a random enemy follower. Restore X defense to your leader. X equals that follower's attack.
900041070.baseFlair_:
The second circle: Lust.
The carnal malefactors and their licentious ways shall be met with an everlasting storm.
900041070.evoFlair_: The ninth circle: Cocytus. Our emperor, false-tongued serpent, is enthroned where all punishment originates—Where all sin expires.

101014030.baseFlair_: By our pact, I will eradicate thine enemy.

107034010.baseEffect_: Transform a follower or amulet into a Fallen Angel.

113034010.baseEffect_: Banish an enemy follower or amulet. Both players draw a card.
113034010.baseFlair_: Angels fire arrows according to the rules, but the paths of those arrows are unruly.

710034010.baseEffect_: Banish an enemy follower or amulet. Both players draw a card.
710034010.baseFlair_: Angels fire arrows according to the rules, but the paths of those arrows are unruly.

117034010.baseEffect_:
Destroy an enemy follower or amulet.
If at least 3 allied followers have evolved this match, recover 3 play points.
Then, if at least 5 have evolved, draw 2 cards.
117034010.baseFlair_: "Fall from grace" is such a subjective term. Paradise was only ever in the eye of the beholder.

713034010.baseEffect_:
Destroy an enemy follower or amulet.
If at least 3 allied followers have evolved this match, recover 3 play points.
Then, if at least 5 have evolved, draw 2 cards.
713034010.baseFlair_: I am not fallen. With resolve in my heart, I'll step forward once more.

118034010.baseEffect_:
Choose: Put 1 of the following cards into your hand.
-Scion of Desire
-Demon of Purgatory
-Heretical Hellbeast
If you have more evolution points than your opponent, deal 2 damage to your leader and recover 4 play points. (You have 0 evolution points on turns you are unable to evolve.)
118034010.baseFlair_:
Hehe, it's time we saw a true fairy tale in this world! It won't be long now before I—huh?
—Marcotte, Heretical Sister

900044070.baseFlair_: The dreaded day arrives, bringing the end of times. By my hand, the earth shall sink.

111023010.baseEffect_:
Countdown (3)
At the end of your turn, draw a card.
111023010.baseFlair_: With time, glory fades into tranquility. The musical splash of water mingles with laughing voices. This is Isunia, home of shimmering dew and guilds.

101032010.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, deal 6 damage to all enemies if you have at least 30 shadows.
101032010.baseFlair_: Death comes for everyone just the same.

100011050.baseFlair_: This is the surface? I'd heard the shadows were rampant here, but I didn't expect it to stink of death and destruction like this. No matter though. By my lord's order, I will bring light upon the land!
100011050.evoFlair_: My lord once said that even the darkest shadow holds a light of hope. I've dedicated my sword—and my life—to showing everyone the truth in these words! The time has come to illuminate the world!

105011010.baseEffect_:
Ambush.
Whenever another allied follower attacks, give that follower +1/+0 until the end of the turn.
105011010.baseFlair_: Funemployment was the best. Do I really have to help people fight now? Ah, never mind! I'll do the job with a smile on my face!
105011010.evoFlair_: Fighting's hard, but it's just about break time for cute little angels. Ha-ha, I'm kidding! I'll work!

900011010.baseFlair_: "A cute and quiet toy," saith the Mad Hatter. "A talkative friend for a tea party," saith the March Hare.
900011010.evoEffect_: Evolve: Deal 3 damage to an enemy.
900011010.evoFlair_: "The best toy to kill time," saith the Mad Hatter. "A dreadfully boring friend," saith the March Hare.

101021040.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Deal 3 damage to all other allied followers.
101021040.baseFlair_: "Get to work! G'wan, you brainless meathead! Put your back into it! You hear me?" "Urg!" "Hurry it up! If we're out here when the sun rises, we're finished! You'll feel my whip until the job's done!" "Urg, urg!"
101021040.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
101021040.evoFlair_: "Curses! We're surrounded! It's the en—" "Rouuuurggh!" "You... You saved us!" "It—it'sh becaush I lovesh you, shir." "Wait, you can talk?"

103021020.baseFlair_: Beautiful, powerful, and cute to boot! The one and only Feena's here!
103021020.evoEffect_: Evolve: Put a Goblin Mage into your hand and change its cost to 0.
103021020.evoFlair_: Goblin Mage, did you follow me here? Now that you're here, I guess I'll just have to protect you. No one will lay a finger on you!

104021020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Summon 2 Goblins.
Last Words: Put a Goblin King into your hand.
104021020.baseFlair_: With our dear king behind us, we have nothing to fear! Soldiers, attack! The time to rise is now!
104021020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
104021020.evoFlair_: If we're defeated, our dear king will make the enemy pay! So march like heroes! Make the surface-dwellers go pop!

105021020.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Follower Strike: If the enemy follower has at least 5 attack, reduce damage to this follower to 0 until the end of the turn.
105021020.baseFlair_: No sense being a man if you don't go big. Giants? Dragons? Bring 'em on! No guts, no glory!
105021020.evoFlair_: I got big to be a real man. I've got no fear, and I'm happy to charge ahead. Watch out, 'cause these fists are gonna hurt!

107021010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Change an enemy follower into a Neutral follower.
Clash: Deal 4 damage to the enemy follower if it's a Neutral follower.
107021010.baseFlair_: Thou, who art chosen by the heavens—I shall assist thee in forging a new path. If thou seek'st chaos, make malice. If thou seek'st balance, make benevolence.
107021010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
107021010.evoFlair_: I shall grant thee my strength. Ne'ertheless, thy fate is for thee to choose—to grasp with thine own hands. Forge thy destiny, and leave thy mark in history!

114021020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give +1/+1 to another allied follower. If there are any Natura cards in your hand, give +2/+2 instead.
114021020.baseFlair_: They say hunger is the best spice, so everybody dig in! Don't mind me! The feast I'm looking forward to comes afterward!
114021020.evoFlair_: A full heart is just as good as a full belly, and seeing your smiling faces fills me up to the brim! Thank you so much—this is the best meal I've ever had!

115021010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Give all other allied followers Ward.
Whenever another allied follower comes into play, give it Ward.
115021010.baseFlair_: Ladies and gentlemen, it's the moment you've all been waiting for! A clash between the eight realms! Whose hopes and dreams will spur them on to victory? I'm here to give you the blow-by-blow for every nail-biting second of the action!
115021010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
115021010.evoFlair_: Looks like the challenger blew in—I mean, the challenger in blue—just got a second wind! How offensive! Uh, no, I mean... What a strong offensive! Our boy in red is all roped up! No, wait—he's on the ropes! Urgh... Sorry about that, folks. I'm not monkeying around here, I swear!

118021020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Draw 2 cards.
Once on each of your turns, when this follower's attack or defense is increased by an effect, recover 3 play points.
118021020.baseFlair_: Bzzt! Zing! Cracka-boom! You getting a kick outta my supercharged rock yet? Huh? You think I'm a talentless grandstander? No way, buddy—I'm the real deal!
118021020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
118021020.evoFlair_: Doodley, doodley, dee... Gotta get in more practice if I'm gonna play a tune right... But just you wait—I'll knock your socks off with real music instead of electrical shock one day!

101031020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Give +1/+0 to all allied followers.
At the start of your turn, all allied followers gain +1/+0.
101031020.baseFlair_: Those who follow the path of the wind shall walk in its divine protection. Blessed be the newly chosen guardians of the wind's sacred land!
101031020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
101031020.evoFlair_: Let us whip up winds to bind heaven and earth together as one. With my tempests I will lay waste to evil; with gentle zephyrs I will breathe life back into the children of the world!

103031030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to all other followers that cost 2 play points or more. Deal 2 damage to all followers that cost 1 play point or less.
103031030.baseFlair_: Never have the cursed demons crawled out of their burrows in such numbers. If they aren't dispensed with quickly, innocent villagers will pay the price.
103031030.evoFlair_: You demon spawn who dared to assault my homeland... I will not rest until you've tasted the same suffering. My blades will dance until every last one of you succumbs to despair.

105031020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Draw a card. Give +1/+1 to an allied follower.
105031020.baseFlair_: I'm Alice's cat, but I'm a babe too! So feel safe leaving me in charge—I'll do a babe-a-licious job!
105031020.evoFlair_: Huh, why am I blushing? I'm not! I'm not embarrassed. I can be a babe, but I'm a classy lady too!

105031030.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Deal 3 damage to an enemy if you have at least 3 other Neutral cards in your hand.
105031030.baseFlair_: In the age of the gods, a war scorched the skies and left the earth aflame. One intrepid warrior stood amidst the chaos to lead the military forces and defend his ancestral lands.
105031030.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
105031030.evoFlair_: In the age of the gods, an intrepid warrior charged ahead. He won fame throughout the land by striking off the heads of countless foes. Ready to fulfill his destiny, he glares down the shaft of an arrow nocked to his iron bow.

106031020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Gain the following effect: At the end of your turn, deal 2 damage to a random enemy. Do this 2 times.
106031020.baseFlair_: Good? Evil? Like I care. After all, nothing's worse than an ordinary melody! The sound I play is neither good nor evil. It's somewhere in between light and dark—the twilight's melody!
106031020.evoFlair_: Songs about heroes, songs about despair—they're so plain and lifeless! The rhythm I'm after is nothing like that! My twilight melody will go beyond the fate of gods!

106031030.baseEffect_:
Ward.
At the end of your turn, gain +2/+0.
Follower Strike: Deal X damage to the enemy follower before it can deal any damage in return. X equals this follower's attack.
106031030.baseFlair_: We were following its round hoofprints, trailing its melodious call. And then there it was—the golden beast. I let loose a thousand emotions in a single arrow, but the beast reflected the shot... right into my chest. —Qilin Hunter's Diary, last paragraph
106031030.evoFlair_: We've learned a lot from that hunter's death. It is not a creature to be hunted but a being to be exalted. Wickedness begets wickedness; goodness begets goodness. This is the true nature of the golden beast. —The Cult of Qilin, Chapter 1

110031020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give +3/+0 to a follower. Give that follower Strike: Deal 3 damage to this follower.
110031020.baseFlair_: Lovely little beastie, this pup. She'll be the one to decide your fate.
110031020.evoFlair_: Flee in desperation. The pain will hunt you—twist you—until you meet your immaculate end.

117031010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put into your hand copies of the 3 left-most cards in your hand, in the order they were added.
117031010.baseFlair_: The Star shines on all, an emblem of hope. The path of countless twinkling lights she lays out guides travelers in search of their dearest dreams. The lost need only look up to the night sky, and they will find their hopes restored.
117031010.evoFlair_: She is the ruler of the twilight sky, looking down upon the works of mortalkind. Though she governs the stars, what lies beneath them is beyond her ken. She merely observes, smiling on the mortals' light-blessed faces.

117031020.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Add 1 to the cost of all non-follower cards in your opponent's hand until the start of your next turn.
117031020.baseFlair_: There is not a soul on this earth without sin. I too am without exception. Come, O Lord! Sound the harps and let judgment rain down upon all creation.
117031020.evoEffect_:
Ward.
Evolve: Increase your leader's maximum defense by 5. Restore 5 defense to your leader.
117031020.evoFlair_: Perhaps a soul untouched by sin exists somewhere, a precious life that deserves to be spared. But that is neither you nor I. Let us go swiftly—our doom awaits.

106041010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give your leader the following effect - The next time you play a follower with Fanfare effects (excluding Choose and targeted effects), repeat those effects. (This effect is not stackable.)
106041010.baseFlair_: He is the trickster, mayhem incarnate. A shrewd, bizarre, and yet indispensable impostor. He vows to the quiet twilight, laughing at his confinement. —Twilight's Child, preface
106041010.evoFlair_: An eternity spent idle; demise, a mere game. Kill a god? A poem on his lips. Revenge? A performance. With deliverance and disfigurement, now the twilight begins. —Twilight's Child, final chapter

110041010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If there are no duplicate cards in your deck (excluding Mjerrabaine, Omen of One), give your leader the following effect - At the end of your turn, if only one allied follower is in play, give +2/+2 to a random allied follower, deal 2 damage to a random enemy follower, and deal 2 damage to the enemy leader. (This effect is not stackable and lasts for the rest of the match.)
110041010.baseFlair_: This plane is not a singularity; it is an aggregate. Beasts of land, sea, and air; angels, demons, and children of men; even ancients—everything is part of the same whole. Therefore stand by your own will—and I shall see the world put to trial.
110041010.evoFlair_: Do not assemble or congregate. Do not gather or herd. You are a fraction of the ubiquitous whole; you were born to exercise your free will—and I shall see the world put to trial thusly.

900041010.baseFlair_: In the Ninth Circle of Hell, treacherous souls are trapped in ice. I am the lord of this frozen Hell, entrusted with judging those stained by guilt.
900041010.evoFlair_: Those imprisoned in the river of grief must be purged of their guilt, and the purge must continue for all eternity. This is no place for pardons or for the merciful release of death.

900041060.baseEffect_:
Storm.
Fanfare: Banish all enemy amulets.
900041060.baseFlair_:
The eighth circle: Fraud.
For the ten types of transgressors, ten castigations await.
900041060.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
900041060.evoFlair_:
The ninth circle: Cocytus.
Our emperor, the first to have fallen, is enthroned where all punishment originates. Where all sin expires.

900041140.baseEffect_:
Storm.
Strike: The next time this follower takes damage, reduce that damage to 0. Rally (20): Gain the following effect - Can attack 2 times per turn. Rally (40): Evolve this follower.
Can't be evolved using evolution points. (Can be evolved using card effects.)
900041140.baseFlair_: One day, a skyfarer who stands against all calamity shall bond with powers eternal. Upon donning the garments worthy of the ten Eternals themselves, the skies will recognize a new legend.
900041140.evoEffect_:
Storm.
Strike: The next time this follower takes damage, reduce that damage to 0. Rally (20): Gain the following effect - Can attack 2 times per turn.
900041140.evoFlair_: One rift from which two fiery crowns blaze. Three tigers howl, opening the four corners of the sky. Five souls descend, bestowing mercy on the six ruined lands. Hark! Seven stars shine on eight souls crossing over the nine realms. Lo, ten wolves herald the true hero’s ascension.

102014030.baseEffect_:
Destroy an enemy follower.
Deal 2 damage to the enemy leader.
102014030.baseFlair_: There is no applause for the dance of death.

101024030.baseEffect_: Destroy an enemy follower or amulet.
101024030.baseFlair_: They say your curses come back to haunt you many times over. But that's not always so when their target's dead.

103024010.baseEffect_:
Destroy an enemy follower.
Enhance (8): Then put a Servant of Darkness into your hand.
103024010.baseFlair_: This power freezes teardrops and screams alike.

108024010.baseEffect_:
Destroy a random enemy follower with the highest attack in play.
Enhance (8): Then deal 3 damage to the enemy leader.
108024010.baseFlair_: Penance can wait. It's time to scream.

111034010.baseEffect_:
Whenever an allied follower evolves, if only 1 allied follower is in play, change the cost of this card to 3.
----------
Destroy an enemy follower or amulet.
111034010.baseFlair_:
You are your own god.
Solitude is proof of power.

119044010.baseEffect_:
Choose: Use play points equal to this card's cost and play this card as a Gran's Resolve or Djeeta's Determination.
Super Skybound Art (15): Summon a Gran & Djeeta, Eternal Heroes instead.
119044010.baseFlair_: We'll go beyond the sky, to the promised land.

112032010.baseEffect_:
Invocation: At the end of your turn, if you have at least 5 play points and an allied Heaven's Gate is not in play, invoke this card.
Until this amulet leaves play, both leaders have the following effect: At the start of your turn, subtract 3 from the cost of a random card in your hand. If there are no duplicate cards in your deck, subtract 10 instead.
112032010.baseFlair_:
"I've gone through this gate so many times, it doesn't even phase me anymore." —Lyrial, Celestial Archer
"Why exactly have you been going back and forth so much?" —Ephemera, Angelic Slacker

102011020.baseFlair_: The twin-headed giant runs rampant under the moonlit sky. Blades shatter against its steel-like hide, and arrows bounce harmlessly into the dirt.
102011020.evoFlair_: Clad in armor of steel, the twin-headed giant stalks the night. Its blood-stained armor gleams with a dark promise beneath the moon.

106011020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Change the attack of a random enemy follower with the highest attack in play to 1.
106011020.baseFlair_: How's my comely countenance? So exquisite you can't peel your eyes away, right? But don't be so surprised. Just wait—soon I'll be waxed to the max! Om-nom-nom...
106011020.evoFlair_: My face is the full moon! What do you think? So perfect you're getting weak in the knees, right? H-huh? All the green cheese has made me put on weight, you say? W-well... You're exactly right!

110011010.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (3): Give +2/+2 to an allied follower.
----------
Fanfare: Give +2/+2 to another allied follower.
110011010.baseFlair_: Hound of Culann, heaven's chosen warrior, unto you shall I bequeath my all-piercing spear, my runic magic—all I know of battle.
110011010.evoFlair_: The gods have high hopes for you, Hound. Therefore be guided by me in the arts of war. Hone your blade for the fated battle to come!

105021030.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Whenever this follower is attacked, gain +1/+1.
105021030.baseFlair_: Enter our territory if you will. But we'll provide no quarter for plunderers. Away, fangless one!
105021030.evoFlair_: Beastfolk we are, but monsters we're not. We don't swipe our claws haphazardly. So I'm chopping you in two with this mighty axe.

109021010.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Can't take more than 3 damage at a time.
109021010.baseFlair_: The day I freed Lyria... That's when I vowed to protect her with everything I have.
109021010.evoFlair_: It was a mistake to ally myself with the empire... You can throw whatever you like at me, but I won't let you lay a finger on Lyria!

112021010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Restore 6 defense to your leader.
Fanfare: Enhance (10) - Restore 10 defense instead.
112021010.baseFlair_: I'm absolutely terrible at cooking, but I understand wanting to prepare a delicious meal for someone you care about. I would be more than happy to use my heavenly palate to assist you with your own cooking! Now then, let's have a taste... Oooh momma!
112021010.evoFlair_: This... This dish! What a delicate and gentle flavor! It's not perfect, but I can sense the love that went into its preparation—simply delightful. Hehe... It makes me want to head to the kitchen right now!

101031030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Discard your hand, and gain +1/+1 for each discarded card.
101031030.baseFlair_: Yes, let me bathe in your screams of agony and despair. I am coming for you all, angels, and I will pluck every snow-white feather from your wings.
101031030.evoFlair_: Are you not honored, angels, to become prey for such a noble being as I? Go on now. Cry your last tears as you sink into hell.

101031040.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give all other allied followers the following effect until the end of the turn - Reduce damage to 0.
101031040.baseFlair_: Come, brave warrior. My shield shall protect you from harm and shall ward off the specter of defeat. I shall give you the ability to overcome endless conflict!
101031040.evoFlair_: My wisdom promises blessings greater than those of divine providence or earthly destiny! Come, you have been chosen! Fight alongside me against the forces of evil! The light of victory is set to shine upon you!

108031010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Banish an enemy amulet. Gain +3/+3 instead if there are no enemy amulets in play.
108031010.baseFlair_:
Seeking mead, seeking rivals,
he crisscrosses the earth.
His sanity slips, his heart fills
with rage, floods with hate.
—Poems of Suttungr
108031010.evoFlair_:
The grinning war god quaffing mead.
Untouchable by men, tortured by memory,
he crosses mountains, treks ranges,
yet the heavenly one remains remote.
—Poems of Suttungr

113031010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Destroy a follower. If it is an allied follower, randomly summon a copy of an allied follower that has been destroyed during this match. If it is an enemy follower, randomly summon an enemy copy of an enemy follower that has been destroyed during this match.
113031010.baseFlair_: Before those who continue to seek possibility, she reveals herself. Those who refuse to submit to the pain—she shall never abandon them. —The Goddess of Restoration, Chapter 2
113031010.evoFlair_: Before those who hinder possibility, she reveals herself. Those who would usurp freedom—she shall never forgive them. —The Goddess of Restoration, Chapter 3

115031010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Draw 3 cards. Then randomly discard 2 cards in your hand.
115031010.baseFlair_: Sorry to keep you waiting! Now Mithra's here, so have no fear! The time for blessings and protections is near!
115031010.evoEffect_: Evolve: Return an enemy follower or amulet to your opponent's hand.
115031010.evoFlair_: You know, I'd love to just grant everybody's wishes... but rules are rules! First, I've gotta test you! Don't you worry, though! Mithra has something for all the good little boys and girls who try their best!

114041010.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Bane.
Fanfare: If at least 1 allied Naterran Great Tree has been destroyed this match, gain the ability to attack 2 times per turn. If at least 3 Naterran Great Trees have been destroyed this match, give your leader the following effect - At the end of your turn, if there are no allied Viridia Magnas in play, summon a Viridia Magna, evolve it, then remove this effect. (This effect is not stackable and lasts for the rest of the match.)
114041010.baseFlair_: The aether withers, and nature dies with it—signs that our Mother has abandoned us. We must cast her aside, as all children must eventually cast aside their ancestral hearth. Naterra will be saved by the blade, and by the blade alone. —Valdain, Forest Shadow
114041010.evoFlair_: The aether glitters, and nature is its reflection—signs that our Mother has blessed us. We must treat her with grace, as all children must venerate their progenitors. Naterra will be saved by peace, and by peace alone. —Bayleon, Forest King

114041020.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Give your leader the following effect - At the end of your sixth, ninth, and twelfth turns, restore 2 defense to your leader. At the end of your seventh, tenth, and thirteenth turns, give +1/+0 to all allied followers. At the end of your eighth, eleventh, and fourteenth turns, deal 4 damage to the enemy leader. (This effect is not stackable and lasts for the rest of the match.)
114041020.baseFlair_: The avatar of destruction descends in answer to your prayers, the divine spear Trishula clasped in one hand, third eye slumbering upon his brow. Behold the incarnation of immutable power, sole savior of the cosmos.
114041020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
114041020.evoFlair_: When his third eye opens, it will bathe the world in purifying light. Flames will descend in defense of virtue. They are the pitiless flames of salvation, setting creation alight and returning it to nothingness.

117041010.baseEffect_:
Invocation: At the start of your tenth turn, invoke this card. Then, evolve it.
----------
Fanfare: Restore 5 defense to your leader. If your leader had 14 defense or less before defense was restored, draw 2 cards and randomly destroy 1 of the enemy followers with the highest attack in play.
Can't be evolved using evolution points. (Can be evolved using card effects.)
117041010.baseFlair_: The World is an open palm, an author of perfection. Creation is an inevitability that halts for none.
117041010.evoEffect_: Strike: Give your leader the following effect - At the end of your turn, deal 4 damage to all allies and enemies. (This effect is not stackable and lasts for the rest of the match.)
117041010.evoFlair_: The end is imperfection, the portent of creation. All was crafted by The World's hand—and by that same hand all shall be undone.

900041020.baseFlair_: Jet-black thunderbolts pounded the battlefield, tearing the white-winged to pieces in an instant.
900041020.evoFlair_: The wings of a thousand angels were clipped, the servants of the heavens were torn to shreds, and yet the demon general only bellowed, his rage unsated.

900041080.baseFlair_:
The fourth circle: Greed.
The corrupted and avaricious will go mad from the sway of the disparaging sea.
900041080.evoFlair_:
The ninth circle: Cocytus.
Our emperor, the usurper, is enthroned where all punishment originates. Where all sin expires.

900041120.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give the enemy leader the following effect - At the start of your next turn, discard a random card from your hand.
900041120.baseFlair_:
The first circle: Limbo.
Their prayers echoing across vast nothingness, all that stretches before those that cling to hope is hollow eternity,
900041120.evoFlair_:
The ninth circle: Cocytus.
Our emperor, born of flame, is enthroned where all punishment originates. Where all sin expires.

102014040.baseFlair_: Sure there's a shortcut to learning the magical arts! Read tons of spell books to pick up knowledge!

116014010.baseEffect_: Draw 3 cards. Then deal X damage to an enemy follower. X equals the number of cards in your hand.
116014010.baseFlair_: Criminals use implements of violence to pierce the hearts of their victims. Detectives use implements of logic to pierce the heart of the truth.

117023010.baseEffect_:
Countdown (2)
Fanfare: Put a random follower that originally costs at least 9 play points from your deck into your hand. If any other allied Titanic Showdowns are in play, recover 4 play points and banish this amulet.
Last Words: At the start of your next turn, put 5 random followers that originally cost at least 9 play points from your hand into play.
117023010.baseFlair_: Course a grudge match between titans is a disaster waiting to happen. But for the bookmakers and street vendors, it's an opportunity waiting to happen.

116033010.baseEffect_:
Countdown (3)
Fanfare: Banish an enemy amulet.
At the end of your turn, banish a random enemy follower.
116033010.baseFlair_: "None of it was me," the hero grimaced. "This sword, it's the one responsible for everything." After all, a god's blade fells only a god's enemies. It pays no heed to the will of its human wielder.

102011010.baseFlair_: When the great beast took its first step, a hundred soldiers were dispersed like leaves in the wind.
102011010.evoFlair_: When the great beast took its second step, a thousand soldiers were scattered like startled birds.

106021030.baseEffect_: Clash: Until the end of the opponent's turn, this follower can't take more than 3 damage at a time.
106021030.baseFlair_:
Killin' a giant takes
a hundred swords,
ten hundred arrows,
and ten thousand lives.
—Terrifying Giants, folk song
106021030.evoFlair_:
But killin' a giant takes
guts, glory,
and gettin' ready to die.
—Terrifying Giants, folk song

110021010.baseEffect_:
Can only attack the enemy leader.
Ignore Ward.
110021010.baseFlair_: A martial artist knows to target the joints in the armor to shatter it. A monster merely tramples it underfoot, without even realizing it was steel.
110021010.evoFlair_: The martial artist's path leads to knowledge: knowledge of the body, its workings, and its weaknesses. But wisdom is a fragile, flighty thing, liable to desert us in moments of mortal peril.

111021010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give another unevolved allied follower the ability to evolve for 0 evolution points.
111021010.baseFlair_: My name's Reina. Another Reina. I'm not quite the Reina you know... but I'm here to help you out!
111021010.evoFlair_: Really, we never should have met. That's why we'll have to part someday. It's a lonely thought... but I'm not scared. You're on an amazing journey and I'm excited for you!

104031010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Select an allied follower that has attacked this turn and is no longer able to attack. Fully restore its defense and the ability to attack.
104031010.baseFlair_: With this harp granted to me by the gods, I'll play a song of blessings. I'm sure my heartwarming melodies will bring peace to you as well.
104031010.evoFlair_: As the chosen harpist of the gods, I'll bring the melodies of paradise to those who suffer. Though the notes are still but a whisper, I believe they'll reach every corner of this world in time.

111031020.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (4): Summon 2 Minotaurs.
----------
Ward.
Whenever this follower is attacked, gain +0/+2.
111031020.baseFlair_:
Minotaur Captain: When this battle is over, I'm gonna get married.
