Minotaur Soldier: I'll bring the Captain back safe and sound, no matter what it takes!
111031020.evoFlair_:
Minotaur Captain: I'm gonna be a father soon.
Minotaur Soldier 1: Everybody, cover the Captain!
Minotaur Soldier 2: Let's get him back home to his kid!

116031020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 5 damage to the enemy leader. If this is your tenth turn or later, deal 5 damage to all enemies instead.
116031020.baseFlair_:
Add a little gas and the spark becomes flame. So what happens when you punch up the flame?
—Cheeky Demon's Inquiry
116031020.evoFlair_:
Agitate the fire enough and you've got a hefty boom on your hands. So what happens when you punch up that boom?
—Cheeky Demon's Inquiry

101041010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give +4/+3 to an allied follower.
101041010.baseFlair_: One of the four mighty archangels who serve as divine messengers. Gabriel's benevolent smile will lead humanity to ever greater heights.
101041010.evoFlair_: The archangel Gabriel's soul is as pure and white as her wings. As a divine representative, she presents the chosen one with new power in the form of a legendary sword.

103041020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Neutral follower from your hand into play. Give it Rush, and return it to your hand at the end of your turn.
103041020.baseFlair_: The delicate angel reigns over the sky. Though she may look innocent, her unholy rivals quiver when she launches a flurry of light-beam arrows from her star staff.
103041020.evoFlair_: “Attack,” whispers the pure angel. A troop of valkyries fills the sky at her command and descends to drive away the wicked.

106041020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a follower that originally costs 7 play points or less from your hand into play and destroy it. Deal X damage to a random enemy follower. If no enemy followers are in play, deal X damage to the enemy leader instead. X equals the attack of that follower.
106041020.baseFlair_: Stars do more than sit in their heavenly thrones and shine. Part of our might lies in descending to the earth and rending it. You beings with bellies on the ground, I implore you to swear your allegiance to me.
106041020.evoFlair_: Stars don't always guide their observers to brilliant futures. No, death, despair, fear—these are their true predictions. You beings who pray to the heavens, offer your fear to the light.

108041010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Give your leader the following effects.
-Followers can't be played.
-Whenever you play a spell, draw a card.
-Whenever you play an amulet, deal 2 damage to the enemy leader.
(These effects last until this follower leaves play.)
108041010.baseFlair_: Is it a god, or it is a demon? Nay, it is neither, and it cannot be compared to any other being. It is the origin, and it is the end. That which begins the world, and that which ends it.
108041010.evoFlair_: That which differs from all else in the world. That which transcends all else in the world. Great gods and dread demons bow their heads before it.

110041020.baseEffect_:
Ambush.
Drain.
Fanfare: Give +2/+0 to all other allied followers.
At the start of your turn, if this is your tenth turn or later, both players draw 5 cards.
110041020.baseFlair_: Greetings, you adorable little soul. The world just laughs so innocently—makes me want to gobble it all up. When boys finally learn the bitterness inherent in yearning, that's when they ripen into men. Oh! Shall I put the world to the same trial?
110041020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
110041020.evoFlair_: This passion is lovely, don't you think? Hurry and swallow it, just as your yearning commands. No one will ever touch you again; that privilege will belong only to me. Oh! Shall I put the world to the same trial?

111041020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Randomly put 2 different Basic cards from the enemy leader's class into your hand and subtract 3 from their costs.
111041020.baseFlair_:
Realign reality. Alter the axiom, and converge a realm anew.
Realize the inconceivable, and alter destiny.
For once upon a time, man could only gaze up at the earth. —Opening lines from The Almanack
111041020.evoFlair_:
Hell loomed above the heavens, for the heavens lay at the ends of the earth.
We trod the clouds, we floated through the sky.
That has changed everything.
—Final lines from The Almanack

112041020.baseEffect_:
Storm.
Invocation: At the start of your tenth turn or later, if at least 6 allied followers have evolved this match, invoke this card.
Follower Strike: Deal X damage to the enemy follower before it can deal any damage in return. X equals this follower's attack.
112041020.baseFlair_: Ragnarok approaches from the depths of time. The einherjar summoned by the heavenly maidens thirst for battle. The divine warlord climbs astride Sleipnir, his trusted steed, and makes for the land of destiny, the ferocious clatter of hooves echoing in his wake.
112041020.evoFlair_: Huginn reads the thoughts of the world, while Muninn perceives the memories of the world. Within the twilight, these two great birds deliver news of an unavoidable fate. Still the divine warlord chooses to descend upon the battlefield to face his enemies.

115041010.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Give all other allies the following effect - The next time this ally takes damage, reduce that damage to 0.
115041010.baseFlair_: Time flows onward, but battle is a constant. We meet again, dauntless warrior. Once again, I shall shield you from defeat and the suffering that besieges you!
115041010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
115041010.evoFlair_: A goddess of battle and a goddess of the shield. Someday I'd like to test which is stronger—her protection or my barrier. —Godsworn Alexiel

116041020.baseEffect_:
Fusion: Machina or Natura
----------
Fanfare: Deal X damage to an enemy follower. Put X random Machina or Natura cards from your deck into your hand. If this card is fused with a Machina and Natura card, subtract 3 from their costs. X equals the number of cards fused to this card.
116041020.baseFlair_: The world is dead and metal. Nature is lush and fertile. The soul of steel; the frame of a flower. Worlds apart, yet worlds collided. The Omnipotence forces this mergence and births inescapable battle.
116041020.evoFlair_: The mechanical yearns for progress; the natural yearns for propagation. Confrontation is inevitable. Hostility, unavoidable. No victors will walk away from the conflict, save perhaps for the very Omnipotence who designed it.

900041030.baseEffect_:
Storm.
Strike: Deal 7 damage to all enemies.
900041030.baseFlair_: We are two, and we are one. May we never be separated again. May this world—riven into gods and demons—be united again.
900041030.evoFlair_: The world is full of contradictions. Destruction and rebirth. Desire and despair. Love and hate. I am a mixture of all these things, given form in the present. Now, would you like to be burned? Or frozen? Or both?

900041130.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, deal 7 damage to the enemy leader.
900041130.baseFlair_:
The third circle: Gluttony.
Eat or be eaten. This is the law of Hell.
900041130.evoEffect_: At the end of your turn, deal 9 damage to the enemy leader.
900041130.evoFlair_:
The ninth circle: Cocytus.
Our emperor, the trial-bringer, is enthroned where all punishment originates. Where all sin expires.

900044010.baseEffect_: Deal 7 damage to an enemy. Restore 7 defense to your leader.
900044010.baseFlair_: My fatal blow will be the judge.

106011030.baseFlair_: "What's makin' me legs tremble?" grumbled the veteran soldier. "Well, it ain't 'cause I'm lily-livered. Just the earth rattlin', s'all."
106011030.evoEffect_: Evolve: Deal 2 damage to a random enemy follower. Do this 2 times.
106011030.evoFlair_: "No more trembling," said the knight, looking up at the mammoth. "We'll be knocked clean out of here if we stand around quakin'!"

117011010.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (2): Deal 3 damage to a random enemy follower.
----------
Fanfare: Deal 3 damage to a random enemy follower and then 3 damage to the enemy leader.
117011010.baseFlair_: Banish evil from every corner! One clean sweep of arrows will root out even the biggest, baddest evil!
117011010.evoFlair_: Just look at that piercing action, folks! One shot will banish even the most stubborn demons!

101021030.baseFlair_: The demigod-king Gilgamesh was in some ways more powerful than the gods themselves. His strength was irresistible, and he held dominion over the entire world.
101021030.evoFlair_: The demigod-king Gilgamesh was in some ways more powerful than the gods themselves. Desperate to overcome death, he descended to the underworld in search of the secret of immortality.

102031020.baseFlair_: If you seek new heights, I can help. Embrace my power, and become who you were meant to be!
102031020.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Evolve all allied followers.
Evolve effects will not activate for those followers.
102031020.evoFlair_: With my power guiding you to new heights, our victory is all but assured. I know you can do it!

104031030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 3 damage to an enemy.
104031030.baseFlair_: An embodiment of total devastation. Legends warn against challenging this mighty ogre, for those who do find themselves annihilated right along with the ground they stand on.
104031030.evoEffect_: Evolve: Deal 3 damage to an enemy.
104031030.evoFlair_: A raging force of nature and a razor-fanged disaster. None remain who can stop this fearsome beast. When it brings down its fist, countries, continents, and even worlds perish.

101041020.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, restore 4 defense to your leader.
101041020.baseFlair_: I wish to serve God. I wish to do all in my power to bring joy and prosperity to all. Humans, gods, and demons are equal, and I will use my powers to bring light to their existence.
101041020.evoEffect_: At the end of your turn, deal 4 damage to the enemy leader.
101041020.evoFlair_: I have acted against God. Banishment to an endless void awaits. Ha! Haughty gods, prepare yourselves for destruction and despair. My rebellion starts now!

102041020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Banish an enemy follower or amulet.
102041020.baseFlair_: Odin, the greatest of the gods, presided over matters of battle. From his lofty palace in Asgard, he sought to conquer the world.
102041020.evoFlair_: As the twilight begins to fall for the gods, their one-eyed father fought in the battle at Vigrid, clad in jet black armor and armed with a peerless spear.

107041010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give both leaders the following effect - At the end of your turn, draw cards equal to the attack of the strongest allied follower in play. (This effect is not stackable and lasts for the rest of the match.)
107041010.baseFlair_: A divine will, penetrating the spiral of time—his celestial inscription is universal and eternal. The sun sets, and rises to the dawn of a new life, and a new age.
107041010.evoFlair_: Time begets destruction and rebirth. Eternal peace is but a memory lost within the flow of its eternal passage. Pursue not what has been lost in its ravages, but embrace the current.

112041010.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (3): Deal 1 damage to a random enemy follower. Do this X times. X equals the number of allied Machina followers destroyed this match.
----------

113041010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Recover X play points. X equals the number of times that allied followers have evolved this match.
Once on each of your turns, when you play another follower, give it the ability to evolve for 0 evolution points.
113041010.baseFlair_: A fate determined by the gods—no different than the sealing of hope. No time to wait, only to push forward. Gods above, you may think my ambition to be nothing short of senseless. But I won't stop. Not until the very end, not until my final moment!
113041010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
113041010.evoFlair_: Locked away beyond the gate, hope awaits us. Until we reach the new world, my wings will never stop. Those who seek to hinder my ambition, prepare yourselves. This magic blade rends all creation!

900041090.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Deal X damage to your leader. X equals the number of other followers in play. Then destroy all other followers.
900041090.baseFlair_:
The sixth circle: Heresy.
Those that have traversed the righteous order of the world will be burnt to ash.
900041090.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
900041090.evoFlair_:
The ninth circle: Cocytus.
Our emperor, the beguiler, is enthroned where all punishment originates. Where all sin expires.

900011070.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Ward.
Strike: Randomly activate 1 of the following effects.
-Give +1/+0 to all allied followers.
-Restore 2 defense to your leader.
900011070.baseFlair_:
"Brofams! Time to let 'er rip!"
"This formation is undefeated back home!"
"Dudes, let's get on it! Three, two, one..."
"Yaaahooo!"

102041010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Increase your evolution points to 3.
102041010.baseFlair_: I welcome you, my new brethren in a world of chaos! Our clan's victories on the battlefield will surely be a blow to the gods.
102041010.evoFlair_: Today, my new brethren, we embark on a journey that will start with bloodshed but will one day lead us to a new world!

104041020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Restore 4 defense to your leader.
Strike: Deal 2 damage to all enemies.
104041020.baseFlair_: The task of deciding whether to pass judgment was entrusted to the most sorrowful angel of them all. To ease the suffering of those who walk the earth, she played her melodies and sang of her sorrow.
104041020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
104041020.evoFlair_: She could never eliminate all the suffering no matter how hard she tried, and she finally passed her judgment in despair. Her tears fell even as she cleaved through the sinful.

109041010.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (7): Deal 3 damage to all followers. Deal 1 damage to the enemy leader.
----------
At the end of your turn, deal 3 damage to all other followers. Deal 1 damage to the enemy leader.
109041010.baseFlair_: Summoned by an earnest plea, the dragon breaks its shackles. Its cry resonates across the sky and strikes awe into the hearts of all who hear it.
109041010.evoFlair_: Answering the call of the blue-haired girl, this dark dragon takes flight to confront a grave threat to all life. Unshackled at long last, its magnificent roar rattles the heavens.

111041010.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (3): Randomly put 4 different Cocytus cards into your deck.
----------
Fanfare: Replace your deck with a Cocytus Deck.
111041010.baseFlair_: The Heavens fall to Earth. Earth plunges into Hell. Cocytus swallows all, robbing Creation of breath and entombing it in ice. Conqueror. Serpent. Father of Lies. Being with faces innumerable—none of them true. The only certainty is this: He is the world's adversary.
111041010.evoFlair_: Part your lips to speak: Ice will take your throat, twine through your entrails. Be silent: Ice will seal your lips eternally. Blades shall rust away. Knowledge burn to cinders. Life shall be Cocytus's shivering prisoner. The only option is this: To cast this world aside.

115041020.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: Destroy all other followers except a random enemy follower with the highest attack. Then, if at least 4 followers have been destroyed this turn, summon an Imperial Mammoth.
115041020.baseFlair_: Every hundred years, the towering mammoth god gathers the strongest fighters from every realm and holds a tournament. To enter, one must possess the eight essential wills. Competitors flock to the colosseum, each for their own reason.
115041020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
115041020.evoFlair_: Every hundred years, the mammoth god's trumpeting opens wide the gates to other worlds. Victors shall rule. Losers shall serve. The clash of desires in the colosseum shall be offered up to the god.

101041030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Replace your deck with an Apocalypse Deck.
101041030.baseFlair_: The would-be usurper of Heaven, cast into the pits of Hell, has risen again in a cloak of flame. Soon this underworld king shall spark an apocalypse that paints all mortals and gods in blood.
101041030.evoFlair_: The king of the underworld and his gathered armies of darkness reveled in the coming of the day of revelation. Chaos and destruction tore through the world in a dance of madness, staining all in despair.

103041010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Destroy all other followers.
Can't attack the enemy leader if 2 or more enemy followers are in play.
103041010.baseFlair_: The supreme dragon, standing with the gods themselves. The beauty of its deep black frame overwhelms all else in creation.
103041010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
103041010.evoFlair_: The supreme dragon, standing with the gods themselves. Unsurpassed are its divine powers, and heroes dream often of its glory.

104041010.baseFlair_: The omnipotent being who in time reigned supreme over the other gods. He was born to a goddess and rebelled against his divine father.
104041010.evoFlair_: Clad in the armor of fear and wielding a radiant lightning spear, the almighty sky father illuminated the sky of dawn.

105041020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Subtract 20 from the cost of a Neutral card (excluding Queen of the Dread Sea) and a non-Neutral card in your hand. Then discard all other cards in your hand.
105041020.baseFlair_: Prostrate yourself, and vow your loyalty to me. You'll no longer thirst for what you wish for. Tell me your wishes, and then drink down mine.
105041020.evoFlair_: Where go your wishes? Your fragile dreams? Do they sink like a stone into the abyss, or do they rise like bubbles to the surface? Your actions determine all.

113041020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Randomly activate 1 of the following effects. Do this X times. X equals the number of times that allied followers have evolved this match.
-Restore 5 defense to your leader.
-Gain +3/+0 and the ability to ignore Ward.
-Gain +2/+1 and Storm.
-Gain +1/+2 and Bane.
-Gain +0/+3 and Ward.
113041020.baseFlair_: A blade of lightning rests in his grip. The same flash that would make the night sky tremble—it punishes the darkness and descends upon the land. When the threads of fate entwine at last, the final battle against the lord of purgatory shall begin.
113041020.evoFlair_: The adamantine scythe destroys all that it touches; the aegis shield defends all from destruction. When the gods supreme take to arms, the world trembles.

118041010.baseEffect_:
During your turn, when this card is added to your hand from your deck, if X is greater than 0, reveal it and subtract X from its cost. X equals the number of times that allied followers have evolved this match.
During your turn, whenever an allied follower evolves, subtract 1 from the cost of this card.
----------
Can't be targeted by enemy effects or attacked.
118041010.baseFlair_: The gods pride themselves on their immortality, always brimming with hope and promise. But that arrogance will be their undoing. An apocalypse is coming, and I will be the one to lead it.
118041010.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Deal 3 damage to all enemies.
Can't be targeted by enemy effects or attacked.
118041010.evoFlair_: I subsist even as I fall beneath the mortal world. If the gods should remain as they are, then I shall one day climb out of this infernal abyss and purge the heavens of all pride. No matter how far up you go, there is no paradise among us.

119041010.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (5): Deal 4 damage to all followers. Give your leader the following effect until the end of the turn: Allied followers, spells, and effects deal +1 damage.
----------
Fanfare: Deal a pool of 12 damage divided between all other followers and the enemy leader. First deal damage to allied followers equal to their defense in the order they came into play. Then do the same for enemy followers. If any damage is left in the pool afterward, deal it to the enemy leader.
119041010.baseFlair_: The supreme dragon governs all creation. Its dark wings unfurl protectively over a world abandoned by its creators. The dragon's destructive force also heralds rebirth; thus does all life cycle, until it journeys to the sky and the stars beyond.
119041010.evoFlair_: The supreme dragon governs destruction and creation. Its divine will endures in perpetuity, unknown to man no matter how the ages pass. Yet the mysteries of creation are entrusted to them: tiny pinpricks of hope that dwell within their ephemeral forms.

900044020.baseEffect_: Deal damage to the enemy leader until their defense drops to 1.
900044020.baseFlair_: Your fate's reached the end of its thread.

108634010.baseEffect_:
Deal 1 damage to both leaders.
Summon a Forest Bat for both leaders.
108634010.baseFlair_: Hey, can I make you my bloodkin too? —Vania, Vampire Princess

900634020.baseEffect_: Deal 3 damage to the enemy leader.
900634020.baseFlair_: Finally... Allow me to revel in this battle. I feel most alive when dancing between life and death—I want for nothing else! Come, waltz with me. Lose yourself in the thrill. I do hope you won't give me a lackluster performance.

900634030.baseFlair_: I shall join the fray. Even if it does worry me so... You see—fragile is the steel flower which wilts upon a single screw. Rough treatment just doesn't become me. Sigh. I suppose I'll just have to rise past all that. And enjoy what life I've got left.

109623010.baseEffect_:
If you have at least 2 play points, Choose: Play this card as a Night Fall or Madness Revealed.
----------
Countdown (1)
Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to your leader.
Last Words: Draw a card.
109623010.baseFlair_: Just as sleep finds itself wrapped in dreams, you are embraced by the night. If you cower in fear of the darkness, the night will forgive your transgressions. But, alas, you seem none the wiser of its terrors—and there is only one end suitable for the ignorant.

101611040.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to both leaders.
101611040.baseFlair_: A shadow born from human hatred. This parasite warps the spirit and then feeds on it, sapping life force to boost its own dark power.
101611040.evoFlair_: As long as hatred remains in the world, dark shadows will grow ever longer and more powerful. They will one day manifest as a pure terror condemning all light and hope to the darkness.

117611020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to your leader.
Last Words: Give +1/+1 to a random allied follower.
117611020.baseFlair_: I'll let you bloodsuckers in on a secret. Humans may be weak, but we don't fly solo. Mankind stands united, and that spells your inevitable doom.
117611020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
117611020.evoFlair_: I'm not naive. I know one arrow isn't going to faze you fiends. But if you think that's going to stop me from letting off these bolts, think again.

119611010.baseEffect_:
Drain.
Fanfare: If Wrath is not active for you, deal 1 damage to your leader. Otherwise, gain +2/+2 and Rush.
119611010.baseFlair_: Has the kiss of my rapier sated your desire? Or do you perhaps want more? Come closer, and I'll make you blush from head to toe.
119611010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
119611010.evoFlair_: My blade aches with desire for you, even now. Ahh, we drank deep did we not? Or was it the other way around? One thing led to another, and now it's all flown out of my head.

900611010.baseFlair_: A shadow moves soundlessly through the black night, seeking out its master's enemies.
900611010.evoFlair_: A fanged shadow glides soundlessly through the black night, its master's enemies in sight.

900611020.baseFlair_:
"It doesn't look very tasty."
"Not worth the effort to kill it."
"I don't think so either—but let's go ahead and do it in!"
—The three gorgon sisters
900611020.evoFlair_:
"It looks gross. I'll pass."
"I have no interest in it either, I'm afraid."
"Okay! Well, then leave it to my little pet!"
—The three gorgon sisters

101621060.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Gain +1/+1 if Vengeance is active for you.
101621060.baseFlair_: Only a bloodbath of unforgettable proportions will be enough to awaken this demonsword. So I'll kill and kill some more.
101621060.evoFlair_: The tide of blood and death is rising, and the time of the blade's awakening is upon us. So let us continue the slaughter until rivers of blood flow beneath mountains of flesh!

108621010.baseEffect_: If you have at least 5 play points, Choose: Play this card as a Buller, Saintly Maiden or Buller, Dark Maiden.
108621010.baseFlair_: My wings' true form lies somewhere in the middle. I am a saintly maiden—yet so too am I a maiden of darkness.
108621010.evoFlair_: "A pact of white, and pact of ebon. In this moment destiny is mine to select!" "Mrrrow now, what are you getting yourself into?"

110621020.baseEffect_:
Strike: Deal 1 damage to your leader.
Last Words: Deal 1 damage to the enemy leader.
110621020.baseFlair_: Go forth and convulse en masse, for love is but an illusion, a ravenous phantom that endlessly devours reason. Cast down this adoration, discrimination, and division.
110621020.evoFlair_:
The Second Provision: Love Not
Inamorato, inamorata—the greater the affection, the greater the hindrance to our cause. Know your fellows not as lovers but as partners. —Teachings from the Manor of Lust

115621030.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: If there are at least 4 enemy cards in play, gain the ability to evolve for 0 evolution points.
Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Gain +5/+5 and Bane.
115621030.baseFlair_: My first battle was waged in vengeance against the goblins. Next, I plunged into the fray as an agent. If never-ending battle is my lot, then let my blade be the bane of a thousand fiends!
115621030.evoEffect_: Evolve: Destroy an enemy follower with X defense or less. X equals 20 minus your leader's defense.
115621030.evoFlair_:
Teena: I'm worried about Lucius. He's always throwing himself into dangerous situations...

Feena: Yeah, I really wish he'd settle down a bit.

103614010.baseEffect_:
Give an allied follower Rush.
Enhance (4): Then give it +2/+2.
103614010.baseFlair_: Oh! This axe is delighted to finally taste blood!

102624030.baseEffect_: Summon X Forest Bats and deal X damage to your leader. X equals the number of enemy followers in play.
102624030.baseFlair_: When precious blood is offered, creatures of the night spawn from the shadows.

105624010.baseEffect_: Select an allied Neutral follower. Whenever that follower attacks an enemy follower, destroy the enemy follower before it can deal any damage in return until the end of the turn.
105624010.baseFlair_: Grandmother used to be more scary than hairy. —Maisy, Red Riding Hood

108624010.baseEffect_: Give an allied follower +1/+0 until the end of the turn. Summon a Forest Bat if it's a Bloodcraft follower.
108624010.baseFlair_: Your blood's not worth a suck.

111624010.baseEffect_:
Deal 2 damage to an enemy follower.
Restore 1 defense to both leaders.
111624010.baseFlair_: Close your eyes, and plant your seeds in the sea of compassion.

114624010.baseEffect_:
Put a Naterran Great Tree into your hand.
If this is your fifth turn or later, recover 1 play point.
Then, if this is your tenth turn or later, deal 3 damage to the enemy leader and restore 3 defense to your leader.
114624010.baseFlair_:
The Mother bestows gifts upon her children.
When the nightwalker discovered her kindness in his manor, he saw a mad, ardent aether. He soon learned that it grants power to those who easily succumb to insanity.

118624010.baseEffect_: Destroy an enemy follower that costs 3 play points or less.
118624010.baseFlair_:
You're going to die anyway—you may as well amuse me.
—Bloodhungry Matriarch

713624020.baseEffect_: Destroy an enemy follower that costs 3 play points or less.
713624020.baseFlair_:
Everything for my Katalina.
—Vira, Knight Fanatic

115634010.baseEffect_:
Deal 1 damage to your leader.
Draw a card.
If an allied Naterran Great Tree is in play, restore 2 defense to your leader and recover 1 play point.
115634010.baseFlair_: If that vampire poses even the slightest threat to the people, the danger cannot be ignored. What bothers me is that uncanny. Power. What is... Ah. It brings. Understanding. Of madness. —Vampire hunter's scrawled journal entry

117634010.baseEffect_:
Summon a Forest Bat.
If Wrath is active for you, evolve it and draw 1 card. Otherwise, deal 1 damage to your leader.
117634010.baseFlair_: An evil sound wave that bites faster than fangs ever could.

900644030.baseEffect_:
Give your leader the following effects.
-At the start of your turn, draw a card.
-At the start of your turn, lose 1 play point.
(These effects are not stackable and last for the rest of the match.)
900644030.baseFlair_:
Profit.
Profit breeds extravagance.
It is an aggregation of vanity and nonsense.
If meaningless profit is our reality, splurge it all away.

101623010.baseEffect_:
Countdown (4)
At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to both leaders.
101623010.baseFlair_: The roses of the underworld are dyed with fresh blood.

100611010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Gain +2/+0 if Vengeance is active for you.
100611010.baseFlair_: You poor thing. It must be terrible to be haunted by your fears even in your dreams. I know! I can feast on those pesky dreams while you sleep!
100611010.evoFlair_: How dreadfully delightful—consumed by the horrors of your own dreamscape. Why don't you let me devour your delicious nightmares? I won't leave anything behind, but at least you won't suffer anymore.

100611020.baseFlair_: What shall I have for dinner tonight? I think it's going to have to be a human. A real live human. That's the only thing that'll satisfy my hunger. Hee-hee!
100611020.evoFlair_: Nothing tastes better than a human! So full of light! So full of life! All the emotions like love and desire! It's all so delicious!

101611010.baseEffect_: Strike: Deal 1 damage to both leaders.
101611010.baseFlair_: Don't you just look like a bundle of fun. How about you and me skip right to the chase, hmm? Oh, and we don't need to go telling anybody what fun we got up to, do we now?
101611010.evoFlair_: I can think of all kinds of ways to keep myself busy with you. Now close those pretty little eyes of yours and don't... move... a muscle...

101611020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Gain Bane if Vengeance is active for you.
101611020.baseFlair_: Venomous blood gushes forth from the wounded scales. If the serpent is to be defeated, it must be done in a single blow.
101611020.evoFlair_: The serpent's blood burns through flesh, bone, and iron alike. The beast must be eradicated, else a painful death awaits.

101611030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Draw a card if Vengeance is active for you.
101611030.baseFlair_: People are quick to curse me as a demon of rain, but we both know that rain can be a blessing.
101611030.evoFlair_: It's downpour after downpour. I'm starting to get the sniffles myself. Say, would you be willing to part with some of the spark in that soul of yours?

101611050.baseEffect_:
Storm.
Fanfare: Deal 2 damage to your leader.
101611050.baseFlair_: Some friendly advice. Do not make the mistake of thinking a blood wolf civil; approach one too closely and you're likely to walk away a limb or two fewer.
101611050.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
101611050.evoFlair_: Blood wolves are implacable hunters. Once they catch the scent of their prey, they will pursue it to the ends of the earth. And until they have eaten their fill of blood and meat, nothing can stop their rampage.

102611010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Gain +1/+0 and Drain if an evolved allied follower is in play.
102611010.baseFlair_: Hey, that looks like fun. Lemme in on it!
102611010.evoFlair_: Your lives are my toys! Who should I play with next?

102611040.baseEffect_: Last Words: Deal 2 damage to your leader.
102611040.baseFlair_: Snakey's a wild one. You don't want to mess with her.
102611040.evoFlair_: Snakey's a wild one. Don't let her put the squeeze on you!

103611030.baseEffect_: Whenever an enemy follower comes into play, deal 1 damage to the enemy leader.
103611030.baseFlair_: Though I'm a member of the order of the Sky Knights, I'm hardly skilled with a sword. Think of me as a scholar with a propensity for research.
103611030.evoFlair_: If I complete this research, I'll gain power beyond all human knowledge. And then I'll finally be able to complete my mission. Which mission, you ask? Well, to save as many people as possible of course!

104611020.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Deal 2 damage to your leader if Vengeance is not active for you.
104611020.baseFlair_: Stately strands of alabaster protect my home. Anything that gets entangled in it is my foe and my prey.
104611020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
104611020.evoFlair_: The strands of my web decide where you go. But should I suffocate you or suck you dry? The choice is mine.

105611030.baseEffect_: When another allied Neutral follower comes into play, this follower gains Rush.
105611030.baseFlair_: So slithy their forms! May they waltz and gimble and gambol! May their voices sound! —Poems of Unbeing
105611030.evoFlair_: Innocent as babes they pitter-patter, peculiar in shape but dearworth. —Poems of Unbeing

106611030.baseEffect_:
Bane.
Strike: Deal 1 damage to your leader.
106611030.baseFlair_: Hunting is the rite of receiving the blessings of the land. Respect the land and act with humility. Otherwise you will find yourself becoming the hunted. —Orion's Scorpion, Chapter 5
106611030.evoFlair_: Even great heroes who have felled many beasts are no match for its poison. Victims suffer from paralysis, dizziness, nausea, and severe headaches. These migraines then turn into a sleep from which the victim will never awaken. —Orion's Scorpion, Chapter 8

107611010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Enhance (5) - Gain +3/+3. Deal 2 damage to your leader if Vengeance is not active for you. Restore 2 defense to your leader if Vengeance is active for you.
107611010.baseFlair_: Looks like you need some help! Wait, w-what do you mean, you don't need me? I guess I... I really am useless, after all!
107611010.evoFlair_: Perhaps I can be of assistance? Allow me to help! Wait, I m-made it on time? No way... Uh, I'll do my best!

107611030.baseFlair_: "I'm telling y'all, it really moved! See? Here's where it bit me, right here!" — Rural Man
107611030.evoFlair_: "See? That's what I've been telling y'all this whole time! Now look what it's gone and done. Everything's been taken!" — Rural Man

109611010.baseFlair_: "These men are too easy. Isn't there something that can entertain me?" "Perhaps we could dance, milady?" "Why would I dance with a bat?"
109611010.evoFlair_: "What's the point? Everyone falls for me anyway. There's no fun in that." "How about a song then, milady?" "Isn't that just screeching?"

110611020.baseEffect_: Once on each of your turns, when your leader takes damage, gain +1/+0.
110611020.baseFlair_: You think it's cute, eh? Well what kind of adorable little varmint could live 'round these parts? Gotta be more to it than just squeezable cheeks. —Wasteland Explorer
110611020.evoFlair_:
Some beasties try to broadcast how dangerous they are, but, more often than not, it's just a performance. Not the case with this little guy.
—Wasteland Explorer

110611030.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to your leader.
Leader Strike: Restore 2 defense to both leaders after damage is dealt.
110611030.baseFlair_: Whether demonic, divine, or mundane breed, go forth and convulse en masse. It is in the confluence of our differences that we grow stronger. Cast down this odium, discrimination, and division.

110611030.evoFlair_:
The First Provision: Loathe Not
Consecrate your character, your very being, to this, the greatest cause. Look upon your fellows not as abominations but as partners.
—Teachings from the Manor of Lust

111611040.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Gain +4/+4. If Vengeance is active for you, gain +5/+5 instead.
111611040.baseFlair_: I strayed from the path. It was no accident. Every step was intentional. With this arm, no one will ever trample me again.
111611040.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
111611040.evoFlair_: I strayed from the path. Don't misunderstand—it was long before I made my pact with a demon. The wretched girl who once drank from backstreet mud puddles is gone. In her place stands a woman with power. Now I am the one to trample others underfoot!

112611010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Gain +3/+3. Deal 2 damage to the enemy leader and restore 4 defense to your leader.
During your turn, whenever another allied follower evolves, deal 1 damage to the enemy leader and restore 2 defense to your leader.
112611010.baseFlair_: I'm a failure of a pup. My ears are bad, and I can't smell very good either. But, but I can perform! I learned how to do acrobatics and jump through a flaming ring! If I can make you smile, well, that's enough for me!
112611010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
112611010.evoFlair_: You poor, sorrowful pup. I remember when you appeared before me, evidence of my sin... I have no right to be in your life. —Lunelle, Queen of Wolves

113611010.baseEffect_: Whenever an allied Serpent comes into play, change it into a Machina follower.
113611010.baseFlair_: Core mutations have led to one new discovery after another. Armored Bats synthesized with machinery soon appeared... Just as those who would control such beasts did afterward. —Secrets of Sorcery Demystified I
113611010.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Summon 2 Serpents.
Whenever an allied Serpent comes into play, change it into a Machina follower.
113611010.evoFlair_: Bats... Whoooa... So cool... But... I'm happy... Together... With my snakes, too... After all, they're everything... to me. —Gearsnake Tamer to Armored Bat

113611030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If Vengeance is not active for you, deal 2 damage to your leader. If Vengeance is active for you, deal 2 damage to the enemy leader.
113611030.baseFlair_: Abnormal figures take form in the shadows. They mimic the living, taking form through negative emotion. Even now, they lay hidden within the gaps.
113611030.evoFlair_: Some evils simply cannot die. As the demons we carry within ourselves take form once more, malice and despair writhe and wriggle into existence.

114611010.baseFlair_: Use my arrows to necrotize your enemies' bodies and bring them under my control? Understood. About your plan though. I think there's room for optimization. I'm willing to offer you a one-time-only discount. Just take a look at this updated contract...
114611010.evoFlair_: So you want me to use my magic to sow discord in the enemy camp? Understood. If you'll just sign here—that's right, in blood—we can get this contract squared away. Great. Now if you're ready, I'd like to take you through a few alternate plans...

114611030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Naterran Great Tree into your hand. If Vengeance is active for you, gain +1/+0 and Ward.
114611030.baseFlair_:
I've never seen that species before. Its wings generate some sort of light. What could that be? I have to... follow. It. This is. A great. Discovery. But. Those wings. I feel like. They are. Madness. Given form...
—Scholar's scrawled journal entry
114611030.evoFlair_:
Strange. Strange. Strange. Strange. Strange, strange bat. How odd. Why? Does my head. Feel so... strange? Wings? Strange? The madness. Won't stop.
—Twisted scrawl

115611010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to your leader. Summon a Forest Bat.
115611010.baseFlair_: The manual says no great succubus's career was built in a day. So you gotta listen to your elders and put in the elbow grease! Mmmwah! How was that, Mr. Bat? Charming enough for ya?
115611010.evoFlair_: Look at all those demons coming this way... Did my hard work finally pay off? I'm improving! Wait... they're all here to meet her, aren't they? I knew it...

115611020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If Wrath is not active for you, gain the following effect - At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to your leader and this follower. Otherwise, gain the following effect - At the end of your turn, restore 3 defense to your leader.
115611020.baseFlair_: The horned beast's meat is tough. Its flavor unfolds as you chew. You must kill it the same way. Blow after blow after blow, until it falls. —Second Berserker's Epitaph: Part 1
115611020.evoFlair_: I took my first pelt. My history is written on its skin. I will gain the beast's resilience. I will don the pelt and test my strength. —Second Berserker's Epitaph: Part 2

116611010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to your leader.
Last Words: At the start of your next turn, draw a card.
116611010.baseFlair_: You're looking for a contract... with me? Oh darling, do you know what you're getting yourself into? It'll sting. And you understand everything comes with a price tag, don't you? Hm? I'm too straitlaced to be a vampire, you say? Hah. You really think so?
116611010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
116611010.evoFlair_: Look, honey—I despise lies. I've been that way since I was mortal. Anyway, we are talking binding contracts here. These things are much nicer when both parties are interested. Now, be a dear and give me some blood. But... do tell me if it hurts.

117611010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: If Avarice is active for you, gain +0/+2 and Ward.
Fanfare: Enhance (5) - Gain +3/+3.
117611010.baseFlair_: I'm The Moon, howler of apprehension. I stand ready to defend the frightened. I'm still learning as a pup, but I eat cowardice for breakfast.
117611010.evoFlair_: With a little practice, I can crush any fears. I might be young, but I'm not afraid to howl in the moonlight. We're picky about our masters—but if you're worthy, werewolves become the perfect bodyguards.

118611010.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: If Wrath is not active for you, deal 1 damage to your leader. Otherwise, gain +1/+1 and Storm.
118611010.baseFlair_: My supersonic attacks can rend darkness itself—but this is just child's play. You sure you don't need to stop me? To be fair, I guess you can't—you'd actually have to catch me first!
118611010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
118611010.evoFlair_: My supersonic attacks are now at full throttle! Couldn't stop me after all, huh? Not that I expected you to. If you had a hard time seeing me before, I'm practically invisible now!

119611030.baseEffect_:
Bane.
Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Summon 3 Wicked Wolves. Give all allied Wicked Wolves the following effect: Reduce damage from effects to 0.
119611030.baseFlair_: It is said that they came from a barren wilderness in a distant land. Having hunted all the prey it could find there, the wolf pack was forced to find new grounds to prowl.
119611030.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
119611030.evoFlair_: The wolf developed an appetite for magical creatures. It consumed their flesh, and with their power running through its veins, it changed. It was reborn as something new, something stronger. Something far more deadly.

101621020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Summon 2 Forest Bats if Vengeance is active for you.
101621020.baseFlair_: What's that? Are you lost, little human? Hee-hee! Well you're in luck, because I love humans! You smell so good, and you really do have the sweetest blood.
101621020.evoFlair_: Mmm... Your blood's delicious! And oh-so very addictive. I wish I could become your familiar and follow you everywhere you go. Hee-hee!

101621070.baseFlair_: Want to know how I came to master the forbidden arts? Well, it all started with a demon...
101621070.evoEffect_: Evolve: Deal 3 damage to your leader.
101621070.evoFlair_: Did you like that? Hee-hee. What's not to love about forbidden magic? The energy surges through you like an intense wave of raw power! What's that? I look different all of sudden?

104621020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a random Bloodcraft follower from your deck into your hand.
104621020.baseFlair_: The goat-headed, sturdy-bodied demon warrior was also a devout priest who prayed to a dark god to summon countless demons.
104621020.evoFlair_: The demon warrior itself was mighty indeed. Armed with a trident that also served as a staff, it could wreathe a kingdom in flames and reduce it to ash with a single swing.

105621020.baseEffect_: Can't be attacked by followers with 1 attack.
105621020.baseFlair_: There was once a born liar who cried, "Wolf! Wolf!" When the townsfolk fled in fear, he burglarized their town. —Where the Liars Go, Chapter 1
105621020.evoFlair_: The boy was laughing in joy when hoofbeats began to sound. Mounted wolf-slayers had arrived, and they struck the boy down where he stood. —Where the Liars Go, final chapter

106621030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give your leader the following effect - Whenever your leader takes damage during your turn, restore 2 defense to your leader. (This effect lasts until this follower leaves play.)
106621030.baseFlair_:
It may creep in while you count sheep.
It needs no grass—your heart's its meat.
—Demon's lullaby
106621030.evoFlair_:
Nights becomes moons, and your heart now wanes.
At the nightmare's end, a husk alone remains.
—Demon's lullaby

108621020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If Vengeance is active for you, deal 1 damage to both leaders and then 2 damage to a random enemy follower.
108621020.baseFlair_: Vampire! Tainted one! My silver chains will reveal your immortality as false. Howl, my platinum chains.
108621020.evoFlair_: They wind, and snarl, and purify. Before these goddess-blessed chains, you are nothing more than prey to be hunted.

109621010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Choose - Put a Blazing Sapphire or Blazing Ruby into your hand.
109621010.baseFlair_: Join your heart with the crystals. That's right, now align them together... A path of azure and path of crimson await you. Which one calls to your heart?
109621010.evoFlair_: The crystal is merely a mirror, reflecting the colors of your heart. When it shines, your fate shall be revealed. Will you be dyed in azure or colored in red? Which will your heart choose?

112621010.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Give +X/+0 to a Bloodcraft follower in your hand. X equals the number of other allied followers in play.
112621010.baseFlair_: Sky full of clouds, air bitter and cold, and this stupid, white snow! Makes you shiver, doesn't it? That's why winter is the worst. But it's okay now! I'll keep you warm with my scorching blaze.
112621010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
112621010.evoFlair_: Sky full of clouds, air bitter and cold, breath white with frost. Numbs you to the bone, doesn't it? That's why winter is so awful. But it's okay now! I'll thaw you out, and burn away all your frozen bits!

113621010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: If Vengeance is active for you, gain +2/+0.
Last Words: Summon a Forest Bat and give it +X/+0. X equals this follower's attack.
113621010.baseFlair_: Good thing you didn't come across a real vampire, nasty creatures they are. You'd be devoured—body and soul. Lucky for you, I'm the generous type. I'll even show you a dream of divine... pleasure.
113621010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
113621010.evoFlair_:
"If I studied super hard in a dream, I might even be able to pass!"
—Lou, Mysterian Freshman
"I mean, I'll just devour it in the end..."
—Nightmare, Dreameater

115621020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If Vengeance is not active for you, deal 1 damage to your leader. Then activate Vengeance until the end of the turn even if your leader's defense is more than 10.
115621020.baseFlair_: The tusked beast's flesh reeks. It must be rubbed with herbs, then boiled repeatedly. The flavor remaining in the stench's wake stabs at the nose and stomach. —Fourth Berserker's Epitaph: Part 1
115621020.evoFlair_: With the speed of the long-clawed beast, we confounded and defeated the tusked beast. From the tusked beast, we gained piercing strength. With this, we can take a far thicker pelt... —Fourth Berserker's Epitaph: Part 2

116621020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If Avarice is active for you, gain Storm.
116621020.baseFlair_: In his arm resides demon magic. But in his fist rests a spear stained by demon blood. Though his flesh is corrupted by devilish influence, his will is to drive the devils' influence from this world.
116621020.evoFlair_: The path of vengeance is treacherous and lonely—no more than a life spent hunted by demons and shunned by humans. His arm is tainted; his soul is weary. Still he does not let go of his exalted spear, which, in the moonlight, gleams like new-fallen snow.

117621020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: If Wrath is active for you, gain +1/+4, Rush, and Drain.
Fanfare: Enhance (6) - Summon an Imp Lancer.
117621020.baseFlair_: It's long, it's fast, and it'll make you cry! Ta-da! Can I make a mean whip or what? Now that I have this baby, no one can accuse me of being just another ho-hum imp!
117621020.evoFlair_: Eeek! Moooom! I told you to knock before coming into my room! And would you stop laughing at my outfit? I'm just trying to find myself as an imp, okay?

118621010.baseEffect_:
Bane.
Once on each of your turns, when this follower's attack or defense is increased by an effect, restore X defense to your leader. X equals a random number between 1 and 6. If Vengeance is active for you, X equals 6.
118621010.baseFlair_:
Ah, so you're the standout rookie. You won on the Topaz Floor, did you not? Well, let's start with your come-out roll. Ah, but the rules here are a bit different: watch how your opponents handle themselves. Think you can win?
—Diamond Casino, Sapphire Floor
118621010.evoFlair_:
Seven out! Congratulations. Your instinct is as sharp as your eyes. Just as a photographer calibrates their lenses, the player throwing the dice calibrates their throw. Getting the measure of it all is the key to victory.
—Diamond Casino, Sapphire Floor

119621020.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: If Vengeance is active for you, gain Storm.
Fanfare: If Avarice is active for you, gain +2/+2.
119621020.baseFlair_: Hya-haa! I'm gonna be the biggest big shot there ever was! Huh? What do I mean by big? Uh, it means... Well... You know... Anyway! I'm gonna be the most free man ever! So there!
119621020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
119621020.evoFlair_: Leave that dog alone, you sniveling rat-faced skunk, or I'll chain you to my sled and drag you! Come on, Skull Jr.! Hya-haaa! The party's just getting started!

102631030.baseEffect_: Whenever an allied Forest Bat comes into play, deal 1 damage to the enemy leader.

102631030.evoFlair_: I'm here now, so everything will be okay! 'Cause I'm the best there is!

104631030.baseEffect_: If this follower can be targeted by enemy effects, your opponent can only target this follower.
104631030.baseFlair_: I'll keep you smiling. Both destiny and I can be fickle now and then, you see.
104631030.evoFlair_: I fear that the bond we share won't last forever, but all good things must come to an end.

108631020.baseEffect_:

108631020.baseFlair_: I'll stay with you all night long. If you so desire, I'll paint myself in your very color.
108631020.evoFlair_: I'll stay with you all night long. If you so desire, I'll paint the night in your very color.

111631010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give +1/+0 to a Bloodcraft follower in your hand.
111631010.baseFlair_: I'm no longer the proud demon I once was... A pitiful sight to behold, don't you think? If you'll have me though... I'll stand by your side, until this last wing is no more!
111631010.evoEffect_: Evolve: Give +1/+0 to all Bloodcraft followers in your hand.
111631010.evoFlair_: Broken. Imperfect. Surely not worthy of your glance. But if you're willing to take a chance on me, I'll muster my courage and give you everything I have!

111631020.baseEffect_: Last Words: If this follower's attack is at least 4, put a Blood Moon into your hand and change its cost to 1.
111631020.baseFlair_: Your men are but a pack of pups under the moonlight. —Waltz, King of Wolves
111631020.evoFlair_: Your transgressions and your brutality... they will not go unanswered by the moon. —The New Queen

112631020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If Vengeance is active for you, Choose - Put a Peckish Owlcat or Leoparion into your hand.
112631020.baseFlair_:
"They're disgusting... This one, that one, all of them!"
"Hah! You guys've got guts to oppose us!"
"Yep. You're all going to meet a real ugly end."
"Here it comes! Twinsoul Fusion!"
112631020.evoEffect_: Evolve: Choose - Put a Peckish Owlcat or Leoparion into your hand.
112631020.evoFlair_:
"Grrr... Why do all of these creeps keep getting in our way!?"
"Even though we fused them... They're still so disgusting!"
"Ungrateful louts. We'll scramble you!"
"You said it! Twin! Soul! Fusion!"

115631020.baseEffect_:
Drain.

115631020.baseFlair_: I'm actually pretty new to teaching. My subject is language studies, but I also know a lot about romance novels and girls' comics. Anything you need to know, just ask.
115631020.evoEffect_:
Drain.
Evolve: Deal 2 damage to all enemies.
115631020.evoFlair_: What's the subject you struggle with most? I'll clear my schedule this weekend and give you a private tutoring session. One-on-one is the best way to learn, don't you think? That way I can give you all my attention.

117631020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: If Wrath is active for you, gain the ability to evolve for 0 evolution points.
At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to your leader.
At the start of your turn, restore 2 defense to your leader.
117631020.baseFlair_: Aaah, that bleating is music to my ears. Look, I'm not here to kill you. Buuut, I'm not letting you live either. I'll break you down, fix you up, then make you love me. Love me with all your heart.
117631020.evoEffect_:
At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to your leader.
At the start of your turn, restore 2 defense to your leader.
During your turn, whenever your leader takes damage, deal 3 damage to a random enemy follower (up to 10 times per turn).
117631020.evoFlair_: I'm rather fond of humans. Fragile, but resolute. Weak, but determined. But sometimes I get a tad too excited and accidents happen... See? Now you're crying. I don't see what good it'll do you though.

118631010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Discard 2 cards. At the start of your next turn, draw 2 cards.
118631010.baseFlair_:
Well, well, look what the catfish dragged in! Will you call the bet? Raise the stakes? We're all breathless with anticipation! Remember: the real trick isn't in the cards. Now, show us what you can do!
—Diamond Casino, Ruby Floor
118631010.evoEffect_: Evolve: Randomly summon a Bullet Bike or Arcane Personnel Carrier.
118631010.evoFlair_:
Fifth street! Oh, my. I do admire a player that can keep their cool! And you even realized the entire table was in on the trick! Gambling is all about teamwork; being psychic helps too!
—Diamond Casino, Ruby Floor

Fanfare: Summon a Forest Bat.

900631010.evoFlair_: I only wish to stay with you all day, master. If you so desire, I'll relinquish the day to you.

900631020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Summon a Forest Bat.
Whenever an allied Forest Bat comes into play, deal 1 damage to the enemy leader.

900631020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
900631020.evoFlair_: I decided to stay with you all night! If you insist... then I'll stay with you till the morning!

900631030.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Evolve an allied Trill, Devilish Idol.
Last Words: Restore 2 defense to your leader.
900631030.baseFlair_:
In the shadows behind the glittering idol Trill, you will always find the two maids, Aza and Iza.
"That girl is so two-faced she's practically two different people."
"Yeah, but... she's actually pretty nice."
900631030.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
900631030.evoFlair_:
The maids serve both as Trill's honor guard and her band. They would do anything for their mistress... At least, as long as she pays their wages and keeps them in fish.
"Mm... this is good salmon."
"Trill always sets such a good table!"

900631040.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Destroy an enemy follower with 1 attack or 1 defense.
900631040.baseFlair_:
"Oppose us and you deal with our pet!"
"An owl and cat both, taste the power of two night stalkers made one!"
"Twin! Soul! Fusion!"
—Doublame, Duke and Dame
900631040.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
900631040.evoFlair_: It is both owl and cat, two beasts that were... intended to form an apex predator. But it eats rats, which is a good enough compromise. Born from a beast of the land and a bird of the sky, its hunger is now twofold. Please feed it.

900631050.baseFlair_:
"Oppose us and you deal with our pet!"
"A leopard and lion both, taste the power of two forest kings made one!"
"Twin! Soul! Fusion!"
—Doublame, Duke and Dame
900631050.evoFlair_: It is both leopard and lion, two beasts melded together to form an apex predator. Though they may have taken a new singular form, their desire to hunt remains intact. But now they move with two minds, capable of tearing through throats at twice the pace.

Ahh... Katalina...
You're always so beautiful no matter the occasion... Everything I am, it's all for you...

102632020.baseFlair_: An ancient fortress of the darkest black surrounded by countless creatures of the night. Occasionally, screams can be heard through the din of flapping wings.

100611030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 2 damage to your leader.
100611030.baseFlair_: More, I tell you! More! Heads will roll until my axe turns blunt, and then I'll chop some more!
100611030.evoFlair_: You're out of people to execute? You filthy liar! All humans will answer for the crime of existing, and I will be their judge, jury, and executioner!

101611060.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Gain +1/+0 and Ward if Vengeance is active for you.
101611060.baseFlair_: If you ever find yourself exploring a dungeon, beware of metal statues. They're ice-hearted guardians who will show you no mercy.
101611060.evoFlair_: Their glazed look has fooled many a dungeon raider into dismissing them as harmless. Never ever turn your back on one.

101611070.baseFlair_: Roll up, roll up! Get ya front-row seat to the slaughterhouse show of a lifetime, hosted by this pint-sized imp 'erself! Mind ya, don't lean in too close, though. Lethal accidents do happen on occasion! Hee-hee.
101611070.evoFlair_: What better night for a slaughter than one lit by a blood-drenched full moon! I promise you'll love it to death. 'Ang on a minute. Didn't I just kill you? Hey, get back 'ere!

101611110.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Gain Drain if Vengeance is active for you.
101611110.baseFlair_: My demon claw yearns for blood, so I'll have to take your life. It's nothing personal.
101611110.evoFlair_: Do you see? It throbs with hunger! Please, let it sink into your desperate face! Let it steep its fingers in the warmth of your lifeblood.

101611130.baseFlair_: Yes, yes! More! Oh, is that all you have? But I was so enjoying myself. If that's all the fun you can offer, I'll just have to kill you.
101611130.evoFlair_: That's more like it! I think it's time to kick this up a notch, don't you agree? Don't go dying too quickly, you hear? Ah-ha-ha!

101611140.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, deal 2 damage to the enemy leader if their defense is higher than yours.
101611140.baseFlair_: It's no use trying to hide it. I can see it all over your face—you're dreaming of us together in paradise. Tee-hee. I do like the shy ones.
101611140.evoFlair_: Hmm, you are a shy one. Don't worry, I won't bite—much. Tee-hee, we'll do things you only dreamed of. And some you didn't.

102611020.baseEffect_: Whenever another follower evolves, deal 1 damage to the enemy leader and restore 1 defense to your leader.
102611020.baseFlair_: They're all bright and pretty like people souls...
102611020.evoFlair_: Now I'm strong and sparkly too. Hurray...

103611050.baseEffect_:
Bane.

103611050.baseFlair_: The woods around here belong to wolfmen. If you see bite marks or scratches on the trees, turn back. There's no reasoning with a beast once you're inside its territory.
103611050.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
103611050.evoFlair_: Wolfmen can use their impressive claws to take down monsters many times larger than themselves. If you ever come across monster carcasses with their throats ripped out, that's the work of wolfmen.

104611040.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, gain +1/+0.
104611040.baseFlair_: I wanted to fly from the time I was a tadpole, and the gods eventually gave me these wings. I'm happy about that, but I lost the most beloved thing in my life. I no longer have a purpose or reason to live. What am I supposed to do now?
104611040.evoFlair_: Eureka! At last! An answer! I don't need a purpose or reason to live, because I'm as free as the sky itself. There's nothing I can't do.

105611010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Gain Ward if an enemy follower is in play. Gain +2/+0 and deal 2 damage to your leader if no enemy followers are in play.
105611010.baseFlair_: Humph! It's not like I care about you!
105611010.evoFlair_: Humph! Don't—don't get any ideas! I'm not going to help you fight your stupid enemies!

106611020.baseEffect_:
Ward.

106611020.evoFlair_: If you run into that thing, you better start praying. But none of that "save me" crap. No, you'll wanna pray that it kills you quickly in a single bite. —Prospector's teachings

107611020.baseFlair_: If you were able to tame a magical wolf, it would bite the hands of your foes; there's no better friend to have on the battlefield. —"Wolves," The Monster Encyclopedia, Chapter 4
107611020.evoFlair_: If you know what they want and are able to provide it for them, magical wolves can be fiercely loyal hunters for their partners. —"Wolves," The Monster Encyclopedia, Chapter 5

108611010.evoFlair_: None can escape from the dream. None can run from it. Now let me color you something altogether new.

—Letter from a joyfully victorious city

101621010.baseEffect_: Can only attack if Vengeance is active for you.
101621010.baseFlair_: Loyalty... Justice... I used to believe in such things, but I was a naive fool. Such lofty concepts are nothing but a hindrance on the battlefield.
101621010.evoFlair_: See? I once pledged undying loyalty to my king, yet now I have the strength to fell him with one blow! Ha-ha-ha-ha!

101621030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give +1/+0 to allied Forest Bats.
101621030.baseFlair_: I'm sooo tired of being stuck inside! And what's wrong with having a little fun on a night like this when the moon's so beautiful? Come on, my little friend, you can join in as well!
101621030.evoFlair_: Oh no, the sun's come out! Looks like the fun's over then. Come on, let's get back to the mansion. You'll escort me, right, my little friend?

101621080.baseFlair_: Hrrr! I'm not like you dumb humans, you know. Not with this new power. I'm strong now. Stronger than vampires! Stronger than a lykos!
101621080.evoEffect_: Evolve: Deal 3 damage to both leaders.
101621080.evoFlair_: Hrrr... Wh-what? My mind! I-it's melting... melting away... My mind is blank... and it feels good! Hrrr, hrrr! It feels goood!

101621090.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to all enemy followers if Vengeance is active for you.
101621090.baseFlair_: I am the unknown assassin. I serve the Vampire Lord, striking soundlessly from the shadowing and claiming the lives of hapless humans.
101621090.evoFlair_: A slash of my claws and a life is claimed. And then another. So long as the Vampire Lord wills it, the masked assassin shall continue to hunt.

103621020.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Clash: Summon a Forest Bat.
103621020.baseFlair_: I have been sent to greet you in place of our sleeping empress. When you meet her, you better show enough respect to make her feel like you're kissing her feet.
103621020.evoFlair_: You humans are our food. The only reason I haven't consumed you is as a favor to the queen. But you know, I think I could use a little snack. Don't worry! I'll make sure it doesn't hurt... much.

107621010.baseFlair_: Oh, you're a new face. I'll pierce you right there—it will only hurt for an instant... but you'll be begging for more when I'm done with you.
107621010.evoEffect_: Evolve: Destroy an allied follower, then summon a copy of that follower and give it Rush.
107621010.evoFlair_: I'll give you some love. It will only hurt for a second, but the pleasure will be worth your while—I promise.

107621020.baseEffect_:
Bane.
Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to all enemy followers if Vengeance is active for you.
107621020.baseFlair_: This amalgamation of beasts tears into flesh of its prey with the fangs of a lion—only after it has succumbed to the toxins of the scorpion tail, of course.
107621020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
107621020.evoFlair_: It's easy to forget about the serpent, but one should never ignore it—the venomous clouds expelled from its fangs are fatal.

114621020.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: If an allied Naterran Great Tree is in play, gain Bane.
114621020.baseFlair_:
That person who dealt with us all so honestly, never forgetting why we were here... The one who took such pains to look after. Us. Is that... his. True. Nature? Or. Was. A. Good. Man. Twisted. By. Madness?
—Adventurer's scrawled journal entry
114621020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
114621020.evoFlair_:
His t-t-t-truuuue. TRUE nature. Is. A. Werewolf.
Change. What will? The journey. Forgotten?
Creeping, creeping. Madness gobbles you up. Chomp, chomp.
—Twisted scrawl

115621010.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: If Wrath is active for you, summon 2 Cougar Pelt Warriors.
115621010.baseFlair_: The long-clawed beast's flesh spoils quickly. Leave it a single night and it becomes inedible. Devour it as though pursuing a beast in flight, however, and the meat will melt on your tongue. —Third Berserker's Epitaph: Part 1
115621010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
115621010.evoFlair_: The horned beast's hide can resist those claws. The long-clawed beast's pelt grants speed. Our next hunt's target is set. —Third Berserker's Epitaph: Part 2

117621010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Draw a card. If Vengeance is not active for you, deal 2 damage to your leader. Otherwise, deal 2 damage to the enemy leader.
117621010.baseFlair_: I am The Devil, master of mayhem. Greed? Impulse? Tyranny requires no justification to exist. Cede to pain. Thrust it upon others, and seize all that you covet.
117621010.evoFlair_: I am a calamity that rages as my desires dictate. My underlings? All prisoners of war. These wings? My plunder. Pain sustains me, and I shall teach its virtue to the uninitiated.

118621020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Put an Executioner's Axe into your hand.
Once on each of your turns, when this follower gains Rush or Ward, gain +2/+2.
118621020.baseFlair_: They know that fashion is about novelty. That's why their caps are frequently dyed—and only the freshest blood will do.
118621020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
118621020.evoFlair_: They know that fashion is about hype. That's why they share dyeing tips—and information on where to extract the brightest red.

119621010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: The next time this follower takes damage, reduce that damage to 0.
Strike: Gain +1/+0.
Can't be attacked.
119621010.baseFlair_: Look at this beautiful, lovely masterpiece! Crazy to the max, isn't it? I call it my Divine Death Saw of Death! Wh-what? You think it's cool, too? Hmm... You've got good taste! I like you!
119621010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
119621010.evoFlair_: Hehe... Hahaha... All I want's peace of mind and serenity. Soooo, if you're here to hurt my friends, you're going to go sayonara-bye-bye!

101631020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give an allied follower Storm if Vengeance is active for you.
101631020.baseFlair_: Stop dawdling and finish the job already! I expect victory to be all but assured before I step even one foot upon the battlefield, or have you forgotten? Now pulverize them this instant!
101631020.evoFlair_: The thick stench of charred flesh in the air, ash raining down across a backdrop of jet-black skies. Yes, a veritable feast for the senses. I may have found my paradise yet.

107631010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give your leader the following effect - Whenever your leader takes damage during your turn, recover 1 play point. (This effect lasts until this follower leaves play.)
107631010.baseFlair_: Long time no see... Or was it? Hee-hee. Anyway, I bought a new outfit, what do you think? Don't you wanna go on a date? It's gonna be our little secret, okay?
107631010.evoFlair_: Come on now, don't be shy. After all, we've already done so much together... What, you don't remember? In that case, I'll just have to show you again.

109631030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Enhance (9) - If your leader has 19 defense or less, this follower's attack and defense become X. X equals 20 minus your leader's defense.
109631030.baseFlair_: At the gates of Mashu stands a sentinel—half man, half creature. Seeking fresh offerings for Shamash, it conceals his tail from travelers.
109631030.evoEffect_: Evolve: Gain Storm if your leader has 2 defense or less.
109631030.evoFlair_: The verses depict tales of a monster who stands at the divide between the heavens and earth. Despite its sinister appearance, it has more in common with the divine than a monster.

115631010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to both leaders. If Avarice is active for you, repeat once.
Last Words: Restore 2 defense to your leader.
115631010.baseFlair_: The mountainous beast's flesh was not fit for consumption. But three days later, its odor had become more appetizing, and when I tried it, I found the flavor had greatly improved. —Fifth Berserker's Epitaph: Part 1
115631010.evoEffect_: Last Words: Restore 4 defense to your leader.
115631010.evoFlair_: Our longtime enemy was brought down by the tusked beast's charge. Armed with the mountainous beast's raw strength, we set our sights upon the king of the wilderness. —Fifth Berserker's Epitaph: Part 2

116631010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If at least 10 allied Machina followers have been destroyed this match, recover 1 evolution point.
116631010.baseFlair_: The advent of machinery had much to offer us creatures of the night. The most notable gift? A radical form of treatment, which does not extend life but augments it. Perhaps now we can fulfill a long-held dream. Perhaps now we can win back our freedom. —Bloodkin Memoirs
116631010.evoEffect_: Evolve: If there are at least 2 Machina cards in your hand, give your leader the following effect - At the end of your opponent's turn, summon an Assembly Droid. (This effect is not stackable and lasts for the rest of the match.)
116631010.evoFlair_: Once they fused their flesh with metal, the nightwalkers knew. "Technology lifts the limits nature imposed on life, and it can lift the limits fate imposed on our race," they said. "Technology can raze all resistance, and it can lead us to freedom." —Purebloods

116631020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If an allied amulet is in play, deal 2 damage to an enemy follower.
116631020.baseFlair_:
contagion—spreading from beast. beast—taints life itself. great power. must let someone know. please. spread word quickly. let world know. spread. the madness.
—Scrawled Memo from a Doctor
116631020.evoEffect_: Evolve: Give your leader the following effect - During your turn, whenever cards are added to your hand from your deck, deal 1 damage to a random enemy. Do this X times. X equals the number of cards added to your hand. (This effect is not stackable and lasts for the rest of the match.)
116631020.evoFlair_:
I figured it out—the source of madness. It lies within the unknowable self. There is no running from madness. It does not forgive. It is a rope, snaking up your limbs and binding you. May madness fetter all of existence.
—The Rope of Madness

108641030.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Put a Blood Moon into your hand.
When an allied Blood Moon comes into play, evolve this follower.
108641030.baseFlair_: We were brutalized and driven to the world's end. The light-dwellers hated us. The night-dwellers scorned us. We can't allow them to live any longer!
108641030.evoFlair_: Show your true nature, pack members! When the moon shimmers through the darkness, we'll be freed from the chains of reason! Tonight the world will be ours again!

110641010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: If Wrath is active for you, gain +1/+1 and Storm, and destroy an enemy follower.
At the start of your opponent's turn, if your leader took damage during your previous turn, gain +1/+1.
110641010.baseFlair_: Should we not love our fellows? When seeds of compassion are planted in the arid fields of the human psyche, is it not lust that fertilizes them? Indeed, this is the trial I will administer to the world.
110641010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
110641010.evoFlair_: It's difficult to replace the impulses that govern the association of fellows. Short of breath and shorter of logic, all reason disappears. But, in a sense, there's no better opportunity to recover the true self. Indeed, this is the trial I will administer to the world.

113641020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: If Vengeance is active for you, gain the ability to evolve for 0 evolution points.
Whenever an enemy follower comes into play, deal 1 damage to the enemy leader and restore 1 defense to your leader.
113641020.baseFlair_:
Upon tragedy, a new hope is born. Upon betrayal, a new hand takes hold of power. Only through his determination was he able to cut off the bonds that held him back.
"Consorting with allies is but a crutch for the weak—only the powerful reign supreme on their own!"
113641020.evoEffect_:
Whenever an enemy follower comes into play, deal 1 damage to the enemy leader and restore 1 defense to your leader.
During your turn, whenever this follower attacks and destroys an enemy follower, if this follower is not destroyed, restore 4 defense to this follower.
113641020.evoFlair_:
Regardless of the people's ignorance of truth, I shall continue down this path. An unstoppable rush of power fills my body... Gone is my former powerless self.
"A tragedy is about to begin... I'll take the throne with my very own hands!"

114641030.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to your leader and X damage to all enemy followers. X equals this follower's attack.
Last Words: Deal 1 damage to your leader. Put a 3/5 Kudlak into your deck.
114641030.baseFlair_: Let us spread pestilence. Let us trample the harvest underfoot. Your bodies are lesions. Your strength, a disease. If you would resist, prepare yourselves. The human who strikes me down will be reviled throughout the ages for their sins.
114641030.evoEffect_: Last Words: Deal 1 damage to your leader. Put 3 copies of a 3/5 Kudlak into your deck.
114641030.evoFlair_: Let us spread pathology. Let us blight the harvests. Hawthorn stake. White amnion. If you cannot prepare both, you will die. The human who tells me tales of the end will be lauded throughout the ages for their heroism.

900641050.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to your leader and X damage to all enemy followers. X equals this follower's attack.
Last Words: Deal 1 damage to your leader. Put a 3/5 Kudlak into your deck.
900641050.baseFlair_: Let us spread pestilence. Let us trample the harvest underfoot. Your bodies are lesions. Your strength, a disease. If you would resist, prepare yourselves. The human who strikes me down will be reviled throughout the ages for their sins.
900641050.evoEffect_: Last Words: Deal 1 damage to your leader. Put 3 copies of a 3/5 Kudlak into your deck.
900641050.evoFlair_: Let us spread pathology. Let us blight the harvests. Hawthorn stake. White amnion. If you cannot prepare both, you will die. The human who tells me tales of the end will be lauded throughout the ages for their heroism.

115641020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Union Burst (10) - Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower. Deal 3 damage to the enemy leader. Restore 3 defense to your leader.
At the start of your opponent's turn, if your leader took damage during your previous turn, gain +1/+1.
After Clashing with an enemy follower, if this follower is not destroyed, fully restore this follower's defense.
115641020.baseFlair_: Haahahahahaa! Well done, worm! Very impressive, awakening me! As thanks, perhaps I'll grant you the honor of becoming my servant!
115641020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
115641020.evoFlair_: Only the queen of the night could ever possess such beauty, such dignity. Kneel at my feet and bask in my presence. You could ask no greater honor than to serve Illya Ornstein!

117641030.baseEffect_:
Fusion: Bloodcraft followers that originally cost 3 play points or less
----------
Fanfare: If this card is fused with at least 3 cards, draw cards until there are 6 cards in your hand. Then, if this card is fused with at least 6 cards, deal 6 damage to all enemy followers.
117641030.baseFlair_:
'Tis not the rain that beats, but her brazen footsteps.
'Tis not the thunder that blasts, but her voice in song.
'Tis not the gales that bluster, but her exuberant sighs.
—Imminent Storm: Stanza 7
117641030.evoFlair_:
Look toward the lady on her throne of clouds.
Weep, for the lady now glowers upon the earth.
Tremble before the lady who strikes down sinners.
—Imminent Storm: Stanza 16

118641020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Draw a card. Then, if at least 15 cards have been added to your hand from your deck this match (your starting hand doesn't count), evolve this follower.
118641020.baseFlair_: The other half that I lost is restored. It doesn't change the fact that, in the end, I'm a pitiful demon. If you'll let me stay by your side, though... I'll help you in any way I can!
118641020.evoFlair_: I'm imperfect, but your encouragement kept me going. I might not be worthy of you, even with both my wings. But... if you're okay with it, I'll stand by you until both wings are no more!

101614030.baseEffect_:
Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower.
Deal 6 damage instead if Vengeance is active for you.
101614030.baseFlair_: Blood will be paid for in blood.

106614010.baseEffect_:
Deal 4 damage to an enemy follower.
Put a Serpent into your hand.
106614010.baseFlair_: This poison could kill you four times over with more to spare. —Snake handler

107614010.baseEffect_:
Deal 4 damage to a follower and give it Drain if it's a Bloodcraft follower.
If Vengeance is active for you, recover 2 play points.
107614010.baseFlair_: This time for man has come to an end—let us usher in a new era.

109614010.baseEffect_:
Deal 2 damage to your leader.
Recover 1 evolution point.
109614010.baseFlair_: Thirst for eternity, drink for eternity.

112614010.baseEffect_:
Deal 4 damage to a random enemy follower. Summon a Serpent.
Enhance (6): Summon 4 Serpents instead.
112614010.baseFlair_: If bitten by the viper, alert those around you and immediately isolate yourself. It's not to save your life; it's to save theirs. The poison dripping from your open wound will soon attract other snakes. —Creatures That Won't Mind If You Die, Serpents and Such

116614010.baseEffect_:
Deal 4 damage to an enemy follower.
Summon a Cursebrand Vampire.
If Vengeance is active for you, give +1/+1 to all allied followers.
116614010.baseFlair_:
May blood and pain blot out the light of the moon.
—Cursebrand Vampire

118614010.baseEffect_:
Select a follower. It can't attack until the start of your next turn.
Summon a Spiderweb Imp. If any allied amulets are in play, give it +2/+0.
118614010.baseFlair_: Once the red threads of fate are tied together, there's no undoing them.
