119624010.baseEffect_: Deal 1 damage to all allies and enemies. Do this twice.
119624010.baseFlair_: Common sense and decency are shields wielded by the frail of heart. They are all too easily pierced by the spears of the unscrupulous, who care not for the rules of engagement.

103634010.baseEffect_:
Deal 2 damage to your leader. Deal 6 damage to an enemy follower.
Enhance (7): Then summon a Beast Dominator.
103634010.baseFlair_: This thirst simply refuses to be quenched... Won't you give me what I crave?

105634010.baseEffect_:
Select an enemy follower. Whenever the follower attacks, it will deal 3 damage to itself.
If Vengeance is active for you, give this effect to all enemy followers instead.
105634010.baseFlair_: The ghostly white blade sliced through the sickly jet darkness, running through its target like a needle through cloth. —"Night", Poems of Cruelty

106634010.baseEffect_:
Summon 2 Serpents.
Randomly put 1 of the following cards into your hand: Venomfang Medusa, Euryale, or Stheno.
106634010.baseFlair_: Our trial is a gift. You should revel in it.

111634010.baseEffect_: Give +2/+0 to all Bloodcraft followers in your hand. Then if Vengeance is active for you, give +2/+0 to all Bloodcraft followers in your deck.
111634010.baseFlair_: Only instinct can break the shackles of reason.

708634010.baseEffect_: Give +2/+0 to all Bloodcraft followers in your hand. Then if Vengeance is active for you, give +2/+0 to all Bloodcraft followers in your deck.
708634010.baseFlair_: Matou blood is pure and respected for its Magecraft. We're even called one of the great Three Founding Families associated with the Holy Grail War if you didn't know.

112634010.baseEffect_:
Put 2 random followers from your deck into your hand.
Summon a Forest Bat for each non-Machina follower added to your hand. Then summon an Assembly Droid for each Machina follower added to your hand.
112634010.baseFlair_: I had a nightmare, so I woke up, and then I went to the window to make sure it wasn't true, but there they were. Just like in my nightmare. —Boy from the fog-filled village

900634010.baseEffect_:
Deal 2 damage to all enemy followers.
If an allied Trill, Devilish Idol is in play, deal 3 damage instead.
900634010.baseFlair_:
"I want your full attention, from the opening bars to the very last note! If you're talking in the back row... I'll find you."
—Trill, Devilish Idol

105613010.baseEffect_:
Countdown (5)
Whenever your leader takes damage during your turn, subtract 1 from this amulet's Countdown.
Last Words: At the start of your next turn, randomly put 1 of the highest-cost followers from your hand into play.
105613010.baseFlair_: Drip, drop, drink, drink, key to the door to carnality! Bones, blood, bodies, breath, come hither unto me! —Bloodlock Manuscript

110613010.baseEffect_:
Countdown (4)
At the end of your turn, if only 1 allied follower is in play, give a random allied follower +1/+1 and Ward.
110613010.baseFlair_: A king of men rules through the favor of his subjects, his path strewn with the petals of his citizens' respect. The king of blood, however, rules through the favor of the night, his path paved with individual ambition.

112622010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Recover 1 evolution point.
During your turn, when an allied follower evolves, restore 10 defense to your leader, then banish this amulet.
112622010.baseFlair_: An orb of concentrated blood. Those who seek completion find themselves drawn to its luster.

709622010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Recover 1 evolution point.
During your turn, when an allied follower evolves, restore 10 defense to your leader, then banish this amulet.
709622010.baseFlair_: "I shall descend on the day of Ragnarok!"

113623010.baseEffect_:
Countdown (2)
Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to your leader and draw a card.
At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to your leader and draw a card.
113623010.baseFlair_:
Using pain as a tool to oppress the people? Utterly preposterous. This is merely a bit of good old-fashioned torture as decreed by the heavens, indeed.
—Heretic Priest

101633010.baseEffect_:
Countdown (3)
Fanfare: Deal 6 damage to your leader.
At the start of your turn, restore 2 defense to your leader and draw a card.
101633010.baseFlair_: The taste of sin is bittersweet.

104633010.baseEffect_:
Countdown (4)
Fanfare: Activate Vengeance for you even if your leader's defense is more than 10. This effect lasts until this amulet leaves play.
104633010.baseFlair_: Thus begins a night of inhumanity.

900643010.baseEffect_:
Countdown (5)
At the end of your turn, restore 1 defense to your leader. If you have more evolution points than your opponent, restore 2 defense instead. (You have 0 evolution points on turns you are unable to evolve.)
Last Words: Summon a 4-play point 4/4 XIV. Luzen, Temperance (without Accelerate).
900643010.baseFlair_:
Open your eyes to the nonsense flooding this world.
All one needs is the life pulse of the heart.
Not love, nor anger, nor sorrow. 'Tis all...
Meaningless.

100611050.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Gain Storm if Vengeance is active for you.
100611050.baseFlair_: Hear me, allies. Our time has come to retake our place from the vile mortals! May our fury lead us to victory!
100611050.evoFlair_: Allies one and all, the moon drips red for us! Tonight we purge the world of this human scourge and reclaim our blood right!

704611010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Gain Storm if Vengeance is active for you.
704611010.baseFlair_: Hear me, allies. Our time has come to retake our place from the vile mortals! May our fury lead us to victory!
704611010.evoEffect_: (This card will be treated as Dark General.)
704611010.evoFlair_: Allies one and all, the moon drips red for us! Tonight we purge the world of this human scourge and reclaim our blood right!

101611080.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Gain +2/+0 if Vengeance is active for you.
101611080.baseFlair_: Pain leads to anger; anger leads to power. Nothing is more ferocious than a wounded giant.
101611080.evoFlair_: Pain leads to anger; anger leads to power. A giant, once drunk on blood, is unstoppable.

101611090.baseEffect_: Strike: Deal 2 damage to your leader.
101611090.baseFlair_: I have made a blood oath to fight by your side, and I shall do so until your dying day.
101611090.evoFlair_: I have made a blood oath to fight by your side, and I shall do so until your soul departs this world.

103611040.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Recover 1 evolution point if Vengeance is active for you.
103611040.baseFlair_: So this is one of the prism stones. It's beautiful. The warding magic within is sure to keep anyone safe. Would you like to take it with you?
103611040.evoFlair_: I've never given anyone a present before, but I'd like you to have this, hero. I hope you like it. It's something my first friends and I found together: a prism stone.

104611030.baseEffect_: Clash: Gain Bane until the end of the turn if the enemy follower has Ward.
104611030.baseFlair_: "If you value your life, take off your armor." With the werewolf warriors before him, the elderly commander muttered the order. "Those beasts go after the ones who are harder to crush first."
104611030.evoFlair_: "If you value your life, do not resist." The elderly commander curled his lips back as he put his hands up. "If they think you're easy to crush, your life will be spared."

109611030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Deal 2 damage to a random enemy follower, and give a random allied follower +2/+2.
109611030.baseFlair_: Groar... (As an all-powerful demon known across the netherworld, a great offering is required to summon me properly. Otherwise, this is what you receive.)
109611030.evoFlair_: Groargh... (That summoner has run off... I must find them to return to the netherworld. This form is so cumbersome though... I could really use another hand!)

110611010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Summon 2 Serpents.
Fanfare: Enhance (8) - Give Bane and Rush to all allied Serpents.
110611010.baseFlair_: The serpent's path is winding. What business have you in this cave, little lost sheep? Very well. I shall guide you to the serpent god you seek.
110611010.evoFlair_: Poke a bush and a snake may slither out. I know not what business you had with the serpent god... but it matters little. After all, you're about to be sacrificed to him.

111611020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to your leader. Then deal 1 damage to an enemy.
111611020.baseFlair_: Go forth and convulse en masse. Come one, come all—old and young, gods and demons. Climax and intermingle, for you and your neighbor are but one and the same.
111611020.evoFlair_: From the shadow of provision comes forth unity. Bonded through desire, bound by lust—beasts, gods... all are united through pleasure. Rejoice, for you are one with the world.

112611020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: If Vengeance is active for you, gain the ability to ignore Ward.
Fanfare: If this follower has at least 6 attack, gain Rush.
112611020.baseFlair_: Why does he train? Why does he lust for strength? Why does he fight? There are no answers to such questions. A berserker simply swings his axe.
112611020.evoFlair_: At the end of the training, the fighting, and the quest for strength, lies meaning for the berserker. Having swung his axe, he finds the answers he seeks.

116611020.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: If any other allied Bloodstained Berserkers have been played this match, gain Storm.
116611020.baseFlair_: Not so fast. I take payment up front, milord. Oh, it's not much... Just a bit of pain and fresh, steaming blood. What? Don't have the nerve to pay?
116611020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
116611020.evoFlair_: I've received your payment of... Ah yes. An ounce of pain and a pound of blood, with all the rancor oozing forth. Oh, and you needn't worry. I'll see the mission through—I swear it on your life.

117611030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Enhance (6) - Give +1/+1 to all allied Bloodcraft followers. If Vengeance is active for you, give +2/+2 instead.
117611030.baseFlair_: Mortal commanders rally their troops with charisma and compensation. A demonic commander inspires his underlings with dread and duress.
117611030.evoFlair_:
"Even now, everything makes me jumpy."
"I wake up wondering, 'How did I survive?'"
"A demon even demons feared."
"Never accept his invitation to dine. Never."
—Excerpts from the Psych Evals of Retired Soldiers

119611040.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Draw a card.
Last Words: At the start of your next turn, draw a card.
119611040.baseFlair_: To us demons, humans are like uncut gems. I'm always on the lookout for any that have the potential to shine brighter than others. There's nothing better than seeing a complete nobody rise above the pack!
119611040.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
119611040.evoFlair_: Well, aren't you a diamond in the rough? A soul like yours doesn't come along every day... Will you be a doer of great deeds, or a vessel of terrible destruction? The choice is yours. What do you say? Want to form a contract with me?

100621020.baseFlair_: Strength, beauty—these are my desires, and it is only the magic armor that can fulfill them. With each drop of blood it absorbs, it becomes more glowingly beautiful!
100621020.evoEffect_: Evolve: Deal 2 damage to an enemy follower. Then restore 2 defense to your leader.
100621020.evoFlair_: No, it's still not enough. More sacrifices must be made! Monsters, dragons, angels—everything must be sacrificed in the name of strength and beauty! I pray for the blood that will make me beautiful!

101621040.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Destroy an enemy amulet if Vengeance is active for you.
101621040.baseFlair_: "Contaminate the earth..." "Devour human souls..." "Return the world to darkness..."
101621040.evoFlair_: "My right hand devours the light..." "My left hand repels all hope..." "The weak deserve only death..."

102621010.baseFlair_: I'm a devil. An adorable devil who gets adventurers like you lost so I can toy with them.
102621010.evoEffect_: Evolve: Destroy an enemy follower if Vengeance is active for you.
102621010.evoFlair_: Confusion, exhaustion, and finally starvation. When adventurers despair, I take them out of their misery. To us, despair is the most delicious spice there is!

106621010.baseEffect_:
Bane.
Ward.
Fanfare: Give another allied Bloodcraft follower the following effect - Can't be targeted by enemy effects.
106621010.baseFlair_:
As fluid as she is sharp, her sword pierces her enemies like a snakebite.
"Trespassing isn't permitted in my territory!"
106621010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
106621010.evoFlair_:
She commands a magic serpentine blade, giving her power over life and death.
"I won't let you lay a hand on my sisters!"

110621010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: If an allied follower was destroyed this turn, deal 2 damage to an enemy follower.
Last Words: Deal 4 damage to your leader if Vengeance is not active for you.
110621010.baseFlair_:
Look closely at that face... it is stricken by both rage and sadness. It weeps over the cruel future awaiting you, and simmers with rage at its eternal hunger.
—Prologue, At the Shadows' Edge
110621010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
110621010.evoFlair_:
If its sadness cannot be abated, it must be razed by anger. The anger that goes uncalmed will be drowned in sadness. Whichever the elemental's humor, your best strategy is avoidance.
—Chapter 2, At the Shadows' Edge

113621020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put an Assembly Droid into your hand.
113621020.baseFlair_:
Core mutations have led to one new optimization after another. The Metal-Blade Demon, for example, arms its body and binds itself with steel. Some others cover their kin in iron and force them to serve.
—Secrets of Sorcery Demystified II
113621020.evoEffect_: Evolve: Put a Repair Mode into your hand. Recover 2 play points.
113621020.evoFlair_:
Losing yourself to rage and swinging your strength about? There once was a time when I did that too. It's different now with children in my life. But it isn't so bad. I've grown rather fond of the little ones.
—Mechaforge Devil to Metal-Blade Demon

114621010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Draw cards until there are 5 cards in your hand.
114621010.baseFlair_: Yeek! W-was that a vampire!? No... wait... It was just my own footsteps. Yeesh... I'll never make it if I keep jumping at shadows like this. That's right... I've gotta work hard if I'm gonna save the beautiful damsels of the world!
114621010.evoFlair_: Found you, vampire! You fiend! Carrying off all these beautiful damsels! I'm so jeal—I, I mean! I'm so angry at you! Prepare yourself for... Hm? You're actually kind of fetching yourself... Lemme just take a closer... Hey, come back!

101631040.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Gain Bane and Drain if Vengeance is active for you.
101631040.baseFlair_: One nondescript day the seemingly interminable war ended. But not a soul stood atop the battlefield to claim victory—that is, except a blood-starved demon.
101631040.evoFlair_: Lusting only to reap blood and flesh wholesale, this devil saves his sickle for the battlefield. A merciless judge, he metes out bladed justice to the wretched who devote themselves to petty squabbles.

107631020.baseEffect_:
Drain.
Whenever an allied follower evolves, this follower gains +1/+0 while in your hand.
107631020.baseFlair_: Feast on their terror, for our reign begins now! From the Depths, we have arisen—let us feast on every pigment of life.
107631020.evoFlair_: Silently expanding, our malevolence lurks and creeps in the shadows. Don't look behind you now... Gwahaha!

109631020.baseFlair_: D-do you dislike me now? What did I do wrong this time? Maybe I was standing too close? I guess I was getting a little too familiar...
109631020.evoEffect_:
Bane.
Evolve: Destroy an enemy follower. Deal damage to your leader until their defense drops to 10 if Vengeance is not active for you.
109631020.evoFlair_: So... You weren't mad at me? Thank goodness! If there's anything you want me to do for you, let me know! I'll be right there to take care of it all!

110631020.baseEffect_:
Invocation: During your third turn or later, if your leader has taken damage for the fourth time this turn, invoke this card.
Last Words: Restore 3 defense to your leader.
110631020.baseFlair_: Let me weave you a lie. My eyes shoot flame, but I would never harm a living creature. I have a great many other tales to spin for the ears of ill-mannered louts such as yourself.
110631020.evoEffect_: Last Words: Restore 5 defense to your leader.
110631020.evoFlair_: I see my words fall upon deaf ears. Pity. I will have to find some other way to teach you of wisdom, battle, and honor.

110631030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Choose - Put an Aza & Iza, Feline Maids or Demon Song into your hand.
110631030.baseFlair_: Thanks for coming out to our concert tonight! Are you ready Aza? Ready Iza? Then it's time for our first number: "The Hottest Spring in Hell"!
110631030.evoFlair_:
It's nearly time for our finale! Don't cry, now, or you'll make us cry, too! Here goes "Rivenbrandt Requiem"!
Ugh, I'm beat... I deserve a nice long bath when I get home.

113631010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 2 damage to an enemy follower. If Vengeance is active for you, deal 6 damage instead.
113631010.baseFlair_: If you have pride in your heart, you must hunger for downfall. Because you can be nothing but powerless while bound by the rules of gods... In the depths of depravity and downfall, your pride will shine as never before.
113631010.evoEffect_: Evolve: Change your leader's maximum defense to 10. Give your leader the following effect: Can't take more than 3 damage at a time. (This effect is not stackable and lasts for the rest of the match.)
113631010.evoFlair_: Falling on account of so-called morals and ideals... Pathetic! Those too afraid to choose the fallen path themselves are doomed to constant change. But a proud soul like mine is wholly eternal!

118631020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: If Wrath is active for you, gain the ability to evolve for 0 evolution points.
Can attack 2 times per turn.
118631020.baseFlair_: Just as fools desire change, sinners desire transformation. Equilibrium is the true keeper of the peace. If you wish to open up new possibilities... then you must pay the price. Are you prepared? My twin blades of dark and light will test your resolve.
118631020.evoEffect_:
Bane.
Drain.
Can attack 2 times per turn.
118631020.evoFlair_: The world is a cradle, or a small box garden; merely a toy meant to lull us into a sense of peace. Yet those who came before spilled blood and shed tears to build it. If you would still forge ahead... then you must show me your resolve by overcoming this trial.

119631010.baseEffect_:
Can't attack.
Once on each of your turns, when this follower's attack or defense is increased by an effect, destroy a random enemy follower and restore 3 defense to your leader.
At the end of your turn, if Avarice is active for you, gain +2/+0.
119631010.baseFlair_: At last, we've tracked down the demon. Since we arrived, it hasn't moved a muscle; it just sits there with a malicious glint in its eyes. How many of our loved ones has that thing devoured? I'm going to take my time and really make it suffer. —Demon Hunter's Logbook
119631010.evoEffect_:
(Can attack.)
Once on each of your turns, when this follower's attack or defense is increased by an effect, destroy a random enemy follower and restore 3 defense to your leader.
At the end of your turn, if Avarice is active for you, gain +2/+0.
119631010.evoFlair_: It's a trap! That wasn't the demon we were looking at, just a little part of it, which it uses to lure in prey, and we fell for it. This whole cave is really its mouth! —Demon Hunter's Last Words

119631020.baseEffect_:
Invocation: At the end of your turn, if Wrath is active for you, invoke this card. Then, banish all Knights of Purgatory from your deck.
----------
Ward.
Fanfare: Restore 4 defense to your leader.
119631020.baseFlair_: Powerful emotion is what stokes the fires of purgatory. Form a contract with me, and my infernal blade will be at your service. So long as your heart still burns with passion, not even death will slow me down.
119631020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
119631020.evoFlair_: If you want a change of scenery, I'll find you an even more horrific battle. Come, my lord, fight to your heart's content. Be as brutal as you wish—you don't need technique when you have me.

101641020.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Deal X damage to your leader. X equals half your leader's defense, rounded down.
101641020.baseFlair_: If you wish to be protected from this abominable light, then give your soul—half your life—to the darkness. Do so, and the devil will rise from the darkness and stain this awful light a beautiful jet black.
101641020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
101641020.evoFlair_: Blood is not sufficient. Flesh will not satisfy. The devil demands your soul, and he will offer you great things in return. Come now—the light will not satisfy your urges.

104641010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Draw 2 cards. Deal damage to your leader until their defense drops to 10 if Vengeance is not active for you.
104641010.baseFlair_: The gold you humans talk about is worthless and pointless, so take as much as you want. But I expect you to give it to me—give me what I really want.
104641010.evoFlair_: To me, gold isn't some flashy yellow metal. It's your soul gleaming red. And now that I've made your wishes come true, I'll be taking that soul.

703641010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Draw 2 cards. Deal damage to your leader until their defense drops to 10 if Vengeance is not active for you.
703641010.baseFlair_: The gold you humans talk about is worthless and pointless, so take as much as you want. But I expect you to give it to me—give me what I really want.
703641010.evoFlair_: To me, gold isn't some flashy yellow metal. It's your soul gleaming red. And now that I've made your wishes come true, I'll be taking that soul.

106641010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Summon a Serpent.
At the start of your turn, if at least 2 allied Serpents are in play, 2 Serpents combine to become Medusiana.
106641010.baseFlair_:
Her purple, serpentine locks form one massive snake. Accompanied by countless smiling fangs, this young girl steps back into the night.
"We'll show you everything we've got!"
106641010.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Summon a Serpent.
At the start of your turn, if at least 2 allied Serpents are in play, 2 Serpents combine to become Medusiana.
106641010.evoFlair_:
Fear and worship the snake goddess. Her powers released, she will consume everything under the night sky.
"I can do everything that my sisters can!"

706641010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Summon a Serpent.
At the start of your turn, if at least 2 allied Serpents are in play, 2 Serpents combine to become Medusiana.
706641010.baseFlair_:
Her purple, serpentine locks form one massive snake. Accompanied by countless smiling fangs, this young girl steps back into the night.
"We'll show you everything we've got!"
706641010.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Summon a Serpent.
At the start of your turn, if at least 2 allied Serpents are in play, 2 Serpents combine to become Medusiana.
706641010.evoFlair_:
Fear and worship the snake goddess. Her powers released, she will consume everything under the night sky.
"I can do everything that my sisters can!"

111641010.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: Gain +0/+X. X equals the number of times that your leader has been damaged during your turn this match.
Can't be destroyed by effects. (Can be destroyed by damage from effects.)
111641010.baseFlair_: This world can be totaled and calculated in its entirety. Four fundamental operations—all this demon requires to disentangle the enigmas of our realm.
111641010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
111641010.evoFlair_: This demon presides over all calculation. Before him, all mysteries unravel to reveal their solutions, from the lifespan of man to the pigment of heaven.

111641030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If Vengeance is active for you, give a Bloodcraft follower in your hand Storm. If this is your tenth turn or later and Vengeance is active for you, give all Bloodcraft followers in your hand Storm instead.
111641030.baseFlair_: The battlefield is my stage and the chorus of cannon fire, my applause! Blacken the skies; char them till they can scream no more! Sweet destruction! Beautiful annihilation!
111641030.evoFlair_: Battle is just unrehearsed drama with an all but certain conclusion. Now, go! Secure my conquest for glory, triumph, and victory! And let's end this farce!

115641010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: If Wrath is active for you, gain the ability to evolve for 0 evolution points.
At the start of your opponent's turn, if your leader took damage during your previous turn, restore 3 defense to your leader.
115641010.baseFlair_: Thundering pulse. Soft sighs. Those shrill cries of yours ring in my ears. One. Two. Ahhh, I can't wait to wolf you all down! I'll string you up, dress you, and devour you to the marrow!
115641010.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Deal 1 damage to your leader and then 4 damage to an enemy follower. If you have at least 4 play points, instead of dealing 4 damage to an enemy follower, gain Storm and deal 8 damage to all other followers.
At the start of your opponent's turn, if your leader took damage during your previous turn, restore 3 defense to your leader.
115641010.evoFlair_: The young are always hungry, always clamoring to be fed. We hunt, feed our young, hunt, feed ourselves—gradually overrunning the world. One. Two. No matter how many of you there are, it'll never be enough! We'll string you up, dress you, and devour you to the marrow!

116641020.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: If any other allied Machina followers are in play, destroy 1 and evolve this follower.
116641020.baseFlair_: My blood, you sought to taint with holy water—but these gears are my dam. My heart, you sought to still with silver bullets—but the moon is my shield. Even the sun, which sought to end my being, cannot pierce these steel wings. Finally... I can laugh when day breaks.
116641020.evoEffect_:
Ward.
At the end of your turn, summon 2 Assembly Droids. Then, if at least 10 allied Machina followers have been destroyed this match, give all other allied Machina followers +2/+2 and Ward.
116641020.evoFlair_: Track the frenzied threads back to their source, and look into the six eyes of the web-spinner. Watch as it breaks from its nest, rushes into the sun. The spider finds its prey; the struggle between freedom and restraint begins.

900641060.baseEffect_:
Can't be targeted by enemy effects.
While this follower is in play, your leader has the following effects.
-Can't take more than 1 damage at a time.
-Whenever your leader takes damage, reduce the enemy leader's maximum defense by 3.
900641060.baseFlair_:
Truth is waste. Your world has been reshaped.
I am Temperance, patron of austerity.
There is only one necessity:
Reality.
900641060.evoFlair_:
Hopes. Dreams. Memories. These are tools of hedonism.
Sever all luxuries; leave only thy corporeal self.
Discard excess. Learn what is needed:
Rationality.

117641020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If Wrath is active for you, destroy an enemy follower, then deal 3 damage to the enemy leader.
117641020.baseFlair_: Binding contracts persist in the depths of darkness. Some mortals use death as an escape clause, but demons don't negotiate. Remember well. The devil stains this awful light in beautiful jet black.
117641020.evoEffect_: Evolve: Deal 3 damage to your leader. Summon a Dire Bond.
117641020.evoFlair_: A true contract is not written, nor is it signed in blood; it is bound to the soul. Share your sins to conquer pain and misery. Favors are repaid in kind, for the devil is more trustworthy than the gods.

100614030.baseEffect_:
Deal 2 damage to your leader.
Destroy an enemy follower.
100614030.baseFlair_: A crimson rose blooms in the dead of night.

101624010.baseEffect_:
Summon 2 Forest Bats.
Deal X damage to an enemy follower. X equals the number of allied Forest Bats in play.
101624010.baseFlair_: Now, swarms of darkness, devour the light.

107622010.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, all allied followers gain +1/+0. Deal 2 damage to your leader if Vengeance is not active for you.
107622010.baseFlair_: The first hundred are to be torn apart like straw. The next ten should be rusted in sunlight and forged in moonlight. With the final one, the blade shall bloom with crimson in the shadows, fresh with blood. —Enchanted Blade Arts, Chapter 3

900623040.baseEffect_:
Countdown (2)
Fanfare: Destroy an enemy follower.
Last Words: Deal 2 damage to your leader.
900623040.baseFlair_: The way of red is the path of destitution. Be wary not to succumb to your hunger. —Alexandrite Demon

118633010.baseEffect_:
Countdown (3)
Fanfare: If you have more evolution points than your opponent, recover 2 play points. (You have 0 evolution points on turns you are unable to evolve.)
While this amulet is in play, Vengeance, Avarice, and Wrath are active for you.
118633010.baseFlair_: For every wound borne, the agreement which binds the pactseeker and the epitaph grows stronger.

101611100.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Gain Drain if Vengeance is active for you.
101611100.baseFlair_: Driven by an insatiable hunger, the beast roars as it goes in search of its next prey.
101611100.evoFlair_: No matter how many creatures it consumes, the beast is never sated. Its howls ring out, echoing as though they were lamentations.

102611060.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to your leader and summon a Forest Bat.
102611060.baseFlair_: You want to make a deal with me? Okay, if you say so. As long as you hold up your end of the bargain, my associates and I will help you out.
102611060.evoFlair_: Sure, a deal's a deal. My associates and I pledge our loyalty to you. As long as we keep getting our dues, of course.

105611020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Destroy an enemy follower with 3 defense or less. Deal 2 damage to your leader if Vengeance is not active for you.
105611020.baseFlair_: Worthless geeks everywhere! This is boring, way too boring. I'm gonna finish you with these fists.
105611020.evoFlair_: Can't anyone satisfy me? If you can buck these knuckles, I'll bust out this hammer as your reward.

108611030.baseEffect_:
Strike: Deal 1 damage to all enemy followers and your leader.
Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Gain +0/+1 and an additional Strike: Deal 1 damage to all enemy followers and your leader.
108611030.baseFlair_: "His rage can't be contained." The exorcist whispered painfully. "Every living creature irritates him."
108611030.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
108611030.evoFlair_: "He won't listen to reason," said the exorcist, picking up his weapon with a trembling hand. "Even his own life force irritates him."

116611030.baseEffect_:
Bane.
Last Words: At the start of your next turn, draw 2 cards.
116611030.baseFlair_:
Beyond our walls, there roams a raging fiend. He swings his hatchet, and the earth trembles; he raises his voice, and the sky splits. We have just one wish. O, tempestuous fiend, leave at once so our village may know peace again.
—Village Annals, Dry Season
116611030.evoFlair_: The raging fiend has gone—and it is only now we discover his true intentions. He was our ward and savior; it was he who chased away beast and monster alike. O, proud and aloof archfiend, may you appear before our village once again. —Village Annals, Rainy Season

119611020.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to a random leader. Do this 3 times.
119611020.baseFlair_: At first, he simply fought to survive. Then he fought for money. Then, for honor. Little by little, those battles ate away at his sanity, until only a single unquenchable desire remained. Now all he fights for is the thrill of the kill.
119611020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
119611020.evoFlair_: The color red thrilled him. He delighted in the tormented screams of his victims as he tore them apart, armor and flesh rending under his fingers like paper. When he killed, and when he was on the verge of death—those were the only times he felt truly alive.

101621100.baseEffect_: Fanfare and Last Words: Summon a Forest Bat.
101621100.baseFlair_: Hark upon my ballad, bloodkin. It is a tale of a dark hero, a servant loyal to the pursuit of peace. Much was his suffering under the gaze of the sun.
101621100.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
101621100.evoFlair_: And so the song does tell that in the shadows of shining heroes our kind did dwell. I only pray my essence lives on for all eternity amidst its lilt and cadence.

103621030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 2 damage to an enemy follower if Vengeance is active for you.
103621030.baseFlair_: Isn't the rain wonderful? No matter how many people you run through, you don't have to worry about blood stains because they'll all be washed away...
103621030.evoEffect_: Evolve: Deal 2 damage to an enemy follower.
103621030.evoFlair_: Tonight's rain is especially heavy. The souls trapped in my lance are weeping, and I think you might be just the person to go console them!

104621030.baseFlair_: His body is that of a man, but his heart is that of a demon, monster, or beast. He indiscriminately pierces both allies and foes, sending them to the shadowy beyond. He is none other than Vlad Dracula, and mortals call him the Impaler.
104621030.evoEffect_: At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to all other followers.
104621030.evoFlair_: After bathing in the blood of countless victims, his hair and eyes took on a crimson hue as if in testament to his malice, and his body finally changed to reflect his evil heart. He is none other than Vlad Dracula, and mortals detest him as the vampire that he is.

104621040.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a random follower that costs 2 play points or less from your deck into play. Repeat once if Vengeance is active for you.
104621040.baseFlair_: No one knows what it seeks or where it's going. The ghost ship traverses the vast seas and skies, and shadowy figures emerge from within.
104621040.evoFlair_: No one knows what it seeks or where it's going. The ship sways back and forth as it goes, and warped lights flicker from within.

105621010.baseEffect_:
Bane.
Fanfare: Deal 2 damage to an enemy follower. Then restore 2 defense to your leader.
105621010.baseFlair_: I thirst and I ache for it. You don't mind, do you? Let me drink the last drop.
105621010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
105621010.evoFlair_: Red, crimson, vermillion—these colors make me go mad. You wouldn't mind, would you? One bite's all I need!

105621030.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Gain Last Words: At the start of your next turn, put a follower that costs at least 6 play points from your deck into play.
105621030.baseFlair_: Beg for your life if you value it. For these frumious jaws crush all. The terrible Bandersnatch! —Poems of Unbeing
105621030.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
105621030.evoFlair_: Wherefore your fury, and wherefore your cry? Speed hence while the moon shines, for if not you shall be chased, and if not you will die. Vanish with the night, Bandersnatch! —Poems of Unbeing

111621020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal X damage to an enemy follower. Restore X defense to your leader. X equals this follower's attack.
111621020.baseFlair_: Princess of Bones, Lady of Blood, Beheader's Blade, Crimson Guillotine. Call me whatever you wish. They're your last words, after all.
111621020.evoFlair_: I love people, but what captivates me isn't a clear complexion or broad shoulders, nor is it status or wealth. I'm after something purer. Life. Warm and throbbing in my palm.

112621020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Draw X cards. X equals the number of allied Machina followers in play.
112621020.baseFlair_: I hate to say it, but it seems monsters even crueler than vampires have learned to use machines—namely demons. Staking hearts is going to be a lot harder from now on, since we've got all manner of metal to pierce through. —Vampire Hunter's Notes, Part 2
112621020.evoEffect_: Evolve: If you have at least 2 Machina cards in your hand, deal 2 damage to an enemy follower.
112621020.evoFlair_: Ah, so many fascinating transformations are upon us. While my kind are feature complete, so to speak, we do have our flaws. Perhaps if we, too, were to adapt the usage of machines... —Vampire's Account, Part 2

116621010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Destroy an enemy follower or amulet. If Wrath is not active for you, deal 2 damage to your leader. Otherwise, restore 4 defense to your leader.
116621010.baseFlair_: Creatures of the night live by one, simple rule—serve the strong, trample the weak! You request my aid? Then prove your worth, worm.
116621010.evoFlair_: I must say, I'm somewhat impressed. Why, I may just promote you to chief worm! Very well. I'll lend you my strength. Now, be a good minion and stay out of my way.

900621010.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Restore 2 defense to your leader.
900621010.baseFlair_: Here I alight in robes of white. The door of light has opened this moment. The hour of pure white has begun!
900621010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
900621010.evoFlair_:
"My soul rejoices at consecration! This moment I'll sally out into a world of white."
"Mrrrow! You wanna take a walk in your new clothes."

900621020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give +1/+0 to all other allied followers.
900621020.baseFlair_: Here I appear in robes so drear. The shackles of darkness have been released this moment. The hour of pure ebon has begun!
900621020.evoFlair_:
"My soul rejoices at degradation! This moment I'll give the ebon to the allies."
"Mrrrow! You wanna show your new fur to your friends!"

101631030.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, deal 2 damage to the enemy leader and a random enemy follower if the leader's defense is higher than yours.
101631030.baseFlair_: A divine being and mistress of vengeance. She gets her power from the shattered remnants of humans' hopes and dreams.
101631030.evoFlair_: Her greatest joy is fanning the flames of hatred in the hearts of the downtrodden. She hopes that those tiny flames will one day grow into a world-devouring conflagration.

103631030.baseEffect_:
Bane.
Can only attack the enemy leader and followers with Ward.
103631030.baseFlair_: The black-winged maiden smiles seductively and glances meaningfully down at the abyss. Take her hand and you'll never set foot on the surface again.
103631030.evoFlair_: The black-winged temptress grins in satisfaction when you assent to step into the darkness. For she is no mere maiden, but the monarch who rules the abyss...

106631020.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to both leaders if Vengeance is not active for you. Deal 1 damage to all enemies instead if Vengeance is active for you.
106631020.baseFlair_: If fairness is the true nature of gods, then this thunder is divine. My lightning will pull all heaven and earth apart and reduce them to dust.
106631020.evoFlair_: Praise the divine lightning? So foolish, so prideful! The gods aren't the only ones who destroy the heavens. But I'll show you who will with this power.

108631010.baseEffect_:
Ambush.
Whenever an allied Forest Bat comes into play, give it +1/+0 and Storm until the end of the turn.
108631010.baseFlair_: A hundred years is fine, and so's a thousand. But what happens when life continues on a hundred times, a thousand times more? Even if the body resists decay, the mind cannot. It will simply go mad. —An adventurer
108631010.evoFlair_: It has no intelligence and cannot reason. But it's lived a thousand years a thousand times over. One look in its eyes and you'll begin to decay. —An adventurer

109631010.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (2): Deal 1 damage to your leader.
Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower.
109631010.baseFlair_: This eye burns with contempt, twisting and gnarling my charred physique. This pain... It's all your fault! Until my last breath, I will detest you!
109631010.evoEffect_: Evolve: Deal X damage to all enemy followers. X equals the number of times that your leader was damaged during your turn in this match.
109631010.evoFlair_: You've branded me as evil, but have you taken a look at yourselves? I was born with this hatred. But this pain you've inflicted upon me... It is you who are the truly evil ones here!

110631010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 2 damage to your leader and draw 2 cards. Deal 1 damage to the enemy leader, and your opponent draws 1 card.
110631010.baseFlair_: People fear what is different, but if we meld our dissimilarities, then there would be nothing left to fear, so go forth and convulse en masse. Assenters, dissenters, and objectors alike, come together in commensurate affection.
110631010.evoFlair_:
The Third Provision: Intermingle
All conflicts and wars are the product of discrepant views and insufficient empathy. Mix, intermingle, ravish, enrapture, and save this world. —Teachings from the Manor of Lust

114631010.baseEffect_:
Bane.
Fanfare: If Avarice is active for you, gain Storm.
114631010.baseFlair_: Wahahaha! You've really shaped up from the sad little crybaby you used to be! We've been fated to fight since birth! So let's make the most of it! Taste my ultimate technique! Nightmarish Descent!
114631010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
114631010.evoFlair_:
Nightmarish Descent! That single attack brings devastation raining down from the sky, drilling through the earth just like Venomous Stakes!
—The mysterious Masked Scholar

114631030.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (1): Deal X damage to an enemy follower. X equals the number of times that your leader was damaged during your turn in this match.
----------
Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to your leader and 5 damage to an enemy follower.
114631030.baseFlair_: I'm a greedy man—there is no limit to my desires. So I'll take my compensation up front, thanks. Don't expect any more work from me than you pay for.
114631030.evoFlair_: Your delusion in itself is my compensation. I feed on humans' feelings and their greed. When I tire of yours... I'm sure I'll devour you too.

101641030.baseEffect_: At the start of your turn, deal 2 damage to your leader if Vengeance is not active for you. Then give -2/-0 to this follower.
101641030.baseFlair_: Hey, why so glum! You're mine now. You should be delighted! Come on, smile! I want to see you smile!
101641030.evoFlair_: All you have to do is listen to what I say. You're a good kid, and I want to give you a reward. Something special. Here, taste this wine; it's made with my own blood. Taste it, and we'll be bound together forever.

102641010.baseEffect_: During your turn, deal any damage dealt to your leader to the enemy leader instead.
102641010.baseFlair_: Blood is so very hot and stimulating. You really should try coloring yourself with it.
102641010.evoFlair_: Injury, pain, seeping blood... I simply revel in them! I'll stain you in blood again and again.

106641020.baseEffect_: Last Words: Give your leader the following effect - Once on each of your turns, when your leader takes damage, deal 3 damage to all enemies. (This effect is not stackable and lasts for the rest of the match.)
106641020.baseFlair_: Those who revere the gods reach sacred lands, but those who revile the gods arrive at terrifying places. The serpent's writhing foretells naught but woe. Your only hope is to cast off your humanity—so go ahead, drink up. —The Forgotten Play, Witch's lines
106641020.evoFlair_: The serpent's bite delivers curses, not venom. These hexes have the power to destroy humans, twisting their very form. Flesh melted, bones broken—you'll become the beast of the demon's land. —The Forgotten Play, Witch's lines

107641010.baseEffect_: Last Words: Give both leaders the following effect - At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to your leader. (This effect lasts for the rest of the match.)
107641010.baseFlair_: You called us demons. You called us monsters. You called for our demise. Unfortunately for you, we survived. Now its our turn to hunt—this night of enchantment has just begun!
107641010.evoFlair_: You tried to drown us. Now we will drown this world into the abyss—hatred, disgust, all of your despicable traits. Your nights of tranquility have ended, for this night will be stained in blood!

109641030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 3 damage to an enemy. Give your leader the following effect: At the start of your next turn, lose 3 play points.
109641030.baseFlair_: Ominous clouds, thunderous tremors, a strike of lightning. The manifestation of fury is an unyielding hammer—incinerating all fighting spirit and divine wills.
109641030.evoFlair_: Pressure builds and releases, tearing the heavens asunder. The manifestation of cruelty is an inescapable hammer—all shall be eradicated without discrimination.

110641030.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: If Vengeance is active for you, gain Storm.
Fanfare: If you have 2 other cards or less in your hand, gain Drain. If you have 0 cards in your hand, gain +3/+1.
110641030.baseFlair_: Eat humans? I could never. Like, they're huuuman—they're weaker than the bugs we've got in hell. No, no, it's way more fun to cut them, dice them, slice them, stab them, impale them, maim them... I could go on!
110641030.evoFlair_: Humans scream, like, a lot. Oh, and they cry too. I guess that's how you know they're squishy. Do you know how to make 'em real upset? It's all right if you don't know—I'll show ya...

112641010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Summon 3 Serpents.
At the end of your turn, give Bane to a random allied Serpent.
At the end of your turn, give Ward to a random allied Serpent.
112641010.baseFlair_:
"You'll pay if you take us lightly!"
Anacondas, vipers, pythons. All snakes become her shield.
"I'll teach you how scary snakes can be!"
They bare their fangs at any who would trespass against their princess.
112641010.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Put a Medusiana into your hand.
At the end of your turn, give Bane to a random allied Serpent.
At the end of your turn, give Ward to a random allied Serpent.
112641010.evoFlair_:
"Come, Medusiana!"
One that could swallow a dragon whole, answers her call.
"Playtime is over! Rip them to shreds!"
All those who oppose the princess of snakes will find themselves as mere field mice before her noble steed.

101624020.baseEffect_:
Destroy an enemy follower.
Draw a card if Vengeance is active for you.

117624010.baseEffect_: Deal 4 damage to all enemy followers. Then, if Vengeance is active for you, deal 4 damage to the enemy leader.
117624010.baseFlair_: Just try running from these silver chains! You'll be cleansed by their blue flames yet!

713624010.baseEffect_: Deal 4 damage to all enemy followers. Then, if Vengeance is active for you, deal 4 damage to the enemy leader.
713624010.baseFlair_: You have no country to defend! Nothing to avenge! You also don't have a shred of ambition! Someone with no reason to fight should just leave!

101634010.baseEffect_:
If Vengeance is active for you, this card costs 4 less.
----------
Deal 4 damage to an enemy follower.
Restore 2 defense to your leader.
101634010.baseFlair_: Why stop there when there's much more life left?

900644020.baseEffect_:
Evolve all allied Machina followers.
Evolve effects will not activate for those followers.
900644020.baseFlair_: Disengaging safeguards. Alpha Drive. —Mono, Garnet Rebel

100611040.baseFlair_: Revolution? Rebellion? Simply delightful! I just live for chaos! May you be the first witness to my swift and ghastly reign of terror! Well, don't just stand there. Help me!
100611040.evoFlair_: War is just wonderful! Nothing beats the sight of fallen soldiers! Let's make this battle so gruesome they'll talk about it for ages. Well, come on! Hurry up and let me do my work!

101611120.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Gain +1/+0 and Ward if Vengeance is active for you.
101611120.baseFlair_: His skin is like steel, impervious to inferior blades.
101611120.evoFlair_: Unbreakable mettle encased in impenetrable steel.

102611030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Gain +2/+2 if Vengeance is active for you.
102611030.baseFlair_: The lowly demon was summoned to the battlefield bound in chains. Even soldiers were reduced to shreds before the creature's overwhelming violence.
102611030.evoFlair_: The beastly demon broke its chains to taste freedom at last. No longer a thrall to its master's orders, the demon was instead bound by its feral instincts.

103611060.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, gain +2/+0 and deal 2 damage to your leader.
103611060.baseFlair_: Present your offering to me, little one, and I'll obey your every command. I'll even call you master...
103611060.evoFlair_: As long as you do what I require, I'll follow you. I'll fulfill my end of our bargain. Now what do you wish of me, my sweet master?

115611030.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (2): Summon 2 Serpents.
----------
Ward.
Fanfare: Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower. If Vengeance is active for you, restore 3 defense to your leader.
115611030.baseFlair_: Poison is medicine. Take, for example, the venomous cobra: the potent poison it stores in its body acts as a catalyst for the unbelievable speed of its growth.
115611030.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
115611030.evoFlair_: Medicine is poison. Take, for example, the cobra's venom: it blisters human skin and eats away at rock and earth.

118611030.baseEffect_:
Crystallize (3): Countdown (3)
Fanfare: Summon an Arcane Personnel Carrier.
Last Words: Summon a Roulette Vampire.
----------
Rush.
Last Words: Summon an Arcane Personnel Carrier.
118611030.baseFlair_: Oh, is this your first time at the casino? Welcome! I do hope you enjoy your stay. Will you bet on red or black first? Or will you risk it all on one number? Either way, I'll give you a tip: don't look away. Now, let's give the wheel a spin! —Diamond Casino, Topaz Floor
118611030.evoFlair_:
Your straight-up bet paid off. Good job on spotting my little trick, too! My gaze determines into which pocket the ball will fall. This time I cajoled it from one to ten. Yes, cajoled. Didn't you know the ball is alive?
—Diamond Casino, Topaz Floor

103621040.baseEffect_: Clash: Deal 1 damage to all enemy followers.
103621040.baseFlair_: That day we learned that anything big enough can threaten our world. —Battalion report
103621040.evoFlair_: A single swipe of the behemoth's hand was all it took to scatter three platoons. Honestly, to see it felt more like looking at a natural disaster than at combat. —Battalion report

106621020.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Whenever this follower attacks and destroys an enemy follower, if this follower is not destroyed, deal 2 damage to a random enemy follower.
106621020.baseFlair_: The twilight signals the coming of the demon wolf and her sinister howl. The freezing wind signals the death of a god at her fangs. Her fangs should be feared; her claws rend the battlefield. —Tale of the Demon Wolf
106621020.evoFlair_: The demon wolf who hungers for blood will consume the sky and crush the earth. She hunts tirelessly for the heart of the spear-wielding god. Her hatred should be feared; her fury will bring the end. —Tale of the Demon Wolf

109621020.baseFlair_: I do say, any cretin foolish enough to make an enemy of the Erste Empire will be met with the fiercest opposition! Or I am not captain of the finest imperial forces!
109621020.evoEffect_:
Ward.
At the start of your turn, deal 3 damage to this follower.
109621020.evoFlair_: To think that you vermin would be this strong... You've left me with no choice. I'll show you the power of dark essence, the very limits of our technology! Behold our true strength!

111621010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Draw 3 cards.
Last Words: Deal 3 damage to your leader.
111621010.baseFlair_: What is treasure to your eyes is trash to a demon's. Yet you covet what is treasure to a demon's eyes as well. No negotiation is needed when one deals in deception. —Words of Belphegor
111621010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
111621010.evoFlair_: The truly wise wouldn't go around striking deals with demons. Fools who thought themselves to be cunning all met with the same fate... I have all the time in the world to play with my food. —Words of Belphegor

101631060.baseEffect_: Follower Strike: Destroy the enemy follower before it can deal any damage in return.
101631060.baseFlair_: You've got something against my hair? Well, you've got guts; I'll give you that! I don't take kindly to those who mock my flowing locks though. Prepare to be turned to stone!
101631060.evoFlair_: Cry all you like; your fate is sealed! You've insulted me, and now it's time to pay the price! Show me your snakiest, dear little darlings!

105631020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Draw 2 cards. Deal 2 damage to the enemy leader for each Neutral card drawn.
105631020.baseFlair_: Humans are beasts, beasts that prowl in search of answers. Such peculiar creatures! Meow-ha-ha!
105631020.evoFlair_: Answers aren't anything you find through searching. Like shadows, they're always there by your side. Meow-ha-ha!

113631020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If Vengeance is active for you, subtract 1 from the cost of 2 Bloodcraft cards (excluding Heartsick Demon) in your hand.
113631020.baseFlair_: Tragic tales of lost love, romance between beast and lady—it is but words that bind their passions. Young romps take to the skies of blue, a couple's ardent devotion, fated life-long loves! As a watchful guardian over their love, I must see all stories through to the end.
113631020.evoFlair_:
There's nothing quite like it... The joy of shared bliss, the pity of a missed connection.
Those two... They're together! They're a couple!
Oh, I musn't engage, but my feelings of passion must be heard! Ah... Love! Wonderful, bittersweet love!

113631030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If Vengeance is active for you, recover 2 evolution points.
113631030.baseFlair_:
She values her friends and wants no harm to come to them. If only she were to fight alone, the others wouldn't need to get hurt.
"May... Leave this to the grown-ups!"
—The Path to Adventure with Three, Plus One, Part 3
113631030.evoFlair_:
She's their valued friend, so they don't want her to be all alone. And if everyone fought together, she wouldn't need to be.
"You're a nincompoop, Moriana!"
—The Path to Adventure with Three, Plus One, Part 4

114631020.baseEffect_:
Crystallize (1): Countdown (1)
Last Words: If it is your turn, put a random Natura card from your deck into your hand. If it is your opponent's turn, draw a card.
----------
Fanfare: Deal 2 damage to an enemy follower. If an allied Naterran Great Tree is in play, deal 2 damage to all enemy followers instead.
114631020.baseFlair_:
Vampires are creatures who have cast off the shackles of fate to live beyond the bounds of common sense. Even so. That one. Is. Different. The way. She moves. Should I. Give in? To madness?
—A historian's scrawled journal entry
114631020.evoFlair_:
Unshackled. Unshackled. Shackledun. Dun, dun, dun. Dunshackledun vampire. She will. Take it. From you. What you cherish. Most. With hands. Fingers. Face. She will. Devour. Your strength. Born. Of madness.
—Twisted scrawl

101641010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Summon 2 Forest Bats and give allied Forest Bats Ward.
101641010.baseFlair_: I use blood to grant myself eternal life. To fulfill a promise I made long ago. To fulfill a vow I made in the name of joy and in the name of loss.
101641010.evoFlair_: My eternal life has but one purpose: to fulfill the promise I made on the day of the blood exchange. It is a vow that transcends eternity.

701641010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Summon 2 Forest Bats and give allied Forest Bats Ward.
701641010.baseFlair_: I use blood to grant myself eternal life. To fulfill a promise I made long ago. To fulfill a vow I made in the name of joy and in the name of loss.
701641010.evoFlair_: My eternal life has but one purpose: to fulfill the promise I made on the day of the blood exchange. It is a vow that transcends eternity.

105641010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give your leader the following effects - You will not gain a play point at the start of your turn. At the end of your turn, draw a card and deal 1 damage to the enemy leader. (These effects last for the rest of the match.)
105641010.baseFlair_: The flow of time is difficult to stop for most, but for me it's so simple. Stay beautiful and dream for eternity.
105641010.evoFlair_: Permanence is just another name for death. But what of it? In this world nothing's sweeter than eternity!

108641010.baseEffect_:
If you have at least 6 play points, and Vengeance is active for you, Choose: Play this card as a Kind Queen Vania or Blood Queen Vania.
----------
Fanfare: Deal 2 damage to both leaders. Then summon a Forest Bat.
108641010.baseFlair_: Someday I'm gonna be a queen. Hey, bloodkin, what should I do then?
108641010.evoFlair_: Hey, bloodkin! You're still gonna be my bloodkin even after I'm queen. Stay with me forever and ever, and be nice to me forever and ever!

112641030.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: If you have at least 7 other cards in your hand, gain Drain.
Fanfare: If you have 3 to 5 other Machina cards in your hand, gain Rush. If you have at least 6 other Machina cards in your hand, gain Storm.
112641030.baseFlair_: I've finally understood why the monsters were collecting mechanical parts. Holy water, sunlight, stakes—nothing penetrates the carapace they've made. That armor is nigh invulnerable. —Vampire Hunter's Notes, Part 3
112641030.evoFlair_: Go ahead, bask in the sweet luster of my steel. You can see why I've adorned my claws—and my very body—in this material. Is there a more fitting symbol of flawlessness? Is there a more fitting path to new, bloodred beauty?

114641010.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (2): Destroy an enemy follower with 4 defense or less. Deal 1 damage to your leader.
----------
Fanfare: Destroy 2 enemy followers. If Vengeance is not active for you, give your leader the following effect - At the start of your next turn, lose 2 play points.
114641010.baseFlair_: I have no tolerance for boors. They are not welcome on my island. If you insist on running amok here... prepare yourself. My blade is of far more costly make than you.
114641010.evoFlair_: Cross your heart and hope to die. Your drunken fugue ends here. You'll pay the price of your rampage with your head. Those are the rules.

116641010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Summon a Flood Behemoth and give it Ward. If Avarice is active for you, evolve this follower.
116641010.baseFlair_: Scared? Don't be. You're mine... My lovely, lovely toy. I will let nothing touch you.
116641010.evoEffect_: Strike: Give -2/-2 to all enemy followers. (Followers are destroyed when their defense drops below 1.)
116641010.evoFlair_: Your pleasure... is my pleasure. I will protect you. I will sweep you into my chest; I will bare my fangs at your enemies. Now come, my toy. Entertain me.

119641010.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: Skybound Art (10) - Summon a Seox, Heavenly Howl.
Super Skybound Art (15): Summon 2 Seox, Heavenly Howls instead.
Strike: Gain Storm and the following effect - The next time this follower takes damage, reduce that damage to 0. Then remove this Strike effect.
Can attack 2 times per turn.
119641010.baseFlair_: You've piqued my interest. You remind me of that man... the one who saved me from the dark and the loneliness. I'd like to observe your power— H-hey! Stop that! Don't touch my mask!
119641010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
119641010.evoFlair_: This power led to my clan's ruin. I hated it... and was also afraid of it. But you said you can count on me. Now, I look upon my power as a source of pride.

900641020.baseEffect_:
Drain.
Fanfare: Summon a Forest Bat.
Whenever an allied Forest Bat comes into play, give it Ward.
900641020.baseFlair_: Is this what it's like to be a queen? All nice and warm? Then that's what I'll be! C'mon, bloodkin, gimme a big hug!
900641020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
900641020.evoFlair_: You're happy when I'm nice, aren't you, bloodkin? Then I'll be nice to you forever and ever! That's what bloodkin are for!

900641030.baseEffect_:
Storm.
Fanfare: Summon a Forest Bat.
Whenever an allied Forest Bat comes into play, give it Bane.
900641030.baseFlair_: Is this what it's like to be a queen? When the bad guys come, I'll fight for you guys, bloodkin! I'll beat up all your enemies!
900641030.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
900641030.evoFlair_: If I fight with you, you'll be happy, right, bloodkin? Then we can be together forever and ever. I'll fight for you, bloodkin!

104614010.baseEffect_: Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower. Then give +3/+3 to a random allied follower.
104614010.baseFlair_: "Vampire, prepare yourse..." —Last words of a vampire hunter

100624010.baseEffect_: Deal 3 damage to all allies and enemies.
100624010.baseFlair_: Tonight blood will rain from the skies.

107634010.baseEffect_:
Deal 3 damage to all followers.
If Vengeance is active for you, recover 3 play points.

106611010.baseEffect_: Clash: Gain +3/+0. Deal 2 damage to your leader if Vengeance is not active for you.
106611010.baseFlair_: From the day that I vowed my love to him, everything that I am became his. But, no, I don't believe I'm being used. After all, he told me that he would make me his wife!
106611010.evoFlair_: There's no way he would betray me. What good would it do him? I won't let him run, I won't let him go, and I won't let him off. Haha—he's going to have to take responsibility.

100621010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 5 damage to an enemy follower if Vengeance is active for you.
100621010.baseFlair_: With every cry of rage his chains grow tighter, and every squeeze of the cold metal against his raw wounds feeds his anger. And so the cycle of torment continues.
100621010.evoFlair_: Eventually the chains were unable to contain his fury. Set free from his purgatory, he rampaged through the underworld in search of those that shackled him.

101621050.baseEffect_:
Storm.
Fanfare: Restore 4 defense to your leader if Vengeance is active for you.
101621050.baseFlair_: My brothers! Have pride in your lineage, your tenacity, your wisdom, your eternal lives! We are the chosen ones! We are the bloodline of darkness!
101621050.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
101621050.evoFlair_: Feel the dark blood coursing through your veins, my brothers, and kneel before me! I am the true leader of our bloodline! Bow your heads and offer your eternal loyalty!

102621020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 4 damage to your leader if Vengeance is not active for you.
102621020.baseFlair_: Pathetic weaklings! Know why you stand before me. Without destruction there can be no creation!
102621020.evoFlair_: Tremble in awe before the destruction I sow! Soon your body and soul will be no more!

103631020.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Whenever this follower attacks and destroys an enemy follower, if this follower is not destroyed, draw a card.
103631020.baseFlair_: The battlefield is my beloved; I want to keep fighting even after my mortal days are through. So I bound myself to a demon, thus transforming the warrior I was into the warfiend I am.
103631020.evoFlair_: My cheeks warped as my fangs grew in, and my forehead split to make way for my horns. But these trivial changes did nothing to change what I really want: war. War that rages throughout the ages!

104631020.baseEffect_:
Storm.
Whenever another follower is destroyed, gain +1/+0.
104631020.baseFlair_: I'd be happy to help relieve you of all those pesky attachments. So satisfy me with what remains of your soul!
104631020.evoFlair_: I know how much it hurts and how irritating it is, so offer yourself to me as sustenance. I'll transform your lowly regrets into sublime tragedy!

105631010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Destroy an enemy follower or amulet. Gain Storm if Vengeance is active for you.
105631010.baseFlair_: Time for fun and games! The enemy forces will be wiped out at my hands, and I'll bear victory and glory.
105631010.evoFlair_: Games are only fun for the victor! Losing's not worth a thing whether you're trounced or knicked. That's why I'll win and keep winning.

106631010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Summon 2 Serpents.
Whenever an allied Serpent comes into play, deal 2 damage to a random enemy follower.
106631010.baseFlair_:
Her mystic eye feeds on the mind, while her scalekin devour the body. As the oldest sister of the snake goddess, she is an especially cruel ruler.
"Your body, your mind—I'll consume it all."
106631010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
106631010.evoFlair_:
A cold grin crosses her lips as she raises her whip. She enjoys playing with and tormenting her prey, never letting them escape.
"I'll go ahead and say it—I'm not as lenient as my sisters."

117631010.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (1): Deal 1 damage to your leader. Deal 2 damage to an enemy follower.
----------
Rush.
Fanfare: If Wrath is active for you, deal 4 damage to an enemy and restore 4 defense to your leader.
117631010.baseFlair_: Indeed I am the Seven of Swords, mark of inequity. Vows be broken, contracts be damned. I live for myself. I invite you to partake in foul inequity and frivolous injustice for my amusement.
117631010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
117631010.evoFlair_: Allow me to whisper sweet nightmares into your ears. Everyone is merely a piece in a bigger game. Friend or foe, I make no distinction. I just want to sneer at the world.

103641010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Deal 2 damage to all enemy followers.
Whenever an enemy follower is destroyed, deal 1 damage to the enemy leader.
103641010.baseFlair_: It consumed the blood of all living things. It drank until people, dragons, and demons alike ran dry. And each time it drank, its body changed. It gained knowledge. It gained claws and fangs. It gained wings. All it lost was its sanity.
103641010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
103641010.evoFlair_: It constantly ached. It constantly thirsted. Its irrepressible, unstoppable, inescapable thirst became an urge rooted in its very being. Vampires fear it as the fate that lies in store for those who lose themselves to the thirst.

110641020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Randomly destroy 3 other followers. If Vengeance is not active for you, deal 7 damage to your leader.
110641020.baseFlair_: Rage burgeons and swathes itself in layers of hatred, despair, ruin, and madness. It spins into the form of a demonic fist. White- and black-winged alike are blown away in a wave of indiscriminate, unreasoning violence.
110641020.evoEffect_: Evolve: If Vengeance is active for you, randomly deal 1 damage to a leader or another follower. Do this 9 times.
110641020.evoFlair_: No one knows what passion, what frustration, reverberates in that echoing howl. Before they can learn, all who hear it are returned to dust.

114641020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Restore 3 defense to your leader. If an allied Naterran Great Tree is in play, gain the ability to evolve for 0 evolution points.
114641020.baseFlair_:
At last we have found the dark deity. Let us fall to our knees in reverence. The abnormal bat, werewolf, and vampire. All. Sprang. From this. This font. The font of. Madness. Madness itself.
—Survey team captain's scrawled journal entry
114641020.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Give your leader the following effects.
-At the end of your turn, if you have at least 8 cards in your hand, randomly discard cards until you have 7, then deal X damage to the enemy leader. X equals 2 times the number of cards discarded.
-At the start of your turn, draw a card.
(These effects are not stackable and last for the rest of the match.)
114641020.evoFlair_:
Great, great, great, great, great deity. No. Myself? Your power. Please. Stop? It will spread. Outward. Without. Cease. No good. Madness.
—Twisted scrawl

118641010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If there are no duplicate cards in your deck (excluding Volteo, Hedonistic Dealer), deal 5 damage to all other followers and give your leader the following effect - At the end of your turn, summon an Arcane Personnel Carrier, then put a random follower (excluding Volteo, Hedonistic Dealer) from your deck into play. Do this 2 times. (This effect is not stackable and lasts for the rest of the match.)
118641010.baseFlair_:
Ah, my fledgling star. Welcome. You have been selected as a candidate to become the newest casino manager! You just have to put it all on the line—position, wealth, life! Now the true gamble begins!
—Diamond Casino, Diamond Floor
118641010.evoFlair_:
Hah! This gamble was not a test of your prowess! It was all lies! I let you win from the very start! Well, you wagered your life and now it's time to collect! Bon appetit!
—Diamond Casino, Diamond Floor

119641020.baseEffect_:
Crystallize (3): Countdown (7)
At the start of your turn, restore 1 defense to your leader and, if you have more evolution points than your opponent, subtract 1 from this amulet's Countdown. (You have 0 evolution points on turns you are unable to evolve.)
Last Words: Summon a Xeno Diablo.
----------
Last Words: If Vengeance is active for you, deal 4 damage to all enemies. If Avarice is active for you, deal 4 damage to all enemies. If Wrath is active for you, deal 4 damage to all enemies.
119641020.baseFlair_: From a bloodstained cape, flame-wreathed arms reach out to embrace animus. As the demon raises a fist, the heavens fall, blanketing the horizon in darkness. It is the hatred of countless souls incarnate; its smile is a harbinger of the end.
119641020.evoFlair_: The beginning of despair is the end of hope—and the decreed hour is come. From the primordial abyss shall flow an everlasting night that swallows the world. From the dungeon of darkness the abomination will smile, knowing its work is done.

111611030.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (3): Deal 1 damage to all enemies.
----------
Fanfare: Deal 2 damage to all enemies.
111611030.baseFlair_: A young lion, whelped in the darkest depths. Legend has it he once served as guardian angel to a great prophet, but the truth has been lost to time.
111611030.evoFlair_: A young lion, whelped in the darkest depths. He grants strength to the vengeful, spurring them on to retribution. Legend has it he himself yearns to rebel against the heavens, but the truth has been lost to time.

101631010.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to the enemy leader and draw a card.
101631010.baseFlair_: I am the living embodiment of revenge. I draw strength from the darkness within human hearts. Hatred... Envy... Soon this world will be filled with resentment!
101631010.evoFlair_: The world is filled with hatred, and the time for revenge is upon us! My dark arts shall skewer the hearts of the hypocrites and pin their souls to the tombstone of resentment!

102631010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Change both leaders' defense to 10, either by restoring defense or by dealing damage.
102631010.baseFlair_: Though my soul may fall, I shall never bow my head to such weak, stunted creatures as mortals. I still possess a measure of pride.
102631010.evoFlair_: When the time came, we sounded the battle cry against the gods that deceived us... As fellow traitors, you are now compelled to follow me.

104641020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Summon a Maelstrom Serpent. Repeat until your area is full if Vengeance is active for you.
104641020.baseFlair_: The gigantic wriggling serpent is a maelstrom that swallows people, cities, cultures, and ideas alike, like a storm that blows away everything in its path.
104641020.evoFlair_: The tremendous, frenzied serpent is nothing less than a calamity that swallows the heavens and the earth. It crushes everything without discrimination, returning it to nothingness like some sort of divine judge.

105641020.baseEffect_:
Ambush.
Strike: Deal 6 damage to the enemy leader if Ambush is active for this follower.
Last Words: Deal 6 damage to the enemy leader if Ambush is active for this follower.
105641020.baseFlair_: Afflicted and annihilated, one oozes into the ebon abyss. Look and fear, human. There lurks despair: one who preys on iniquitous flesh and the bones of the besmirched. —The Abyss, Chapter 2, Verse 4
105641020.evoEffect_:
Ambush.
Strike: Deal 8 damage to the enemy leader if Ambush is active for this follower.
Last Words: Deal 8 damage to the enemy leader if Ambush is active for this follower.
105641020.evoFlair_: Be drenched! Oh, cry out beyond the edge! All is swallowed and flows into the lightless depths. The day has begun—a day longer than eternity and shorter than a blink. —The Abyss, Finale, Verse 1

108641020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal X damage to an enemy. X equals the number of times that your leader was damaged during your turn in this match.
108641020.baseFlair_: Sleep is a product of the beast that consumes the darkness... and those within it. —Chapter 1, A History of Night
108641020.evoFlair_: Humans came to fear the night on account of something that confines them for all eternity. —Chapter 3, A History of Night

111641020.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Transform each Bloodcraft card in your hand that originally costs 2 play points or less into a Crimson Burst.
111641020.baseFlair_: It was humans who spilled blood upon my soil. One good turn deserves another, so I'll see them painted in the same crimson. Yes, caught in my briars and pierced by my thorns... Oh, how red they'll bloom.
111641020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
111641020.evoFlair_: The more blood my roses drink, the more crimson they bloom. Yes, this place is my paradise, but for those foolish humans, it is both purgatory and hell.

113641010.baseEffect_:
During your turn, when this card is added to your hand from your deck, if Vengeance is not active for you, reveal it, change your leader's maximum defense to 10, and then banish it.
----------
Fanfare: Deal 4 damage to an enemy. Restore 4 defense to your leader.
113641010.baseFlair_:
"That vanilla stuff? A little boring, don't you think?"
One look into her eyes is all it takes to fall into the hells of romance.
"You can have it... a passionate love more intense than anything you've ever felt."
113641010.evoFlair_:
"I've lost my taste for those sweet, happy endings."
The incarnation of beauty itself smiled bewitchingly, her prey completely enraptured.
"But you'll give me what I really want, right? All I need is a taste of that bitter, delicious despair."

113641030.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (2): Summon a Voice of the Abyss.
----------
Ambush.
If Ambush is active for this follower when it attacks, summon 3 Voices of the Abyss.
113641030.baseFlair_: Avert your eyes. Seal your breath. Even the ends of the heavens are unsafe from its grasps. Before you is a wretched garden, whose thorns prey on the skin of the ignorant. Turn around, and the voices of despair shall call you once more. —The Abyss, Chapter 3, Verse 6
113641030.evoEffect_:
Ambush.
If Ambush is active for this follower when it attacks, summon 4 Voices of the Abyss.
113641030.evoFlair_:
His arm, in the deepest depths of its organs. Within the screaming throat, darkness blooms. The nightmare becometh real, bringing forth a new life. Ah... To be born with sin. A new song echoes.
—The Abyss, Finale, Verse 5

900641010.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Bane.
Can attack up to 3 times per turn.
900641010.baseFlair_: "You'll have plenty of time to regret fighting us—when you're sitting in her stomach! Medusiana, swallow 'em whole!" —Medusa, controller of the great snake
900641010.evoFlair_: "Huh? Pointing your sword at the gorgon sisters? That's more than a little stupid! Medusiana—punish 'em!" —Medusa, controller of the great snake

101634020.baseEffect_:
If Vengeance is active for you, this card costs 4 less.
----------
Deal 8 damage to all followers.
101634020.baseFlair_: It takes days to make a world, but a second to destroy it.

108611020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 4 damage to both leaders.
108611020.baseFlair_: Pain for all the earth. Woe, grief, and misfortune. Now cry your tears of agony!
108611020.evoFlair_: Cry, and let the pain drive you mad! No matter where you run, the pain I inflict will be there with you.

118611020.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (2): Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower. If any allied amulets are in play, draw a card.
----------
Storm.
Fanfare: If any allied amulets are in play, recover 3 play points.
118611020.baseFlair_: Pain? What pain? I'm so pissed I forgot I'm even hurt! Oh, I'll cool down—after I punch a hole through your freaking face!
118611020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
118611020.evoFlair_: Reason? Hell if I know. I'm so mad I forgot why I'm mad! Maybe pounding your face in will jog my memory!

101631050.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 5 damage to an enemy. Restore 5 defense to your leader.
101631050.baseFlair_: Naked is the human mind in my presence. By all means cling to your doubts. My talents allow me deep inside your mind. Now offer up your life to me.
101631050.evoFlair_: Step outside your facade and cast aside your mortal ties, for tonight we revel. Tonight you will surrender to the tantalizing taste of my company!

107641020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Put a Demonic Storm and a Demonic Strike into your hand. If Vengeance is active for you, recover 6 play points.
This follower can't be damaged by spells.
107641020.baseFlair_: This deception of a world has gone stale. Let the demons roam freely, and reduce it to ash—the fire will rightfully return you all to the void.
107641020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
107641020.evoFlair_: His demons are masters of deception. All colors of the heavens and earth will vanish before them.

115641030.baseEffect_:
Crystallize (2): Countdown (2)
Fanfare: Draw 2 cards.
Last Words: Deal 2 damage to your leader.
----------
Fanfare: Deal 5 damage to a random enemy follower and then the enemy leader. If Wrath is active for you, deal 10 damage instead.
115641030.baseFlair_: When her roar resounds, the frozen soil cracks and a beam of light splits the sky. None who live should risk the queen's displeasure.
115641030.evoFlair_: At her second roar, even the skies shall pale in fear. The haughty queen of frozen earth is an ice-cloaked avatar of terror.

117641010.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (0): Put an Unselfish Grace into your hand. If Avarice is active for you, put an Insatiable Desire into your hand instead.
----------
Can't be targeted by enemy effects.
