117641010.baseFlair_:
Truth is waste. Your world has been reshaped.
I am Temperance, patron of austerity.
There is only one necessity:
Reality.
117641010.evoFlair_:
Hopes. Dreams. Memories. These are tools of hedonism.
Sever all luxuries; leave only thy corporeal self.
Discard excess. Learn what is needed:
Rationality.

112631010.baseEffect_:
During your turn, whenever an allied follower evolves, subtract 1 from the cost of this card.
----------
Fanfare: Deal 3 damage to all enemies. If Vengeance is active for you, summon 2 Serpents and give all allied Serpents Ward.
112631010.baseFlair_: This is the form you find most alluring? How charming—how obscene—I'm rather fond of it. Well, time to get down to business. I'm here to damn you, after all.
112631010.evoFlair_: It's only natural to lose yourself to indulgence and madness. After all, I'm going to make this night last as long as I can. We'll see if your body lasts until morning.

109641020.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (8): Destroy all allied followers and amulets. For each card, put a random follower that costs more than it from your deck into play.
----------
Storm.
Bane.
109641020.baseFlair_: After abducting the bodies of the living, he transfigures them completely. Assembled are instruments of resentment to perform malicious symphonies for his orchestra of slaughter.
109641020.evoFlair_: The tones are striking and coarse—too intense for a human to endure. His otherworldly music twists the ears and crumples the heart. Upon the finale is an ovation from demonkind, as all that remains is death and destruction.

116641030.baseEffect_:
Crystallize (2): Countdown (10)
During your turn, whenever another allied amulet comes into play, subtract 1 from this amulet's Countdown.

----------

Once on each of the opponent's turns, when the opponent plays a follower, it can't attack until the end of the opponent's turn.
116641030.baseFlair_: Follow not the cursed threads. Their source is illness incarnate, and it spins a web of madness. It speaks in cacophony and abides in distortion. Hear or see it once, and there is no return. Cover your ears; still the sound seeps in. Close your eyes; still the image blazes.
116641030.evoFlair_:
Silver, holy water, even the sun... There is nothing left that can restrain me. You think these tendrils of madness tenacious? Watch me sever them with steel. The moonstruck night is over. And when day breaks, I begin.
—A Vampire with Pure Silver Wings

118641030.baseEffect_:
When this card is added to your hand from your deck, subtract X from its cost. X equals twice the number of times you've played a Bloodsoaked Archdemon using its Accelerate effect.
----------
Accelerate (1): Draw a card. Put a Bloodsoaked Archdemon into your deck.
----------
Rush.
After Clashing with an enemy follower, if this follower is not destroyed, fully restore its defense and deal 5 damage to the enemy leader.
118641030.baseFlair_: They pursue me relentlessly. They rack me and slice at my flesh. I desire naught but love and peace. I do not wish to fight. Devils, O foul devils, begone. Why will you not leave me be?
118641030.evoFlair_: Without warning, they are racked and sliced; there is no time to wail or gnash teeth. Their tormentor calls them devils while begging for mercy; all the while his hands are never idle. He is the devil, a diseased soul trapped in a victimhood of his own making.

900111020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Banish this follower if at least 2 other cards were played this turn.
900111020.baseFlair_: Gliding upon the wind, as if to illuminate the canopy of the forest—but try and catch a glimpse, they'll vanish without a trace.
900111020.evoFlair_: Gliding upon the wind, gently floating as if willed by the forest itself—even now, they continue to flutter and flicker.

110124010.baseEffect_:
Banish an enemy follower with 0 attack or less.
Draw a card.
Enhance (6): Banish any enemy follower instead.
110124010.baseFlair_: Burned by tears or torn by screams, you must bear it, never decaying, for all eternity.

900134040.baseFlair_: I'm gonna fight too! Wars are filled with pain and sadness, and they make you want to run away... Still, I won't turn back—not ever! I might've shown up here on accident, but that doesn't matter. I really love this world!

900134050.baseEffect_: Deal 3 damage to a random enemy follower.
900134050.baseFlair_: Guess I'll fight or whatever. Honestly, I've got better things to be doing, but hey, mabes there's something to all this hope stuff Chickadee's been going on about. At least I'll look cool.

900144020.baseEffect_:
Draw 2 cards.
Enhance (2): Add 2 to the number of cards played this turn.
900144020.baseFlair_: The noble shimmer of life for you, noble one. —Yggdrasil

900144030.baseEffect_:
Give an allied follower +1/+0 and Rush.
Enhance (4): Then give all allied followers Storm.
900144030.baseFlair_: The noble shimmer of life must not be defiled by anyone. —Yggdrasil

900144070.baseEffect_:
Banish all cards in play.
Banish all cards in your hand and deck.
Put copies of the first 10 cards your opponent played this match (excluding XII. Wolfraud, Hanged Man and Treacherous Reversal) into your deck, in the order they were played.
Transform the Reaper at the bottom of your deck into a Victory Card.
Treat allied cards that have been destroyed this match as if they were banished.
At the end of your opponent's next turn, put copies of each card in your opponent's hand into your hand (excluding XII. Wolfraud, Hanged Man and Treacherous Reversal).
900144070.baseFlair_:
So how's it hangin', and how do you do?
What's fact and what's fiction is up to you!
Hey... You really gonna believe that? Heck, I'm not even sure myself!
Nothing matters except satisfying yourself!

100111010.baseEffect_: Last Words: Put a Fairy into your hand.
100111010.baseFlair_: Fairies get lonely, so we always stick together. If you hurt me, they won't be pleased!
100111010.evoFlair_: If you try and hurt me, we'll make you regret it. But if you're a good friend, the fairies won't forget it!

101111010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to a random enemy follower.
101111010.baseFlair_: Elf rules say we've gotta live as one with nature, but grown-ups get to go out into the world! Pffft, I can't wait till I'm bigger.
101111010.evoFlair_: I mean, I really like the forest! It's my home! But I wanna know what's out there so bad. So, um, I was thinking of going on an adventure! I mean, look, I'm so grown-up already, right? It'll be fine!

101111020.baseFlair_: I fight to defend the forest from the forces of darkness! I will not allow any more of my friends to be killed!
101111020.evoFlair_: I'm not going to cry any more! I'm going to keep fighting even if I don't have any strength left! Courage makes anything possible! Shield of the pixies, lend me your strength!

103111050.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Gain +1/+1 if at least 2 other cards were played this turn.
103111050.baseFlair_: Look! Look how high I can climb now! Soon I'm going to be a grown-up!
103111050.evoFlair_: Once I grow up, I'm gonna leave the forest. One day I'll be a big cat girl!

111111030.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Give +1/+1 to another allied follower with at least 4 attack.
Enhance (4): Give +1/+1 to all other allied followers instead.
111111030.baseFlair_: The forest is a living, breathing organism. That's why I look after its health. Just like people need doctors, the forest needs an arborist!
111111030.evoFlair_: Young Treants are bad at expressing themselves. But I understand what they mean. H-hey, what? Are those termites? Eeeww, get away!

112111030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Until the end of the turn, subtract 1 from the cost of a Machina card (excluding Robotic Bagworm) in your hand.
112111030.baseFlair_: The source of the core's metamorphosis was a tiny little insect. It began using steel in place of branches and iron instead of leaves to construct its cocoon. As a result, it was afforded protection from predators and the environment alike. —Researcher's Report, Part 1
112111030.evoFlair_: Something is strange about this forest. Today I fired an arrow at a most curious insect, and to my surprise, it deflected it! It was my first encounter with a bug sporting a metallic carapace. —Forest Notes, Part 1

115111020.baseEffect_: Last Words: Put a Greenwood Guardian into your hand.
115111020.baseFlair_: To an outsider, this nation must look like it's been conquered by the forest. But the people here praised my skill, saved my family, and gave me a duty to fulfill. This is the best work environment I could ask for.
115111020.evoFlair_: Here in this forest, things like social status and political power are more worthless than weeds. Even if I put an extra hole in the head of some noble who broke the law, no one would criticize me. I can't think of a better place to work.

116111030.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: If at least 4 other cards were played this turn, summon an Ironback Beetle.
Clash: If any other allied Machina followers are in play, gain +1/+1.
116111030.baseFlair_:
The source of the core's metamorphosis was another tiny little insect. It began wrapping its horn in steel, giving it an impressive boost in power—so much so that the little guy can bore through a live tree. What a transformation.
—Forest Elf's Journal, Part 1
116111030.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
116111030.evoFlair_:
Steel-covered insects, beasts clad in steel—the forest elves have but one explanation: the fauna have adopted machinery into their biology. One suspects we will soon follow suit.
—On Flourishing, Part 1

118111030.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Last Words: Summon a Dutiful Steed.
118111030.baseFlair_: Some stranger was commenting about the "fashionable scarecrow" out by the ranch. What's he doin' in this one-horse town? For his sake, I hope he's not here to rustle the cattle. That cactus'll do more than just spook him. —General Store Shopkeeper, Jessop Village
118111030.evoFlair_:
He doesn't eat or sleep. I reckon he's the perfect lookout; he ain't a bad shot, either. Don't waste your time feelin' sorry for trespassers—this town's prosperity comes from the ranch, after all.
—General Store Patron, Jessop Village

900111010.baseFlair_: There are fairies in forests, fountains, flower beds, and everywhere else. If you can't see them, it's because your heart is impure. Look, there's one right next to you!
900111010.evoFlair_: Trickery, moodiness, mischief—while these are all aspects of fairies' characters, what's most important is the strength of their feelings. They are highly emotional and will sacrifice their lives to help their friends and families.

117121020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If at least 2 other cards were played this turn, gain +2/+2. Then, if at least 4 other cards were played this turn, gain +2/+2 more and Ward.
117121020.baseFlair_:
Mom told me to leave it in the forest, but she's not the boss of me! This bug's way too cool! I'm totally taking it home with me!
—A Boy's Account
117121020.evoFlair_:
He did promise to take good care of it. Boys will be boys, I guess. But I draw the line when a pet is literally bigger than the house!
—A Mother's Account

119121010.baseEffect_:
Invocation: When you play a card using its Accelerate effect for the second time this turn, invoke this card.
----------
Storm.
Fanfare: Enhance (6) - Gain +X/+X. X equals the number of times you've played a card using its Accelerate effect this match.
119121010.baseFlair_:
I am Walder, brave warrior of the forest! As a ranger, it's my duty to disperse the dastardly forces that threaten this place! Prepare to kiss the blue sky goodbye!
Woo, that was awesome! Now that's what I call making an entrance!
119121010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
119121010.evoFlair_: Wait for me, Jade. I'll come back with plenty of tales of my adventures! And then we can forge our own new legends, together!

113131010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Gain +X/+0. X equals the number of allied Whirlwind Rhinoceroaches you've played this match. If X is at least 5, gain Storm.
113131010.baseFlair_: The witch first gave it a simple command: usurp life. He would carry out that order faithfully—quicker and more accurately.
113131010.evoEffect_: At the end of your turn, return this follower to your hand.
113131010.evoFlair_: Its thorny carapace is thick and its swinging blades are sharp: it is the usurper of life. And once again it will carry out the orders of the witch.

113131030.baseEffect_:

Fanfare: If at least 4 other cards were played this turn, deal 4 damage to a random enemy follower.
113131030.baseFlair_: Let's all go on an adventure. I've got snacks in my bag and a pocketful of friendship. Nothing will be scary while the three of us are together. —The Path to Adventure with Three, Plus One, Part 1
113131030.evoFlair_: The are lots of dangers out on an adventure. We might even have to fight. "Let me battle it out alone!" "No way!" The travelers argue, and cracks begin to form in their friendship. —The Path to Adventure with Three, Plus One, Part 2

110141020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Crystalia Eve into your hand and change its cost to 3 if at least 2 other cards were played this turn. Change its cost to 1 instead if at least 4 other cards were played this turn.
110141020.baseFlair_: Beyond the glaciers, where the snowstorm leads, whatever could bring you to this place a second time? You're a strange one... but that might not be so bad. I suppose I could lend you a hand.
110141020.evoFlair_: The crystals' power is eternal. In comparison, our chance meeting is but a sigh which clouds the frozen air before dispersing. Even so... perhaps this fleeting warmth has meaning. Perhaps it is something I need.

115141030.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Gain +0/+X. X equals the number of allied cards destroyed this match that cost 1 play point or less. Then, if X is at least 5, evolve this follower.
Can't attack the enemy leader.
115141030.baseFlair_: Joy, anger, sorrow, pleasure—they are all as one. The deep green torrent is as the forest incarnate. Its power surges and swells, playfully for now. Hidden within its elegant form is the rapture of the shuddering forest.
115141030.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
115141030.evoFlair_: The dragon beats its great wings and soars into the air, leaving a shower of blossoms in its wake. It laughs, shimmering bewitchingly—the mighty destroyer of those who would dare defile the forest.

"Ready to play with the mousey, Shama?"

"Meow-wee! It's a lot more fun that way!"
118141010.evoFlair_:
"Mrow-wow! It's coming your way, Shamu!"
"Mrow-wee! It's really giving us a good chase!"
"We'll play with you until you can't even stand!"

Return an allied follower or amulet to your hand.
Draw a card.
101114010.baseFlair_: Heeding the trees' call, the forest-dwellers return.

112114010.baseEffect_:
Return an allied follower or amulet to your hand.
Draw a card.

709114010.baseEffect_:
Return an allied follower or amulet to your hand.
Draw a card.
709114010.baseFlair_: Let me guide you, my lord. Just follow this light.

101114050.baseFlair_: C'mere, everyone! Come play with the trespasser!

110114010.baseFlair_: Recently, all manner of people have been coming through the forest, so the fairies never want for entertainment.

103114020.baseEffect_:
Give an enemy follower -10/-0 until the end of the turn.

103114020.baseFlair_: Don't worry. They're just playing—for now anyway.

106114010.baseFlair_: The bowstring's twang and shallow breath disappear amid the sound of rustling leaves. Wait quietly—nay, peacefully. An impatient heart is proof of trepidation. A forest warrior can have no such thing. —Elven Tactics, counterattack section

Return an allied follower or amulet to your hand. Then deal 3 damage to an enemy follower.
(Can be played only when both a targetable allied card and enemy card are in play.)
114114010.baseFlair_:
The first arrow pierces its prey—proof of a warrior who has discarded all fear. The second arrow, fired to finish the job, is proof of a hunter who has dispensed with mercy.
—Elven Tactics, pursuit section

702114010.baseEffect_:
Return an allied follower or amulet to your hand. Then deal 3 damage to an enemy follower.
(Can be played only when both a targetable allied card and enemy card are in play.)
702114010.baseFlair_: I am the bone of my sword, Caladbolg II.

115114010.baseEffect_:
Deal 2 damage to an enemy follower.
If at least 2 other cards were played this turn, put a Greenwood Guardian into your hand.
115114010.baseFlair_:
It begins as a seed, transforming into a sprout upon the barren land. When the sprout takes root, a guardian appears who has taken a vow to protect it.
—Teachings of the Great Forest, Part 1

114124010.baseEffect_:
Put a Naterran Great Tree into your hand.
If this is your fifth turn or later, recover 1 play point.
Then, if this is your tenth turn or later, draw 2 cards.
114124010.baseFlair_:
The Mother bestows gifts upon her children.
When the forest dwellers discovered her kindness in the underbrush, they saw a simple, verdant aether. They soon learned that it grants power to those who seek perfection.

115124010.baseEffect_:
Put 2 Fairies into your hand.
If any allied Naterran Great Trees are in play, add 1 to the number of cards played this turn.
115124010.baseFlair_:
Precious, sacred, miracle of the wood.
Feeds on life to nurture light for spirits pure and good.
By its light they frolic, ephemeral and free.
Paradise for them, but death for you and me.
—Woodland folk song

713124010.baseEffect_:
Put 2 Fairies into your hand.
If any allied Naterran Great Trees are in play, add 1 to the number of cards played this turn.
713124010.baseFlair_:
The shine of the fairies is so fantastical... Aw shucks, I really should’ve brought my camera.
—Aiko Takamori

900124010.baseFlair_: You're so unfashionable I can hardly look. But just relax. You're about to be reborn a hundred times over in fashionable white. —Fashionista Nelcha

900124020.baseEffect_: Change an enemy follower's defense to 1.
900124020.baseFlair_: You're so unfashionable I can hardly bear it. But don't worry. You're about to be reborn a hundred times over in fashionable black. —Fashionista Nelcha

107134010.baseEffect_:
Return an allied follower or amulet to your hand. Restore X defense to your leader. X is the number of returned cards.
Enhance (5): Return all allied followers and amulets instead.
107134010.baseFlair_: "I'll heal you!" "Do you need healing?" "Hey, I can heal you!" "See? When we feel like it, we can do amazing things together!"

114134010.baseEffect_:
Give +1/+0 and Rush to all followers in your hand that originally cost 1 play point or less.
Enhance (4): Give +1/+0 and Storm instead.
114134010.baseFlair_:
Here... This is my first piece! It's yours!
—Rayne, Elf Smith

900144040.baseEffect_:
Give an allied follower +0/+1.
If you have played at least 4 other Fils in this match, that follower can attack 2 times per turn.
900144040.baseFlair_: Oho! Let's make this a liiittle bit more chic!

900144050.baseEffect_: Restore 1 defense to your leader. Recover 1 evolution point. Draw a card.
900144050.baseFlair_:
Its light is eternal, an unparalleled brilliance that radiates for eternity.
—On Carbuncles, Cryptid Companion

107113010.baseEffect_:
Countdown (2)
Last Words: Deal 1 damage to a random enemy follower.
Deal 1 damage to a random enemy follower if this amulet is returned to your hand.
At the end of your turn put a Fairy into your hand.
107113010.baseFlair_: Unto the earth will the living return, and from the earth will life be born anew. The flame reducing trees to ashes; the rejoicing of fire fairies throughout the forest.

109113010.baseEffect_:
If at least 2 other cards were played this turn, and you have at least 1 play point, Choose: Play this card as a Fairy's Yawn or Fairy's Awakening.
----------
Countdown (2)
At the end of your turn, put a Fairy into your hand.
109113010.baseFlair_: Are they resting blissfully in a land of dreams? Or are they luring you into a devious trap? Careless eyes quickly become prey for the forest. —One-eyed Fairy Hunter

900113010.baseEffect_:
Countdown (2)
At the end of your turn, select a random enemy follower. It can't attack next turn.
900113010.baseFlair_: Even if it looks to be safe, you can never be too careful. Get entangled in their shenanigans, and you too could lose something important. —One-eyed Fairy Hunter

900113020.baseEffect_:
Countdown (2)
During your opponent's turn, whenever an enemy follower attacks your leader, deal 1 damage to that follower.
900113020.baseFlair_: When all is said and done, for them it is merely a prank—even at the cost of lives. They do however they please, so choose wisely. —One-eyed Fairy Hunter

101122020.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, give +1/+0 to a random 1/X allied follower.
101122020.baseFlair_: The kindly weedfolk are said to bestow their blessings upon those too weak to defend themselves.

106133010.baseEffect_:
Countdown (3)
Last Words: Draw a card.
Draw a card if this amulet is returned to your hand.
At the end of your turn, give a random allied follower +1/+0.
106133010.baseFlair_: Fairy whispers are made of truth, tricks, and treachery. If one picks up only on their truth, ignoring the other parts, then a flicker in time becomes the same as time eternal. —Account of a fairy-handler

100111020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put 2 Fairies into your hand.
100111020.baseFlair_: Hey there, little fairy! Thanks for patrolling the forest again. So how was it? Peaceful as usual today, huh?
100111020.evoFlair_: Now I know you fairies keep the forest safe, but remember to take care of yourselves! You're a part of the forest too, you know.

100111040.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Gain +1/+1 and Ward if at least 2 other cards were played this turn.
100111040.baseFlair_: We elves are practically powerless compared to other species, you know. But there is an unbreakable bond between us. When we work together, our hearts become one!
100111040.evoFlair_: The forest is our holy land. We cannot allow the forces of evil to enter it! Those who wish to do harm to nature must first do battle with the elves!

101111030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Return an allied follower or amulet to your hand.
101111030.baseFlair_: You there, traveler—have you lost your way? Well, you've found the right fairy! I'll show you the way out in a flash!
101111030.evoFlair_: Look! We made it outside! Woo-hoo! Isn't this great? Huh? Me, lost? Heh, a-actually, I might've made oooone wrong turn. Ack, no, don't get mad! Look, I'll get it next time! J-just let me show you the way!

101111040.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Change the cost of a Fairy in your hand to 0.
101111040.baseFlair_: Pixies, come! Assemble in my light! You have the power to drive away the forces of evil!
101111040.evoFlair_: Pixies, you have answered my call! Thank you! Now come! Let us defend the forest together!

101111070.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Draw a card if at least 2 other cards were played this turn.
101111070.baseFlair_: Our home has become polluted with the miasma of war. Mighty God Tree, we beg of you! Please restore this forest to its rightful state!
101111070.evoFlair_: It remains faint, but it can be heard—the voice of the mighty God Tree! The forest lives yet! Now come, let us use the tree's power to drive away this evil!

101111090.baseFlair_: Finally I have you cornered! You abducted my friends, and now you must pay the price! Do not believe yourselves to be safe in your stronghold! Friends, I am coming for you!
101111090.evoFlair_: I cannot storm the stronghold by myself. That much is certainly true. But I am not alone! My friends are waiting for me inside, and their fragrance shall lead me to them!

102111010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If an evolved allied follower is in play, select an enemy follower. It can't attack next turn.
102111010.baseFlair_: Hey, have a whiff of this! A marvelous aroma, isn't it? Hey... What's with the sour face?
102111010.evoFlair_: The next batch will smell stupendous! First comes the dash of dwarf's sweat, and then the dollop of bat's blood...

102111020.baseEffect_: Whenever another follower evolves, put a Fairy into your hand.
102111020.baseFlair_: Fairies flutter into the grove, attracted by the bard's song.
102111020.evoFlair_: Fairies begin to dance, enraptured by the bard's song.

104111020.baseFlair_: Why did you come so deep into our woods? Do you want to hurt us? You shouldn't be doing that...
104111020.evoFlair_: I'm part of these woods, and they're part of me. That's why you won't get away with hurting me. You'll sleep in the earth if you try.

105111020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Add 1 to the number of cards played this turn.
105111020.baseFlair_:
"Together since birth."
"Together till death."
"Two as one, what fun!"
"One as two, how fun!"
105111020.evoFlair_:
"Dee, what will today bring?"
"Loads of fun, dear Dum."
"Dee, what to do today?"
"Something fun, dear Dum."

106111010.baseEffect_: Whenever this follower's attack or defense is increased by an effect, draw a card.
106111010.baseFlair_: If you like me—hehe—then I'll like you back! I'll do everything I can for you!
106111010.evoFlair_: Everybody that likes me is a good person—hehe—which makes you a good person too!

107111030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Enhance (5) - Until the end of the opponent's turn, give all allied followers +1/+0 and the following effect: Reduce damage from effects to 0.
107111030.baseFlair_: Hey there, Leaf Man here! Could ya spare me some water? I'm parched!
107111030.evoFlair_: Hi, Leaf Man again! Thanks for the water, that really hit the spot!

108111020.baseEffect_: Follower Strike: The enemy follower can't attack next turn.
108111020.baseFlair_: You think I'm the watcher of the spellgrove? You couldn't be more wrong. I am its ivy, the moss growing within. I am the servant that serves under it.
108111020.evoFlair_: The spellgrove sows its seeds in people. And once the flowers begin to bud, it's—no, don't come any closer. Get out, or it'll curse you too!

109111010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Destroy an enemy amulet if at least 2 other cards were played this turn.
109111010.baseFlair_: Ah, such a tragedy... The trees, they wither and thirst for life because of me. Ah, what a miracle... My skin, it glows and shimmers with youth from head to toe.
109111010.evoFlair_: Oh, such agony... As you sleep, they scream because of me. Oh, such beauty... My heart, it sings a melody while my radiance awakens.

109111020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Enhance (5) - Give an allied follower +1/+2. Restore 3 defense to your leader.
109111020.baseFlair_: Fairies love to revel in their mischief, but there are some who know the pleasures of serving. Myself, for example…
109111020.evoFlair_: As the years pass, some look back to realize the errors from their youth. Now let us return what was so unfairly purloined from you.

110111020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give an enemy follower -1/-0 until the end of your opponent's turn.
110111020.baseFlair_: We must never kill, for all life is an act of existence. What should be, is. Let go and allow life to run its course.
110111020.evoFlair_:
The First Law: Existence
A branch that flourishes is no more worthy than one that withers. It merely is. You must view reality as it exists.
—Teachings of the Unkilling Guardian

111111010.baseEffect_: Last Words: Give -2/-0 to a random enemy follower.
111111010.baseFlair_: We must never kill. Nor may people be permitted to relinquish their lives. One's own allotment is all that is deserved.
111111010.evoFlair_: In the shadow of law looms punishment. All possession breeds inequality. Therefore humans should own nothing but their lives. Go forth, carve from them all these needless things.

112111010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Gain +3/+3 and deal 2 damage to 2 random enemy followers.
During your turn, whenever another allied follower evolves, deal 2 damage to a random enemy follower.
112111010.baseFlair_: The people of the forest tell me that all humans are evil, that I should shoot 'em on sight. But I don't believe that. Surely there are some good ones in the bunch! Hmm... But how do you tell them apart? Guess I'll just shoot whoever!
112111010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
112111010.evoFlair_: Whew! I'm glad you're one of the good ones! If you were a bad guy, you would've been shot to bits! How do I know that? Well, the arrows fired from a daisybow never miss an evil person.

114111030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Naterran Great Tree into your hand. Then if at least 2 other cards were played this turn, put a Fairy into your hand.
114111030.baseFlair_:
What terror, what fright—the great tree seen by night.
Eyes, mouth, and nose—yet silent it grows.
Mouth closed in daylight hours—once opened, devours.
—Woodland folk song
114111030.evoFlair_:
The great tree is the forest's most fearsome terror.
Possessed of eyes, nose, and mouth, still it may not speak.
That wordless mouth opens only to devour its prey.
—Songs of the Unsullied Wood (Translation)

115111010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If at least 3 other allied Greenwood Guardians have been played this match, gain +1/+1. Then, if at least 6 other allied Greenwood Guardians have been played this match, gain Ward.
115111010.baseFlair_:
The sprout bears a sapling, bringing further blessings to the land. The oathbearer trains herself to grow strong, so that she might protect this bounty of nature.
—Teachings of the Great Forest, Part 2
115111010.evoFlair_:
The sapling extends its branches, spreading the blessings of nature along with them. If any should seek to plunder this bounty, the mighty warrior must use her strength to eliminate them.
—Teachings of the Great Forest, Part 3

116111020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Add X to the number of cards played this turn. X equals the number of allied Natura cards in play.
116111020.baseFlair_:
When spring breathes, new life grows. First a sprout, then a bud—a flower smiles at the sun. Flexing its petals, it takes to the air. Hail, Spriteling! Laugh on and dance through the treetops.
—Forest Ditty
116111020.evoFlair_:
The fairies knew it, when the forest fell to the steel revolution. But their resolve did not change, for change would compromise the unyielding nature of the land.
—The Pure Forest

117111020.baseEffect_: Whenever you play a card using its Accelerate effect, deal 2 damage to a random enemy follower.
117111020.baseFlair_: You know, this really isn't your season. Compared to the other forest flowers in full bloom, you stick out like a sore thumb.
117111020.evoFlair_: Early bloomer, late bloomer; we all get second winds. You, on the other hand, are going to wilt while the forest explodes in color.

118111020.baseEffect_: During your turn, whenever an allied amulet leaves play, draw a card. (Transformation doesn't count as leaving play.)
118111020.baseFlair_: All right, everybody! Have you got your bags and tongs? If you need gloves, just let me know! All right, move out! We're going to make this forest sparkle!
118111020.evoFlair_: A lot of folks are leaving their trash in the forest. Tsk-tsk. But on the flip side, there are so many kindhearted friends of the forest! Thank you for your hard work, everybody!

119111010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Fairy into your hand.
119111010.baseFlair_: From an outsider's point of view, you may suspect that I am a caster of curses. This is not the case. I am merely an agent of karma.
119111010.evoEffect_: Evolve: Give Bane to all Fairies in your hand.
119111010.evoFlair_: What is the difference, you ask? Curses are used by humans to inflict pain on each other. Karma is simply the will of the forest, exacting judgment on humans for their wrongdoings.

100121020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 2 damage to an enemy follower if at least 2 other cards were played this turn.
100121020.baseFlair_: Atoms of steel, heed my call! Leave your Mother Earth behind and gather here! A cave this full of minerals will let me draw out my full power. Leave this place to me!
100121020.evoFlair_: Atoms of steel, pierce my enemies! Ha! That's about right. With elemental magic, form is everything—it's got to be elegant, precise, and stylish! The more witchy you look, the better the elements will flow!

101121020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give +1/+0 to all allied followers until the end of this turn.
101121020.baseFlair_: Now then: one, two, three, one, two, three—you there, stay in time!—two, three. Come on now! If you're enjoying this, put your whole body into it! Let's do this dance right!
101121020.evoFlair_: All right, it's festival day! As long as we all dance together, we can drive all our worries away! Now here we go! All together!

103121030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Enhance (6) - Transform an enemy follower into a Snowman.
103121030.baseFlair_: Sledding, snowball fights, and snowmen! I love playing in the snow!
103121030.evoFlair_: Snowmen are so big and silly! I think I'll make some more!

104121020.baseFlair_: Am I cute, or am I cute? Tee-hee-hee! If you don't like me when I'm fun-size, then I'll turn myself big!
104121020.evoEffect_: Evolve: Gain +2/+2 if at least 3 cards were played this turn.
104121020.evoFlair_: Hah, what do you think now? This is what happens when I bust out my teensy-weensy hammer. I won't stay this way long, but I bet I'll be more useful than before!

105121010.baseEffect_: Clash: Gain +2/+0 until the end of the turn.
105121010.baseFlair_: Hey, Bobo! Chop, chop! It's time for work! We'll cut down a thousand trees today!
105121010.evoFlair_: Bobo, I worked up a sweat, but I still have lots of energy. What do you say we cut down another thousand?

106121010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give your leader the following effect - Followers can't be played. (This effect lasts until this follower leaves play.)
106121010.baseFlair_: I wanna be a singer! Just listen. I practice like this every day: Eh-la-la-la-la! Huh, why's everybody holding their ears?
106121010.evoFlair_: I'm gonna be the best singer some day! Gotta practice! Gotta work every day, oh yeah! Duh-duh-duh-delicious destiny! It's my duh-duh-duh-dream!

107121020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give +1/+0 to another allied Forestcraft follower.
107121020.baseFlair_: What's with the prickly attitude? Don't get it twisted, I'm trying to help you out here! Now you're in for it—I'll spruce you up!
107121020.evoFlair_: Let's not beat around the bush, you've got me furious! No mercy for any of you saps—my wrath is one with the forest!

111121020.baseEffect_: Follower Strike: Until the end of your opponent's turn, change the enemy follower's attack to 0; and until the end of your turn, change this follower's attack to 0.
111121020.baseFlair_:
"I never asked to see it all..."
"But I see it anyway."
"I never asked to be a mind-reader."
"Someday, I wanna be a normal girl, y'know?"
111121020.evoFlair_:
"It's easier to be alone."
"But a girl likes to have company sometimes."
"I'm on my own..."
"It ain't easy bein' lonely!"

113121010.baseFlair_: As the youth hurried forward in search of help, there opened before him a glade of a thousand blossoms. The gentle elf standing within—messenger of the God Tree—extended her hand to the boy. —Prostrations before the God Tree, Chapter 2
113121010.evoEffect_: Evolve: Put a Fairy Wisp and a Fairy into your hand.
113121010.evoFlair_: Answering the young man's cries, the God Tree made a kaleidoscopic protection bloom from the elf's outreached hand. And just as the gentle elf promised, the fairies guided the young man onward. —Prostrations before the God Tree, Chapter 3

114121020.baseEffect_:
At the end of your turn, if an allied Naterran Great Tree is in play, summon a Fairy.
Whenever an allied Fairy comes into play, give it +1/+1.
114121020.baseFlair_:
Lovely, lovely lady of the wood.
Drinks the lives of mortals and looks the way they should.
Enter not the forest, lest this fate you meet:
Eternity as soil beneath her shining feet.
—Woodland folk song
114121020.evoFlair_:
This woodland spirit is lovely to behold.
Her beautiful mien mimics those she has absorbed.
Seated atop the graves of intruders, she shines with purest light.
—Songs of the Unsullied Wood (Translation)

115121010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Greenwood Guardian into your hand. If at least 3 allied Greenwood Guardians have been played this match, deal 2 damage to an enemy follower.
115121010.baseFlair_:
The branches beget leaves, bringing a wealth of blessings. When the time comes, the mighty warrior ushers in those who have shown gratitude for the forest's bounty.
—Teachings of the Great Forest, Part 4
115121010.evoFlair_:
When the leaves flourish and the sapling evolves into a great tree, it drops new seeds to the ground. The guardian guides her sistren, nurturing them to become mighty warriors themselves.
—Teachings of the Great Forest, Part 5

116121010.baseEffect_: Last Words: At the start of your next turn, put a random Machina card with the lowest cost from your deck into your hand.
116121010.baseFlair_:
The iron harvested from beetle horns has made our weapons far more efficient. Metal is more durable and malleable than wood. Though accepting these changes gives me pause—when will we ourselves have to adapt?
—Forest Elf's Journal, Part 2
116121010.evoFlair_:
It is for the forest's sake that they've donned steel and brandished machinery. Though they have changed, the land has not. And they know it, as they find their ancestral home growing... outdated.
—On Flourishing, Part 2

119121020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If at least 2 other cards were played this turn, summon a Stumpeye.
119121020.evoFlair_:
"And away we go! Make sure ya don't hold Mim back with all yer hot air!"
"You're one to talk. Make sure you don't get stuck in a rut and trip her up."
—A Certain Stump and Horn

900121010.baseFlair_: That distinct, high-pitched buzz is a telltale sign that the assassins of the forest have arrived. They wield their poison stingers with exceptional mastery, flitting around their prey before going in for the kill.
900121010.evoFlair_: When their victims run, they go for the back; when their victims don't, they go for the heart. The sinister drone of their wings is almost assuredly the sound of a life about to be lost.

101131020.baseEffect_:
Storm.
Fanfare: For each other card played this turn, gain +1/+0 until the end of the turn.
101131020.baseFlair_: It was a small enough creature at first. But when granted new power by a witch, it began to swell, its carapace growing thicker...
101131020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
101131020.evoFlair_: Its dully glowing eyes betray no feeling, and even screams of agony cannot reach its ears. Controlled by a witch, the creature uses its wicked horns to make a game of wreaking havoc.

102131030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give all allied followers the following effect until the end of your opponent's turn - Reduce damage from effects to 0.
102131030.baseFlair_: I love this forest, and I want to help all my friends there!
102131030.evoFlair_: You can count on me! I'd do anything to help out my friends and forest!

107131010.baseFlair_: People call me the best blacksmith in the forest. Humph, it's not like I'm amazing or anything, everyone else here is just sloppy.
107131010.evoEffect_: Evolve: If you've played at least 3 cards this turn, give another allied follower +1/+0 and Rush. Reduce damage to that follower to 0 until the end of the turn.
107131010.evoFlair_: I-I'm sorry for being mean! I mean, I thought that blacksmiths were supposed to act cool and stuff... Was I wrong? Is this why I have no friends?

108131010.baseEffect_: If at least 2 other cards were played this turn, and you have at least 2 play points, Choose: Play this card as a Paula, Gentle Warmth or Paula, Passionate Warmth.
108131010.baseFlair_: I can't say I see too clearly yet... what it looks like when I love. But little by little I'm beginning to understand.
108131010.evoFlair_: My love for you shows itself in my wish to serve. With this power that you gave me, I'll serve the people with everything I've got.

108131030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Skystride Raptor into your hand.
108131030.baseFlair_: There are no walls between man and beast. Given love, compassion, and openness, we are one and the same.
108131030.evoEffect_: Evolve: Give Bane to all allied Skystride Raptors in your hand.
108131030.evoFlair_: I am you, and you are me. Let us run, and let us fly. This is the hour of the hunt!

110131030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If at least 2 other cards were played this turn, give +1/+0 to all allied followers. Then if at least 4 other cards were played this turn, give +0/+1 to all allied followers.
110131030.baseFlair_:
Her guileless voice rings out in the halls of the crystal palace, urging everyone to partake in celebration of the holy day.
"Welcome to the crystal palace! Come dance with me!"
110131030.evoEffect_: Evolve: Give +2/+2 to another allied follower.
110131030.evoFlair_:
Music descends from on high, covering the city of Crystalia like a blanket of snow. Only she knows the magic spell to put a smile on everyone's face.
"I'm having the time of my life! How about you?"

113131020.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Return another allied follower or amulet to your hand. If it's a Machina card, draw a card.
113131020.baseFlair_: Core mutations have led to one new breakthrough after another. One can either eliminate enemies of the woodland or expand the forest itself. These ideas are opposed to the ones expressed by the Mechalance Elf. —Veteran Researcher's Report, Vol. 2
113131020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
113131020.evoFlair_: The mechanical lance you bear is lovely enough... But enemies should be welcomed with open arms rather than expelled. They'll never leave the forest—I'll never let them. —Guard of the Machinatree to Mechalance Elf

114131020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Fairy into your hand. If an allied Naterran Great Tree is in play, put 2 Fairies into your hand instead and gain Rush.
114131020.baseFlair_:
Prideful, prideful god of all that grows.
Creation's dawn is in its whorls—the secrets it knows.
Die and fall beneath its till—become one with the past.
To be the future's soil is the only way to last.
—Woodland folk song
114131020.evoFlair_:
The embodiment of a forest's growth is prideful in nature.
It is an avatar of the world's inception.
It ushers all life toward the dead past, tilling it into the future's soil.
—Songs of the Unsullied Wood (Translation)

115131020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Union Burst (10) - Deal 2 or 4 damage to all enemy followers. (Damage is determined randomly for each enemy.)
115131020.baseFlair_: Leave it to me, big bro! I'll shoot down every last one of your enemies! After all, the odds of me hitting my mark are a hundred to one! Wait a sec... That's not much, is it?
115131020.evoEffect_: Evolve: Gain +2/+0 until the end of the turn. Add 2 to the number of cards played this turn.
115131020.evoFlair_: I didn't want you to see me missing any targets, so I've been practicing in secret! Now I've got the power of a hundred! Hopefully I can keep it up and pierce your heart someday too, big bro... Hehe!

115131030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Greenwood Guardian into your hand.
115131030.baseFlair_: I'd describe myself as powerless ivy, while the forest guardians are more like mighty trees... Oh how I wish I could be like them. I will adorn the great warriors with flowers, so that the forest may continue to propagate and conquer this land.
115131030.evoEffect_: Evolve: Give your leader the following effect - Whenever an allied Greenwood Guardian comes into play, deal 1 damage to a random enemy follower. (This effect is not stackable and lasts for the rest of the match.)
115131030.evoFlair_: To the guardians, I'm no more than a twig. We're as different as a tiny bud and a great tree. But all buds will one day bloom, painting the land like a flower garden.

118131020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Enhance (4) - Evolve this follower.
Can't be evolved using evolution points. (Can be evolved using card effects.)
118131020.baseFlair_:
Yup yup, I'm small and that's A-OK! At least, that's what my gut tells me. It's also telling me this is the right way to go!
...Whoopsie. It was a dead end.
118131020.evoEffect_:
Storm.
Strike: Gain +X/+0. X equals the number of allied amulets with different names that have left play this match.

900131020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Return an allied follower or amulet to your hand.

900131020.evoFlair_: My love looks like passion! I wanna use this new power that you gave me... and help people share some excitement of their own!

900131030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to an enemy follower.

105141020.baseEffect_:
Ward.

105141020.baseFlair_: Thou art a torrent in the verdant depths. Thou art burgeoning might and volition given shape. Within thy diminutive frame dwelleth the forest's prodigious rage.

105141020.evoFlair_: From thy maw, O dragon, doth issue a roar to shake all trees. It is the sound of the ire of the persecuted. For thou art a great protector who doth consume all defilers of the forest.

107141020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal X damage to a random enemy follower. X equals the number of cards played this turn, including this card.

112141020.baseFlair_: It's thanks to the miraculous development of robotics that a warrior of his caliber has appeared in the forest. Finding both the wooden and iron weapons of the past insufficient, he carves out the future of the elves with his mechanical blades. —Researcher's Report, Part 4

112141020.evoFlair_: I am without equal, a lord of new techniques that rival even a thousand strong. The logic behind these twin blades is foolproof—twice the weaponry, twice the fallen foes. Even the world beyond the forest will come to know my power.

115141020.evoFlair_: I am the happiest person in the world to have the pleasure of serving you, my lord. Please allow me to remain by your side always.

100111060.baseEffect_: Strike: Put a Fairy into your hand.
100111060.baseFlair_: Tsk, don't you ever get tired of chasing after me? I told you I was leaving. Leave me be—I slipped out of that circle.
100111060.evoFlair_: I just can't sit around and wait for the day I finally die. That's why I left the forest behind and took up the sword. No more lying safe in my cradle. I walk my own path now.

101111050.baseEffect_: Whenever another allied follower comes into play, deal 1 damage to a random enemy follower.
101111050.baseFlair_: We forest dwellers all stick together. Don't think you can mess with me 'cause I'm alone!
101111050.evoFlair_: Hee-hee! See? If everyone from the forest lends a hand, we can take down enemies you'd have no hope against alone!

101111060.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Select an enemy follower. It can't attack next turn.
101111060.baseFlair_: You seem tired, stranger. Would you care for some water? Hee-hee! Oh, there's no need to thank me...
101111060.evoFlair_: What? You can't move? Oh! Didn't I tell you that I'm the spirit of a poisoned fen? Hee-hee! I do love watching humans struggle.

102111030.baseEffect_: Whenever another allied follower comes into play, restore 1 defense to your leader.
102111030.baseFlair_: Oh no! Snap out of it! I'll give you the help you need, so hold on just a little more.
102111030.evoFlair_: Here, let me sprinkle this spring water on you. Soon your wounds will heal!

103111040.baseEffect_: Last Words: Put a Woodkin Curse into your hand.
103111040.baseFlair_: A symbol of fortune to friends of the forest and a walking curse for its foes.
103111040.evoFlair_: A woodland spirit that carries out the will of the forest. If you seek to harm the forest, prepare to bear its curse.

104111030.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, give all other allied followers +0/+1.
104111030.baseFlair_: O children of the earth! The earth is my flesh, and my love will support you as long as you stand on your own two feet.
104111030.evoFlair_: O children of the earth! The earth is my flesh, and I shall walk with you until you return to me.

104111040.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Gain +1/+1 and Storm if at least 2 other cards were played this turn.
104111040.baseFlair_: They fire splinters of great trees that pierce steel armor like it's nothing from atop beetles that can outspeed even dragons. In other words, they're our natural enemies. —Veteran Dragoon
104111040.evoFlair_: Infantry is beaten by cavalry, which is in turn beaten by dragoons. We're the ultimate force on the battlefield. But you'd do well not to assume that this logic holds once Mother Nature comes into play. —Veteran Dragoon

105111030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Gain +1/+1 and Ward if there are at least 3 other Neutral cards in your hand.
105111030.baseFlair_: Normally the statement the forest lives is intended as metaphor, but on rare occasions it's literally true. —The Living Forest, Author's Preface
105111030.evoFlair_: The forest that was there yesterday had vanished overnight. Gazing at the tracks on the ground, I muttered to myself, "The forest lives." —The Living Forest, Chapter 1

106111020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a random amulet from your deck into your hand.
106111020.baseFlair_: Look up and all you'll see are leaves and branches. You can't see a single star in the forest! So I've made up my mind to leave the forest and see the night sky!
106111020.evoFlair_: Sure, being in the forest is safe, but it's no fun! No matter where you walk, all you see is green. So that's why I think there's a bright future waiting for me outside somewhere!

107111010.baseEffect_: Whenever this follower's attack or defense is increased by an effect, deal 1 damage to a random enemy follower.
107111010.baseFlair_: I can't be entrusted to protect this forest if I keep relying on everyone else's help. Just you wait, because I'm gonna be great one day!
107111010.evoFlair_: This forest has always protected and watched over me, so I gotta do my best too! My hand is steady—here goes! In the name of the forest, I'll shoot this arrow!

108111030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a random follower with X attack from your deck into your hand. X equals the number of cards played this turn, including this card.
108111030.baseFlair_: Here it is, the concert we've all been waiting for! Let's make all our practice count! Now, we'll begin this first passage adagio.
108111030.evoFlair_: It's time to crescendo! Let the music flow through you, and soon the audience will be jumping for joy! A-one, two, three!

109111030.baseFlair_: They roam the land upright on two legs, breeding and increasing in numbers at their destination. They're renowned for their sublime flavor, but one should be careful not to consume too much.
109111030.evoFlair_: After hunting these mushroom creatures, seek help if your skin feels irritable. Their spores can spread to your lungs, and before long you'll begin feeling like a mushroom yourself.

111111020.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: Enhance (6) - Gain +3/+3.
Strike: Put a Fairy into your hand.
111111020.baseFlair_: Iiiit's showtime! Hey, I know how I look, but the forest is my lovely baby! You mess with the woods, you get felled! Understand?
111111020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
111111020.evoFlair_: Iiiit's showtime! I may seem kinda rowdy, but don't judge me by my looks! I'm everybody's lovely baby! I'll trash anyone who troubles the trees! Understand?

112111020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a random Machina card from your deck into your hand.
112111020.baseFlair_: Outsiders continue throwing their broken machines into the forest, the place I call home. I will gladly take it upon myself to collect their trash, for you see, here in the forest we help each other out.
112111020.evoFlair_: Now, where to put the parts I've collected? Should I just attach them to the junk I found yesterday? If anyone finds out how much I enjoy fiddling with these metallic creations, it'll be the end of me. Sigh... And yet my heart's always aflutter when I'm tinkering around.

113111030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If another Machina card was played this turn, gain Storm.
113111030.baseFlair_: Core mutations have led to one new discovery after another. Robotic bagworms use technology for defensive purposes, while this elf uses it as a means to attack. —Veteran Researcher's Report, Vol. 1
113111030.evoFlair_: Your cocoon's impressively novel, but novelty isn't everything. Fruit's tastiest, after all, just before it goes soft. —Mechaclaw Elf to Robotic Bagworm

Storm.

115111030.baseFlair_: Ooh-ooh-ah! Ooh-ooh, ah-ah! Ooh-aaah! (This thing's light as a feather! Bet I can use it to knock down loads of fruit from the treetops!)
115111030.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
115111030.evoFlair_:
"Wow! So strong!"
—Water Fairy
"Are you telling me that hammer isn't hollow?"
—Fairy

118111010.baseEffect_:

118111010.baseFlair_: Eek! Who knew they'd make their move on my watch?! So that's where the squirrels have been stashing their acorns!
118111010.evoFlair_: Whoa! I didn't think this would happen during my night patrol! The fairies are spinning the squirrels' acorns like tops! Kinda mean, don't you think?

101121010.baseEffect_: Fanfare and Last Words: Put a Fairy into your hand.
101121010.baseFlair_: I love these grand dances. A fairy just never knows who she may meet! Tee-hee, I wonder who'll dance with me tonight.
101121010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
101121010.evoFlair_: Just look at it all—the merrymaking, the laughter, the joy! Tonight let's dance until dawn comes!

101121030.evoFlair_: So many years ago, I wandered into this forest under the charms of the fairies and was captured. Of course I wanted to go home at first. But now I know in my heart that I must protect this forest. Witness the power the fairy king has bestowed on me!

101121040.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Destroy an enemy amulet if at least 2 other cards were played this turn.
101121040.baseFlair_: A magical flower which grows deep within the forest. Once it blossoms, it consumes all life around it, stripping the area bare to fuel its own growth.
101121040.evoFlair_: It is not only the fruits of the land that are consumed by this carnivorous plant. Humans and other creatures caught within its vines are all gobbled up without mercy.

107121010.baseFlair_: Wait, that's not it! I just have to nock the arrow here and... Oh, come on! How do I do this? I'm not ready yet! Just... give me a moment so I can shoot you, okay?
107121010.evoEffect_: Evolve: Deal 2 damage to X random enemy followers (up to 5 followers). X equals the number of cards played this turn, including this card.
107121010.evoFlair_: I did it! I finally hit the mark! Now you'll get a taste of my skill! Wait, I'm out of arrows? What am I supposed to do now?

108121020.baseFlair_: Owl Man: he is... the forest's heart.
108121020.evoFlair_: Owl Man: he is... the forest's conscience.

Rush.
Whenever an allied Fairy comes into play, destroy it.
Whenever an allied Fairy is destroyed, gain +1/+1 and deal 1 damage to the enemy leader.
113121020.baseFlair_: Long ago there was a sickly boy who fell in love with a fairy. The fairy granted him protection, but a pestilence spread throughout his land as a result. The boy's eyes came to burn with hatred and rage for her.
113121020.evoFlair_: You insist you never intended to destroy the land? It was an unfortunate coincidence? What a terrible joke! Even if that's the truth—it's too late now. I despise you. What else are you good for than this?

115121020.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Last Words: Put a Greenwood Guardian into your hand.

The fallen seeds grow into new sprouts, marking the next beginning. When the guardian beholds this new life, she entrusts the oath to her apprentices.

115121020.evoFlair_:
As this cycle of growth continues, the land of blessing becomes a forest. But the oathbearer is no longer alone. She is joined by a multitude of mighty warriors.
—Teachings of the Great Forest, Part 7

105131010.baseFlair_: My magic makes it easy to take on any foe! The thing is, it only works once.
105131010.evoFlair_: Once I charge up my magic, any foe will be gone in one blow! But after that, my energy and magic are through.

106131020.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Clash: Gain +1/+0 if no other allied followers are in play.
106131020.baseFlair_: He is a young boy who wanders the forest, void of memory. Although his vision is clear, he is a shadow of his former self.
106131020.evoFlair_: In the rustling of the forest, the boy is burdened by whispers of the fairies, which remind him of his terrible past. These whispers serve as a warning and a curse. He can't escape his sins...

109131010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Choose - Put a Shamu's Antics or Shama's Gaze into your hand.

109131010.evoFlair_: "Meow-wee! I just love a good chase!" "Meow-wow! Come now, we'll play with you until you can't even stand!"

112131020.baseEffect_: When you play a spell, evolve this follower.

112131020.evoFlair_: Oh. My. God. That girl is soooo gorgeous! She's just, like, radiating beauty. I hate her. Like, so much that I could just foam at the mouth... Grr...

114131010.baseFlair_: Agriwrestling is a sacred battle dance celebrating the harvest. I doubt I could have performed it before—I was such a weakling. But thanks to my teachers, I'm not that person anymore! Here I go! Lightning Plowshares!

Ward.

Lightning Plowshares is a fascinating technique. The practitioner gathers incredible lightning power around one hand, and then strikes, tilling the soil like the heavens' own plow!
—The mysterious Masked Scholar

900131010.baseFlair_: The falcon's beak pierces even gods.
900131010.evoFlair_: The falcon's beak devours even gods.

Ward.

101141020.evoFlair_: The long, long journey that turns through life and the forest toward the future has only just begun. Surely someday we'll all live in peace.

Fanfare: Randomly put 1 of the lowest-cost Forestcraft followers from your deck into your hand.

113141020.baseFlair_: The fairy speaks to the young man who is brimming with hatred. Long ago she entrusted him with the ability to dispel illness, but the illness he dispelled went on to annihilate his homeland. The fairy's eyes dampen with profound sorrow and regret...
113141020.evoEffect_: Evolve: Give your leader the following effect - During your turn, whenever a follower is added to your hand from anywhere but your deck, give that follower +1/+1. (This effect is not stackable and lasts for the rest of the match.)
113141020.evoFlair_: My sins, my errors are what nourished the hatred within you. I didn't act out of love. It was a selfish infatuation I simply forced upon you. But I care deeply for you. There's nothing more to it.

114141010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: If you have at least 2 Fairies in your hand, gain +1/+1 and Ward.
Then if you have at least 4 Fairies in your hand, gain +1/+1 more and Bane.
Then if you have at least 6 Fairies in your hand, give +1/+1 and Storm to all Fairies in your hand.
114141010.baseFlair_: Long ago, when the greatest tree in the forest was but a sapling, he reached the pinnacle of fairy swordsmanship. Now, that sapling has long overshadowed the woods. He is still improving—each dawn reaching for loftier heights than existed the day before.
114141010.evoFlair_: Just as a tree's rings evidence the sturdiness of its trunk, the fairy blader's wrinkles are proof of his resolute strength. Much like a great tree's branches, the pinnacle of fairy swordsmanship is ever rising skyward. He hones his techniques now with as much diligence as ever.

116141030.baseFlair_: Glittering. Ephemeral, fragile, and strong. That is the nature of the forest's lifeblood, the resplendence that I command! Now, I beseech that same eternal vitality—lend power to my sword!
116141030.evoEffect_:
Ward.
Evolve: Deal 1 damage to a random enemy follower. Do this X times. X equals the number of cards in your hand.
116141030.evoFlair_: The misery of the trees, the anger of the flowers, everything is a demand of the Queen. And why I must press forth with the forest at my back! O enemies of the weald, you will know the woodborne wrath of my blade!

117141010.baseFlair_:
There's no point in self-sacrifice!
Hm... Does that sound believable to you?
I'm The Hanged Man, devotee of self-sacrifice!
So how's it hangin', and how do you do?
117141010.evoEffect_:
Evolve: If at least 3 cards were played this turn, gain +3/+3.
Can't be destroyed by effects.
117141010.evoFlair_:
Live for the sake of others? That makes zero sense!
Don't people who say that piss you off?
Self-sacrifice is the noblest thing you can do!
So how's it hangin', and how do you do?

117141030.baseEffect_: Once on each of your turns, when you play a card using its Accelerate effect, restore 2 defense to your leader and recover 1 evolution point.
117141030.baseFlair_:
Ice crystals are pure. They reflect a person's true colors. The wicked will simply freeze. But for those who are true of heart...
"You're... an interesting one. Here, I'll lend you a hand."
117141030.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Put a random follower with Accelerate from your deck into your hand.
Once on each of your turns, when you play a card using its Accelerate effect, restore 2 defense to your leader and recover 1 evolution point.
117141030.evoFlair_:
She, too, is pure. As she changes company, so do her colors shift. Before villains, she turns pale with rage. But before the like-hearted, she sparkles with radiance.
"Crystalia's light guide us!"

900141020.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Gain Bane while an allied Irate Forest Beast is in play.
900141020.baseFlair_: In the beginning he was so wild he seemed like he would tear me apart—it was terrifying. But I discovered the gentleness inside his wildness, and my fear turned to love.
900141020.evoFlair_: I'm going to show you—show you the depth of a love that accepts everything about you. All afflictions that rain down upon you—I'll oppose and erase them.

900141030.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Gain Storm while an allied Gentle Forest Beauty is in play.
900141030.baseFlair_: In the beginning she was so delicate she seemed like she would fall apart—it was terrifying. But I touched the strength inside her delicateness, and my fear turned to love.
900141030.evoFlair_: I'm going to show you—show you the intensity of a love that destroys everything before you. All obstacles you face—I'll topple and destroy them.

101114060.baseEffect_: Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower. If at least 2 other cards were played this turn, deal 6 damage instead.
101114060.baseFlair_: Burn! And fly away and freeze and explode too!

104114010.baseEffect_: Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower. Then deal 2 damage to the enemy leader if at least 2 other cards were played this turn.
104114010.baseFlair_: As charming as a children's toy and more dangerous than a sorcerer's fireball.

113114010.baseEffect_: Draw 2 cards. If at least 2 other cards were played this turn, draw 3 instead.
113114010.baseFlair_: To show gratitude for abundance, receive plenty.

709114020.baseEffect_: Draw 2 cards. If at least 2 other cards were played this turn, draw 3 instead.
709114020.baseFlair_:
"Magic-users cast magic with their own mana, but those who use spirit arts draw from mana in the atmosphere."
—Puck

118114010.baseEffect_:
Summon a Hornet Warrior.
Enhance (5): Summon 2 instead.
Enhance (8): Summon 3 instead. Then give +1/+3 to all allied Hornet Warriors.
118114010.baseFlair_: A source of food, medicine, and death—hornets truly are versatile creatures.

102124020.baseEffect_: Deal 1 damage to a random enemy follower. Do this X times. X equals the number of cards played this turn, including this card.
102124020.baseFlair_: There's an arrow to protect each person in need.

103124010.baseEffect_: Destroy an enemy follower that costs 2 play points or less. Destroy an enemy follower or amulet that costs 5 play points or less instead if at least 2 other cards were played this turn.
103124010.baseFlair_: All are powerless before nature's might.

107124010.baseEffect_:
Give an allied follower +1/+0. Deal X damage to an enemy follower. X equals the attack of the strongest allied follower in play.
(Can be played only when both a targetable allied card and enemy card are in play.)
107124010.baseFlair_: Your blade rests within a scabbard; their blades rest within their minds. A blade can be unsheathed, as their true power can be unleashed.

900124030.baseEffect_: Deal 3 damage to the enemy leader.
900124030.baseFlair_: It's okay! It barely even stings! Well, at least I never heard anybody complain after they'd got stung... —Fairy

103134010.baseEffect_:
Summon a Skystride Raptor.
Enhance (8): Then put a Grand Archer Selwyn into your hand and change its cost to 0.
103134010.baseFlair_: The wounds inflicted by the falcon's talons are convenient targets for the hunter.

117134010.baseEffect_:
Draw 2 cards.
If at least 2 other cards were played this turn, summon a Furious Mountain Deity. Then, if at least 8 other cards were played this turn, summon 2 Deepwood Anomalies.
117134010.baseFlair_: This banquet is open to anyone who appreciates the miracle of life.

113144010.baseEffect_:
Choose: Summon a Gentle Forest Beauty or Irate Forest Beast.
Enhance (6): Summon both instead.
If at least 2 other cards were played this turn, give the summoned follower(s) +2/+2.
113144010.baseFlair_: If this were just desire, we would've walked on by. But we did a double-take—it's love.

900144060.baseEffect_:
Remove all effects on a random enemy follower with the highest attack in play, except changes to its attack or defense, then destroy that follower.
Add 2 to the number of cards played this turn.
900144060.baseFlair_: You know why they call me the Stoneclaw? 'Cuz you've gotta be dumb as rocks to fight me.

101112010.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, put a Fairy into your hand.
101112010.baseFlair_: Hey, silly human, come play with me!

105112010.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, give all allied followers +2/+2 if at least 4 allied followers with a different name are in play. Then destroy this amulet.
105112010.baseFlair_: Oooh, this music is so nice. It makes me feel sparkly! —A fairy

111113010.baseEffect_:
Countdown (1)
Fanfare: Draw 2 cards.
Until this amulet leaves play, your leader cannot receive more than 5 damage at a time.
111113010.baseFlair_: This world is a rotten fruit, fallen from the tree, crushed underfoot, perfuming the air with decay.

104123010.baseEffect_:
Countdown (2)
Whenever an enemy follower attacks your leader, deal 2 damage to that follower.
104123010.baseFlair_: The fairies lead those they favor out of the woods. Those who aren't so lucky are led to the hungry one, but the fairies never stop giggling either way.

112122010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Recover 1 evolution point.
During your turn, when an allied follower evolves, put 2 Fairy Wisps into your hand, then banish this amulet.
112122010.baseFlair_: An orb of concentrated nature. Those who seek abundance find themselves drawn to its luster.

709122010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Recover 1 evolution point.
During your turn, when an allied follower evolves, put 2 Fairy Wisps into your hand, then banish this amulet.

100111030.baseEffect_: Whenever another allied follower comes into play, gain +1/+0.
100111030.baseFlair_: A white wolf said to live deep in the heart of the forest. She carries with her the wishes of the forest dwellers and bares her fangs at those who would harm the wild.
100111030.evoFlair_: Her eyes pierce through to the heart of evil; her claws rend wickedness in two. As long as the white wolf lives, none with evil in their hearts dare even approach the forest.

102111040.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Gain Ambush if at least 2 other cards were played this turn.
102111040.baseFlair_: Try as you might, you'll never find me. The brush is best for hiding!
102111040.evoFlair_: First I hide in the underbrush, nice and sneaky... And then I pounce! Pretty terrifying, right?

103111030.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: Put a Fairy into your hand.
103111030.baseFlair_: I am a knight of the woods. My duty is to battle alongside the fairies!
103111030.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
103111030.evoFlair_: Fairies, bless my sword! As long as your wings shimmer, I'll keep hunting down the forest's enemies.

105111010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If you have 2 other Neutral cards or less in your hand, put 2 Fairies into your hand. If you have at least 3 other Neutral cards in your hand, put a Thorn Burst and 2 Fairies into your hand.
105111010.baseFlair_: This is how I was born. The only clothes I wear are these petals, and I sleep on a bed of roses. But please don't look down on me. I've got a few thorns too.
105111010.evoFlair_: It's not that I'm too small; it's that you're too big. My beauty's in how meekly I bloom. Perhaps you humans should live a bit more meekly too.

107111020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give another allied follower +1/+0. Put 2 Fairies into your hand.
107111020.baseFlair_: Where did I come from, and where am I going? I haven't the foggiest... The fairies have lead me astray in this forest!
107111020.evoFlair_: Where do we come from, and where are we going? Without knowing, I'll go on. Without knowing, I'll live on. The forest is unexpectedly pleasant... Perhaps I'll make a new life here.

108111010.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Put a Fairy into your hand.
108111010.baseFlair_: Sigh, I tell you! Kids these days aren't up to snuff! Humph! No, I'm not a child—I am an elf. Thank you very much!
108111010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
108111010.evoFlair_: You kids will never learn unless a grown-up teaches you a thing or two. Guess I'll just have to show you what happens when elves get angry.

110111010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Gain +2/+2 and Rush.
Strike: Gain +1/+0.
110111010.baseFlair_: There exist a surprising number of cultures in heavily forested regions that reportedly worship bears as gods. I've decided to head into the heart of the wood to investigate these practices myself. —Researcher's Notes
110111010.evoFlair_: The god stood on two legs... a being that could well have created man in its image. It was the revelation of a lifetime. Its hulking figure as it reared up to protect its territory was indeed divine... —Researcher's Notes

113111010.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: The next time damage is dealt to this follower, reduce that damage to 0.
Enhance (8): Gain +3/+3.
113111010.baseFlair_: With courage, you can do anything! The one thing that's impossible... is giving up!
113111010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
113111010.evoFlair_: Without courage, you couldn't do a thing! A sharp sword and a sturdy shield would just gather dust. The greatest weapon of all is courage!

114111010.baseEffect_:
Crystallize (1): Countdown (3)
At the end of your turn, put a Fairy into your hand.
----------
Fanfare: Put 2 Fairies into your hand.
114111010.baseFlair_: That tiny body is incredibly busy. When he happens across lost travelers, he sends a gentle breeze to shepherd them in the right direction. See him at play with the woodland sprites—he is the very figure of benevolence.
114111010.evoFlair_: A tiny spark of malice can cause a great deal of trouble. He lures travelers astray and sends gales to obscure their paths. See him conspiring with the woodland sprites—he is the very figure of malevolence.

117111010.baseFlair_: Call him The Hermit, guru of deliberation. He offers calm and measured advice to troubled travelers. Though his tips are formulated from the deepest rumination, they are simply put and highly beneficial.
117111010.evoFlair_: While he is often lost in thought, he would never lose his way in the woods. From underbrush to canopy, the forest is his refuge. He is an elusive philosopher, evading confrontation whenever he can.

119111030.baseEffect_:
At the start of your turn, evolve this follower.
Last Words: Draw a card.
119111030.baseFlair_: When the petals fall from this tree, parting will follow soon after, or so the old legend went. But the nearby villagers treated the tree with such respect and kindness that it grew weary of inflicting such grief on them. Ever since, it has stayed in bloom all year round.
119111030.evoEffect_:
Ward.
Last Words: Draw a card.
119111030.evoFlair_: Rumors of the tree spread, and people flocked from afar to see it. The tree bent its branches so that its flowers could be better seen, and young lovers would keep petals as good luck charms. In time, the villagers became prosperous, and the tree delighted in their happiness.

100121030.baseFlair_: Beg your pardon—I was told not to let anyone pass through this rose garden. Would you be so kind as to leave? I'd prefer not to use force.
100121030.evoEffect_: Evolve: Return another follower to the player's hand.
100121030.evoFlair_: My warnings go unheeded then. A shame. Would that I could show you mercy. Do not struggle against the thorns now. Foolish and ugly you may be, but at least you'll serve to fertilize the garden.

101121080.baseFlair_: You'd steal such a fleeting thing as life? Pathetic villains. The God Tree grieves for your actions, but I will cleanse your wicked souls.
101121080.evoEffect_: Evolve: Put 2 Fairies into your hand and change their cost to 0.
101121080.evoFlair_: The lamentations of the trees carry a hurtful magic energy that passes from root to root and causes the God Tree to suffer. But do not worry—even sinners like you can become food for the forest.

101121090.baseEffect_: Whenever another allied 1/X follower attacks, deal 1 damage to the enemy leader.
101121090.baseFlair_: A mighty stag flaps its wings, stirring up a whirlwind that emboldens and empowers the weak.
101121090.evoFlair_: The stag summons forth a whirlwind that stirs courage in the hearts of the powerless, giving them the strength to press onward.

102121010.baseFlair_: Driven to free her captured ally, Yuel commanded will-o'-wisps to banish the darkness. No foe could escape her fiery wrath.
102121010.evoEffect_: At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to a random enemy follower. Do this 2 times.
102121010.evoFlair_: In the darkness Yuel's flames dance, warding away the evil that threatens to overtake her companion. The embers flicker, each capable of incinerating an entire forest.

104121030.baseEffect_:
Whenever you play a Forestcraft follower that originally costs at least 6 play points, subtract 3 from the cost of this card.
----------
Ward.
104121030.baseFlair_: Do you have some business with the young lady? May I ask your name? I'm sure you understand that I can't allow just anyone to see her.
104121030.evoFlair_: One requires many skills to be worthy of standing at the young lady's side. What makes the butler is mastery of swordsmanship, magic, and of course everyday tasks!

105121020.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Whenever this follower attacks and destroys an enemy follower, if this follower is not destroyed, gain +1/+1.
105121020.baseFlair_: The wisdom of battle leads the warrior to new heights. Much like a tree thrives in a forest, the warrior thrives in the heat of battle.
105121020.evoFlair_: The warrior faces off against foes to protect the fresh buds of life. Clad in furor, his great hammer grows stronger with each swing.

106121020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put an Ivy Spellbomb into your hand. Change its cost to 1 if there are at least 3 allied followers in play, including this follower.
106121020.baseFlair_: You can manipulate natural life with a magical elixir. But do be careful—even a slight error in the formulation could prove fatal.
106121020.evoFlair_: Drink it carefully and without fear. Use magical elixir in good health, and there's nothing more useful. Well, that's it for class today. See you again next week!

108121010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Choose - Put an Angel's Dress or Demon's Dress into your hand.
108121010.baseFlair_: Ngwah-ha-ha-ha-ha! You dowdy idiots, you piles of lint! As a lookbook incarnate, I, Nelcha, shall do you the favor of a lifetime and teach you what style really means!
108121010.evoFlair_: Ngwah-ha-ha-ha-ha! Fine feathers make fine fools! You're a thread more presentable now. Now let's go and show what we've got on the runway!

109121010.baseFlair_: My sister's a prodigy, the kind that only appears once a century. I'm nothing compared to her, so surely she is more worthy of the sacred bow.
109121010.evoEffect_: Strike: Deal 1 damage to all enemy followers.
109121010.evoFlair_: My father, my sister, Captain... They're all counting on me. So, please, sacred bow! Heed my call, and come to my aid!

110121020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give an enemy follower -4/-0 until the end of your opponent's turn.
110121020.baseFlair_: We must never kill, even in the face of evil or tyranny. Alas, who are we to cast judgment? For the sake of all creation, let go and allow life to run its course.
110121020.evoFlair_:
The Second Law: Observation
Complete or incomplete, everything is equal in existence. There is no room for intervention, no space for devotion.
—Teachings of the Unkilling Guardian

112121010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal X damage to an enemy follower. X equals 2 times the number of allied Machina followers in play.
112121010.baseFlair_: Analyzing the metal insect's carapace inspired us to develop a new weapon: a mechanical bow, capable of firing iron arrows through even the thickest trees. In fact, during our first test firing, the arrow pierced cleanly through the bug. —Researcher's Report, Part 2
112121010.evoFlair_: The critters in the forest are becoming increasingly frantic. Intruders enter our home accompanied by strange machines, while others wield curious bows—bows that even we elves couldn't hope to wield. —Forest Rumors, Part 2

114121010.baseEffect_:
Storm.
Last Words: Deal 2 damage to the enemy leader.
114121010.baseFlair_: I thought I knew elven spear-fighting inside and out, but when I backed this elf into a corner, he managed to wound me severely. I wasn't even in range of his weapon... What technique could he possibly have used? —A martial artist
114121010.evoFlair_: While fighting an intruder, my hand slipped... And just like that, a new technique was born! I will call it "spear-throwing!" Elven spear-fighting will never be the same! —Elven Pikeman

118121020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Summon a Dutiful Steed.
During your turn, whenever an allied amulet leaves play, deal 3 damage to a random enemy follower and then 1 damage to the enemy leader. (Transformation doesn't count as leaving play.)
118121020.baseFlair_:
Oh, he's so cool and handsome. But is it true he used to be a ruffian? Well... This town was poor and desolate in the beginning. Look at him now, though—a respected hunter. Just seeing him in action makes me want to swoon!
—Saloon Waitress, Jessop Town
118121020.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Recover 2 play points.
During your turn, whenever an allied amulet leaves play, deal 3 damage to a random enemy follower and then 1 damage to the enemy leader.
118121020.evoFlair_:
This town used to be nothin' but sand and rocks. We had cattle, but they attracted some nasty critters. Enter the hunters. As the town grew, so did the jobs. It's because of the ranch that town and hunter both got a fresh start.
—Saloon Doorman, Jessop Town

900121020.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Strike: Give +0/+1 to all allied Mimlemel, Freewheeling Lasses.
900121020.baseFlair_: Back in the day, I was just some dried up wood waitin' fer death. But ya... Ya saved me. Been around many a season, but when ya gave me that spring water, ya didn't just save my life—ya went beyond my bark and nourished my core.
