100211050.baseFlair_: Dead men tell no tales, so the saying goes. It's true enough, in my experience.
100211050.evoFlair_: The dead may not speak, but your corpse will let the world know what I'm capable of—make no mistake.

101211080.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Gain Ward if an allied Commander card is in play.
101211080.baseFlair_: Halt. Beyond here lies the domain of my lord. As long as I live, none shall pass.
101211080.evoFlair_: Let fly your arrows; humble me with your hordes. But mark my words: No harm shall befall my ward.

102211040.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give all allied Officer followers +1/+0.
102211040.baseFlair_: Glorious victory awaits us at the end of this battle. But to get there we must advance! Advance!
102211040.evoFlair_: If we prevail here, trust that peace will come. So advance, and never look back!

102211050.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put 2 random Officer cards from your deck into your hand.
102211050.baseFlair_: Time to open a way! Stay right behind me, everyone!
102211050.evoFlair_: Your armor can't stop this sword! Consider yourself warned if you'd stand in my way!

104211030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If an allied Commander follower is in play, gain Last Words: Summon a Tristan of the Round Table.
104211030.baseFlair_: As a Knight of the Round Table, I have a duty to fulfill, and I will allow nothing to stop me from seeing it done. Never will I forget that there is a place for me waiting by her side!
104211030.evoFlair_: The quiet pain in my chest... my thirst for everything you are... All must be suppressed to fulfill my knightly duty. I must aid my king in building his regal paradise!

105211010.baseEffect_:
Ambush.
Fanfare: Summon a Kunoichi Trainee.
105211010.baseFlair_: If you try to harm my liege, then I'll serve as your adversary. I've come from the darkness to take your lives!
105211010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
105211010.evoFlair_: My life exists for the sake of my liege. I'll dispatch any of his enemies!

106211030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Evolve this follower if there is an allied non-Swordcraft follower in play.
106211030.baseFlair_: Next I shall sing your praises, Castor! Brilliant horseman, superb tactician—an unlucky arrow sent you to Hades, your sublimity untarnished.
106211030.evoFlair_: Even though we're separated by that infernal place, we're still brothers and compatriots. My song for you ascends the heavens and reaches the gods, becoming a star whose light will never fade.

107211010.baseFlair_: My liege, are you unharmed? Rest assured, your safety is of utmost importance.
107211010.evoFlair_: My liege, are you unharmed? Fear not, we shan't let a single shred of harm touch you.

114211020.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Randomly put 2 different Levin cards (excluding Levin Scholar) from your deck into your hand.
114211020.baseFlair_: Sigh... Mysterious ruins are always such a head-splitting challenge. But if it's arithmetic prowess you seek, I'd be glad to be of assistance. All calculations are, in essence, puzzles. And every puzzle has an answer. I won't disappoint.
114211020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
114211020.evoFlair_: Very well, I promise to give every puzzle my all... Actually, hm... What an unexpected turn of events. I can't read a single word.

117211020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If an allied Commander card is in play, evolve this follower.
117211020.baseFlair_: The way I see it, one soldier is both a force unto herself and part of a greater force. Many of our brethren have paved the way, so that someone might deal the foe a crushing blow. If I'm chosen to be the spearhead, my victory will be your victory as well.
117211020.evoFlair_: Oh, glorious day. I've been chosen to carry the hopes of my comrades. But please, don't forget: the reason my lance can deal this final blow is because you, my brothers and sisters in arms, have pierced a path to victory.

119211010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Give all allied Officer followers the following effect - Clash: Deal 2 damage to the enemy leader.
Clash: Deal 2 damage to the enemy leader.
119211010.baseFlair_: Ain't no time to rest, kiddo—no one ever got what they want by sittin' around. If you want somethin', you've gotta grasp victory with your own two hands!
119211010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
119211010.evoFlair_: To the empty-handed go the bigger spoils, so throw down yer weapons an' throw up your fists! Now show me your hunger, and grasp victory with your own two hands!

101221040.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal X damage to the enemy leader. X equals the number of allied Officer followers in play.
101221040.baseFlair_: Let resolve be my sword, virtue my guide. And may this cursed blood that courses through my veins never succeed in seeing me fall from grace.
101221040.evoFlair_: I have proved myself as a knight. Now crimson-draped with Holy Lance in hand, I seek the Holy Grail. I will see my desires come true, and I will bring glory to my king!

101221060.baseFlair_: Reinforcements, when called upon, serve one purpose: turning the tide of battle! Come, comrades, our time is now!
101221060.evoFlair_: We shall show you no quarter, vile beasts. Step aside now, or face certain doom where you stand!

103221020.baseFlair_: Don't be fooled by my appearance. I'm a seasoned officer tempered in the fires of battle! Now, my proud warriors, take to the skies with me!
103221020.evoEffect_: Evolve: Deal X damage to an enemy follower. X equals the number of allied followers in play.
103221020.evoFlair_: With this sword, I'll fight for the people of Valeria... Hey! Quit patting my head! I'm an airship admiral, so show a little respect!

104221020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Summon a Luminous Knight.
Can evolve an allied Commander follower each turn for 0 evolution points until this follower leaves play.
104221020.baseFlair_: To end this age of darkness, we sacrificed our names. Now advance, knight, until this world at last knows peace.
104221020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
104221020.evoFlair_: Ours is the magic of light infused with the prayers of the people and the wishes of those who fight beside us. And we shall turn the power of hope to light!

114221010.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: If an allied Naterran Great Tree is in play, recover 3 play points.
Fanfare: Enhance (8) - Gain Storm.
114221010.baseFlair_:
You fleet-footed felines leap through the air with such fluidity and grace. Your erratic movements confound the enemy! Before they can recover from their confusion, our voices rise in cries of victory!
—Hordes singing the praises of their warrior brethren
114221010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
114221010.evoFlair_:
You fleet-footed felines possess bodies that require no rest, allowing you to advance through the most treacherous terrain with ease. March on to new battlefields, and show the enemy your pride as beastfolk!
—Hordes seeing off their warrior brethren

115221010.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Whenever this follower attacks and destroys an enemy follower, if this follower is not destroyed, evolve it.
115221010.baseFlair_:
The battles rage on, one after another. The people, the emperor, even the rice fields are exhausted. Eventually the only ones left fighting in the great war are the samurai.
—Ranno Era, Year 4: Changing Times
115221010.evoFlair_:
By the blood of five generations of emperors, along with countless rulers and samurai alike, the long battle finally comes to an end. There is no one left for the samurai to cut down.
—Bunji Era, Year 5: War's End

118221020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: If you have at least 2 Commander cards in your hand, gain +1/+1.
Once on each of your turns, when this follower's attack or defense is increased by an effect, deal 3 damage to a random enemy follower.
118221020.baseFlair_: Everyone ridiculed his weapon as antiquated and inefficient. But he was adamant, asserting that in a situation where there aren't enough doctors to go around, every rock is a formidable weapon.
118221020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
118221020.evoFlair_: Swords were broken, arrows were depleted. Firearms, gunpowder, and even magic were all spent. As dire as the situation seemed, he remained resolute, racing across the battlefield with rocks in hand.

105231020.baseFlair_: The sword was embedded within the white ridge for ages until fate entrusted it to one young man. The sword spoke to him, saying, "I am thy blade!"
105231020.evoEffect_:
Bane.
Ward.
Follower Strike: Destroy the enemy follower before it can deal any damage in return.
105231020.evoFlair_: The young man nodded, and the white ridge blade shone. Having revealed its true form, it began to speak: "I am thy blade, and thou art my comrade! I shall bring you victory!"

109231020.baseEffect_:
Can't be attacked.
Whenever an allied Officer follower comes into play, that follower can't be attacked.
109231020.baseFlair_: If you desire wings, sacrifice your possessions. Free yourself from will and reason, for they are irrelevant in the skies. —Next Generation Warfare, Chapter 1
109231020.evoFlair_: Recognize the sky not only as a home for birds, but as a new realm of battle. If you desire victory, find the path and take wing to the skies as a single blade. —Next Generation Warfare, Chapter 2

110231020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to an enemy. Randomly put 1 of the following cards into your hand.
-Gilded Blade
-Gilded Goblet
-Gilded Boots
-Gilded Necklace
Whenever you play a Loot card, deal 2 damage to a random enemy follower.
110231020.baseFlair_: Take and take again. Do not return until the wealth of this world is back in its proper pocket. Seize everything, leave nothing.
110231020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
110231020.evoFlair_:
The Third Step: Uproot
The world is full of profiteering thieves and absurd moguls. Steal the soil beneath them, so not a single sprout may take root.
—Teachings of the Usurping Thief

110231030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Destroy an enemy follower with at least 6 attack.
110231030.baseFlair_: I carry a giant sword to fell giant foes. How else would I cut down gods and dragons alike? It is the ambition of every swordsman to learn such technique.
110231030.evoFlair_: I fell giant foes to make my name giant. Why else would I cut down good and evil alike? It is the desire of every swordsman to achieve such superiority.

118231010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: If allied followers have evolved at least 3 times this match, evolve this follower.
Whenever this follower takes damage, if it's not destroyed, gain +1/+1 and fully restore its defense (up to 10 times per turn).
118231010.baseFlair_: Hero and leader of Rudelwolf, a newly formed organization of condemners. Often referred to as the Immortal Wolf, he fights with a thirst for a more ideal world.
118231010.evoEffect_: Whenever this follower takes damage, if it's not destroyed, gain +1/+1, fully restore its defense, and restore X defense to your leader (up to 10 times per turn). X equals the defense restored to this follower.
118231010.evoFlair_: The infernal sigil embedded into his body grants him immortality in exchange for eternal pain. This ravenous warrior stops at nothing to achieve his ideals.

900231040.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, gain +1/+0 and restore 3 defense to this follower.
900231040.baseFlair_: Lancelot, captain of the Order of the White Dragons, has been my best bud since we were little. Yeah... Lancey's really amazing—he's no ordinary childhood friend!
900231040.evoFlair_: Of course I worry about stuff! Right now I want to get as good as Lancey so we can fight side by side as equals... I've still got a long way to go though!

900231050.baseFlair_: I pledged this sword to my country. No matter how my honor is besmirched, I cannot falter in keeping my vow!
900231050.evoFlair_: This sword slayed the great dragon—do not presume you'll escape it so easily. Now, time to meet your end!

900231060.baseEffect_:
Storm.
Strike: Gain +1/+1 if an allied Vane, Indomitable Knight is in play.
900231060.baseFlair_: I've been handed a royal decree from the king to seek knowledge that will benefit our country, but I don't even know where to begin... I think I'll start by observing other lands.
900231060.evoFlair_: There must be something I can do for the people of this kingdom... but what? What should a knight protect? That's the question I have to answer.

900231070.baseEffect_:
Gain Rush while an allied Siegfried, Dragonslayer is in play.
Strike: Gain +X/+0. X equals the number of other allied followers in play.
900231070.baseFlair_: Humph. Plebian riff-raff like this dares to stand in my way to royalty? What insolence. We shall conquer them, vassal! Follow my lead!
900231070.evoFlair_: I want to build a land without war, where even the powerless can live in peace. To do that, I'll need superlative vassals. Captain, won't you aid me?

101241020.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Gain +1/+0 for each enemy follower in play. If there are at least 3, gain the following effect: Can't be targeted by enemy effects.
101241020.baseFlair_: She descended upon the chaotic battlefield, a pristine white flower against the darkness. As her ivory blade danced, the wicked fell before her.
101241020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
101241020.evoFlair_: As a blossom bosoms its precious nectar, so too the knight did shield her wards from harm. As a lady of grace so easily ensnares the gaze of onlookers, so too the flash of the knight's blade did bedazzle her foes.

103241010.baseEffect_:
Storm.
Fanfare: Enhance (9) - Can attack 2 times per turn. Reduce damage to 0 until the end of the turn.
103241010.baseFlair_: From this day forth, our order will be known as the Sky Knights! May justice and honor forever be our comrades in arms!
103241010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
103241010.evoFlair_: We brandish our swords to uphold order and to thwart the forces of cruelty and chaos. Let us ride like lightning, my brothers and sisters!

703241010.baseEffect_:
Storm.
Fanfare: Enhance (9) - Can attack 2 times per turn. Reduce damage to 0 until the end of the turn.
703241010.baseFlair_: From this day forth, our order will be known as the Sky Knights! May justice and honor forever be our comrades in arms!
703241010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
703241010.evoFlair_: We brandish our swords to uphold order and to thwart the forces of cruelty and chaos. Let us ride like lightning, my brothers and sisters!

704241010.baseEffect_:
Storm.
Fanfare: Enhance (9) - Can attack 2 times per turn. Reduce damage to 0 until the end of the turn.
704241010.baseFlair_: From this day forth, our order will be known as the Sky Knights! May justice and honor forever be our comrades in arms!
704241010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
704241010.evoFlair_: We brandish our swords to uphold order and to thwart the forces of cruelty and chaos. Let us ride like lightning, my brothers and sisters!

106241020.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Last Words: At the start of your next turn, put a Barbarossa into your hand. Change its cost to 8 if there are 2 enemy followers or less in play. Change its cost to 2 instead if there are 3 enemy followers or more in play.
106241020.baseFlair_: His beard, crimson like an inferno. His advance, furious like the flames. The people call him the red-bearded king. He is an immortal hero who aids an imperiled kingdom.
106241020.evoFlair_: His blades, silver and shining, cut through the flaming dervish of the battlefield. For great prosperity, and for the people's peace, he continues to reign in red-bearded glory.

110241030.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, give +1/+1 to all allied Officer followers.
110241030.baseFlair_: My valiant soldiers, let my song be the wind at your backs, spurring you on to glory! Be steadfast and never hesitate! Charge!
110241030.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Put a random 1-play point and 2-play point follower from your deck into play.
At the end of your turn, give +1/+1 to all allied Officer followers.
110241030.evoFlair_: My voice shall bolster your fighting spirit and salve your wounds. Thus armed, any one of you is a hero worth a thousand swords! One more march and you shall hear my victory hymn. Onward to glory!

112241030.baseEffect_:
During your turn, when this card is added to your hand from your deck, reveal it. Then give +1/+0 to a random allied follower.
Fanfare: Evolve another allied follower whose attack or defense has been increased by an effect. Evolve effects will not activate for that follower.
112241030.baseFlair_: His most impressive feature is that eye of his. Sure, he can read the battlefield like an open book—but that's common enough for all master swordsmen. No, he's got an eye for talent, able to transform those who haven't reached their full potential into true warriors.
112241030.evoFlair_: Sometimes gossip circles about him: "Is that so-called master actually any good with a blade? I bet he's all talk." I advise those rumormongers to laugh while they still can. His true ability is fearsome; his strikes are but flashes of lightning to the untrained eye.

113241020.baseEffect_:
Storm.
Fanfare: Enhance (9) - Randomly put different Levin followers (excluding Albert, Levin Champion) from your deck into play until your area is full.
Strike: Gain +1/+0 if another allied Levin card is in play.
113241020.baseFlair_: A not-yet-champion was born into tragedy. Together with his comrades, he learned the strength of banding together. He reaches out an arm: "Devotion is our power. Into the melee at lightning speed!"
113241020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
113241020.evoFlair_:
Though he cannot forgive his own sins, he excuses those of others. A frozen heart, a burning pain.
"This tragedy will not happen again—not so long as I have a hand in things!"

115241030.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: If at least 1 allied follower has evolved this match, gain Ward.
Then, if at least 3 have evolved, recover 3 play points.
Then, if at least 5 have evolved, restore 5 defense to your leader.
Then, if at least 7 have evolved, draw cards until there are 7 cards in your hand.
115241030.baseFlair_: Hehe. Are you surprised by my appearance? Right now I'm not the chosen harpist of the gods... I'm an ordinary warrior who fights alongside the people! I'll play for you a song of courage!
115241030.evoFlair_: Rather than merely playing my harp from paradise, I want to join with the people to create a new paradise! A mournful melody isn't befitting of a bright future. Come, let the melody of courage resound!

116241020.baseEffect_:
During your turn, when this card is added to your hand from your deck, reveal it and give your leader the following effect until the end of the turn: Whenever an allied Machina follower comes into play, give it +1/+0 and Rush.
----------
Rush.
Fanfare: Give your leader the following effect - Whenever an allied Machina follower attacks an enemy follower during your turn, deal 1 damage to the enemy leader. (This effect is not stackable and lasts for the rest of the match.)
116241020.baseFlair_: Relying on the brute strength of a single soldier, what an archaic strategy. These days heroes are made on the assembly line. Can you argue with such convenience? No. You can't. Now come—let us reactivate our future legend!
116241020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
116241020.evoFlair_:
Harumph... To trust numbers alone—a foolish notion, that. Shave it down to the core and what's left? Hordes of listless troops? If you won't heed my question, then perhaps the business end of my spear will convince you.
—Patrick, Rhiceros Knight

116241030.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Randomly put 2 different Officer followers from your deck into your hand.
Enhance (7): Gain the ability to evolve for 0 evolution points and the following effect - The next time this follower takes damage, reduce that damage to 0.
116241030.baseFlair_: One cultivates kindness to protect their friends. One cultivates strength to survive. That's what my father taught me, and I will never forget his words! No matter the despair I face, I will cut it in twain with a flash of my silver blade!
116241030.evoEffect_: Evolve: Until the end of the turn, subtract 3 from the cost of an Officer follower in your hand.
116241030.evoFlair_: Leave your tears in the past and your promises for the grave. That's what he told me, so I won't hang my head any longer. I'll look forward and keep going. Not just for myself—but for everyone who's believed in me so far!

118241010.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (1): Put a Desperados' Shot into your hand.
----------
Rush.
Follower Strike: Destroy the enemy follower before it can deal any damage in return.
Last Words: At the start of your next turn, summon a Val, Trusty Getaway Car.
118241010.baseFlair_: Welcome to Rivayle, where folk are poor and lives are short. It's eat or be eaten, and that's the way it's always been. But there's tell of a couple of bandit lords who look like haze and fight like hellfire. People call 'em Bunny and Baron. And they're gonna change this here world.
118241010.evoFlair_:
"We're Bunny & Baron. And we're gonna tip the scales."
"Yep. Gotta even out the odds."
"Then let's hop to it, Bun'."
"Damn skippy, Bar'!"
"We're gonna get everything back!"

900241020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Summon a Shield Guardian and a Heavy Knight.
900241020.baseFlair_: Even in the most despair-filled battle, my strategies will come through. Here and now, I vow fresh hope and victory!
900241020.evoFlair_: When your hearts are dyed in hope, any hardship can be overcome. All right, victory's in sight! Let's win this battle!

900241030.baseEffect_:
Storm.
Fanfare: Gain +1/+0 for each other allied follower in play. Then return all other allied followers to your hand.
900241030.baseFlair_: I'll use my power to make this world of hope writhe. Here and now, I vow fresh despair and defeat!
900241030.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
900241030.evoFlair_: When your hearts are dyed in despair, the world will fill with pain. And you will be defeated. Let's end this battle!

101214020.baseEffect_:
Destroy an enemy follower.
Summon a Knight if an allied Commander card is in play.
101214020.baseFlair_: The keen edge that cleaves the enemy lines in two.

106214010.baseEffect_: Put a Swordcraft follower from your hand into play. Give it Rush, and return it to your hand at the end of your turn.
106214010.baseFlair_: A quick flash. Cry of the steel hanging in the air. A head tumbles to the ground before its owner realizes what's happened.

112214010.baseEffect_: Give Rush to an allied follower. That follower can attack 2 times per turn.
112214010.baseFlair_: Who needs a shield? Can't even cut anything with it. —Dualblade User

103224010.baseEffect_: Select an allied follower and deal X damage to all other followers. X equals the attack of the chosen follower.
103224010.baseFlair_: Foes? Allies? Stop talking nonsense! On the field of battle, I don't need anyone but myself!

111224010.baseEffect_:
Deal 2 damage to all enemy followers.
Randomly put 2 of the following cards into your hand.
-Gilded Blade
-Gilded Goblet
-Gilded Boots
-Gilded Necklace
111224010.baseFlair_: If stealing everything they own can't satisfy you, steal even the void that's left behind. Leave not even the sensation of nothingness.

900224010.baseEffect_: Banish an enemy follower or amulet.
900224010.baseFlair_: Well, you'll live well in the next world. —Valse, Magical Marksman

105234010.baseEffect_: Summon a Club Soldier, a Heart Guardian, and a Spade Raider.
105234010.baseFlair_: They say the diamonds fellow slipped up and got his head chopped off.

106234010.baseEffect_: Put 2 random Commanders that cost 3 play points from your deck into play.
106234010.baseFlair_: It is where twelve heroes sit, all of them brave men of distinguished military service. It is the heart of the kingdom—if not the very world. It is the round table. —Knights of the Round Table, Chapter 3

109234010.baseEffect_:
Choose: Summon 1 of the following followers.
-Vane, Indomitable Knight
-Siegfried, Dragonslayer
-Lancelot, Twinfang Prodigy
-Percival, Lord of Flames
Enhance (8): Choose 2 instead.
109234010.baseFlair_: For country. For comrades. For dreams. For honor. With an unyielding conviction and dignity beating in their hearts, four knights assume a destiny most noble. In the name of justice and those they wish to protect, they wield their blades.

900244010.baseFlair_: Darkness of despair, begone! Twilight Blade! —Lecia and Nano

101232010.baseEffect_:
Whenever an allied follower that originally costs 1 play point comes into play, give it Storm.
At the start of your turn, summon a Knight.
101232010.baseFlair_: Follow the point of his sword off into the distance to where the promised land lies.

104232010.baseEffect_: Whenever an allied Commander follower comes into play, deal X damage to a random enemy follower. X equals the attack of the Commander. If there are no enemy followers in play, deal X damage to the enemy leader instead.
104232010.baseFlair_: Target sighted! Ready the cannon! Fire! —Captain Lecia

111232010.baseEffect_: Whenever you play a Commander follower, put a random Officer follower that costs X play points from your deck into play. X equals the original cost of that Commander follower.
111232010.baseFlair_: Loyalty as strong as steel, forged into a blade to strike down sorrow.

101211130.baseFlair_: Reinforcements swept down, not a hoof to be heard. Under a storm of beating wings, the tables soon turned.
101211130.evoFlair_: From parts unknown the winged auxiliary soared. Soon its braying led the cheers of victory.

101211140.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give +2/+2 to an allied Officer follower.
101211140.baseFlair_: Massaging the egos of your men will only bring you grief. You there! Don't just stand around! An instant of laziness like that in battle and you're a goner!
101211140.evoFlair_: Listen up and listen well, men! Lack of concentration is the first step to a watery grave! Focus on the task at hand, and see that your enemy beats you to the bottom!

103211040.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to all enemy followers if an allied Commander card is in play.
103211040.baseFlair_: You have nothing to worry about, my dear master. Once they tangle with me, the fiends in pursuit will run for cover.
103211040.evoFlair_: To be praised by you is an honor of which I am not worthy, sir. By way of thanks, I'll wield this whip as only I can!

105211020.baseFlair_: It's not just things you can see that I crush. I also crush the spirits of fools who think they can beat me just because they're men.
105211020.evoEffect_: Evolve: Destroy an enemy follower or amulet.
105211020.evoFlair_: It's the hour of conquest! Your land, your history, and your pride are all about to be crushed!

115211010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower.
Whenever an enemy follower is destroyed, gain +1/+1.
115211010.baseFlair_:
"I am the lone rose of the battlefield! I never fail to wink!"
"Eek! It's her!"
"I hear she can fell her foes with one eye closed!"
—Petalwink Paladin and enemy soldiers
115211010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
115211010.evoFlair_:
"I am the lone rose of the battlefield! I give even my enemies a proper greeting!"
"Eek! We surrendered! Why's she coming this way!"
"Quit waving back at her, you dolt! Retreat! Retreeeat!"
—Petalwink Paladin and enemy soldiers

100221020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give +1/+1 to all other allied followers.
100221020.baseFlair_: Battle awaits, recruits. Fear not what lies ahead, for victory is ours for the taking!
100221020.evoFlair_: Victory is already ours. How can I be so sure, you ask? Simple. Every battle is won or lost before it's ever fought, and this one is no exception.

104221030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Randomly gain Rush, Bane, or Ward.
104221030.baseFlair_: Sometimes you lose things, and sometimes you find 'em! But ain't that just how it goes? I got this scary-lookin' hook for instance, so how'd you like to see what this little beauty is all about?
104221030.evoFlair_: Me hook is so much better than the hand I lost—and it's finding its targets especially well today. So come and have a taste! I'll send the lot of you to Davy Jones's locker!

114231010.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (1): Put a Princess's Strike into your hand.
----------
Ward.
Fanfare: Put a Princess's Strike into your hand. If there are fewer allied followers than enemy followers in play, recover 2 play points.
114231010.baseFlair_:
"I truly believe we can reach the Virtuous Mother."
Forever noble, forever brave...
"So, please. Won't you put down your swords?"
The Princess addresses the radicals, hoping to bring an end to the conflict.
114231010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
114231010.evoFlair_:
"It is the duty of the Forest Princess to guide the lost."
A tender heart, a steely resolve...
"And she mustn't be stifled by overzealous retainers, mm?"
She fights against the laws of nature to protect the meek.

101241010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Summon Otohime's Bodyguards until your area is full. (An area can hold 5 cards.)
101241010.baseFlair_: Welcome, dear guest. Rest a while. My home is your home. Oh? Something precious eludes your grasp? Please do tell. Let us discuss how I can aid you.
101241010.evoFlair_: The nerve! First you hurry a lady, and then you demand she wait while you prepare! Show a little decorum, would you? Excuse me! My voice will be heard, and no, you will not leave me here under any circumstances!

701241010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Summon Otohime's Bodyguards until your area is full. (An area can hold 5 cards.)
701241010.baseFlair_: Welcome, dear guest. Rest a while. My home is your home. Oh? Something precious eludes your grasp? Please do tell. Let us discuss how I can aid you.
701241010.evoFlair_: The nerve! First you hurry a lady, and then you demand she wait while you prepare! Show a little decorum, would you? Excuse me! My voice will be heard, and no, you will not leave me here under any circumstances!

101241030.baseEffect_:
Ambush.
Fanfare: Destroy an enemy follower with at least 5 attack.
101241030.baseFlair_: A still-raw rancor is to blame for this cursed soul's arrival at the capital gates, and only vengeance for a love betrayed will see her leave.
101241030.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
101241030.evoFlair_: Tears of desperation and her companion's blood lend a dark sheen to her sword. Her enemy will one day learn that her devotion to her cause shines with the same intensity.

107241010.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Gain -X/+Y. X equals the number of other allied followers in play, and Y equals the number of enemy followers in play.
Can't be targeted by enemy effects.
107241010.baseFlair_: Within the flames of battle, dark petals dance—bringing further pain and begetting madness into the world.
107241010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
107241010.evoFlair_: The vehement black flower wields its blade in search of the strong, taking form as a woman—her dancing silhouette and sword as fast as the wind.

706241010.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Gain -X/+Y. X equals the number of other allied followers in play, and Y equals the number of enemy followers in play.
Can't be targeted by enemy effects.
706241010.baseFlair_: Within the flames of battle, dark petals dance—bringing further pain and begetting madness into the world.
706241010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
706241010.evoFlair_: The vehement black flower wields its blade in search of the strong, taking form as a woman—her dancing silhouette and sword as fast as the wind.

108241030.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Transform the Reaper at the bottom of your deck into a Victory Card.
At the end of your turn, put 2 random Officer followers from your deck into your hand.
108241030.baseFlair_: This world is home to those without swords. It is home to those who cannot stand. That is why I am here. I am the sword of the weak, and I act as their courage!
108241030.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
108241030.evoFlair_: Who said you cannot battle? Who said you were a coward? Do not worry, for I am here. Raise your sword and your spirits!

109241010.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Strike: Put a Beatrix, Undying Blue into your hand if there is no allied Beatrix, Undying Blue in play or your hand.
109241010.baseFlair_: Damn it, Bea! Where the hell did you go? Sometimes I think she gets in trouble just for the attention!
109241010.evoFlair_:
Grrr... Seriously, Bea? You ran off alone and got captured by the enemy again? When this is over, I'm gonna chew your head off!
Spear of Arvess! Show 'em your power!

109241030.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Put a random Swordcraft follower (excluding Ironfist Beast Warrior) from your deck into your hand. Subtract 2 from its cost.
Fanfare: Enhance (9) - Subtract 9 from its cost instead.
109241030.baseFlair_: He may appear different, but his heart is one with his comrades, as is his loyalty to the motherland and his love for its citizens. With a mighty roar, he storms the battlefield.
109241030.evoEffect_: Evolve: Give all other allied Swordcraft followers Rush.
109241030.evoFlair_: In this fist is naught but pure will—a will to serve the motherland, a will to live with compassion. With a majestic howl, the iron beast storms into battle.

117241020.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: Enhance (8) - Gain the ability to evolve for 0 evolution points.
During your turn, whenever this follower attacks and destroys an enemy follower, if this follower is not destroyed, recover 2 play points and gain the ability to attack 2 times this turn.
117241020.baseFlair_: I am perfection, flawless beauty personified. But that's not enough. No words can ever do me justice. So, let's finish this battle to perfection—finding a befitting solution is going to take me all night.
117241020.evoEffect_:
Rush.
Evolve: Give -4/-0 to an enemy follower.
During your turn, whenever this follower attacks and destroys an enemy follower, if this follower is not destroyed, recover 2 play points and gain the ability to attack 2 times this turn.
117241020.evoFlair_: A flawless recon mission, preparations are complete. But that's not enough. Mere victory means nothing to me. So, let's teach them the meaning of utter defeat—only then can I find the last piece to become complete.

101234020.baseEffect_: Summon a Pirate and a Viking.
101234020.baseFlair_: All right, you louts! Finish this up!

102221040.baseEffect_:
Ambush.
Fanfare: Summon a Koga Kunoichi.
102221040.baseFlair_: If you can't evade my attacks, death is all that's left for you.
102221040.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
102221040.evoFlair_: My bunshin clone is like a shadow, but the pain it inflicts is very real. I'll paint the night red with these twin blades.

111221010.baseEffect_:
If this card is discarded, deal 1 damage to a random enemy follower.
----------
Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to a random enemy follower. Do this 4 times.
111221010.baseFlair_:
Everything lay in ruins: weapons, soldiers, buildings. That single attack sent all who approached flying.
Everything was laid waste: his body, his heart, his mind. Each swing shredded something deep within him.
111221010.evoFlair_:
It was a lance. A single lance.
It was made to pierce, sever, and destroy.
He was a man. A solitary man.
He merely forgot everything but destruction.

101231040.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Last Words: Summon a Fortress Guard.
101231040.baseFlair_: What a vicious force! What a savage onslaught! So this is the power of our enemy. I'll just have to hold out until the reinforcements arrive!
101231040.evoFlair_: Even if I fall, my friends will avenge me. I have nothing to fear, so prepare yourselves! I come for you!

111231020.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Select 1 card in your hand and discard the rest. Draw a card for each card you discarded.
111231020.baseFlair_: Death is sacred. Birth is holy. That's why I love the battlefield. It shines bright with miracles! Life and death, chance and fate intertwine in this all-enveloping drama. War is an act of love... That's why I sell arms.
111231020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
111231020.evoFlair_: The warm glow of burning buildings. The screams. The chorus of friendly fire. The tears of joy and shouts of welcome from the ramparts when the army returns victorious. War is so exquisite—humanity will never outgrow it. Come then! We have miracles to sell!

112231030.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (2): Randomly summon a Lilje, Butler of the Mists or a Sheena, Maid of the Mists.
----------
Fanfare: Deal 2 damage to all enemy followers.
112231030.baseFlair_: All value lies in strength. Weaklings are no more than rubbish. If you wish to defeat me and prove your own worth, you must first show you have what it takes.
112231030.evoFlair_: I see. It seems you are not as foolish and weak as I had assumed. Very well. I shall determine the worth of your neck with my blade.

900231100.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 2 damage to all enemy followers.
900231100.baseFlair_: All value lies in strength. Weaklings are no more than rubbish. If you wish to defeat me and prove your own worth, you must first show you have what it takes.
900231100.evoFlair_: I see. It seems you are not as foolish and weak as I had assumed. Very well. I shall determine the worth of your neck with my blade.

113231020.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Can't be targeted by enemy effects.
Last Words: Summon a Shield Guardian, and give it +X/+X. X equals the number of times that allied followers have evolved during this match.
113231020.baseFlair_:
We asked why he fights, why he's stood tall.
"The wicked forces encroaching," he answered while facing their onslaught. "Now watch me clear the way!"
His stance on the battlefield was all the explanation his actions required.
113231020.evoFlair_: Thousands of blades, myriads of arrows, and millions of spells assaulted him. Yet he did not flee or throw his arms in the air. Trusting in his brother-in-arms, he flung aside fear and fought through to the very end. That is why we shout—to say look at these imposing shields.

119231020.baseEffect_:
Storm.
Bane.
Strike: Recover X play points. X equals this follower's attack.
119231020.baseFlair_: All I've ever been good for is woodcutting. No one thought I'd ever amount to anything... but I'll prove them wrong! My daily grind won't have been for nothing. I leave this town a nobody, but I'll return a hero!
119231020.evoFlair_: Chopping day in, day out, all year round... My old routine was nothing special, but thanks to all that practice, my skills with an axe are top notch. Just wait till the folks back home hear about this!

104241010.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Summon a Durandal the Incorruptible if there isn't an allied Durandal the Incorruptible in play.
104241010.baseFlair_: A proud hero in the service of a kingdom destined for glory. She charges across the battlefield, holding her holy sword Durandal high for the sake of her homeland.
104241010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
104241010.evoFlair_: Durandal flashes white each time it's brought down, and every shining afterimage it leaves in the air brings further glory to her kingdom.

107241020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Randomly put different Swordcraft followers that cost 2 play points or less from your deck into play until your area is full.
107241020.baseFlair_: The battle went silent as soon as it started. The soldiers unsheathed their blades and raised their shields, all in the name of the Knight King. With the tips of their swords, they seek the promised land.
107241020.evoFlair_: Almost as if predestined, enemies are felled and evil is defeated, all in the name of the Knight King. At the end of their grueling journey, the promised land awaits them.

111241010.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Invocation: At the start of your turn, if 15 or more allied followers have been destroyed during this match, invoke this card.
Strike: Give all other allied followers +1/+1.
111241010.baseFlair_:
The exhaustion of conflict sucks at an army's boots like muddy ground. When his troops foundered in the swamp of despair, the lionhearted hero stepped forth, clad in flames, and rattled the heavens with his roar:
"Set your despair ablaze. Reduce your enemies to ash!"
111241010.evoFlair_: The lion's roar roused his allies and froze his foes. Despair burned away, leaving only the thirst for victory. The balance had been broken. And so they pressed onward to glory. "Pit the fire in your hearts against the foe. Blaze our trail to the future!"

112241020.baseEffect_:
Whenever an allied Machina follower is destroyed, subtract 1 from the cost of this card.
----------
Rush.
Whenever another allied Machina follower comes into play, give it Rush.
112241020.baseFlair_: A hero emerged that day from among the masses. Despite his imposing appearance, the man who protected the people from the enemy invasion was showered with applause. —Commander's Report, Part 4
112241020.evoFlair_: I am honored to have been presented with such cutting-edge equipment, despite being a mere commoner. I vow to meet everyone's expectations by seizing victory in the next battle.

113241010.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (4): Randomly summon 2 of the following - Cannoneer, Buccaneer, or Marine Raider.
----------
Once on each of your turns, when you play a Loot card, summon a Pirate and Viking.
113241010.baseFlair_: I am the law of the sea! I plunder as I please, show my might, and accept no limits to my seafarin'! I am the queen—she who sees o'er the seas!
113241010.evoFlair_:
"In this world—more'n anyone else—the queen does as she pleases!"
"The cap'n's mighty all right! That why I'm with 'er!"
"Alwida's out of her mind, so we never get bored!" —Alwida's band of pirates

114241010.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (3): Summon 3 Shield Guardians.
----------
Storm.
Fanfare: If at least 10 allied followers have been destroyed this match, give +2/+2 and Storm to another allied follower.
114241010.baseFlair_: A skilled hawk hides its talons, but a ferocious tiger bares its fangs for all to see. No amount of strategy, artifice, or cunning intimidates the beast, as it only cares about mowing down the enemy.
114241010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
114241010.evoFlair_: The mighty army crumbles, but the wise tiger sharpens its fangs. The beast tears open a formidable stronghold once said to be unconquerable. Though man may know pride, tigers are incapable of such folly.

116241010.baseEffect_:
Crystallize (1): Countdown (1)
Fanfare: Put a Naterran Great Tree into your hand.
Last Words: If it is your turn, randomly put 1 of the highest-cost Natura cards that cost X play points or less from your deck into your hand. X equals your remaining play points.
----------
Ward.
Fanfare: If there are no other allied followers in play, recover 6 play points.
116241010.baseFlair_: Harumph... The crash accomplishes more and more every day. The fruits of my guidance cannot be measured by the naked eye, but no matter. I can see the efforts of my troops, and it is wild perfection. One for the crash and the crash for one!
116241010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
116241010.evoFlair_:
Wow... You still train your troops like that? How traditional, leaving the heavy lifting to a handful of commanders. Isn't our way less complicated? If one of your soldiers fall, just replace them!
—Grayson, Rocket Blader

900241070.baseEffect_:
Can't attack.
At the end of your turn, randomly deal X damage to an enemy or another ally and then Y damage to this follower. X equals this follower's attack and Y equals the attack of the follower or leader damaged (leaders have 0 attack). Do this 2 times.
900241070.baseFlair_:
My liege, I'm not your weapon; rather, you are mine.
Chariots may need drivers, but I will hold the reins.
900241070.evoFlair_:
I rampage as I please; my liege can only watch.
My liege, I'm not your weapon; rather, you are mine.

900242010.baseEffect_: While this amulet is in play, all allies in play and allied followers that come into play can’t take more than 4 damage at a time.
900242010.baseFlair_: A holy sword bound to a certain proud hero. Its blade will shine for eternity, never to break or tarnish.

106211020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to all enemy followers.
Strike: Deal 1 damage to all enemy followers.
106211020.baseFlair_: You stand there without permission—in my territory and so disorderly! If you've come by mistake, be carved; if you've come with purpose, be carved!
106211020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
106211020.evoFlair_: If you're in my territory, then you belong to me. Aren't you concerned about how I will handle your life? You'll be diced and dead.

116211030.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (2): Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower.
----------
Ward.
Fanfare: Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower.
116211030.baseFlair_: He once had a brother who took pride in his strength. That very same brother had his life eaten away by the flames of war. Now, wielding a weapon unintentionally passed on to him, he wades into battle and calmly states, "You're gonna feel the impact."
116211030.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
116211030.evoFlair_: That boisterous laughter and those cheerful and carefree days have left him. Despite this, he has to continue on, reminding himself, "Lotta fightin' left. But I'm not out here just for me."

119211030.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: Destroy a random enemy follower or amulet.
119211030.baseFlair_:
Unlike horses or elephants, the noble rhinoceros lives alone, never forming herds with others. Due to this independent spirit, one can continue to fight alone even if it loses its rider.
—Military Encyclopedia: Rhinos, Chapter 1
119211030.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
119211030.evoFlair_:
Rhinos have poor eyesight and lack the precision of other steeds. Without proper direction, they will rampage across the battlefield, knocking down friend and foe alike.
—Military Encyclopedia: Rhinos, Chapter 2

101221110.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Recover X play points. X equals the number of other allied followers in play.
101221110.baseFlair_: You did well to hold out in my absence, but now I have returned, and our victory is assured! The time has come for us to strike back!
101221110.evoFlair_: Hear me well, evil creatures. My soldiers have suffered and fallen at your hands, and so I must take your lives in return! Your heads shall adorn the graves of the fallen!

101231020.baseFlair_: Umm... can I help? It's just... you do realize you've stumbled into a dragon's domain, don't you? Sorry to have to ask, but... would you object if I skipped straight to chastising you?
101231020.evoFlair_: I suppose foregoing the formalities wouldn't hurt just this once. I don't often entertain guests, you see, and—oh my, where are my manners? Please rest a while, and feel free to occupy yourself with this little one while I call for help.

103231030.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Bane.
Follower Strike: Deal X damage to the enemy leader. X equals this follower's attack.
103231030.baseFlair_: I was born with superhuman strength, and it caused all kinds of trouble for my mother. Still, packing the strength of a giant has its uses, such as being able to cut down stone dragons!
103231030.evoFlair_: Stone dragons, fire dragons, flying dragons... Hardly worth the effort of showing up! Bring me big, bad, god-level dragons! I'll chop 'em up and make 'em into gifts for my mother!

104231030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give +2/+2 to all other allied followers. Give all allied Officer followers Ward.
104231030.baseFlair_: You're the swords and shields of your homeland! You're the handpicked elite bringers of the dawn! Now show our foes why you're here!
104231030.evoFlair_: This airship represents the height of humanity's wisdom and magical arts, and on it rides hope itself! Now fly with me into the light of dawn and see why they call me the wolf!

102241010.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Can attack up to 14 times per turn.
Can't attack the enemy leader.
102241010.baseFlair_: The ambitious young Alexander rose up to conquer a vast continent. In place of war horses, dragons of exceptional cunning pulled his mighty chariot.
102241010.evoFlair_: The king's army marched across the continent to consolidate an empire stretching from ocean to ocean. Alexander alone would sit on its great throne.

105241020.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Can't be destroyed by effects. (Can be destroyed by damage from effects.)
105241020.baseFlair_: In his eyes is an authority—a cutting perceptiveness—unique to those who have overcome despair time and again. Though he ages, he remains valiant. Though he grows old, he is a hero still. Halfhearted tactics hold no sway with him.
105241020.evoFlair_: The way of the weak is to gaze upon the tides of war and puzzle out a strategy. But the strong need pay no heed to the tides of war. They can sever a foe's schemes with a single swing. Only one thing is, therefore, necessary: the will to advance.

108241020.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: Give an allied follower +3/+4. If it is an Officer follower, give it Ward. If it is a Commander follower, give it Clash: Draw a card.
108241020.baseFlair_: Once the royal castle falls, even the greatest kingdom is defeated. Should we not then build the strongest of all castles? —Words of a king
108241020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
108241020.evoFlair_: Your days are over, you who guard the royal castle in accordance with old custom. Prostrate yourself before the procession of the flying king! —Words of a king

109241020.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (2): Summon 2 Knights.
----------
Fanfare: Give your leader the following effects.
-Whenever an allied follower attacks, if there are no allied Knights in play, summon a Knight.
-Whenever an allied follower that originally costs 1 play point comes into play, give it Storm.
(These effects are not stackable and last for the rest of the match.)
109241020.baseFlair_: Only despair could be found on the desolate battlefield, utterly devoid of hope. It was then that his voice echoed throughout the forsaken air—an order to counter attack, a promise of triumph.
109241020.evoFlair_: The soldiers gathered at his blade, where their wills were united as one for glory, for victory, and most importantly, for the people. His heart ablaze with passion, the honorable knight charges into the battlefield.

119241010.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: Skybound Art (10) - Subtract 5 from the cost of all Swordcraft followers in your hand.
Super Skybound Art (15): Subtract 5 from the cost of all Swordcraft followers in your deck.
During your turn, when this follower attacks and destroys an enemy follower, if this follower is not destroyed, evolve it.
119241010.baseFlair_: I journey in search of supreme strength; to meet a glorious end in combat is my deepest desire. Indeed, the thing I fear most is halting my steps and letting my blade succumb to rust. Will I be able to achieve my end before that happens?
119241010.evoEffect_:
Rush.
Can attack 2 times per turn.
119241010.evoFlair_: There are those whose journeys differ from mine. Divergent paths lead to divergent destinations; a thousand buds will yield blooms in infinite variety. This is what makes the world an interesting place, and why I have further yet to go.

900241060.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Destroy 2 enemy followers.
Last Words: Deal 4 damage to the enemy leader.
900241060.baseFlair_:
I'd love nothing more than to watch the miracle of life and death play out to its conclusion, but alas—peace is an ever-present threat. One that must be removed... permanently.
—Alyaska, War Hawker
900241060.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
900241060.evoFlair_:
The stage of miracles that is the battlefield deserves a fitting end. And I happen to know the best way to give this drama a proper send-off!
—Alyaska, War Hawker

117211010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Discard a card. Gain +X/+X. X equals the original cost of the discarded card.
117211010.baseFlair_: The Eight of Cups calls for noble surrender. He smiles upon the faces of the desirous masses and, in calm, measured tones, explains the path of enlightenment: to extend a hand and give to those in need is to gain something far more precious.
117211010.evoFlair_: He gladly divests himself of his riches, buoyed by his philosophy: to hold onto gold and other treasures is to lose everything. One needs only to let go. Those with empty pockets will gain wealth and splendor far beyond imagining.

102231030.baseEffect_: Last Words: Summon a Leonidas's Resolve.
102231030.baseFlair_: A true king is not measured by his achievements in life but rather by his ability to inspire his soldiers in death.
102231030.evoFlair_: He fought with his spear until it snapped, his sword until it shattered, and finally with his fists. The king bellowed as he scattered legions. Even if he'd fallen, his people would have spoken of him long after his death.

110241020.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (2): Change an enemy follower's attack and defense to 1/1.
----------
Fanfare: Change all enemy followers' attack and defense to 1/1.
110241020.baseFlair_:
Long ago, lived the ninja Jiraiya, who learned how to transform into a toad. He married a woman named Tsunade, who could transform into a slug, and banished the fearsome beast Raiju.
—Book of Heaven, The Legend of Jiraiya
110241020.evoFlair_:
Jiraiya's mortal enemy, Orochimaru, transformed into a serpent, but Jiraiya exorcised the serpent's spirit with a slice from the Namikiri. It is said that in defeating his rival, he ascended to the heavens a master of his art.
—Book of Earth, The Legend of Jiraiya

900232010.baseEffect_: Whenever an allied follower comes into play, give it +3/+3 and Rush.
900232010.baseFlair_: The great king has fallen. And yet his army continues marching to the cadence of his commands.

111241030.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (2): Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower.
Accelerate (7): Deal 3 damage to all enemy followers.
----------
Storm.
Can attack 2 times per turn.
111241030.baseFlair_: In this world ravaged by ceaseless battle, would it kill you to at least fight with a little grace? My blade is but a pale pink flower. And like a petal in the wind, your head shall spiral to earth.
111241030.evoFlair_: An executioner's blade? Utterly repulsive. Something so boorish and utterly devoid of meaning can't compare to the art of my swordplay. My technique shall paint the earth, as shall your blood.

711241010.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (2): Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower.
Accelerate (7): Deal 3 damage to all enemy followers.
----------
Storm.
Can attack 2 times per turn.
711241010.baseFlair_: In this world ravaged by ceaseless battle, would it kill you to at least fight with a little grace? My blade is but a pale pink flower. And like a petal in the wind, your head shall spiral to earth.
711241010.evoFlair_: An executioner's blade? Utterly repulsive. Something so boorish and utterly devoid of meaning can't compare to the art of my swordplay. My technique shall paint the earth, as shall your blood.

900521030.baseFlair_: It does not speak, for a monster has no words. However, seen somewhere in its eyes is melancholic sorrow.
900521030.evoFlair_: You cannot speak, for the towering monster stands right before you. However, heard somewhere in its roars is heartrending anguish.

900524010.baseEffect_:
Deal 4 damage to an allied follower and enemy follower.
(Can be played only when both a targetable allied card and enemy card are in play.)
900524010.baseFlair_: If you don't wish to kill me, allow me to change your mind! —Fran, Monster Girl

900534040.baseFlair_: I'm also gonna fight! I'm done crying, and I'm done watching other people cry. Just try and do something mean. I'll stop you—you can bet on it!

900534050.baseEffect_:
Restore 4 defense to your leader.
Put a Fleeting Joy into your hand.
900534050.baseFlair_: Um, I can fight too... I used to be really weak... and I couldn't do anything. But I'm different now. I think... I've changed. And I'm not gonna lose to you. 'Cause I want to win!

101511120.baseFlair_: All this poor creature wanted was another hug from its master. A demon granted it eternal life in order to fulfill that final wish.
101511120.evoFlair_: Eternal life comes at a price: one's flesh and blood, one's feelings, one's memories. The skull beast could not even remember its old master and was condemned to spreading death for all eternity.

104511020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give an allied follower the ability to ignore Ward.
104511020.baseFlair_: The moon and life both wane. But don't you think that's what makes it so elegant?
104511020.evoFlair_: Both the moon and life wane before long. But don't you think it's how you wane that counts?

108511030.baseFlair_: They say nothing short of dying can fix being dumb. But dying sure didn't fix that knuckleheaded son of mine. —Words of an elderly woman
108511030.evoFlair_: First my socks go missing, and then the dishes start breaking. It's a pain in the neck, all right. But it takes me back to the old days, and that's fine by me. —Words of an elderly woman

113511010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Gain +5/+5 and 3 shadows.
Last Words: Gain 1 shadow.
113511010.baseFlair_: I'll put in my hours, but don't expect me to clock in any overtime. I have things to do at home... Not that you should concern yourself over that.
113511010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
113511010.evoFlair_: I'll put in my hours, but don't expect me to clock in any overtime. What... I dropped something, you say? O-oh, that's the HaZeus fanfic I wrote! Y-you're a fan too? Omigosh, let's gush! HaZeus or Zeudes? I just can't choose my OTP!

118511020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Enhance (6) - Transform this follower into a Giant Skull.
Last Words: Necromancy (1) - Summon a Skeleton.
118511020.baseFlair_: Wood? Leather? Metal? No, no, no, those won't do! The discerning man only wears the latest fashions on the battlefield—and this season, it's all about head-to-toe bone!
118511020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
118511020.evoFlair_: There's nothing like vintage bones; they look better each time they're worn! When I die, I hope someone makes good use of my sturdy frame too!

900511010.baseFlair_: Though dead, he continues to fight. Though nothing but a bundle of dry bones, he continues to thirst for blood.
900511010.evoFlair_: Battles bring death, and death brings evil spirits—the evil spirits that possess souls tainted by hatred, turning them into pitiful shuffling skeletons.

900511020.baseEffect_:
Storm.
Banish this follower when it leaves play or when your turn ends.
900511020.baseFlair_: An evil soul rising forth from the very depths of the underworld.
900511020.evoFlair_: A hateful soul rising forth from the very depths of the underworld.

101521010.baseFlair_: No one can predict what will happen on the battlefield. Sometimes experienced soldiers die, and sometimes their skeletons keep walking onward. You have to fight them all the same.
101521010.evoFlair_: Departed souls are tough, so there's no point in fighting them. The best option is to turn and run. But what if the skeleton you're facing is a friend who's supposed to be dead? It's your duty as a friend to cut it down.

114521020.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Whenever an allied Naterran Great Tree is destroyed, gain +2/+2.
114521020.baseFlair_:
A hound's distant baying echoes through the netherworld. A patchwork dog bounds toward you.
"That pooch always has candy in his mouth. Seems his master used to give him toys shaped like that. Maybe rebirth doesn't change your personality all that much."
114521020.evoFlair_:
Resurrected creatures don't sleep. The faithful dog waits patiently, its round eyes filled with hope.
"How about that. Don't usually catch this pooch sittin' down on the job. Seems the lord found his master for him. I guess rebirth got him his happy ending."

119521010.baseFlair_: I am no god or mage—I am but a humble purveyor of medicine. I wouldn't go so far as to say I can fix all your problems, but I can promise you this: I will do everything that's in my power, limited though it might be.
119521010.evoFlair_: The desire to believe you'll be healed is fine—up to a point. For you see, the line between helping and harming is as fine as the line between medicine and poison. They're more alike than you'd think and can be quite tricky to differentiate.

115531010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: The next time this follower takes damage, reduce that damage to 0.
Union Burst (10): Put a Pudding Time into your hand.
115531010.baseFlair_: Ooooh! Wooooh! I'm a scaaary ghooost who sends all the little kids running! Give me pudding or I'll haaauuunt yooouuu!
115531010.evoFlair_: I don't remember how I became a ghost. At first I thought I should go toward the light, but once I tasted pudding, I changed my mind!

711531010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: The next time this follower takes damage, reduce that damage to 0.
Union Burst (10): Put a Pudding Time into your hand.
711531010.baseFlair_: Ooooh! Wooooh! I'm a scaaary ghooost who sends all the little kids running! Give me pudding or I'll haaauuunt yooouuu!
711531010.evoFlair_: I don't remember how I became a ghost. At first I thought I should go toward the light, but once I tasted pudding, I changed my mind!

109541030.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Enhance (6) - Evolve all other allied followers. Evolve effects will not activate for those followers.
At the end of your turn, give all evolved allied followers Last Words: Draw a card.
109541030.baseFlair_: Want me to divine your future? My predictions are never wrong, you know! In fact, I can even tell you the exact moment you're gonna die. Tee hee!
109541030.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
109541030.evoFlair_: Since you've called upon me, I'll give you a special fortune! Don't you worry, my divination's always on point! I can even change how you're gonna die. Tee hee!

900541040.baseEffect_: Last Words: Deal 2 damage to the enemy leader.
900541040.baseFlair_: Ruff 'em up! No matter what kinda soul it is, we'll give 'em the ol' one-two bark n' snap!
900541040.evoFlair_:
Charon: Hehe... I hear she likes it when you pet her.
Orthrus: I-if you try it, you'll lose a finger!

900541050.baseEffect_: Last Words: Restore 2 defense to your leader.
900541050.baseFlair_: Hound 'em to death! We'll round up all the souls an' put 'em in the dog pound!
900541050.evoFlair_:
Charon: Hehe... He's so fluffy I could die.
Orthrus: Yeah, but he bites...

101514010.baseEffect_:
Destroy an allied follower.
Draw 2 cards.

109514010.baseEffect_:
Destroy an allied follower.
Draw 2 cards.
109514010.baseFlair_: I'm not done with you just yet.

110514010.baseEffect_:
Remove all effects from an enemy follower except changes to its attack or defense.
Enhance (5): Then destroy that follower.

115514010.baseEffect_: Burial Rite: Put a random Shadowcraft follower from your deck into your hand. If Burial Rite was performed with a follower with an original attack or defense of 1, put 2 Shadowcraft followers into your hand instead.
115514010.baseFlair_:
Long, long ago, the demons began their march, we know not where. They say those demons are marching still.
—Demonic Procession, Hyakki-Yagyo

103524010.baseEffect_: Destroy an enemy follower with 1 defense. If you have at least 8 shadows, you can perform Necromancy (8) to destroy an enemy follower with 2 defense or more instead.
103524010.baseFlair_: What a tiny, pitiful, and altogether lovely soul.

107524010.baseEffect_:
Destroy an allied follower.
Summon a Zombie.
107524010.baseFlair_: "We'll fight together in the next life as well, of course?" —A Zombie's Grave

114524010.baseEffect_:
Put a Naterran Great Tree into your hand.
If this is your fifth turn or later, recover 1 play point.
Then, if this is your tenth turn or later, Reanimate (4).
114524010.baseFlair_:
The Mother bestows gifts upon her children.
When the shambling corpse discovered her kindness in his grave, he saw a deathly, necrotic aether. He soon learned that it grants power to those who desire life.

119524010.baseEffect_:
Burial Rite: Summon 2 Skeletons.
If you've performed Burial Rites at least 5 times (excluding this card) this match, summon 2 Liches instead.
119524010.baseFlair_: This graveyard is really going to come to life tonight.

111534010.baseEffect_:
Draw a card.
Remove all effects from an allied follower except changes to its attack or defense.
Enhance (4): Remove all effects from all followers except changes to their attack or defense instead.

112534010.baseEffect_:
Give an allied follower the following effect: The next time damage is dealt to this follower, reduce that damage to 0.
Enhance (4): Give all allied followers that effect instead.
112534010.baseFlair_: I find myself unable to cut through the bodies of my relatives. Not sure if it's their memories that keep me from completing the slice, or just the rigor mortis. —Necromancer

900534010.baseEffect_:
Give +4/+0 to an allied follower.
Necromancy (4): Give that follower Rush.
900534010.baseFlair_:
The vessels of the living are full.
Crude, earthen cups tempting the god of death to drink.
Pour, then! Brim over and descend into madness.

900544010.baseFlair_: Ruff! I'll drag you right to the pits of the underworld!

900544020.baseFlair_: Ruff! Time to tear your soul into little shreds!

900544040.baseEffect_:
Deal 2 damage to an enemy follower.
Burial Rite: Deal 5 damage instead.
900544040.baseFlair_: Use my knowledge to live for the moment. —Ceridwen, Eternity Hunter

900544060.baseEffect_:
Until the start of your next turn, your leader can't take more than 5 damage at a time.
Enhance (9): Randomly put 4 different Machina followers (excluding Aenea, Amethyst Rebel) from your deck into play.
900544060.baseFlair_: If you put enough junk together, sometimes it gains new purpose. And if you put it together with a friend, then you might just find new happiness.

105513010.baseEffect_:
Countdown (3)
Whenever an allied follower (excluding Ghosts) is destroyed during your turn, summon a Ghost.
105513010.baseFlair_: They say home is where the soul is.

118513010.baseEffect_:
Countdown (3)
At the end of your turn, perform Necromancy (2): Draw a card.
118513010.baseFlair_: Don't try to pry money from the hands of the dead. The dead won't relinquish it and the money won't relinquish you.

101522010.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, gain 1 shadow.
101522010.baseFlair_: Death gathers, and it knows no bounds.

101532010.baseEffect_: Whenever you perform Necromancy, summon a Ghost.
101532010.baseFlair_: Hey, ghosts and ghostesses! Come on and dance with me!

100511010.baseFlair_: A drop of dragon's blood falls on a woeful carcass. The evil god's power has resurrected the dead soldier as a soldier of death. In its skeletal chest is but one wish: to offer blood and death to the master.
100511010.evoFlair_: The sergeant's dragon-like fangs tear through anyone who defies its evil god. Prideful warriors are but playthings for this creature, which seeks to kill until it perishes once again.

100511020.baseFlair_: I'm so lonely, and it's so cold here. Can you stay with me? Please?
100511020.evoFlair_: Don't be scared of me. I just want to be with someone, that's all. Please, will you go with me into the beyond?

101511010.baseFlair_: The bones of the dead are a treasure trove for those who seek the spoils of war. But you would do well to remember that every treasure has a guardian.
101511010.evoFlair_: Some people refuse to die. Their malice is such that they refuse to be taken even once they're reduced to dry bones. Thieves come in search of the treasures of the dead but find themselves condemned to the same fate.

101511020.baseFlair_: Things that die turn to dust? Ha! Only children believe that nonsense! Love, you see, never dies.
101511020.evoFlair_: No matter how many times it is lost, love abides. Don't you think that's just wonderful? Now come show me that you love me!

101511060.baseEffect_: Whenever another allied follower is destroyed, deal 1 damage to the enemy leader.
101511060.baseFlair_: Advance, brethren, and do not fear death! Your lives shall fuel our assaults on our enemies!
101511060.evoFlair_: Your malice shall remain as you sink into the underworld. I shall weave your grudges into a curse and wield it in the name of revenge!

101511110.baseFlair_: A corpse animated by an ancient curse. Do not allow the lifelessness to lure you into a false sense of security. Get tangled in the bandages and you'll be devoured.
101511110.evoFlair_: Once the bandages have you in their grasp, your passage to the world of the dead is assured. But is that such a bad thing? It's nice and warm inside the wrappings, you know. Maybe you should try them on for size.

102511010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Summon a Ghost if an evolved allied follower is in play.
102511010.baseFlair_: So, you want to go beyond taboos? I'd love to help you out with that.
102511010.evoFlair_: So, you want to go beyond taboos? Then you need to kill! To drown the night in blood!

103511030.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Give all other allied followers the following effect - When this card is banished, destroy it instead.
Whenever another allied follower comes into play give it the following effect: When this card is banished, destroy it instead.
103511030.baseFlair_: I believe in fighting fire with fire. If the grave robbers insist on digging up corpses to create monsters, I'll defend this graveyard by siccing my monstrous hunting hounds on them.
103511030.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
103511030.evoFlair_: May grave robbers sleep in graves. May those who unearth the dead join them... Once they're gone, my hounds and I will guard them for eternity.

105511010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If another allied follower is in play, destroy that follower and draw 2 cards.
105511010.baseFlair_: The demon-eating demon you heard about was me. I guess we're all related, but a meal's still a meal!
105511010.evoFlair_: Looks like quite the feast today! I'll be having a main dish of vengeance, hors d'oeuvres of hatred, and death pangs for dessert!

105511030.baseFlair_: Bones, bones, stack and form. Abandon your shape of old and into a new shape be reborn. —A heartless necromancer
105511030.evoFlair_: Bones, bones, forget when you were a man! You're an ogre now, so serve mightily under my command! —A heartless necromancer

106511030.baseEffect_: Last Words: Deal 1 damage to a random enemy follower.
106511030.baseFlair_: A fire god known as the Shining One. Even should he perish, the flames which rise from his globe will still burn on. —Death and Fire, Chapter 1
106511030.evoFlair_: He manifests fire and garbs himself in embers. This is evidence of his eternal, unfailing power. It is said that should his body rot away, his shimmer would still linger. —Death and Fire, Chapter 4

107511010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Burial Rite - Draw a card.
107511010.baseFlair_: The more... death... you see, t-the better you become at necromancy. So, p-please... show me.
107511010.evoFlair_: Thank you for showing me... it feels so... familiar. The soul... I-I can hear it... It's c-calling to me... I can hear it!

107511030.baseEffect_: Whenever another allied follower is destroyed, restore 1 defense to your leader.
107511030.baseFlair_: These insects wear rigid animal bones for protection, and instinctively gather large bones to increase their chances of survival. —Creatures of Death, Chapter 1
107511030.evoFlair_: In recent years, they can commonly be found on the battlefield—unsurprising, as there are plenty of bones to be found on dead mercenaries. —Creatures of Death, Chapter 2

108511010.baseFlair_: You're just a pile of bones now, and you're still shy? Go ahead, say hello!
108511010.evoFlair_: Even dead, you're still like you've always been. I like how shy you are. I've always liked that since way, way back!

109511020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Necromancy (6) - Remove all effects from an enemy follower except changes to its attack or defense.
109511020.baseFlair_: I don't look so good? Well, I haven't been able to sleep in ages. You see, there's a legendary spell in Estalucia... And I've been killing myself searching for a route there...
109511020.evoFlair_: Before I exhaust my life force, I'll give Honey a body of her own, so she can walk this mortal world. I hope I can make it in time...

110511030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Enhance (6) - Gain +3/+3. Remove all effects from an enemy follower except changes to its attack or defense.
110511030.baseFlair_: Silence yourself. Speaking is deception. Everything is perfect in the still depths of quiescence.
110511030.evoFlair_:
The First Record: Remain Undivided
Language emerged when countries developed separate borders and histories. Verbalization plays no part in unity.
—Teachings of the Silent Ones

111511010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Enhance (4) - Gain Last Words: Summon 2 Skeletons.
111511010.baseFlair_:
Cowardly Matador: W-wait! I thought that thing was dead!
Mischievous Necromancer: Someone asked me to bring him back!
111511010.evoFlair_:
Cowardly Matador: How long is this thing going to chase me?
Mischievous Necromancer: Until death! Oh. But it's already dead...

112511010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Gain +3/+3 and summon 3 Ghosts.
During your turn, whenever another allied follower evolves, summon a Ghost.
112511010.baseFlair_: My editor's got some nerve! All he did was make ridiculous complaints about my manuscript! First of all, I'm a ghost! I'm already dead! How can he expect me to "breathe life" into my writing?
112511010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
112511010.evoFlair_: What? He liked my manuscript this time? I did a good job expressing the sorrow of death and the joy of life? But... But of course! Haha! I used some of my own experiences from when I was alive as inspiration!

112511020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If another allied follower is in play, destroy that follower, then draw 2 cards. If it's a Machina follower, gain +1/+1.
112511020.baseFlair_: Just picked up a fresh cadaver! Wonder what this thing eats? Raw meat? Souls? Or maybe something else? Oh well! I'll just feed it whatever for now! —Novice Necromancer
112511020.evoFlair_: A cadaver's physical form is composed of whatever it consumes after death. As such, the skill of its creator is reflected in its quality. I must say, this one is most impressive... I've never seen anything like it. —Veteran Necromancer

113511030.baseFlair_: The eternity of death nourishes him to lead a legion of corpses. He is their commander—a silent king from a time forgotten. He spreads an ancient curse as silent as death itself. Rumors say that if he were to speak, his dignity would be lost to the sands of time.
113511030.evoEffect_: Evolve: If another allied follower is in play, perform Necromancy (8) - Give Storm to another allied follower.
113511030.evoFlair_: A forbidden sarcophagus covers his face, and cloth swaddles his mysteries. He is the sole overseer. Yet he himself can never be seen, for a fear of the unknown secures his power. Rumors say that if he were to show his face, the facade would immediately crumble to dust.

114511030.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Put a Naterran Great Tree into your hand.
Last Words: Gain 1 shadow.
114511030.baseFlair_: The clop of fleshless hooves resounds. The revenant ram prances forth. "To repay the debt it owes humans and sheepdogs for their protection in life, the revenant will devour any dangerous spirits which approach them. The cycle of life and death is a fascinating thing."
114511030.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
114511030.evoFlair_: The living do not gather here. The revenant herd grazes only upon spirits. "The rams gather spirits about them like a living sheep's fleece. But they soon devour this warm coat, leaving their bones bare once more. The cycle of life and death never fails to entertain."

115511020.baseEffect_: Last Words: Put a Skeleton into your hand. If an allied Naterran Great Tree is in play, summon a Skeleton instead.
115511020.baseFlair_:
The skeletal crane's cry is that of a soul rent in two.
"The deeper the love, the deeper the loss. That mother crane was resurrected without her child. What does she see with those empty eyes? I wonder if she regrets coming back."
115511020.evoFlair_:
Her featherless wings cannot fly. Instead, she walks.
"Resurrected animals can no longer bring forth new life. Nonetheless, they live on. What else can they do but move forward? Surely their rebirth had a purpose, after all."

118511030.baseEffect_: Last Words: Summon a Bullet Bike.
118511030.baseFlair_:
Dreams have withered, warmth has fled; all that's left is a lone skeleton. The rhyme and reason of existence have fallen away with his flesh, yet he still digs at the river bottom—and at the bottomless fog of memories.
—Tyneagh Mine Log, One XXXXXX: Beginnings
118511030.evoFlair_:
After days of fruitless scavenging in the sand, a missive comes on the wind. The skeleton throws away his meager grains of gold and mounts his trusty steed. A newly discovered gold mine awaits.
—Tyneagh Mine Log, One XXXXXX: Beginnings

119511030.baseEffect_: When you perform Necromancy, gain Storm.
119511030.baseFlair_:
The basic premise is sound. Zombies feel no pain, so why not reform some of their bones into wings? Just think of all the mobility options it would open up! The lack of feathers is making true flight difficult, though.
—Zombie R&D Report
119511030.evoFlair_:
The zombies can run well enough, but that's still a far cry from flight. We're going to have to rethink this whole concept. It's important that zombie design keeps up with modern innovations, after all.
—Zombie R&D Report

119511040.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If any other allied followers are in play, destroy 1 and draw 2 cards.
119511040.baseFlair_: All right everybody, step this way and form an orderly line. We'll have you in the underworld in no time, I promise. Hey, you souls over there! I told you not to wander off! Sheesh, how did I get stuck with a dumb job like this?
119511040.evoFlair_: Seriously, what did I do to deserve this? It's bad enough the souls don't listen to me, but I'm always on the graveyard shift! Okay, I can do this, just put on that customer service smile... Otherwise Charon'll rake me over the coals again.

900511030.baseFlair_: Ain't no one gonna be the boss of me. I'm gonna live the way I like. God knows when I'm dead some necromancer will be working me to the bone. —A Young Man at the Tavern
900511030.evoFlair_: All you do is drink from morning till night, grumbling into your cups. You're like a living corpse. Why don't you try walking with your arms held straight out in front of you? Bet the look would suit you! —Barman at the Tavern

101521020.baseFlair_: Your death will make me stronger. But do not concern yourself with me; I can survive perfectly well all alone.
101521020.evoFlair_: I cannot do it all again—the sadness, the pain. Once I'm laid to rest beneath the ground, my love, let's meet in our dreams.

103521030.baseEffect_:
Can only attack the enemy leader and followers with Ward.
Last Words: Destroy a random enemy follower.
