—Chapter 3, Encyclopedia of Demonic Harbingers
110531030.evoFlair_:
Life's bright ichor drips from the crown. Caught in the empty vessel of a dead man, it fills the void and makes him dance. But caught in the vessel of a living man, it floods the soul and drives him mad.
—Chapter 4, Encyclopedia of Demonic Harbingers

114531020.baseEffect_:
Can't be targeted by enemy effects.
Last Words: Give a random allied Naterran Great Tree Last Words - Summon an Immortal Elephant.
114531020.baseFlair_: The ground shakes. The massive, immortal elephant trumpets its battle cry. "Today's giant elephant vs human battle was another smashing success. The spectral beast circus has a devoted following. Rebirth can mean finding a whole new way of life."
114531020.evoFlair_:
The immortal elephant rises no matter how often it is struck down, to the thunderous applause of the audience.
"That elephant—Paono—is a real pro. So intelligent! And there's plenty of things he can do that the living couldn't. Being reborn can really expand a performer's repertoire!"

900531030.baseEffect_: Last Words: Summon a 7-play point, 3-attack Tri-Head Hound without Last Words.
900531030.baseFlair_:
Once you get to know them, it's not so hard to tell each head apart. —Mino, Crafty Reaper
They're hard workers, that's for sure. They've already chased down several lost souls for me. —Charon, Stygian Ferrywoman
900531030.evoFlair_:
Trying to muscle in on my territory? There's only room for one loyal hound here! —Orthrus, Junior Hellhound
Looks like your heads all get along. That's good. Teamwork's a big part of being a good guard dog. —Cerberus, Hound of Hades

101541010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put Coco and Mimi into your hand.
101541010.baseFlair_: "Woof! You can never enter the underworld!" "Woof! I won't let you through this gate!" "Sorry, but we can't let you go any further! Come back when you're dead!"
101541010.evoFlair_: "Woof! Are you going to the surface?" "Woof! Are you going to take us with you?" "You certainly are pushy, but I guess we can follow you for a little bit!"

701541010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put Coco and Mimi into your hand.
701541010.baseFlair_: "Woof! You can never enter the underworld!" "Woof! I won't let you through this gate!" "Sorry, but we can't let you go any further! Come back when you're dead!"
701541010.evoFlair_: "Woof! Are you going to the surface?" "Woof! Are you going to take us with you?" "You certainly are pushy, but I guess we can follow you for a little bit!"

704541010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put Coco and Mimi into your hand.
704541010.baseFlair_: "Woof! You can never enter the underworld!" "Woof! I won't let you through this gate!" "Sorry, but we can't let you go any further! Come back when you're dead!"
704541010.evoFlair_: "Woof! Are you going to the surface?" "Woof! Are you going to take us with you?" "You certainly are pushy, but I guess we can follow you for a little bit!"

107541010.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: Necromancy (10) - Evolve this follower.
Fanfare: Enhance (10) - Gain Storm.
107541010.baseFlair_: As long as my reign is true, you shall face death—a fitting fate for any trespasser of my domain. Repent to that person and beg for forgiveness.
107541010.evoEffect_:
Rush.
Can attack 2 times per turn.
107541010.evoFlair_: For tainting our pride, don't think for an instant you'll be able to make it out of here alive. Wander for eternity with that person.

110541010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Summon a Mimi, Right Paw Hellhound and a Coco, Left Paw Hellhound.
110541010.baseFlair_:
"Woof! You're a funny lookin' playmate!"
"Woof! Just right, if you ask me!"
"You ready? 'Cuz we're just itchin' to go at it with ya!"
110541010.evoEffect_: Evolve: Give all other allied followers Last Words - Deal 1 damage to a random enemy follower.
110541010.evoFlair_:
Charon: Heh... How cute. I wouldn't get so cocky if I were you.
Orthrus: You're in for it now—my sister's flames are the fiercest in the underworld!

112541010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Put an Eternal Vow into your hand.
Clash: Deal 3 damage to the enemy follower.
At the end of your turn, restore 3 defense to your leader.
112541010.baseFlair_: This is far from the first time, but... if you're willing to pledge your eternity to me, I will gladly embrace you. So close your eyes. Only for a moment though; we will be together forever soon enough.
112541010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
112541010.evoFlair_: Till death do us part? Don't expect me to be satisfied by such a trite turn of phrase. Swear to me. Swear that you'll love me forever, even after death...

114541010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Put a Naterran Great Tree into your hand. Summon a Necrofauna.
Whenever an allied Naterran Great Tree is destroyed, summon a Necrofauna.
114541010.baseFlair_:
Animal spirits gather round to hear her tales.
"There's so much to see and do in this world—who could be satisfied with a single lifespan? But you can keep on going if you want. That's the miracle of rebirth."
114541010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
114541010.evoFlair_:
A kind voice beckons. Animal spirits flock to its owner.
"The world is so vast, many souls get lost after returning. Will you all come with me to find them? We need to let them know what a miraculous gift their rebirth is."

116541030.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: Necromancy (4) - Summon a Nightmare Devourer. Repeat for remaining shadows or until your area is full.
Last Words: Randomly activate 1 of the following effects.
-Restore 2 defense to your leader.
-Gain 2 shadows.
116541030.baseFlair_: Why come back from the dead? To once again taste the sweetness of sleep. So is the nature of the spectral baku. It wanders in an eternal dream—dragging in those from the outside that would try to disturb it, leaving halcyon silence in its wake.
116541030.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
116541030.evoFlair_:
Hey, beast. Sorry, but I can't accept these terms. You want to know my policy? It's this: I'll sleep when I'm alive. Keeps the soul burning. Don't get it? Here, let me play you a number: "Midday Death Napper."
—He Who Once Rocked

117541010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Burial Rite (2) - Reanimate (X) and Reanimate (Y). X and Y equal 6 split randomly.
(To perform Burial Rite (2), there must be at least 2 open spaces in your area after this follower comes into play.)
Enhance (9): Do not perform Burial Rite. Evolve this follower instead.
Can't be evolved using evolution points. (Can be evolved using card effects.)
Last Words: Draw 2 cards.
117541010.baseFlair_:
Holy vows is what we wanted. Right, darling?
We are The Lovers, enjoying mutual affection.
It's always in our heart to stay together till the end.
Embrace me, darling. You won't have to go it alone.
117541010.evoEffect_: At the end of your turn, destroy 6 other random followers. Then, if the enemy leader has 7 defense or more, deal damage to them until their defense drops to 6.
117541010.evoFlair_:
Matrimony is what we desired. True, my dear.
We are The Lovers, enjoying lustful temptation.
But should we split, we'll share love with many others.
Speak to me, dear. What kind of love do you desire?

113514010.baseEffect_:
Summon 3 Skeletons.
Deal damage to an enemy follower equal to the number of allied Skeletons in play.
113514010.baseFlair_: The delusions of the departed—a perfect weapon for the living.

107534010.baseEffect_:
Reanimate (X)
X equals your current turn number.
107534010.baseFlair_: Inflated with souls, one day the cyclone will consume its final soul upon reaching nirvana, and all will become one.

116534010.baseEffect_:
Choose: Use play points equal to this card's cost and play this card as a Luna's Game or Aenea's Friendship.
Necromancy (4): Instead Reanimate (4), Reanimate (2), Reanimate (1), restore 4 defense to your leader, and put a Fleeting Joy into your hand.
116534010.baseFlair_: A chance encounter brought together two souls. Friendship gave life to courage, and courage blossomed into hope. Maybe the meeting wasn't accidental; maybe it was fated all long. "I can fight. I'm not alone anymore, and that makes me strong!"

900534020.baseEffect_:
Deal 4 damage to an enemy.
Necromancy (20): Deal 10 damage instead.
900534020.baseFlair_:
Cycle as does life; bite as does the serpent.
Reversal of providence, the bonds' inner workings.
Not am I now but the miracle's reversal.

900544030.baseFlair_: Use my knowledge to live for an eternity. —Ceridwen, Eternity Hunter

900512010.baseEffect_:
When an allied follower is destroyed, destroy this amulet.
Last Words: Summon a Lich and a Zombie.
900512010.baseFlair_: One does not cling to life without first grasping fear.

900512020.baseEffect_:
When an allied follower is destroyed, destroy this amulet.
Last Words: Draw 2 cards. Restore 2 defense to your leader. Gain 2 shadows.
900512020.baseFlair_: If you really want the gold, you musn't be afraid to be a little reckless.

100511060.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Last Words: Give Ward to a random allied follower.
100511060.baseFlair_: Once upon a time, a knight fell in love. He sacrificed everything to protect the object of his affections: money, status, reputation—even his own life.
100511060.evoFlair_: Night after night the pitiable cavalier who fell in love with a fairy prowls the forest. But the object of his affections is no more. She does not even exist in his memory.

104511030.baseEffect_:
Bane.
Last Words: Give Bane to a random allied follower.
104511030.baseFlair_: If you want to take lives, you have to be the ebon itself. You need to embrace the darkness in your heart and sharpen the barbs of your every murderous impulse.
104511030.evoFlair_: A truly ebon heart is free of any corrupting influences, and it drinks even the blood that spurts out of victims. So be ever-diligent in your quest to extinguish lives.

119511010.baseFlair_: Waaargh, a living person! Oh, you're just a regular ghost. Hey, wanna hang out with me? I get so lonely around here, but... the living scare me. They're so warm and... and animated! Gives me the creeps.
119511010.evoFlair_: Hey, don't laugh, it's a perfectly normal fear! Oh, you weren't laughing at me? You're just happy to find someone who's not afraid of you? Sheesh, that's weird. Who'd get scared by cute li'l wandering spirits like you? The living on the other hand... Brr!

101521070.baseEffect_: Whenever another allied follower is destroyed, draw a card.
101521070.baseFlair_: Do not fear death. Your souls are my lifeblood. They will live on forever within me.
101521070.evoFlair_: Death is calling you—inviting you towards eternity. Come, give yourself to it. Allow me to drink deeply of your soul.

117521010.baseEffect_:
Crystallize (2): Countdown (4)
Whenever you perform Burial Rite, subtract 1 from this amulet's Countdown.
Last Words: Summon a Cloistered Sacristan.
----------
Ward.
117521010.baseFlair_: Heed the Three of Wands, guideposts of empathy. May their sympathies help you overcome the stalemate of purgatory. Walk forward with confidence; the wands mark the way.
117521010.evoEffect_:
Ward.
Evolve: Burial Rite - Restore 3 defense to your leader.
117521010.evoFlair_: I oversee the dead; my pact is with this cemetery. Our bonds can't be severed even in death—much is learned from a pile of corpses. Death is a part of us, and we are part of death. Neither is more important than the other.

118521010.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (1): Destroy an allied follower. Reanimate (3).
----------
At the end of your turn, deal 2 damage to all enemy followers. Reanimate (3).
118521010.baseFlair_:
The dead are attracted to shiny things and their greed overrules grudges or regrets. The skeleton melts into the crowd of corpses and allows himself to be ruled.
—Tyneagh Mine Log, One Skeleton's XXXX: Next Steps
118521010.evoFlair_: Countless corpses are worked beyond the bone and tossed aside by a greedy necromancer. Fueled by a more powerful desire, the skeleton escapes this fate. He heads deep into the mines, where noxious gases permeate the air. —Tyneagh Mine Log, One Skeleton's XXXX: Next Steps

101531040.baseFlair_: By the time you notice the rotten smell, it is too late. You are already inside the dead dragon's stomach.
101531040.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
101531040.evoFlair_: The dragon never stops eating, and yet its hunger refuses to be sated. The meat it devours slips out of the gaps between its bones and falls upon the ground. The dragon thereupon slurps it up once more and emits a howl of greed.

103531020.baseEffect_:
Bane.
Last Words: Deal 3 damage to all enemy followers.
103531020.baseFlair_: I am Balor. To behold my eyes is to face calamity most dire!
103531020.evoFlair_: With these eyes I'll transform this battlefield into a hell on earth! Those who face me will shed tears of blood until they perish!

105531010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Summon an enemy Odette, White Swan. Then evolve this follower.
105531010.baseFlair_: Only you can alter my fate—only you, dear. Please save me from this world of darkness; please kiss me.
105531010.evoEffect_: At the end of your turn, deal 2 damage to all enemies.
105531010.evoFlair_: Is white the same as goodness? No, white is the color of the void—of utter meaninglessness. Please choose me. I promise to embrace your love and let it infuse me.

107531020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Summon a Skeleton Knight.
Last Words: Summon a Skeleton.
107531020.baseFlair_: Don't you know who my father is? Get on the ground and show some respect!
107531020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
107531020.evoFlair_: The life of a prince is dreadfully boring sometimes. You came just in time, I was looking for a distraction... You'll be begging for mercy when I'm done with you!

110531010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a random 5-play point Shadowcraft follower from your deck into your hand.
110531010.baseFlair_: I don't enjoy fighting, but guiding lost souls is my duty. So allow me to guide you, lost one... to the fiery depths of the underworld.
110531010.evoEffect_: Evolve: Necromancy (5) - Subtract 5 from the cost of a Shadowcraft follower in your hand until the end of the turn.
110531010.evoFlair_:
Cerberus: Ooh... I just got a chill down my spine.
Orthrus: Charon is terrifying when she's angry!

102541010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Randomly summon 1 of the following - Velocious Beetle, Virulent Hornet, or Vicious Scorpion.
At the start of your turn, randomly summon 1 of the following: Velocious Beetle, Virulent Hornet, or Vicious Scorpion.
102541010.baseFlair_: A noble lord of the underworld, served by grotesque vermin that devour any who would harm their master.
102541010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
102541010.evoFlair_: Seated upon a mountain of skulls, the lord calmly partakes of his meal. There's no hurry. After all, the souls of the underworld are countless.

108541010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Choose - Put an Eternal Potion or Instant Potion into your hand.
Strike: Recover 1 play point.
108541010.baseFlair_: Moment after moment makes an eternity. Insight upon insight makes omniscience. Not yet but some day, I'll surpass every living soul and become my true self.
108541010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
108541010.evoFlair_: You'd be more useful as my pawn than as a fool. So, listen, fool. Your life's already mine!

117541030.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Put 2 random followers of different costs (excluding Nephthys, Goddess of Amenta) from your deck into play and destroy them.
Enhance (10): Then, if allied followers that originally cost 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 9, and 10 play points have been destroyed, win the match.
117541030.baseFlair_: The goddess of the underworld has another name: Nebet-Het. Dare not slander death. Dare not disparage death. When the lamentations of the living reach her ears, the world will brim with joy.
117541030.evoFlair_: The last rites act as a warm send-off for those who have reached the end of the line. The goddess of Amenta awaits, ready to lift all burdens from the soul. Rejoice in your final moments. From now on there will be no more pain.

118541030.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (3): Reanimate (3). If you have more evolution points than your opponent, Reanimate (5) instead. (You have 0 evolution points on turns you are unable to evolve.)
----------
Ward.
Fanfare: Give -1/-4 to all other followers. (Followers are destroyed when their defense drops below 1.)
118541030.baseFlair_: Let the parched earth teem with life and rejuvenation course through the land. All flows from the river and at its head is the deity of Duat. Love shall spill from her chalice and its grace shall bless the people.
118541030.evoEffect_:
Ward.
Evolve: Give +1/+4 to all other allied followers.
118541030.evoFlair_: Benevolent Aset, upon thy brow sits the sun disk and horns, the shining crown of Sirius. As water always flows from high to low, so do blessings flow from your throne to the people. And just as life and death course eternal, so too does your divine protection.

101534030.baseEffect_:
Summon 3 Zombies.
Necromancy (6): Give +0/+1 and Ward to allied Zombies.
101534030.baseFlair_: Look, there's your mother on the right, then your father, and then your little brother on the left. Wait, or was it the other way around?

900544050.baseEffect_: Subtract 2 from the cost of all Shadowcraft cards in your hand.
900544050.baseFlair_:
A fleeting moment of intimacy.
Or perhaps the bitter start of eternity.
Regardless of the outcome, you will share it with her.

900533010.baseEffect_:
Countdown (3)
At the end of your turn, if this card's Countdown is at 3, Reanimate (8). If it's at 2, Reanimate (10). If it's at 1, Reanimate (12).
900533010.baseFlair_:
The dead are but empty vessels.
Crude, earthen cups drained by the god of death.
Pour, then! Fill the vessel and make it dance.

101511070.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Necromancy (4) - Deal 4 damage to the enemy leader.
101511070.baseFlair_: Those who are dead and who envy the living, imbue my scythe with your resentment! Let us hunt together!
101511070.evoFlair_: Do you suffer? Do you hate? Are you filled with bitterness? Then follow me! Let us stain the moon red with blood!

101511100.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Necromancy (4) - Restore 4 defense to your leader.
101511100.baseFlair_: What is death? Death is nourishment. It is our nourishment as a god of death.
101511100.evoFlair_: If we move our fingers to weave their fate, the weak become our prey in a matter of moments. Heh-heh, consider yourself lucky that I'm full right now.

105511020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If another allied follower is in play, destroy that follower and summon a Tin Soldier.
105511020.baseFlair_: Do you have business with a mad hatter? I brought one man's hat right with me, but nothing for young ladies unfortunately.
105511020.evoFlair_: Days like these are the best, miss. That's doubly true for the world you're from! Just give it some thought. You don't want to make any regrets.

100521030.baseFlair_: Kingdoms fall, palaces crumble, entire populations perish. And yet true royalty always prevails.
100521030.evoFlair_: Your king has returned and must be praised! We have cheated death, achieved immortality, and returned to the world of the living! Now come, my subjects! It is time to rebuild our kingdom!

103521040.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Last Words: Destroy a random enemy follower with the highest attack in play and then restore X defense to your leader. X equals that follower's attack.
103521040.baseFlair_: We are guardians of the dead in the service of Nephthys, goddess of Amenta. We bring death to those who disturb the sleep of the departed, and send them to the underworld.
103521040.evoFlair_: Vile grave-robbers, you've blasphemed against the dead, so your fates are sealed! Prepare to be judged by the goddess of Amenta!

107521020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Burial Rite - Destroy a random enemy follower with the highest attack in play.
107521020.baseFlair_: These scales dictate the fate of souls by measuring the weight of their sins. Will you put yours to the test?
107521020.evoFlair_: The guardian of the scales dons the mask of a beast, never erring in judgment. Today, the scale shifts the feather of truth towards the heavens once again.

113521010.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Burial Rite - Put a random 3-play point follower and a random 1-play point follower from your deck into play.
113521010.baseFlair_:
As a shaman, her duties include relieving successors to the throne of pain and stress—with her sweet, sweet embraces and coddling.
"Just let me heal you with all my love! Huff... Puff..."
113521010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
113521010.evoFlair_:
"Behave yourself... Not in front of everyone."
—Aisha

"Ngh... Such strength... I... Urk!"
—Khawy

108531010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If you have at least 6 shadows, Necromancy (6) - Choose: Summon a Spellplate Cavalier or Bone Cavalier.
108531010.baseFlair_: If you insist, then fine—I'll bring your boyfriend back to life. A brave knight of few words? Hahaha, he must have been so charming.
108531010.evoEffect_: Evolve: Evolve all allied Spellplate Cavaliers and Bone Cavaliers.
108531010.evoFlair_: Oh, I'm sorry. He was just so charming that I had to make him my own. But see! Don't you think he looks better with me?

111531020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Randomly put a Shadowcraft follower (excluding Gluttonous Empress) that costs X play points or less from your deck into play, then destroy that follower. X equals your total number of play point orbs.
Whenever another allied follower is destroyed, restore 2 defense to your leader.
111531020.baseFlair_: Excuse me, is this the banquet hall? I heard there was going to be a feast. Oh, please. Don't go to any trouble on my account. All you have to do is stay reeeal still for me...
111531020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
111531020.evoFlair_: To me, the best part of the feast isn't the souls. It's the flesh of my plump and succulent fellow demons... The bones of my wretched compatriots. That's what makes me salivate. I don't have an invitation... but I know I can depend on your hospitality.

119531010.baseEffect_:
Can't be targeted by enemy effects.
Last Words: Summon a Vaseraga, Shadowed Scythe.
119531010.baseFlair_: The Foe does exist. They sow seeds of strife and fan the many flames of war. Our Society must terminate that threat, wherever it may be.
119531010.evoFlair_: This body's been specially augmented, so I don't feel any pain. I can't say I'm fond of it either, but there are things this body, forged of my many mistakes, can do. I'll put my life on the line to protect the things that are important.

900531040.baseFlair_:
Once you get to know them, it's not so hard to tell each head apart. —Mino, Crafty Reaper
They're hard workers, that's for sure. They've already chased down several lost souls for me. —Charon, Stygian Ferrywoman
900531040.evoFlair_:
Trying to muscle in on my territory? There's only room for one loyal hound here! —Orthrus, Junior Hellhound
Looks like your heads all get along. That's good. Teamwork's a big part of being a good guard dog. —Cerberus, Hound of Hades

104541020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Necromancy (3) - Summon a Zombie. Repeat for remaining shadows or until your area is full.
Fanfare: Give all other allied followers +2/+0 and Rush until the end of the turn.
104541020.baseFlair_: The sun rose and set a hundred times before we finally managed to take that fiend's head. It looked like the nightmare had finally ended—until the god of the underworld aided our nemesis. —Chapter 4, Notes on Gods and Demons
104541020.evoFlair_: The nethergod returned him to life as a headless horseman, and he sped away into the dark. So it falls upon us to prepare for the next war, when he will surely haunt us again. —Chapter 19, Notes on Gods and Demons

105541010.baseEffect_: Last Words: Banish all allied Shadowcraft cards in play and summon a Dark Alice. At the start of your next turn, banish all Shadowcraft cards in your hand and your deck.
105541010.baseFlair_: Lands of wonders, lands of marvels! Anything you wish for will come true! I was born because that's what you wished for, Alice.
105541010.evoFlair_: If the world changes, I'll have to change too. Isn't that scary to think about? I don't want the world to change, and I don't want to change either. So I'm going to stay an illusion.

106541020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Add X to this follower's attack. X equals the number of allied followers destroyed during this match.
106541020.baseFlair_: A cage of life or perhaps a literal living hell, this undying armor harbors tens of thousands of souls. It is a supernatural being that extends its life by feeding on death. —Demonic Recollections, Chapter 6
106541020.evoFlair_: It shines with animus; it radiates malice. Behind its breastplate, indignation melds with despair as souls swirl in a stygian eddy that surpasses the pits of hell. —Demonic Recollections, Chapter 7

108541020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Put 10 Skeletons into your hand.
At the end of your turn, deal 6 damage to all enemies if you have at least 30 shadows.
108541020.baseFlair_: Beyond the land's end. Beyond the world's end. Beyond the netherworld's end. It lurks outside all perception. One need only to wait patiently for it.
108541020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
108541020.evoFlair_: Shrouded away in a mist of souls, it cannot be seen. Is it only one? Are there two or more? When it finally springs into action, the world may well end.

108541030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give your leader the following effect - Whenever you play a follower that originally costs 3 play points or less, destroy that follower and summon X Ghosts. X equals the original cost of that follower. (This effect is not stackable and lasts for the rest of the match.)
108541030.baseFlair_: Ah, welcome, and thank you for coming! Our theater is exquisitely stimulating. Life dances here, and death sings. The curtain's about to rise on a tale to surpass your imagination.
108541030.evoFlair_: Is this a comedy of hatred, or a tragedy of anomie? That's for you to decide. Now please sit back, relax, and enjoy the show.

112541030.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, if any other allied Machina followers are in play, deal 4 damage to all enemy followers. Otherwise, deal 4 damage to all other followers.
112541030.baseFlair_: The corpses wriggled and moved, fusing together and growing in size. The consumed became one with its gruesome form as bitter tears streamed down their faces. The mountainous mass of bone and machinery roared as it wreaked its havoc. —Necromancer's Report, Part 3
112541030.evoFlair_: That was fascinating. I never dreamed it was possible to control so many bones at once. It feels as though machines were made to be used by necromancers. Now then... There's not a soul left in this town, so I suppose it's time to find a new audience to feed my magic.

900541100.baseEffect_: Last Words: Summon a Path to Purgatory. Gain 6 shadows.
900541100.baseFlair_: In the grip of his hands is the great equalizer of purgatory—the blade demands veneration from all who would behold the manifestation of darkness itself.
900541100.evoFlair_: The bringer of death incarnate usurps the light from all creation. No lightning shall ever be permitted to strike before him. When the gods supreme take to arms, the world trembles.

115541030.baseEffect_:
Crystallize (3): Countdown (10)
Can't be destroyed or banished by effects. (Can be destroyed by Countdown.)
Whenever an allied follower evolves, summon a Ghost and subtract 2 from this amulet's Countdown.
Last Words: Summon an Arcus, Soulful Manager.
----------
Can't be destroyed or banished by effects. (Can be destroyed by damage from effects.)
At the end of your turn, change this follower's attack and defense to X/X. X equals your current turn number.
115541030.baseFlair_: A symphony of screams—a performance to curdle the blood and stand each hair on end! No need to be shy! Come right up to the stage! This play was written especially for you—I'm certain you'll enjoy it!
115541030.evoFlair_: Why, whatever is the matter? You've gone quite pale. The actors look familiar, you say? Well, of course they do. They're all the people you've killed. A comeuppance makes for a satisfying ending, don't you agree? Now! Time for the climax!

118541020.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Bane.
Ward.
Fanfare: Necromancy (15) - Summon an Invincible Monster Trio.
At the end of your turn, deal 2 damage to the enemy leader.
Last Words: Destroy a random enemy follower.
118541020.baseFlair_:
"Crouching corpse, lurching zombie! Hyaaaah!"
"Can you escape my ghostly grasp? OoooOOo."
"You'll never get past my wall of bandages."
"Invincible monster trio, assemble!"
118541020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
118541020.evoFlair_:
"I'll leap up from my grave and hit 'em with my wandering soul palm!"
"We shun the sunlight and stubbornly cling to life..."
"Our bond is as tight as my bandages! It will never fray."
"We're the invincible monster trio!"

106534010.baseEffect_: Destroy all enemy followers with 4 defense or less.
106534010.baseFlair_: Cold, heavy, oppressive. The mist and death are rather alike. —Death's Dirge, Chapter 5

113534010.baseEffect_:
Give your leader the following effect: At the end of this turn, summon Zombies until your area is full.
Enhance (9): Randomly put different Shadowcraft followers from your deck into play until your area is full. Then destroy those followers.
113534010.baseFlair_:
"Shorthanded? Perhaps I could be of assistance."
—Arcus, Ghostly Manager

115523010.baseEffect_:
Countdown (3)
Fanfare: Burial Rite - Reanimate (7).
During your turn, whenever an allied follower is summoned using Reanimate, perform Necromancy (4): Give it Storm.
115523010.baseFlair_:
"Hey, quit shovin', pup!"
"Get in line, or I'll ruff you up!"
"If you can't follow the rules, you won't get into Hades!"
—Cerberus, Hound of Hades

109533010.baseEffect_:
Countdown (2)
Fanfare: Transform all followers in play into Zombies.
Whenever a follower (excluding Zombies) comes into play, transform it into a Zombie.
109533010.baseFlair_: A miracle, it's a miracle! My bedridden mother, she's walking! In fact, she's doing so well that she's even biting! —Optimistic Young Man

101521090.baseFlair_: Okay, hand it over. No, not your money! That stuff tastes awful. It's your soul I'm hungry for.
101521090.evoFlair_: No matter how many souls I eat, I never get full. I've got to find someone with a bigger soul. You might be a good start.

106521020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Summon 3 Skeletons.
At the end of your turn, give a random enemy follower -4/-0 until the end of the opponent's turn if there are at least 4 allied followers in play.
106521020.baseFlair_: Toying with life and trampling over the dignity of death. It is such a unique merit of the art that I could just cry—hey now, don't move a muscle unless you want to end up like these little ones.
106521020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
106521020.evoFlair_: Unable to rest and bound for eternity—these little ones must resent me. But it's something you come to expect. Great necromancers live alongside resentment, after all.

111521030.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (2): Draw a card.
Burial Rite: Draw 2 cards instead.
----------
Ambush.
111521030.baseFlair_: Its touch is ineluctable, yet indiscernible. Death is always by your side—always watching, always caressing.
111521030.evoFlair_: Notice it. Flee from it. You will always find death by your side—surely following you with a smile.

114521010.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (1): Destroy an allied follower. Draw 2 cards.
----------
Rush.
114521010.baseFlair_: Smear my name if you wish. Hate me all you want. Who cares how heavy my soul weighs in the balance? That voice in my head keeps chanting, "Fight. Win. Mow them down." If you want to stop me, be ready to wager your soul on the venture.
114521010.evoFlair_: I'm perfectly satisfied with what I have now. I don't need peace in the afterlife. What possible interest would there be in existing as a spirit bereft of flesh? I only feel alive when I'm swinging this blade anyhow.

900521010.baseFlair_: Seeking after power, hunting after power, the giant offers up its reason and howls madly. In its eyes no trace of a mind can be found. In its hands no trace of mercy can be seen.
900521010.evoFlair_: Once the giant abandoned its humanity, nothing was left but a path of carnage. Unable to reflect on its actions or even shed tears of regret, it can only writhe. It can only howl.

900521020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 3 damage to an enemy.
900521020.baseFlair_: Seeking after power, hunting after power, the skeleton vows to the past and screams. In its eyes the old light is gone, but in its hands a trace of the old light remains.
900521020.evoFlair_: Once the skeleton abandoned its humanity, nothing was left but readiness for annihilation. Separated from its dear ideals and any resemblance of its former appearance, it clings to a sword that shimmers meaninglessly.

101531050.baseEffect_: Last Words: Summon a Mordecai the Duelist.
101531050.baseFlair_: He seeks a never-ending duel to make his bloodless body burn with passion again.
101531050.evoFlair_: He trains for an eternal duel to satisfy the cravings of his fleshless body.

104531030.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Summon 2 Wights.
Last Words: Put a Wight King into your hand and change its cost to 0.
104531030.baseFlair_: We are a cortege of corpses, and we will reign eternal. Even if my bones turn to dust, a new thane will follow.
104531030.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
104531030.evoFlair_: I envy the living for their warmth, and I covet their pulse, but I shall not ask you to give these things to me. I only ask that you relinquish them and join us.

107531010.baseFlair_: I never wished for such a power. I never wished to see this one reduced to bones. But alas, I was born a necromancer—that's what I do.
107531010.evoFlair_: To reduce this dragon to bones, and wrest it from slumber... It's much too tragic. But alas, I am a necromancer—that's my destiny.

112531010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Necromancy (12): Reanimate (X), Reanimate (Y), and Reanimate (Z).
X, Y, and Z equal 12 split randomly.
112531010.baseFlair_: Mere cadavers fetch a small price. Vessels without contents only last around five minutes after all.
112531010.evoFlair_: It doesn't matter if the vessel still has its organs. There are things more important than flesh, you see.

101541030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Destroy an enemy follower. Add its attack and defense to this follower's attack and defense.
101541030.baseFlair_: A death god from the underworld who acquired the dead body of a demon king. She has offered countless souls to revive him as her loyal retainer.
101541030.evoFlair_: The underworld death god hunted the souls of the living and offered them to her demon king. At last she has revived him as her puppet.

103541010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Randomly put followers of different costs (excluding Nephthys) from your deck into play until your area is full. Then destroy those followers.
103541010.baseFlair_: A goddess sits upon her throne near the entrance to Amenta, considering how to judge those who enter. She is feared by the living as the face of their demise but worshipped by the dead as the guardian of their souls.
103541010.evoFlair_: Do not fear me, living one, for I mean you no harm. I only wish to give you the supreme gift, that of sweet oblivion. Let me wash away your melancholy and free your spirit from the agony of life.

703541010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Randomly put followers of different costs (excluding Nephthys) from your deck into play until your area is full. Then destroy those followers.
703541010.baseFlair_: A goddess sits upon her throne near the entrance to Amenta, considering how to judge those who enter. She is feared by the living as the face of their demise but worshipped by the dead as the guardian of their souls.
703541010.evoFlair_: Do not fear me, living one, for I mean you no harm. I only wish to give you the supreme gift, that of sweet oblivion. Let me wash away your melancholy and free your spirit from the agony of life.

107541020.baseEffect_:
At the end of your turn, perform Necromancy (4): Gain +3/+0.
Strike: If this follower has at least 10 attack, destroy this follower.
Last Words: Deal X damage to the enemy leader. X equals this follower's attack.
107541020.baseFlair_: I have death in the grip of my hand. With a trace of magic, the pieces will be in place. Manmade immortality... Man will play god on this day! Finally, my wish will... —A Sorcerer's Journal
107541020.evoFlair_:
Why are they such fools? Humans trying to play god—death cannot be controlled, for in the end...
—Chasing Immortality, Chapter 3

117541020.baseEffect_:
Invocation: When you perform Burial Rite, if it is your fifth, seventh, or ninth time this match, invoke this card, then return it to your hand.
----------
When this follower leaves play, or at the end of your turn, summon a Lich. (Transformation doesn't count as leaving play.)
117541020.baseFlair_:
Do not call to him. Do not glorify him. Do not follow him. The spirits that flock in his wake do so well enough. He is a lord with no vassals, charging into battle to hold service for the departed.
—Chronicle of the Dreadlord, Preface
117541020.evoFlair_:
The dead worship at his feet while the living cower in fear. Never have I seen such a well-preserved corpse. O lord of release, your rage has brought us sweet salvation.
—Scribbles Found in Chronicle of the Dreadlord

900541060.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Reanimate (X)
X equals the number of shadows you have.
900541060.baseFlair_: A horror birthed from the blackest abyss. It devours any who are foolish enough to venture into its lair, claiming his or her words, memories, and appearance for itself.
900541060.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
900541060.evoFlair_: It returns to the human world donning the appearance and personality of those it's devoured, attempting to assimilate its victim's former life. This mimicry is its primary method of catching new prey.

110524010.baseEffect_:
Summon 3 Skeletons. Give +1/+1 to all allied followers.
Necromancy (4): Give +2/+2 to all allied followers instead.
110524010.baseFlair_: Malice penetrates the marrow. Even when flesh rots away, animosity remains forever trapped in bone.

102521020.baseFlair_: Andras is an embodiment of silence. When he appears in our world, drawn by screams, he brings death to those unlucky enough to be caught in his path.
102521020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
102521020.evoFlair_: Andras is a harbinger of the icy darkness. All touched by his blade of frost are doomed to spend eternity as statues.

117531010.baseEffect_:
Crystallize (2): Countdown (3)
Fanfare and Last Words: Transform a random enemy follower into a Skeleton.
----------
At the end of your turn, destroy 2 random enemy followers and restore 5 defense to your leader.
117531010.baseFlair_: Here comes Death, riding in to compel transition. Passing on becomes easier after realizing the uncertain nature of life. With a swing of his scythe, all shall submit to the law of change.
117531010.evoFlair_: Death is inevitable. Death does not discriminate. Death is inescapable. All who stand before his hooves receive the same fate.

118531020.baseEffect_:
Crystallize (1): Countdown (3)
During your turn, whenever an allied follower is summoned with Reanimate, give it the ability to evolve for 0 evolution points.
----------
Ward.
Fanfare: Summon a Philosopher of Death.
At the end of your turn, summon a Philosopher of Death.
118531020.baseFlair_: Thoughts are souls without vessels. Damaged books are corpses of knowledge. And while there's nothing stopping a corpse from reanimating, they may also revive themselves via possession... Ah, I see. This is this essence of necromancy.
118531020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
118531020.evoFlair_: A library is a graveyard of knowledge and I am nothing more than a grave robber. Let us acknowledge shame and move beyond it, for life is a pale glimpse of a vibrant afterlife. Besides, the thirst for knowledge never dies and this is what I live for.

101541020.baseEffect_:
If 4 allied cards are in play, this follower costs 9 less play points.
----------
Fanfare: If 4 other allied cards are in play, destroy all other allied cards.
101541020.baseFlair_: When the gate to the Dead World is opened, the lost lord will be reborn. Humanity and heaven will bear the cost.
101541020.evoFlair_: The lord's flesh has been smeared with the unclean blood of corpses from the underworld, but his sword continues to gleam as it has for millennia, ready to be wielded against the ranks of the living.

111541020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Necromancy (X) - Deal X damage to all other followers. X equals the defense of the enemy follower with the highest defense in play.
111541020.baseFlair_: The hero slew the wyrm, but not its obsession. Its malice was stronger than death. Though its heart rotted away, venomous avarice still pumped through its veins, dragging the wyrm back to tortured consciousness.
111541020.evoFlair_: Oozing resentment. Awash in greed. Poison billows from between its rotting jaws as its tongue lolls out in mindless lust for Hreidmar's gold. The hero who pierced its heart is no more. Wallowing in its own evil, the wyrm raises a gurgling, impotent roar.

115541010.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (2): Summon a One-Tailed Fox.
Accelerate (5): Summon 3 One-Tailed Foxes.
----------
Fanfare: Summon 4 One-Tailed Foxes.
Whenever an allied One-Tailed Fox comes into play, give it +1/+0 and Drain.
115541010.baseFlair_: Ahh, the sound of the clamoring crowd is sweet. What's a play without an audience? Is it any wonder how much we demons all love humans? To the end of the procession and beyond.
115541010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
115541010.evoFlair_: We live within a strange story. Life is fleeting, mortals the flickering figures in a shadow play. Is it not odd? Cast your dice or dance your fill, but do so before dawn. To the end of the procession and beyond.

900541140.baseFlair_: Once I slept below the turf. Now I rock out on stage. Lucky I spent my time in the bowels of hades though, 'cause now my riffs are metal as hell. Rise, my dead heads. Get out of your dirt beds. 'Cause I've got a banging new song for you: "Undead Riot."
900541140.evoFlair_: The baku crawls into the space between life and death, snuffling for dreams to eat. It hears a soul-rousing note—the song of the dead, pulsing with life. The creature squeezes its eyes shut and laments, "Back to sleeep." Thus the struggle between silence and sound begins.

109541020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Necromancy (6) - Evolve this follower.
Evolve this follower if it was summoned using Reanimate.
109541020.baseFlair_: The oath and flames were once separated by death. No tears to douse the flame, no method to deliver the oath. A wandering blade teaches for eternity, seeking an immortal enemy. Once again, his duel begins.
109541020.evoEffect_: Last Words: Summon an unevolved Mordecai, Eternal Duelist.
109541020.evoFlair_: If this were a story, it would have already reached the ending. If this were a song, the performance would have finished. However, this is his life—a reality that continues without end. And once again, his duel begins.

116541020.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (3): Summon 3 Assembly Droids and put a 9-play point He Who Once Rocked (without Accelerate) into your deck.
----------
Storm.
Ward.
Last Words: Reanimate (8).
116541020.baseFlair_: Once I slept below the turf. Now I rock out on stage. Lucky I spent my time in the bowels of hades though, 'cause now my riffs are metal as hell. Rise, my dead heads. Get out of your dirt beds. 'Cause I've got a banging new song for you: "Undead Riot."
116541020.evoFlair_: The baku crawls into the space between life and death, snuffling for dreams to eat. It hears a soul-rousing note—the song of the dead, pulsing with life. The creature squeezes its eyes shut and laments, "Back to sleeep." Thus the struggle between silence and sound begins.

119541020.baseEffect_:
At the end of your turn, if you have 5 cards in play and at least 15 shadows, change the cost of this card to 0.
----------
Bane.
When this card comes into play, perform Necromancy (20): Evolve this follower.
Can't be evolved using evolution points. (Can be evolved using card effects.)
119541020.baseFlair_: Abandon all hope of compassion, for you have exhausted my mercy. From the abyss I have watched you squander your existence and cast aside all chances for redemption. 'Tis now time to reap the annihilation that you have sown.
119541020.evoEffect_:
Bane.
At the end of your turn, banish all enemy followers and amulets.
119541020.evoFlair_: Do not despair, for 'tis the reaper who has reason to lament. His grief shall engulf the horizon in a dark veil of destruction. O souls destined for the next life: heed the reaper's warning, lest the wheel of cleansing turn once more.

111541030.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (1): Summon a Tartarus, the Tormentor. Then destroy it and put a Lurker in the Dark into your hand.
----------
Ambush.
Strike: If Ambush is active for this follower, destroy all enemy followers with 5 or less defense.
111541030.baseFlair_: "Even heroes can starve..." "Shall I sing you a lullaby?" "Pray, fool! And repent under the lash!" "You're hilarious!" "Hey... Why are you so sad?" "What's your name?" "If you wanna be friends, you gotta act like it!"
111541030.evoFlair_: "What strange weather we've been having." "Whaddya wanna do tomorrow?" "There's... this one person I can't stop thinking about." "Did you just bite me!" "The world must face judgment." "Ahh, I'm so booored..." "I just want a little bit. Do you mind?"

113541010.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (6): Deal 3 damage to all followers. Summon a Path to Purgatory. Put a 7-play point Hades, Father of Purgatory (without Accelerate) into your deck.
----------
Last Words: Summon a Path to Purgatory. Gain 6 shadows.
113541010.baseFlair_: In the grip of his hands is the great equalizer of purgatory—the blade demands veneration from all who would behold the manifestation of darkness itself.
113541010.evoFlair_: The bringer of death incarnate usurps the light from all creation. No lightning shall ever be permitted to strike before him. When the gods supreme take to arms, the world trembles.

900811050.baseEffect_:
Rush.
At the end of your opponent's turn, destroy this follower.
900811050.baseFlair_: What makes one human? In pursuit of the answer, it was crafted.
900811050.evoFlair_: What completes a human? The answer was never found. Regardless, they continued to multiply.

118821010.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, if you have at least 1 play point, restore 2 defense to your leader. Then, if you have at least 3 play points, deal 2 damage to the enemy leader.
118821010.baseFlair_: My insignificant life in this tiny capsule... how meaningless. Interfacing with the system only makes me envious of how free other life-forms are. But none of this matters. I'll probably fade out of existence soon enough anyway.
118821010.evoFlair_: I'm more than just a tiny existence in this miniature capsule! It matters how I feel and what I want to do! And I... I want to get to know you all better! To become friends!

900841140.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Discard your hand. Give your leader the following effect: At the end of this turn, change the enemy leader's maximum defense to 2.
900841140.baseFlair_: Born as a human, converted to evil, and summoned as a god. She sets out in pursuit of global destruction to restore all things to their primordial state, fully aware that it is an exercise in futility.
900841140.evoFlair_: Unparalleled destruction lays waste to the world. Her bloodcurdling war cries mask her screams, while her sweeping claws conceal her longing for a loving embrace. No amount of destruction can appease her, nor would all the compassion in the world get through to her.

900841150.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If you have 4 cards or more in your deck, banish all cards in your deck until only 3 cards remain. Then banish all other followers and amulets.
900841150.baseFlair_: Deathly slaughter is her charge, her fate, her very being. True to her namesake, she paints the skies and earth a crimson red.
900841150.evoFlair_: Her deathly fate consumes the world. When both her eyes open to reflect all of creation, every living thing is torn asunder, tinting the world in a crimson hue.

900841160.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: Lose 8 play point orbs.
Reduce damage to this follower to 0.
Can't be affected by effects except for those that change this card's attack or defense.
900841160.baseFlair_: Hexes and omens are her fixations, while confusion is her cadence. She intoxicates all with the melody of despair. Those who hear her siren call fall prey to her fatal charms.
900841160.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
900841160.evoFlair_: The curtain of despair rises without warning. What comes to pass next is too merciless and cruel to speak of. Finality will be the tune played without surcease until the end of the world.

115814010.baseEffect_: Give your leader the following effect: At the end of your turn, if you have at least 1 play point, draw a card. If you have at least 3 play points, draw 2 instead and restore 2 defense to your leader. At the end of your turn, remove this effect.
115814010.baseFlair_:
One. Be silent and thoughtful. Awareness of your entire body is essential. Two. Until you are capable of coming to a complete halt, you should not so much as move a muscle.
—The Ultimate Way of the Fist, Preface

713814010.baseEffect_: Give your leader the following effect: At the end of your turn, if you have at least 1 play point, draw a card. If you have at least 3 play points, draw 2 instead and restore 2 defense to your leader. At the end of your turn, remove this effect.
713814010.baseFlair_:
The curtains will rise any second now...
I'm not nervous—I'm just focusing.
—Karen Hojo

110824010.baseEffect_:
Choose: Put 2 copies of 2 of the following cards into your deck.
-Analyzing Artifact
-Ancient Artifact
-Mystic Artifact
-Radiant Artifact

107834020.baseEffect_:
Subtract 1 from the cost of an Artifact card in your hand.
Put 3 copies of that Artifact card into your deck.
107834020.baseFlair_: If evolution is the incentive, progression is the objective.

118834010.baseEffect_: Give your leader the following effect: At the end of your turn, if you have at least 1 play point, give -2/-2 to a random enemy follower. Then, if you have at least 3 play points, give +2/+2 to a random allied follower. At the end of your turn, remove this effect.
118834010.baseFlair_: Not content with either light or darkness, you now desire both? Splendid! Most splendid!

900834050.baseEffect_: Summon a Mystic Artifact and Ancient Artifact.
900834050.baseFlair_: I will fight. I will take down every tyrant, every reaver of worlds, every pillager of dreams. I do not forgive or forget. It's time we put an end to this.

900834060.baseEffect_:
Randomly put 1 of the following cards into your hand.
-Tisiphone, the Malignant
-Alecto, the Dissonant
-Megaera, the Indignant
900834060.baseFlair_: Yeah, sure, fight, do whatever. You're angry, then you're crying, and now you're like, "My emotions give me power." Oh, scary. Well, you've forgotten something important. I'm the one that stirred that resentment. So I'm still the one pulling the strings! Now get lost!

900844020.baseEffect_:
Deal 1 damage to an allied follower. Deal 2 damage to an enemy follower.
(Can be played only when both a targetable allied card and enemy card are in play.)
900844020.baseFlair_: The roar of the silverbeast lord reverberates even in the stomachs of machines with much courage.

115811010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Destroy an enemy follower whose attack or defense has been raised.
115811010.baseFlair_: Heh... You seem awfully proud of that expensive armor and weaponry. But my lance here will ferret out your weaknesses and pierce right through them!
115811010.evoFlair_: Strength is weakness and fortes are flaws. Any advantage has drawbacks, is what I'm saying. Get ready, evildoers—my lance is one sharp analyst.

117811020.baseEffect_: Last Words: Put a Paradigm Shift into your hand.
117811020.baseFlair_: Don't ask me what to do. I was born without a shred of creativity. Just give me the schematics, and I'll follow them to a T. That's all I'm good for anyway...
117811020.evoFlair_:
That guy's knack for reproducing designs is nuts. It's like he literally pulls the finished product out of the blueprints, down to the last bolt. I'm not even joking.
—A Fellow Engineer

118811020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Enhance (6) - Gain +4/+4 and put 2 Puppets into your hand.
Once on each of your turns, when an allied Puppet comes into play, put 2 Puppets into your hand.
118811020.baseFlair_: You there! Do you know how expensive making puppets can be? But then I had a brain wave one day—as long my puppets can pass for puppets, it doesn't matter what I use to make them!
118811020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
118811020.evoFlair_: I wrap some yarn round and round long enough, and I've got myself a puppet! How about that? Just think of the savings on fabric! Only problem is... now they've raised the price on yarn!

900811010.baseFlair_: It was created to destroy. Even if its very form is replaced, the inevitable march towards the future cannot be stopped.
900811010.evoFlair_: It was created to push forward. Even if its very form destroyed, the inevitable march towards the future cannot be stopped.

900811030.baseFlair_: Scrutinize and analyze, to fulfill the purpose of its creation. Discover meaning from naught, for it is none other than yourself.
900811030.evoFlair_: Scrutinize and analyze, to fulfill the purpose of its creation. Before you, a purpose is born from naught.

110821010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Choose - Put a Miraculous Invention or Hazardous Invention into your hand.
110821010.baseFlair_: It came to me in a flash! Not just one idea, but two! Only problem is, I can't decide which one to build. Aahh, it's so hard to choose!
110821010.evoFlair_:
Combat really isn't my area of expertise... but I'm one heck of an inventor!
What? I'm a great fighter, too? Aww, c'mon, now! Don't make me blush!

112821010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Put a random Artifact card from your deck into your hand.
Enhance (8): Put 2 random Artifact cards into your hand instead, and recover 7 play points.
112821010.baseFlair_: The first change led to discovery. Everyone saw that if you could somehow use these machines, then you would hold the power to change the world within the palm of your hand. —Robot Research Log, Part 2
112821010.evoFlair_: The possibilities of machines are limitless. They can immediately manifest the wishes of their users. I wonder how the ambitions of mankind will change the machines in turn. —Researcher's Reflections, Part 2

115821010.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, if you have at least 1 play point, deal 1 damage to a random enemy follower. If you have at least 3 play points, deal 2 damage to a random enemy follower and 1 damage to the enemy leader instead.
115821010.baseFlair_:
One. Training the body was once thought the only path. Know now: that path leads nowhere. Two. Temper though you might, flesh is not steel. For armor, turn to the forge.
—The Ultimate Way of the Fist: New Testament, Body
115821010.evoFlair_:
Three. Training the body is a fruitless pursuit of strength. It is not the true Way of the Fist. Four. Prepare yourself by donning steel. Only then will you find the true path.
—The Ultimate Way of the Fist: New Testament, Body

116821020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Select an allied Artifact follower and put a copy of it into your hand.
116821020.baseFlair_: Start small—it's most efficient. Go too big, and you invite careless mistakes. Remember, don't lose the machines for the factory.
116821020.evoFlair_: If you can accomplish great things by starting small, you're clever. But if you start big and end up with something small, you're an idiot. Listen, everything's made up of atoms—that's the beauty of the world.

900841010.baseEffect_: Last Words: If it is your turn, then put a random Artifact card from your deck into your hand. If it is your opponent's turn, draw a card.
900841010.baseFlair_: This here is mine. I suppose I could break you with it if I wanted it to. —Spinaria, Keeper of Enigmas
900841010.evoFlair_: Go ahead and break it, if you wish. Just so you know though, it'll break you with it. —Spinaria, Keeper of Enigmas

900841050.baseFlair_: Anger. First the girl learned anger when she saw the folly and pride of men. "How come people only think of themselves?"
900841050.evoFlair_: Anger. The girl was incensed to learn of human greed and superficiality. "These people will never learn."

111814010.baseEffect_:
Destroy an allied Portalcraft follower or Portalcraft amulet without Countdown. Deal 4 damage to an enemy follower.
(Can be played only when both a targetable allied card and enemy card are in play.)
111814010.baseFlair_: Say, if you had to pick between me or the world, which would you choose? I mean, do I even need to ask?

708814010.baseEffect_:
Destroy an allied Portalcraft follower or Portalcraft amulet without Countdown. Deal 4 damage to an enemy follower.
(Can be played only when both a targetable allied card and enemy card are in play.)
708814010.baseFlair_:
"That's right. He is, without question, a fake priest."
-Rin Tohsaka

114814010.baseEffect_:
Give a random Puppet in your hand +4/+0.
Enhance (7): Put 2 Puppets into your hand. Then give 2 random Puppets in your hand +4/+0 instead.
114814010.baseFlair_: For all that dolls began as human simulacrums, they seem to become more advanced the further their appearance deviates from those origins.

116814010.baseEffect_:
Choose: Put 1 of the following cards into your hand.
-Analyzing Artifact
-Bifurcating Artifact
-Radiant Artifact
-Paradigm Shift
116814010.baseFlair_: They converse through the resonance of steel. Metallic sounds ring out and connect distant places, travelling much farther than organic voices.

118814010.baseEffect_:
Draw a card.
Give your leader the following effect: At the end of your turn, if you have at least 3 play points, put a Mechanical Designs into your hand. At the end of your turn, remove this effect.
118814010.baseFlair_: Lack of manpower's a thing of the past.

107824020.baseEffect_:
Put an Analyzing Artifact into your deck.
At the end of your turn, draw a card.
107824020.baseFlair_: If I were a god, I would have never created humans. I'd prefer something much simpler, much more obedient—a servant.

113824010.baseEffect_:
Put a Radiant Artifact into your deck.
At the end of your turn, draw a card.
113824010.baseFlair_:
One could say these blueprints are like a letter from an era gone by. The author's fervor is palpable from the design alone.
—Studious Engineer

713824010.baseEffect_:
Put a Radiant Artifact into your deck.
At the end of your turn, draw a card.

114824010.baseEffect_:
Put a Naterran Great Tree into your hand.
If this is your fifth turn or later, recover 1 play point.
Then, if this is your tenth turn or later, put a Radiant Artifact into your hand.
114824010.baseFlair_:
The Mother bestows gifts upon her children.
When the scientists discovered her kindness during their research, they saw an advanced, marvelous aether. They soon learned that it grants power to those who test the boundaries of civilization.

117824010.baseEffect_: Put copies of 2 random allied Artifact cards with different names destroyed this match into your hand. Then, if at least 6 allied Artifact cards with different names have been destroyed this match, change their costs to 0.
117824010.baseFlair_:
Chief sent us a missive about the most common workplace accidents. We all had a good laugh at how absurd they were, especially number twenty. Then Chief said, "Go dig up the bodies and ask them yourselves."
—Artifact Researcher

713824020.baseEffect_: Put copies of 2 random allied Artifact cards with different names destroyed this match into your hand. Then, if at least 6 allied Artifact cards with different names have been destroyed this match, change their costs to 0.
713824020.baseFlair_: Orange? Heh... That is the name of my loyalty!

112834010.baseEffect_: Give your leader the following effect until the end of this turn: Whenever an allied Artifact card comes into play, recover 1 play point and draw a card.
112834010.baseFlair_: Lighting lamps and consulting maps, humans are guided through this world by their tools. It is for this reason that technology is, in fact, a form of divinity worthy of worship.

709834010.baseEffect_: Give your leader the following effect until the end of this turn: Whenever an allied Artifact card comes into play, recover 1 play point and draw a card.
709834010.baseFlair_: I did not expect to be testing this prototype so soon.

900834010.baseFlair_: Go on now: swear to the light. —Demon of the Gaps

900834020.baseEffect_: Give a follower +2/+0. Then remove all effects from that follower except changes to its attack or defense.
900834020.baseFlair_: Go on now: wander through the dark. —Demon of the Gaps

900834070.baseEffect_: Put a copy of a random allied follower played this turn (excluding Lunalu, Fangirl A) into your hand.
900834070.baseFlair_: My pen and my body are ready!

900844030.baseEffect_:
Give -10/-0 to a random enemy follower.
Banish a random enemy amulet.
Give the enemy leader the following effect: At the start of your next turn, lose 1 play point.
900844030.baseFlair_: There are proper ways to doin' things—precepts which must never be broken. But here you've gone, like some common ingrate, and broken the most important one: never piss me off. That'll be 100,000 gold, the full value of which I will receive immediately.

107813030.baseEffect_:
Countdown (3)
Whenever an allied Artifact follower comes into play, give it Rush.
Whenever you play an Artifact card, recover 1 play point.
107813030.baseFlair_: Wings? I'd prefer something with a little more sophistication. —Geno, Machine Artisan

109813010.baseEffect_:
If you have at least 1 play point and Resonance is active for you, Choose: Play this card as an Artifact Squadron or Artifact's Glow.
----------
Countdown (2)
At the end of your turn, randomly put 2 of the following cards into your deck: Mystic Artifact, Radiant Artifact, Prime Artifact.
109813010.baseFlair_: Occasionally the contraptions of antiquity become the innovations of posterity.

900813010.baseEffect_:
Countdown (2)
At the start of your turn, put a random Artifact card that costs at least 3 play points from your deck into your hand.
900813010.baseFlair_: Warriors roused from antiquity shall take up arms once again.

900813020.baseEffect_:
Countdown (2)
Whenever you play an Artifact card, restore 1 defense to your leader.
900813020.baseFlair_: Radiance roused from antiquity shall illuminate the day once again.

107823010.baseEffect_:
Countdown (3)
At the end of your turn, randomly put 2 of the following cards into your deck: Analyzing Artifact, Ancient Artifact, Mystic Artifact, Radiant Artifact.
107823010.baseFlair_: Absorbing traces of magical power, it amplifies and supplies it, as if a maternal provider to those who are willing to come take it.

900822020.baseEffect_:
Can't be destroyed by effects.
At the end of your turn, if the enemy leader has 10 defense or less, deal 1 damage to a random enemy follower and 1 damage to the enemy leader, then banish this amulet.
900822020.baseFlair_: I call this one the Too-Hot-to-Handle!

107833010.baseEffect_:
Countdown (2)
Fanfare: If there are any Artifact cards in your hand, randomly discard 1 and add 2 to this amulet's Countdown.
Until this amulet leaves play, your leader can't take more than 3 damage at a time.
107833010.baseFlair_: The path to omnipotence exists within the beyond.

111843010.baseEffect_:
Countdown (25)
Fanfare: Enhance (5) - Subtract 15 from this amulet's Countdown.
Whenever an allied follower is destroyed, subtract 1 from this amulet's Countdown.
Whenever an allied follower evolves, subtract 2 from this amulet's Countdown.
Last Words: Summon an Avatar of Desecration.
111843010.baseFlair_:
"Drink in defilement!"
"Purify it!"
They flirted with forbidden knowledge, a sinister gambol with blasphemy and corruption, and created something inhuman—something to transcend humanity.

100811020.baseFlair_: Behold, and see! My beloved puppet dances with delight, almost as if it lives!
100811020.evoEffect_: Evolve: Put a Puppet into your hand. Give a random Puppet in your hand Bane.
100811020.evoFlair_: Oh, my beloved puppet... it seems that I've not bestowed upon you enough life. Hmm... Yes, of course—let's simply take theirs!

100811060.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If Resonance is active for you, gain Rush.
100811060.baseFlair_: Do you know my master? I see. In that case, say goodnight!
100811060.evoFlair_: Where is my master? Is it you? Hm. Maybe. Prove it to me!

100811070.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put 2 Analyzing Artifacts into your deck.
100811070.baseFlair_: Grr... Roar! (Beat it, kid! My master has no interest in punks like you!)
100811070.evoFlair_: Rra... Rawrgh ! (You still here? You're not worth a second of my master's time! Worthless! Worthless, I say!)

107811020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Enhance (4) - Gain +1/+1. Put a Puppet into your hand.
107811020.baseFlair_: I'm looking for a soul, for science. If I give one to teddy, surely he'll talk, right?
107811020.evoFlair_: I'm gonna give your soul to teddy, see? This way, I'll never be alone.

107811090.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Select a follower in your hand (excluding Hamelin) that originally costs 3 play points or less. Put a copy of that follower into your hand.
107811090.baseFlair_: Dear listeners, join me on a musical journey! Just follow the tune of my magical melodies—the sound of my pipe compels you!
107811090.evoFlair_: It's the march that never ends—nowhere and forever! Hey, where do you think you're going? Just follow me!

107811100.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Randomly put 2 of the following cards into your deck: Analyzing Artifact, Ancient Artifact, Mystic Artifact, Radiant Artifact.
107811100.baseFlair_: I don't believe it—I'm actually flying! That lady's a genius!
107811100.evoFlair_: It's like a dream! Soaring through the skies, I'll be unstoppable—even dragons won't stand a chance!

107811130.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If there are any Artifact cards in your hand, randomly discard 1 and gain Rush and Bane.
107811130.baseFlair_: It was just supposed to be a ledger of sorts—I didn't think it'd actually come to life. —Master Puppeteer
107811130.evoFlair_: My laboratory, reduced to ashes—how am I supposed to take notes now? —Banished Puppeteer

108811010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Prime Artifact into your deck.
108811010.baseFlair_: Artifacts aren't just objects. They're living witnesses to history. But everyone's forgotten them. That's why these girls are so lonely.
108811010.evoEffect_: Evolve: Put a random Artifact card from your deck into your hand.
108811010.evoFlair_: Artifacts aren't just objects. Their bodies are filled with history. Try to remember... remember what the world used to look like.

109811020.baseEffect_: When an allied Artifact follower comes into play, this follower gains Ward.
109811020.baseFlair_: Sometimes I can getcha up and running and sometimes ya won't even turn on. I think I'll call ya... The "I dunno if you'll work this time" machine! —An Inventor
109811020.evoFlair_: So ya work better when your buddies are around, eh? Then I'll call ya the "Looks scary but actually just lookin' fer friends" machine! —An Inventor

110811010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Randomly put either a Guardform Golem or a Strikeform Golem into your deck. If Resonance is active for you, put both a Guardform Golem and a Strikeform Golem into your deck instead.
110811010.baseFlair_: Haha, I might be a genius! If something has no fixed form, that just means it can be shaped into anything! All right, my cute little golems! Let's try some more exciting looks!
110811010.evoFlair_:
"Huh... For imitations, these aren't half bad."
—Paracelsus

112811010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Gain +3/+3 and put 2 Puppets into your hand.
During your turn, whenever another allied follower evolves, put a Puppet into your hand.
112811010.baseFlair_: Excuse me... Can you help me? I know I look like a doll, but actually an evil man trapped my soul inside this puppet! Will you please help me look for my original body?
112811010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
112811010.evoFlair_: Thank you! It's hard to move this doll's joints, the clothes are too cute and fluffy, and I just feel completely helpless. If I had tear ducts, I would've already cried my eyes out. But now that I'm with you, I have a good feeling I'll finally relocate my body!

112811030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put 2 Bifurcating Artifacts into your deck.
112811030.baseFlair_: The source of the core's metamorphosis was a variety of phenomena. When the orb was unearthed, it brought forth wide-reaching change; the machines had come. —Robot Research Log, Part 1
112811030.evoFlair_: The existence of this core will advance both human and machinekind. It's given us plenty to hypothesize about, so now all that's left is proper experimentation. I wonder how the world will change from our discoveries. —Researcher's Reflections, Part 1

113811010.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: Put 2 Ancient Artifacts into your deck.
113811010.baseFlair_:
Cat Cannoneer?
I don't appreciate being lumped together with her, ya meow! Her cannon's totally lacking on paw-er, see what I mean? This is a brand-new original creation, the Paw-Cannon!
113811010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
113811010.evoFlair_:
"Hey! Your Paw-Cannon's totally ripping off mine!"
"It's not a rip-off, it's, uh, an homage!"
—Cat Cannoneer and Cat Gunner

114811020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Enhance (6) - Put a Puppet into your hand and give it Bane.
114811020.baseFlair_: As the current head of a long line of puppet masters, I've grown fond of making puppets geared toward children. Yet the customers don't come by my shop anymore. I wonder why...
114811020.evoFlair_: I see now where I had erred. I was too obsessed with tradition, and as such the masses find my work to be out-of-date. So I've decided to keep up with the times. Behold my latest creation—dearest Julie!

114811030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Naterran Great Tree into your hand. If Resonance is active for you, gain Rush.
114811030.baseFlair_:
Concept: Enforce with both weaponry and armor.
Subjects: Small, weak animals.
Mission: Preserve endangered species.
—Domination Plan Proposal, Team A
114811030.evoFlair_: We've succeeded with part one of the plan. Though the change in ecology resulting from expansion of their habitat came unexpectedly. Nonetheless, we'll continue to observe their ongoing war against bladed hedgehogs. For the good of all of us.

115811030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If Resonance is active for you or if an allied Naterran Great Tree is in play, gain Ambush until the end of your opponent's turn.
115811030.baseFlair_:
Concept: Reinforcement of weak points.
Subjects: Animals with substandard senses.
Mission: Research wild animals' potential.
—Domination Plan Proposal, Team D
115811030.evoFlair_: Above is a mole we've seen often of late. Reclaiming its species' lost visual acuity has given it a whole new way of life. We must continue to observe this artificially-induced evolution. For the good of all of us.

116811010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Paradigm Shift into your hand.
116811010.baseFlair_: The source of the core's metamorphosis brought about new technology. We no longer need extensive equipment or advanced facilities to tinker with machinery. As a result, devices have grown lighter and inventing more efficient. —Tech Research and Development, Report 1
116811010.evoFlair_:
Technology, and therefore machinery, exists for its own sake. As such, inventors believe that one day machines will surpass humanity. The world toddles towards a completely mechanized future, free of human influence.
—Boon of Technology, Part 1

117811010.baseEffect_: Last Words: Put a Puppet into your hand.
117811010.baseFlair_: Witness the Two of Cups, flowing in unison. Bound as they are, the two souls steal gazes at each other when the master isn't looking. Though this affair may be fleeting, their lovestruck hearts yearn for an encore.
117811010.evoFlair_: Greetings from the puppet master, tugger of heartstrings. See, people bemoan the rifts that drive them apart. But I warp space so they may come together... So what if the joy I bring is manufactured? It's real to them, and that's all that matters.

119811010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Enhance (4) - Summon a Mechanized Soldier.
Enhance (6): Summon 2 instead.
Enhance (8): Summon 3 instead, and give all allied Mechanized Soldiers the ability to evolve for 0 evolution points.
119811010.baseFlair_:
Tools of metal cost time and money to make and maintain.
Tools of flesh are ready made and need only an upgrade.
119811010.evoEffect_: Evolve: Give +1/+1 to all other allied Mechanized Soldiers.
119811010.evoFlair_:
When tools of metal break, one must take the time to pick up the broken parts.
When tools of flesh break, one need only leave them to turn into compost on their own.

100821010.baseFlair_: To unravel the secrets of life, it is only logical to dismantle all lives. That is what master has requested—what master wishes for.
100821010.evoEffect_: Evolve: Put 2 Puppets into your hand.
100821010.evoFlair_: This body of steel simply seeks the essence of life—to fulfill master's order, and to one day create a life for master.

107821010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If Resonance is active for you, gain Ward.
107821010.baseFlair_: The sky is my domain to explore! They aren't real, but with these wings I can fly anywhere!
107821010.evoFlair_: To protect my beloved, I'll do anything—my feelings are pure! Even if it pains me, I want to be with the one I truly love.

107821020.baseEffect_: Last Words: If you have at least 4 cards in your hand, put a Puppet into your hand. If you have 3 cards or less in your hand, put a Puppet and a Flower Doll into your hand.
107821020.baseFlair_: This is the garden of eternity. Even after my master withers away, I'll stand over and guard this grave until the end of time.
107821020.evoFlair_: This is the garden of eternity. My master loved me for the white flower I was, and for eternity I will bloom forever, here in the master's stead.

107821030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put 2 Ancient Artifacts into your deck.
107821030.baseFlair_: Hey, check out these wings! Pretty brilliant, huh? I guess you could call me a genius of sorts, I invented 'em myself!
107821030.evoEffect_: Evolve: Put a random Artifact card from your deck into your hand.
107821030.evoFlair_: Maybe someday there'll be wings for everyone! If we all could be so free, we could even fly all the way to the sun!

107821070.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If there are any Artifact cards in your hand, randomly discard 1 and give your leader the following effect - Subtract 3 from the next source of damage your leader takes.
107821070.baseFlair_: Yeah, I can fix it for ya—for a price, of course. Hm? What do I take for payment? I'm but a simple man, what do you think? Pay up!
107821070.evoFlair_: Listen here, buddy—I ain't running a charity. Man's gotta make a living somehow. Nothing personal, it's just business!

108821010.baseEffect_: If you have at least 2 play points and Resonance is active for you, Choose: Play this card as a L'Ange Miriam or La Diablotine Miriam.
108821010.baseFlair_: My life is synthetic, and so is my body. But my heart doesn't come from anyone else. I want to battle together with you. I really do!
108821010.evoFlair_: Other people made my life and my body. But my heart is mine and mine alone. I can be strong if we're together. I really believe I can!

110821020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Destroy another allied Portalcraft follower or Portalcraft amulet without Countdown, and then draw 2 cards.
110821020.baseFlair_: Destroy, destroy, destroy. If it exists, it deserves to be destroyed. There is no future without destruction—dress for the apocalypse, dance to the damage!
110821020.evoFlair_:
The Second Order: Abide No Rule
Order is the enemy of the masses. Every desire to rebel should be carried to its fullest expression. Smash and trample everything.
—The Teachings of Team Destruction

111821010.baseFlair_: My little sister's real sick, so she's stuck in bed. But it's okay, 'cause I met a man who promised to make her live forever!
111821010.evoEffect_: Last Words: Put a Puppet into your hand.
111821010.evoFlair_:
Why... How... What's happened. To me?
My sister and. Me. We're puppets... Now.
This is wrong... This is all wrong!

113821010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Put a Puppet into your hand.
Whenever an allied Puppet comes into play, restore 1 defense to your leader.
113821010.baseFlair_: All creations have their own purposes—those which must be fulfilled... And I too, shall play my part. Zahnrad, the grace of your wings shall make life dance.
113821010.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Put a Puppet into your hand.
Whenever an allied Puppet comes into play, restore 1 defense to your leader.
113821010.evoFlair_: No matter how many times it breaks, no matter how many times it rusts, I will always repair it. After all, there is nothing sadder than a purpose unfulfilled. Now, my gears, serve your purpose.

117821010.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, put a copy of a random allied follower destroyed this match that costs X play points into your hand. X equals your remaining play points.
117821010.baseFlair_: Hark, the herald of Judgement, bringer of rejuvenation! Mender of broken bodies, lifter of spirits, and petter of four-legged friends. She'll be there to help you when no one else can.
117821010.evoFlair_: A tuner like me restores things to their original state. Waiting around for help is so dull and dumb. You can't expect it to fall into your lap. You gotta put in some effort and seek it.

118821020.baseEffect_:
Once on each of your turns, when this follower's attack or defense is increased by an effect, recover 1 play point.
At the end of your turn, if you have at least 1 play point, summon a Dutiful Steed.
118821020.baseFlair_:
As the trains race across the country, these lupine mechanisms can be seen loitering near the tracks. They maintain the integrity of the rails twenty-four hours a day. It's thanks to their support that transportation is reliable.
—Magitrains for Nimwits, Page 3
118821020.evoFlair_:
Many trains are equipped with sleeping cars to make your journey more comfortable. Open the window, and the night sky will accompany you on your ride. By the time you wake up, we'll have arrived at your destination.
—Magitrains for Nimwits, Page 4

119821010.baseEffect_:
Ambush.
Fanfare: Choose - Put 1 of the following cards into your hand.
-Gilded Goblet
-Gilded Boots
-Gilded Necklace
119821010.baseFlair_: A crime is a crime, and trash is trash. No matter how lofty their morals are, a thief is still a thief—which is exactly why I work covertly—and vanish like smoke in the night.
119821010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
