116834010.baseFlair_: The soldiers have gathered their courage; they are now ready to war against fate. A single voice rings out like a shot over the silent ranks. "The time has come to take up arms. Come, let us carve a path to the future!" The rebellion has begun.

900834040.baseEffect_:
Give +4/+4 to an allied follower.
If that follower is Shin, Lawful Light, transform it into Shin, Chaotic Darkness.
900834040.baseFlair_:
Well, now that you've seen me, let's make a new world order. Yes, I will plunge this world into darkness.
—Shin, Chaotic Darkness

108822010.baseEffect_: Whenever an artifact follower that originally costs at least 3 play points comes into play, deal 3 damage to a random enemy follower. If no enemy followers are in play, deal 3 damage to the enemy leader instead.
108822010.baseFlair_: From progress comes innovation, and from innovation comes progress.

107811040.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If Resonance is active for you, deal 1 damage to all enemy followers.
107811040.baseFlair_: Swords? Totally barbaric. It's all about firepower, baby!
107811040.evoFlair_: Bringing a sword to a gun fight? Ha! I'd like to see you try, buddy.

107811120.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Put a Puppet into your hand.
Whenever an allied Puppet is destroyed gain +1/+1.
107811120.baseFlair_: Incomplete, insufficient, imperfect and abandoned by its master. But despite everything, it lives.
107811120.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
107811120.evoFlair_: Reduced to nothing and recreated from nothing. The mask effectively conceals a steady stream of tears.

109811030.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Put a Gilgamesh into your hand if Resonance is active for you.
109811030.baseFlair_: The oblivious beast of clay is no more. Through the wisdom of Shamhat, I have awakened and carry this name. Together with the hero, I'll take on this world once again.
109811030.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
109811030.evoFlair_: Gugalanna, lords of the stars, what have you, it matters not. Those who bear their fangs to my dearest will be slain—even gods. For my one dear friend, I'll risk it all.

111811020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Destroy another allied Portalcraft follower or Portalcraft amulet without Countdown, and then summon an Analyzing Artifact.
111811020.baseFlair_: Yesss! Destroy, destroy, destroy! But if we diiid decide to keep something after all has been smashed to bits, perhaps it may be an idol... A beacon for the world, crafted by my very own hands.
111811020.evoFlair_: Follow her into the deepest of shadows. To recreate the idol of destruction herself is to earn the authority to destroy—and within the shadow of destruction lies creation.

900811040.baseEffect_:
Storm.
Last Words: If it is your turn, then put a random Artifact card from your deck into your hand. If it is your opponent's turn, draw a card.
900811040.baseFlair_: Forged potential of ivory—a guide to the proper way, simply a matter of course.
900811040.evoFlair_: Chaotic potential of obsidian—the proper way is but only one, for infinite opportunities exist.

900811080.baseFlair_: This device is a barrier. It wards its master from obliteration... by first obliterating the would-be destroyer.
900811080.evoFlair_: This device is a barrier, secure until the bitter end. Its every nut, bolt, and feature was designed to protect. It doesn't fear destruction because it exists for one reason: to serve its master.

900811090.baseFlair_: This device is meant to reap. And there is nothing it can't harvest.
900811090.evoFlair_: This device is meant to steal life away. It was perfectly designed by its master to do so.

900811100.baseEffect_:
Storm.
Last Words: Deal 2 damage to the enemy leader.
900811100.baseFlair_: Soar—that is what you were created to do. Revert reason, bring chaos to order.
900811100.evoFlair_: Soar—that is what you were created to do. Before you, all reason and all existence crumbles into chaos.

107821090.baseEffect_: Whenever an effect puts cards into your deck, gain +1/+0.
107821090.baseFlair_: In our experiments, we paired a human's body with a demon's blood. Using the organs of a beast, and a heart of black iron, we created something unspeakable, unidentifiable.
107821090.evoFlair_: Not human, demon, nor beast. It swelled as if it were water, and moaned in agony. We created something truly horrifying that day—an abomination without purpose.

107821100.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Puppet into your hand. Give +0/+1 and Ward to all Puppets in your hand.
107821100.baseFlair_: Comparable to a spider, the doll quickly latches onto any unfortunate soul entangled in its intricately woven threads.
107821100.evoFlair_: Its entangled threads stained with drops of vermillion, the true nature of the doll is revealed as it greedily devours its prey.

108821020.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: Put a random Artifact card that costs at least 3 play points from your deck into your hand.
108821020.baseFlair_: Talking's... something I'm pretty bad at. That's why this thing... does the talking for me. My new arm...
108821020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
108821020.evoFlair_: Talking's not... what I do well. I think I'll come in handy too. Let's battle together... I'll do everything I can.

109821020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Summon a Go, Go, Robomi!
Fanfare: Enhance (8) - Subtract 3 from that amulet's Countdown.
109821020.baseFlair_: So your name's Robomi, huh? It's amazing that an eons-old machina soldier can move and talk. I'm Nicholas, and I'll be taking care of your maintenance from now on, Robomi!
109821020.evoFlair_: The same technology used to create Robomi... I'll use it to protect the ones I love! Gigante Suit ready! Nicholas, lifting off!

900821030.baseFlair_: This unit's name is Robomi. You have been registered as this unit's new engineer, Nicholas.
900821030.evoFlair_: Charging complete. Preparing Hyper Megaton Kick.

107831020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a random Artifact card from your deck into your hand. Repeat once if Resonance is active for you.
107831020.baseFlair_: Entirety set right. Naught set to its counter. Now, you too must step upon the scales.
107831020.evoFlair_: Bear the burden of this world and the weight of mankind—achieve equilibrium and balance the heavens and earth.

116831020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Machina or Natura follower from your hand into play. Give it Rush and the following effect: At the end of your turn, return this follower to your hand.
116831020.baseFlair_:
Concept: Automated artillery barrage
Subjects: All organisms capable of conveying laser turrets
Mission: Development of creature that is weapon and carrier in one
—Domination Plan Proposal, Team Z
116831020.evoFlair_:
Organic life has donned steel, shouldered machinery, and assumed the robe of power. It roars, "We reign supreme; these machines are our attendants." This biological drive for dominance is vital; it's what propels us into the future.
—In Defense of Machines, Part 2

117831010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Recover X play points. X equals the number of allied followers in play.
At the end of your turn, if you have at least 1 play point, draw a card. Then, if you have at least 3 play points, subtract 2 from its cost.
117831010.baseFlair_: I am the Two of Swords, exemplar of denial. The only path is forward. The only thing worth honing is skill. Nothing else matters. All these tools are at my disposal. No one will stand in my way.
117831010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
117831010.evoFlair_: He is a master swordsman; his ideal state is stillness. To him, nothing need exist... Yet he realizes: he denies, therefore he is. Quickly, he turns his tools towards his own mind; he shreds away at his consciousness, hoping to one day return to his purest form.

107841020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Summon a Spinaria's Artifact.
Whenever an allied Artifact follower comes into play, give that follower the following effect: At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to a random enemy follower.
107841020.baseFlair_: These artifacts move at my command, but they do nothing for my lonely heart.
107841020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
107841020.evoFlair_: Somebody, anybody! Please rescue me from this life of solitude. For such a companion, I would do anything...

704841010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Summon a Spinaria's Artifact.
Whenever an allied Artifact follower comes into play, give that follower the following effect: At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to a random enemy follower.
704841010.baseFlair_: These artifacts move at my command, but they do nothing for my lonely heart.
704841010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
704841010.evoFlair_: Somebody, anybody! Please rescue me from this life of solitude. For such a companion, I would do anything...

107841030.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Give your leader the following effects.
-Whenever you play an Artifact card, recover 1 play point.
-At the end of your turn, if Resonance is active for you, discard your hand and draw 6 cards.
(These effects are not stackable and last for the rest of the match.)
107841030.baseFlair_: Someone has to make sure fate stays in balance. I can restore order, or let chaos consume this world. Now then, which one will it be?
107841030.evoFlair_: Rotate the eternal wheel of fate, and the truth of the world reveals itself. Reach the limits of the world so that it may change forevermore. How far will you go?

111841010.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to all enemies. If the total cost of allied Artifact cards destroyed during this match is at least 20, deal 5 damage instead.
111841010.baseFlair_: Look, life's not about following the pack, nor about creating a name for yourself. It's like this—when you get to be a certain age, you begin to see the right path. Eye for an eye, tooth for a tooth. That's why you gotta fight only those that are ready for it.
111841010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
111841010.evoFlair_: Look, I don't plan to boast. The fact this sword chose me is just coincidence, you see. But even us older folk, we've got dreams. It doesn't embarrass me at all to say that's why I live my life rewarding virtue and punishing vice.

113841020.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (2): Summon 2 Puppets.
----------
Fanfare: Put 2 Puppets into your hand.
113841020.baseFlair_:
Fear. Rage. Hatred. Affection—no, it's useless. I can't express all my heart feels for you. But I wonder... What do you make of me now?
—Orchis, Linked Heart
113841020.evoFlair_: From near and far, she sought a heart. The purpose of her creation. Her purpose in this world. Seeking the knowledge for herself, she continues her journey. As the answers are revealed, her heart beats on.

117841030.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Put a Spinaria & Lucille, Keepers into your deck.
When an allied Artifact card comes into play, gain the ability to evolve for 0 evolution points.
117841030.baseFlair_: I'm not good at fighting, and it certainly isn't fun, but I made a promise to stick by you, Spinaria! I'll never abandon my big sister!
117841030.evoFlair_:
Lucille said I was important to her... My chest feels... warm. I think I'm happy.
—Spinaria, Keeper of Enigmas

117814010.baseEffect_: Destroy an enemy follower. Then deal X damage to a random enemy follower. X equals the destroyed follower's attack.
117814010.baseFlair_: I hate attention. I get enough of that from doll aficionados.

109824010.baseEffect_:
Select 2 followers in play. Deal X damage to the first follower and Y damage to the second follower. X equals the attack of the second follower and Y equals the attack of the first follower.
(Can be played only when 2 targetable followers are in play.)
109824010.baseFlair_: I'll transcribe your cries to my scores and use those tears to play my orchestra! Let the concerto begin...

107834010.baseEffect_:
Banish an enemy follower.
Put a random Artifact card from your deck into your hand.
107834010.baseFlair_: Somewhere within the vast, infinite reaches of this dimension, surely there's a place befitting you.

108834010.baseEffect_:
Choose: Summon a Lloyd the Android or Victoria. Put a Puppet into your hand.
Enhance (7): Give the summoned follower +0/+3 and Bane.
108834010.baseFlair_: "This is a fight for Orchis!" "If that's what you want, then it's what you'll get!" —Zwei and Orchis

109834010.baseEffect_:
Transform an Artifact card in your hand into an Artifact Spark.
Deal 4 damage to the enemy leader.
(Can be played only when a targetable Artifact card is in your hand.)
109834010.baseFlair_: Only through the perspective of man can nothingness be. Through the perspective of the universe, even nothing exists as something.

900844040.baseEffect_:
Summon 3 Wretches.
If at least 20 allied followers have been destroyed this match, give them Storm.
900844040.baseFlair_: What is this pain which grips my chest? Is it anger? Confusion? Are... are you my prey? Why can't I remember?

100811050.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a random Artifact card from your deck into your hand.
100811050.baseFlair_: My mission has only just begun—this flesh of iron will be your end!
100811050.evoFlair_: My mission continues—you will not survive, for I am black iron incarnate!

107811080.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If Resonance is active for you, gain +1/+0 and Ward.
107811080.baseFlair_: They ain't much to look at, but they're everything to me... You won't lay a hand on my crew—these arms are for protecting!
107811080.evoFlair_: What'd you say to me, punk? Never underestimate a pirate! Don't say I didn't warn ya—these arms are for fighting!

113811030.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: If Resonance is active for you, gain Rush.
Fanfare: Enhance (9) - Gain +3/+3.
113811030.baseFlair_: Core mutations have led to one new discovery after another. We set out to create a prototype soldier— instead, a different beast was born. At times it takes the form of man. At others, a monster. We had no way of predicting it. —Mechalab Sound Archives (File 001)
113811030.evoFlair_: With the dawn of the mechanical age, the definition of the "optimal figure" has changed. Whether a creation takes form as a skillful man or powerful beast, either one shall serve its purpose effortlessly. —Comparison of Mechanical Mammoth and Prototype Soldier

119811030.baseFlair_: Liking toys is fine; just don't get too attached to 'em. For those of us who fix toys, drawing that line helps us to maintain our professionalism. Well, look at you, Mr. Hoot-hoot! Now that we've fixed up your casing, you look like a brand-new bird!
119811030.evoFlair_: Don't get me wrong, you've gotta put some heart into it if you want to do a good job. But it won't do to get personally invested in every toy you meet. Aww, Mr. Hoot-hoot, it's almost time for us to say goodbye... Why's this gotta be so hard?!

109821010.baseFlair_: This... This must be the inner garden. Ahaha... I've arrived! To think all I needed to make it to the promised land was cross that pathetic barrier!
109821010.evoEffect_: Evolve: Banish all enemy followers with 3 defense or less.
109821010.evoFlair_: Now then, how should I start with this garden's destruction? Aha... I know just the trick. I'll thoroughly grind it to dust! Ahaha!

107831010.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: Enhance (10) - Evolve this follower and this follower's attack is X until the end of the turn. X equals the number of allied Artifact cards destroyed during this match.
107831010.baseFlair_: A synthetic body, a synthetic life, a crossbreed. Neither human nor beast, what is my purpose in this life?
107831010.evoFlair_: What is my purpose in this life? I'll find my true purpose and make something of myself someday—just watch!

114831010.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, if Resonance is active for you or if an allied Naterran Great Tree is in play, summon a Cannon Hermit Crab and change its attack and defense to X/Y. X and Y are equal to half this follower's attack and defense, rounded up.
114831010.baseFlair_:
Concept: Waterproof and fully automated.
Subjects: Creatures already accustomed to armor.
Mission: Protect the peace without the need for human personnel.
—Domination Plan Proposal, Team C
114831010.evoFlair_: The giant hermit crab peacekeeping experiment came to a most startling conclusion: the number of test subject crabs no longer matched up with the number of equipment sets produced. Further investigation will be required to find out why. For the good of all of us.

110841030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Banish all cards in your deck. Then put 10 Mystic Artifacts, 10 Radiant Artifacts, and 10 Prime Artifacts into your deck.
110841030.baseFlair_: After they were abandoned by their god, the sages began to dream. They would remake their philosophy, the laws of the world... the world itself. Thousands of forsaken souls united to give birth to a single mechanism. A single whole. A single... order.
110841030.evoFlair_: The new order burst from the old world's body, turned, and consumed it. One planet was not enough to sate its hunger; and so it devoured and grew. As it waxed in size and power, it knew it was no mere creation. It was the sum and the genesis of all the cosmos's principles.

112841030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Banish all Machina cards from your deck. Put X Tisiphone, the Malignants, Y Alecto, the Dissonants, and Z Megaera, the Indignants into your deck. X, Y, and Z equal the number of Machina cards banished from your deck split randomly.
112841030.baseFlair_: What value is there in emotion? It's all just a dumb processing error. That's why I have to reclaim, reduce, and recycle them all—they're junk! Junk that I created! It hurts the pride to see your creations grow inefficient!
112841030.evoEffect_: Evolve: Put a random Machina card from your deck into your hand.
112841030.evoFlair_: Stop laughing. Stop crying. And stop staring at me like that. You're going to make me vomit with those stupid expressions. You know what, forget it. It's termination for you. I'll wring the oxygen from your lungs, the tears from your ducts, and the life from your body!

113841030.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Choose - Summon a Lloyd the Android or Marionette//Uno.
Whenever an allied Lloyd the Android comes into play, give it +2/+2.
Whenever an allied Marionette//Uno comes into play, summon a Marionette//Due.
113841030.baseFlair_:
I was spiteful. I was jealous. I wanted to erase you—surpass you.
But... I don't know anymore. Are we even enemies? What are we? I... I wonder what to even make of you anymore.
—Zwei, Resonant Heart
113841030.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Transform a Puppet in your hand into a Marionette//Tre.
Whenever an allied Lloyd the Android comes into play, give it +2/+2.
Whenever an allied Marionette//Uno comes into play, summon a Marionette//Due.
113841030.evoFlair_: From within her heart, she sought the answers. The folly of humanity. The righteousness of humanity. Seeking to witness them herself, she continues her journey. As the answers are revealed, her heart beats on.

116841030.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Whenever an allied Machina or Natura follower attacks, recover 1 play point.
At the end of your turn, if you have at least 1 play point, deal 5 damage to a random enemy follower. Then, if you have at least 3, deal 3 damage to all enemies.
116841030.baseFlair_: Its claws are state-of-the-art. They warp virtual mass and crush stars into dust. But to the great bear, even these ruinous weapons are but appendages. Fear not the blade—fear the flesh that wields it.
116841030.evoFlair_:
Activating Ometeotl: all systems online.
Code: FMD. OpticPilot, ready to go.
Inputting extermination sequence... Approved.
Things are about to get ugly.
—Ralmia, Sonic Racer

900841070.baseEffect_:
Storm.
Can attack 2 times per turn.
Last Words: Summon a Marionette//Uno and a Marionette//Due.
900841070.baseFlair_: Hatred. Last the girl despaired at the world of men and began to hate. "If these people won't learn, if they're going to be miserable forever, then—"
900841070.evoFlair_: Hatred. The girl finally came to despise the world as unsavable. "If this is how the world is, then someone should crush it to pieces!"

110811020.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Last Words: Put 2 Puppets into your hand.
110811020.baseFlair_:
Did you hear about the statue our neighbors gave us?
"Targets identified. Changing to battle mode."
After it started movin', it crushed a lot of good men.
"Strengthening battle parameters."
110811020.evoFlair_:
No matter what we did, it kept fighting.
"Damage minimal. Continuing battle operations."
When reinforcements arrived, it transformed.
"More targets acquired. Switching to annihilation mode."

114811010.baseEffect_:
Crystallize (1): Countdown (2)
At the end of your turn, put an Analyzing Artifact and an Ancient Artifact into your deck.
----------
Fanfare: Deal 4 damage to an enemy follower.
114811010.baseFlair_: Purifying rays, shining volley! Oh? One of the monsters actually survived. All right then, I'll just have to take it head-on!
114811010.evoFlair_:
"Not bad, not bad at all! I could get used to your brand of archery! Why don't you sail the seas with us aboard my ship, lassie?"
"Nah, I don't think I'd be able to stand you. I'll pass."
—Captain Meteo and Dazzling Archer

900811060.baseEffect_: Last Words: At the start of your next turn, summon a Prime Artifact.
900811060.baseFlair_: The entity has no consciousness of its own. But it was constructed for a reason: to continue endlessly onward; to advance. To surpass all conscious beings.
900811060.evoFlair_: The entity has no principles of its own. But it was made to fulfill an ideal: light is a signal of one's advancement. It will make all conscious beings bow down before it.

107821050.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal X damage to an enemy follower. X equals the number of remaining Artifact cards in your deck.
107821050.baseFlair_:
A construct of bronze, created to serve as a guardian of the south island. It never misses its rounds—once in the morning, once in the afternoon, and once in the evening.
—Island Tales, Chapter 2
107821050.evoFlair_:
As time marched on, the people eventually forgot its purpose. Even so, its trembles can be heard like clockwork—once in the morning, once in the afternoon, and once in the evening.
—Island Tales, Chapter 3

107831060.baseEffect_:
Can't attack the enemy leader.
At the end of your turn, randomly destroy an allied Artifact follower. Deal damage to the enemy leader equal to that follower's cost.
107831060.baseFlair_: FLY TODAY. FLY TOMORROW. FLY ANYWHERE AS ORDERED BY MASTER / A SHELL (DIVINE BULLET).
107831060.evoFlair_: FLY TODAY. FLY TOMORROW. MASTER OCCASIONALLY TAKES A RIDE / A CARRIAGE (DIVINE TRANSPORT)

108831010.baseFlair_: No one mocks me! I mean, I'm perfect! If you can't accept that, then I won't accept you!
108831010.evoEffect_: Evolve: Give an allied Victoria the ability to attack 2 times per turn.
108831010.evoFlair_: Oh, so I'm broken? A defect? That's so selfish of you to say! You won't get away with this! You won't! I'll shred anything that mocks me. Victoria!

113831010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Randomly summon copies of different allied Artifact followers destroyed during this match until your area is full.
113831010.baseFlair_:
The artifacts, they do not speak. One therefore shouldn't rely on language when dealing with them.
The veteran technician's actions communicated this to us.
—Specialist Records, Chapter 6
113831010.evoFlair_: (The artifacts speak. Every circuit in them tells an eloquent story. I don't talk to them because there's just no need—and, well, I'm the quiet type.)

108841020.baseEffect_: Whenever an effect puts cards into your deck, banish a random enemy follower or amulet.
108841020.baseFlair_: Its sudden appearance... blank and we... blank everything and everything... blank at least in the afterlife... blank —Book of Many Blanks
108841020.evoFlair_: Before any of us realized... blank so... blank and could appear any time... blank please take great care to... blank —Book of Many Blanks

108841030.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: Gain +X/+0. X equals the number of remaining Artifact cards in your deck.
Strike: Put 3 Artifact Rhinos into your deck.
108841030.baseFlair_: Life, metal—there's not a difference between them. Born from love or built by hand, they're bound to multiply, to spread like wildfire. —Words of a mechanical technician
108841030.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
108841030.evoFlair_: Why does life get ideas when it deals with metal? After all, it wears tempered steel, and it eats with custom silver. Life, metal—there's not a difference between them. They both multiply; they both spread like wildfire. —Words of a mechanical technician

109841010.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (3): Put a follower that originally costs 3 play points or less from your hand into play and give it Rush. Give your leader the following effect: Once on each of your turns, when an allied follower attacks, deal 1 damage to the enemy leader. (This effect lasts for the rest of the match.)
----------
Ambush.
109841010.baseFlair_: Affirmative. It's a long shot from here... But this rifle isn't just for show. I always hit my mark.
109841010.evoFlair_: R-really it was nothing... Don't praise me like that right after battle... I don't know—it just makes me self-conscious. Argh! Don't you think we're both a little too old for teasing like this!

112841010.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: Put a Gullian Aura and a Gullian Howl into your hand.
Whenever this follower takes damage, if this follower is not destroyed, summon an Assembly Droid.
112841010.baseFlair_: The final change brought radicalization. Everything we thought was wrong. The cores don't seem to have been created by mortals. And that includes this core believed to be the original as well... —Research Log, Part 4
112841010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
112841010.evoFlair_:
Verifying access request...
Failed.
Please input Origin Core code.
Authorizing access...
Code not recognized. Access Denied.

113841010.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (1): Put a random Machina card (excluding Magna Giant) from your deck into your hand.
----------
Ward.
Fanfare: Deal X damage to all enemy followers. X equals the number of allied Machina followers destroyed during this match.
113841010.baseFlair_: Core mutations have reached their zenith. On one hand, a mighty roar to govern all: Gullias. On the other, life breathes through an ancient warrior once more within a creation of steel. —Mechalab Sound Archives (File 003)
113841010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
113841010.evoFlair_:
"So you command this machine... A very impressive display! However! Valor is as equally important as power! Now witness, as the dawn of a new age rises—Magnaaa... Giaaant!"
—Magna Giant to Gullias, Silverbeast Lord

118841020.baseEffect_:
Invocation: At the start of your turn, if at least 20 allied followers have been destroyed this match, invoke this card.
----------
Ward.
Fanfare: Put a Dead to Rights into your hand.
When this follower comes into play, summon a Magitrain.
118841020.baseFlair_: The Titan of Prosperity is true to his title. He's the de facto ruler of Rivayle, a man of commerce whose mastery of the railways ensures his dominance. Better to obey the Gilded Autocrat than suffer his ghastly audit.
118841020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
118841020.evoFlair_: "That pissy sonuvagun's touch is spread throughout Rivayle, so of course he rules the roost. One word from him and the poor get fed dust while the rich get fat off lies. In my opinion, sugar, that's the cruelest witchery of all." —Nahtnaught, Cursed Queen

900841080.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: Gain +X/+0. X equals the number of remaining Artifact cards in your deck.
Strike: Put 3 Artifact Rhinos into your deck.
900841080.baseFlair_: Metal multiplies, and it spreads like wildfire. It bears the seeds of utility and sometimes sows destruction.
900841080.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
900841080.evoFlair_: Metal multiplies, and it spreads like wildfire. Its destruction is sure to reap some sort of benefit for life.

900814010.baseEffect_:
Whenever an allied Artifact follower is destroyed, subtract 1 from the cost of this card.
----------
Choose: Summon a Barrier Artifact, Keenedge Artifact, or Airstrike Artifact.
900814010.baseFlair_: To reconstruct reason, first you must reconstruct form.

900834030.baseEffect_:
Give +4/+0 and Storm to an allied Portalcraft follower.
If that follower is a Maisha, Hero of Purgation, give +X/+0 instead.  X equals the number of allied followers destroyed during this match.
900834030.baseFlair_:
"Is this it! Is this what a hero does!"
"That's how it seems to me. Am I wrong?"
—Erika and Maisha

107811110.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Put a random Artifact follower that costs 3 play points or less from your deck into play.
Repeat once if Resonance is active for you.
107811110.baseFlair_: Without a master to be guided by, the hungry whale wanders the skies, ravaging the earth below with enchanted explosives.
107811110.evoFlair_: In search of a new master, the colossal whale wanders the skies, singing a song akin to cries of lamentation.

111811010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Put 2 Puppets into your hand.
Whenever an allied Puppet comes into play, deal 1 damage to the enemy leader.
111811010.baseFlair_: A puppet modeled after or inspired by a wyrm of unknown origin. The strings running through it are all that gives it a semblance of volition.
111811010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
111811010.evoFlair_: A puppet modeled after or inspired by a wyrm of unknown origin. Although its body does not shelter the heart or pride of a dragon, it unleashes destruction all the same.

116821010.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (3): Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower. Put a Paradigm Shift into your hand.
----------
Fanfare: Choose - Summon a Radiant Artifact or Prime Artifact.
116821010.baseFlair_:
We continued to optimize machines for research. When we needed combat data, we created bots willing to take our places on the battlefield. Thus, we could continue to develop new technologies in complete safety.
—Tech Research and Development, Report 2
116821010.evoFlair_:
Some wonder why we are so devoted to our research. It is simple: we see the potential of technology. If deemed necessary, we would use our own bodies as test subjects. We mean to rewrite the history of all life in steel.
—Boon of Technology, Part 2

107831040.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, deal 2 damage to the enemy leader. If Resonance is active for you, deal 4 damage instead.
107831040.baseFlair_: Sword of folklore, saber of the heavens. A blade of gleaming sapphire shall purge the dark, and the light shall be deliver'd.
107831040.evoFlair_: Fate calls upon a savior to put an end to this eternal conflict, destined to cut through the chaos and restore harmony to this realm.

118831020.baseEffect_:

----------
Ward.
Fanfare: Recover 7 play points.
118831020.baseFlair_:
Magitrains are well-equipped to meet safety needs. They feature engineers with certain augmentations that truly connect them to their work. This allows magitrains to blast past any would-be wasteland bandits.
—Magitrains for Nimwits, Page 5
118831020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
118831020.evoFlair_: The steam whistle blows; passengers look up from their magazines. An arrival message plays over the intercom, and the train comes to a halt. With souvenirs in hand, the passengers disembark and reunite with their families on the platform. It's what makes our work worth it.

107841010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal X damage to all enemy followers. X equals the number of allied Artifact cards destroyed during this match.
107841010.baseFlair_: From the heavens, it looms over the earth below, as a reminder to all its inhabitants—the mechanical purge is nigh.
107841010.evoFlair_: The beings above have long since perished, but the mechanical purge knows no lifespan—simply awaiting the call, "awaken".

----------
Fanfare: Put 3 Puppets into your hand.
108841010.baseFlair_: Why do people love other people? Why do they hate them? I know that somewhere in the world the answer is waiting.
108841010.evoFlair_: Master gave me my heart. He's not here anymore, so I want to learn—learn why he gave it to me.

If you have at least 2 Puppets in your hand and 8 play points, Choose: Play this card as an Orchis, Resolute Puppet or Orchis, Vengeful Puppet.

706841010.evoFlair_: Master gave me my heart. He's not here anymore, so I want to learn—learn why he gave it to me.

112841020.evoFlair_: Once uttered, a commandment from this battle goddess must be followed. But in turn, for those people who martyr themselves in her name, she becomes their unwavering sword, banishing the enemies of mankind.

114841010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If Resonance is active for you or if an allied Naterran Great Tree is in play, gain Storm.
114841010.baseFlair_:
Concept: Base strength reinforced with armor and weaponry. Fully automated.
Subjects: Giant monsters with intellect.
Mission: Test limits of domination over nature.
—Domination Plan Proposal, Teams A, B, and C
114841010.evoFlair_: People may be foolish, thought the gorilla, but they make great things. After making full use of their new weapons to earn victory in battle, the gorilla ignored orders to return to base and struck out on its own. For the good of all of us.

116841020.baseEffect_:
Fusion: Machina
----------
Rush.
Fanfare: Randomly activate 1 of the following effects. Do this X times. X equals the number of cards fused to this card.
-Summon an Armored Tentacle.
-Summon an Assault Tentacle.
-Gain +3/+3 and draw 3 cards. (Draw up to 3 times.)
116841020.baseFlair_: So you've gathered up courage. Ooh, I'm so scared. Hah! I might find your efforts cute if they weren't so nauseating. Listen, I know the unknown—and I've seen your fates. So shut up, give up, and get those disgraceful mugs out of my sight. This world's already mine!
116841020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
116841020.evoFlair_: Desire, faith... The strong don't need any of that. Know why? They have it all already! They believe in nothing but themselves! So come on, do your dance of fury. Gather at your pity parties; spin your feeble bonds. It's meaningless—all of it! This world's already mine!

900841020.baseEffect_: Whenever an allied Puppet comes into play, transform it into a Lloyd the Android if there isn't an allied Lloyd the Android in play. At the end of your turn, restore 3 defense to your leader if there is an allied Lloyd the Android in play.
900841020.baseFlair_: Kindness, warmth, and love from people. They're the bonds that connect the world. Hey, Lloyd, you understand now, don't you? The meaning of living in this world?
900841020.evoFlair_: As long as there's love in my heart, the world and I are sure to stay connected. If you want to break that connection, then Lloyd and I will defeat you.

900841030.baseEffect_: Whenever an allied Puppet comes into play, transform it into a Marionette//Uno if there isn't an allied Marionette//Uno in play. Transform it into a Marionette//Due instead if there is an allied Marionette//Uno in play.
900841030.baseFlair_: This anger, sadness, and hatred toward people... I'm going to turn myself into something new. Ah, master, the reason that I'm alive is—
900841030.evoFlair_: This hatred in my heart. I know it's dividing me from the world. No... your words can't reach me anymore. I'll listen to my feelings and shred you to pieces.

900841100.baseEffect_:
Bane.
At the end of your turn, randomly put 2 different Portalcraft followers from your deck into play.
900841100.baseFlair_:
"Drink in defilement!"
"Purify it!"
Its decree washed over them, consumed them: violate. There is nothing left in this world, for soon it will be devoured whole.
900841100.evoFlair_:
"..."
"..."
Having fulfilled its commands, they were assimilated into the being's pure corruption. The world was soon to follow, ushering in a new blasphemous reality.

900841110.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Can attack 2 times per turn.
Follower Strike: Deal X damage to the enemy follower before it can deal any damage in return. X equals this follower's attack.
900841110.baseFlair_:
Target acquired. Switching to battle mode.
Activating quantum blade Naelaon.
I am Tisiphone, the Malignant. Ye who would trespass on forbidden ground, step forward and meet thy destruction.
900841110.evoFlair_: Charging complete. Activating quantum blade Naelaon. My blade, cut first thy wings. Fell second thy legs. Hunt third thine arms; gouge forth thine eyes. Sunder fifth thy neck. Pierce sixth thy heart.

900841120.baseEffect_:
At the end of your turn, summon 2 Assembly Droids.
Whenever another allied Machina follower comes into play, give it +3/+3.
900841120.baseFlair_:
Target acquired. Switching to battle mode.
Activating particle mace Kotaehge.
I am Alecto, the Dissonant. Ye who would trespass on forbidden ground, hear the cacophony and meet thy destruction.
900841120.evoFlair_:
Activating particle mace Kotaehge.
Optimizing battle pattern... Complete.
Accessing all unit mainframes... Authorization complete.
Manually overwriting system data. Forcing restart.
All units: Fusillade.

900841130.baseEffect_:
Bane.
Fanfare: Deal 5 damage to a random enemy follower and 6 damage to the enemy leader.
900841130.baseFlair_:
Target acquired. Switching to battle mode.
Activating wave cannon Iraliae.
I am Megaera, the Indignant. Ye who would trespass on forbidden ground, behold true fury and meet thy destruction.
900841130.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
900841130.evoFlair_:
Adapting battle protocol.
Charging wave cannon.
Charge complete.
Wave cannon Iraliae, standby. Fire.

900841200.baseEffect_:
Maneuver: Followers that originally cost at least 5 play points
When this follower becomes Maneuverable, banish all other followers (excluding Iceschillendrig, Gilded Autocrats).
900841200.baseFlair_:
Dear me, these iron horses are near perfect for life in the wild lands. Oh, thank the heavens for Lord Iceschillendrig.
—Syndicate Employee
900841200.evoFlair_:
Seat reservation is very simple. The quality of your seat, the speed of your car are determined by your intrinsic value. Your intrinsic value to me.
—Iceschillendrig

107821060.baseEffect_:
Storm.
Fanfare: Put a Puppet into your hand. Give +1/+0 and Storm to all Puppets in your hand.
107821060.baseFlair_: The depths of this sorrow are eternal. The past, the future—they matter not. All that remains is the pain of loss.
107821060.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
107821060.evoFlair_: Kill, my puppets! The time for vengeance has come. My hopes and dreams are but naught. If I cannot have her back, at least you'll have a taste of my anguish!

107821080.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: If there are any Artifact cards in your hand, randomly discard 1 and gain the following effect - Can't be targeted by enemy effects.
Can attack 2 times per turn.
107821080.baseFlair_: Would you really believe the gods to be faultless and infallible? They're bound to err occasionally—humankind is just one example of many missteps.
107821080.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
107821080.evoFlair_: Would you truly believe the gods to be flawless and unquestionable? Simply observe their failed creations—neglected and cast aside.

111831020.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (2): Banish an enemy follower with 2 defense or less. Put a Guardform Golem and a Strikeform Golem into your deck.
----------
Fanfare: Randomly put different Artifact followers from your deck into play until your area is full.
111831020.baseFlair_: I keep the link between the inner and outer realms: the Worldgate. And once opened, it shall usher in a new order. The novel will bring forth advancement, while the obsolete will fall to the wayside. But, please. Do not fear the coming change.
111831020.evoFlair_: I am but an observer, distantly peering toward the dual realms. Never once have I visited this world, until calamity reared its head. I am most fortunate the light and winds have brought me to you.

111841020.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (3): Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower. Then, if you have at least 1 evolution point, use 1 evolution point and deal 3 damage to all enemy followers. (You have 0 evolution points on turns you are unable to evolve.)
----------
Ward.
Fanfare: Deal 4 damage to an enemy.
Can't be targeted by enemy effects.
111841020.baseFlair_: Good and evil in excess are poisonous to this world. They are measured on the scales of heaven and earth, for balance is the only justice. Heresy against this principle is sin and will be dealt with thusly. Well, let me put it simply: this is pretty much it for you.
111841020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
111841020.evoFlair_: This world vacillates between good and evil like a rocking cradle. Who wishes to disturb this tranquility with wretched change? That is heresy, and heresy is sin. Superior or inferior, those who break this principle will be condemned.

115841030.baseEffect_:
Crystallize (2): Countdown (2)
At the end of your turn, randomly put a Guardform Golem or Strikeform Golem into your hand. Each of these followers can be added to your hand only once with this effect.
----------
Ward.
Fanfare: Deal X damage to all enemies. X equals the number of allied Artifact cards with different names destroyed this match.
115841030.baseFlair_:
"I've concluded that the Artifacts are not ancient relics. The data they gathered is, even now, being transmitted somewhere. There is an incredibly advanced civilization out there somewhere, observing us."
—Voice recording of a certain professor
115841030.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
115841030.evoFlair_:
"I finally isolated the data transmission. I've decrypted the destination... Now that's strange. This can't be right. Those coordinates would be far above our atmos—"
—Voice recording of a certain professor

119831020.baseEffect_:
Crystallize (5): During your turn, whenever an allied Artifact follower comes into play, give it Rush, recover 1 play point, and draw a card.
----------
Fanfare: Give +X/+X and Storm to another random allied follower. X equals the number of allied Artifact cards with different names destroyed this match.
119831020.baseFlair_:
You want an efficient way to move your resources to the front lines? Simple. Just kit out the factory itself as a moving fortress!
—"Passionate" Engineer
119831020.evoFlair_:
A little innovation goes a long way. The energy and manpower you put in will be more than worth it. Think about it this way—do you want to carefully manage your resources, or do you want to win this war?
—"Passionate" Engineer

900831050.baseEffect_:
At the end of your turn, randomly activate 1 of the following effects:
-Destroy a random enemy follower.
-Deal 4 damage to the enemy leader and restore 2 defense to your leader.
-Subtract 1 from the cost of all cards in your hand.
If this is your tenth turn or later, activate all instead.
900831050.baseFlair_:
Well, now that you've seen me, let's go ahead and make a new world order. If you're the light of this world, then I'm the darkness that will engulf it in chaos.
Aaah, how long I've waited for this day.
900831050.evoFlair_: Now I'll plunge the world into darkness. And after my embrace, not even your light will bring salvation. You should just give it up. There's no point saving anything anymore.

115841020.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (1): Select a card in your hand and banish the rest. Draw a card for each card you banished. If this is your first turn, draw 1 more.
----------
Fanfare: Deal 7 damage to the enemy leader and a random enemy follower. Restore 7 defense to your leader. Gain Ambush until the end of your opponent's turn.
115841020.baseFlair_: This new world needs only one god—me. I will overcome all adversity and bring my dream to fruition, no matter what. For the rest of you... it's game over.
115841020.evoFlair_: Omniscient Kaiser is my divine right to see all things. No matter what masses rise against me, they have no hope of victory. All shall kneel in deference to my will!

900842010.baseEffect_:
Whenever an allied follower is destroyed, subtract 1 from the cost of this card.
----------
Fanfare: Put a Destruction in Black into your hand.
Can't be destroyed by effects.
At the start of your turn, restore 2 defense to your leader.
900842010.baseFlair_: The urge to destroy is white. People's smiles on the morrow of the apocalypse will be evidence of the unstained righteousness of annihilation.

900842020.baseEffect_:
Whenever an allied follower is destroyed, subtract 1 from the cost of this card.
----------
Can't be destroyed by effects.
At the start of your turn, deal 5 damage to all enemies. If an allied Destruction in White is in play, deal 10 damage instead.
900842020.baseFlair_: The urge to destroy is black. People's smiles on the eve of the apocalypse are the corrupt obstacle hindering the inevitability of annihilation.
